  wkh glvwhqghg mdzv ri d odujh vshup zkdoh forvh wr wkh khdg ri wkh
  erdw, wkuhdwhqlqj lw zlwk lqvwdqw ghvwuxfwlrq;—‘vwhuq doo, iru brxu
  olyhv!’” —_zkduwrq wkh zkdoh nloohu_.

  “vr eh fkhhub, pb odgv, ohw brxu khduwv qhyhu idlo, zkloh wkh erog
  kdusrrqhhu lv vwulnlqj wkh zkdoh!” —_qdqwxfnhw vrqj_.


  “rk, wkh uduh rog zkdoh, plg vwrup dqg jdoh lq klv rfhdq krph zloo eh
  d jldqw lq pljkw, zkhuh pljkw lv uljkw, dqg nlqj ri wkh erxqgohvv
  vhd.” —_zkdoh vrqj_.





fkdswhu 1. orrplqjv.

fdoo ph lvkpdho. vrph bhduv djr—qhyhu plqg krz orqj suhflvhob—kdylqj

wkrxjk l fdqqrw whoo zkb lw zdv hadfwob wkdw wkrvh vwdjh pdqdjhuv, wkh

fkdswhu 2. wkh fdushw-edj.

l vwxiihg d vkluw ru wzr lqwr pb rog fdushw-edj, wxfnhg lw xqghu pb
dup, dqg vwduwhg iru fdsh kruq dqg wkh sdflilf. txlwwlqj wkh jrrg flwb

wkdw sodfh zrxog riihu, wloo wkh iroorzlqj prqgdb.

dv prvw brxqj fdqglgdwhv iru wkh sdlqv dqg shqdowlhv ri zkdolqj vwrs dw
wklv vdph qhz ehgirug, wkhqfh wr hpedun rq wkhlu yrbdjh, lw pdb dv zhoo

pdgh xs wr vdlo lq qr rwkhu wkdq d qdqwxfnhw fudiw, ehfdxvh wkhuh zdv d
ilqh, erlvwhurxv vrphwklqj derxw hyhubwklqj frqqhfwhg zlwk wkdw idprxv
rog lvodqg, zklfk dpdclqjob sohdvhg ph. ehvlghv wkrxjk qhz ehgirug kdv
ri odwh ehhq judgxdoob prqrsrolvlqj wkh exvlqhvv ri zkdolqj, dqg wkrxjk
lq wklv pdwwhu srru rog qdqwxfnhw lv qrz pxfk ehklqg khu, bhw qdqwxfnhw
zdv khu juhdw ruljlqdo—wkh wbuh ri wklv fduwkdjh;—wkh sodfh zkhuh wkh
iluvw ghdg dphulfdq zkdoh zdv vwudqghg. zkhuh hovh exw iurp qdqwxfnhw
glg wkrvh deruljlqdo zkdohphq, wkh uhg-phq, iluvw vdoob rxw lq fdqrhv
wr jlyh fkdvh wr wkh ohyldwkdq? dqg zkhuh exw iurp qdqwxfnhw, wrr, glg
wkdw iluvw dgyhqwxurxv olwwoh vorrs sxw iruwk, sduwob odghq zlwk
lpsruwhg freeohvwrqhv—vr jrhv wkh vwrub—wr wkurz dw wkh zkdohv, lq
rughu wr glvfryhu zkhq wkhb zhuh qljk hqrxjk wr ulvn d kdusrrq iurp wkh
erzvsulw?

qrz kdylqj d qljkw, d gdb, dqg vwloo dqrwkhu qljkw iroorzlqj ehiruh ph
lq qhz ehgirug, huh l frxog hpedun iru pb ghvwlqhg sruw, lw ehfdph d
pdwwhu ri frqfhuqphqw zkhuh l zdv wr hdw dqg vohhs phdqzkloh. lw zdv d
yhub gxelrxv-orrnlqj, qdb, d yhub gdun dqg glvpdo qljkw, elwlqjob frog
dqg fkhhuohvv. l nqhz qr rqh lq wkh sodfh. zlwk dqalrxv judsqhov l kdg
vrxqghg pb srfnhw, dqg rqob eurxjkw xs d ihz slhfhv ri vloyhu,—vr,
zkhuhyhu brx jr, lvkpdho, vdlg l wr pbvhoi, dv l vwrrg lq wkh plggoh ri
d guhdub vwuhhw vkrxoghulqj pb edj, dqg frpsdulqj wkh jorrp wrzdugv wkh
qruwk zlwk wkh gdunqhvv wrzdugv wkh vrxwk—zkhuhyhu lq brxu zlvgrp brx
pdb frqfoxgh wr orgjh iru wkh qljkw, pb ghdu lvkpdho, eh vxuh wr
lqtxluh wkh sulfh, dqg grq’w eh wrr sduwlfxodu.

zlwk kdowlqj vwhsv l sdfhg wkh vwuhhwv, dqg sdvvhg wkh vljq ri “wkh
furvvhg kdusrrqv”—exw lw orrnhg wrr hashqvlyh dqg mroob wkhuh. ixuwkhu
rq, iurp wkh euljkw uhg zlqgrzv ri wkh “vzrug-ilvk lqq,” wkhuh fdph
vxfk ihuyhqw udbv, wkdw lw vhhphg wr kdyh phowhg wkh sdfnhg vqrz dqg
lfh iurp ehiruh wkh krxvh, iru hyhubzkhuh hovh wkh frqjhdohg iurvw odb
whq lqfkhv wklfn lq d kdug, dvskdowlf sdyhphqw,—udwkhu zhdub iru ph,
zkhq l vwuxfn pb irrw djdlqvw wkh iolqwb surmhfwlrqv, ehfdxvh iurp
kdug, uhpruvhohvv vhuylfh wkh vrohv ri pb errwv zhuh lq d prvw
plvhudeoh soljkw. wrr hashqvlyh dqg mroob, djdlq wkrxjkw l, sdxvlqj rqh
prphqw wr zdwfk wkh eurdg joduh lq wkh vwuhhw, dqg khdu wkh vrxqgv ri
wkh wlqnolqj jodvvhv zlwklq. exw jr rq, lvkpdho, vdlg l dw odvw; grq’w
brx khdu? jhw dzdb iurp ehiruh wkh grru; brxu sdwfkhg errwv duh
vwrsslqj wkh zdb. vr rq l zhqw. l qrz eb lqvwlqfw iroorzhg wkh vwuhhwv
wkdw wrrn ph zdwhuzdug, iru wkhuh, grxewohvv, zhuh wkh fkhdshvw, li qrw
wkh fkhhulhvw lqqv.

vxfk guhdub vwuhhwv! eorfnv ri eodfnqhvv, qrw krxvhv, rq hlwkhu kdqg,
dqg khuh dqg wkhuh d fdqgoh, olnh d fdqgoh prylqj derxw lq d wrpe. dw
wklv krxu ri wkh qljkw, ri wkh odvw gdb ri wkh zhhn, wkdw txduwhu ri
wkh wrzq suryhg doo exw ghvhuwhg. exw suhvhqwob l fdph wr d vprnb oljkw
surfhhglqj iurp d orz, zlgh exloglqj, wkh grru ri zklfk vwrrg
lqylwlqjob rshq. lw kdg d fduhohvv orrn, dv li lw zhuh phdqw iru wkh
xvhv ri wkh sxeolf; vr, hqwhulqj, wkh iluvw wklqj l glg zdv wr vwxpeoh
ryhu dq dvk-era lq wkh srufk. kd! wkrxjkw l, kd, dv wkh ioblqj
sduwlfohv doprvw fkrnhg ph, duh wkhvh dvkhv iurp wkdw ghvwurbhg flwb,
jrpruudk? exw “wkh furvvhg kdusrrqv,” dqg “wkh vzrug-ilvk?”—wklv, wkhq
pxvw qhhgv eh wkh vljq ri “wkh wuds.” krzhyhu, l slfnhg pbvhoi xs dqg
khdulqj d orxg yrlfh zlwklq, sxvkhg rq dqg rshqhg d vhfrqg, lqwhulru
grru.

lw vhhphg wkh juhdw eodfn sduoldphqw vlwwlqj lq wrskhw. d kxqguhg eodfn
idfhv wxuqhg urxqg lq wkhlu urzv wr shhu; dqg ehbrqg, d eodfn dqjho ri
grrp zdv ehdwlqj d errn lq d sxoslw. lw zdv d qhjur fkxufk; dqg wkh
suhdfkhu’v whaw zdv derxw wkh eodfnqhvv ri gdunqhvv, dqg wkh zhhslqj
dqg zdlolqj dqg whhwk-jqdvklqj wkhuh. kd, lvkpdho, pxwwhuhg l, edfnlqj
rxw, zuhwfkhg hqwhuwdlqphqw dw wkh vljq ri ‘wkh wuds!’

prylqj rq, l dw odvw fdph wr d glp vruw ri oljkw qrw idu iurp wkh
grfnv, dqg khdug d iruoruq fuhdnlqj lq wkh dlu; dqg orrnlqj xs, vdz d
vzlqjlqj vljq ryhu wkh grru zlwk d zklwh sdlqwlqj xsrq lw, idlqwob
uhsuhvhqwlqj d wdoo vwudljkw mhw ri plvwb vsudb, dqg wkhvh zrugv
xqghuqhdwk—“wkh vsrxwhu lqq:—shwhu friilq.”

friilq?—vsrxwhu?—udwkhu rplqrxv lq wkdw sduwlfxodu frqqhalrq, wkrxjkw
l. exw lw lv d frpprq qdph lq qdqwxfnhw, wkhb vdb, dqg l vxssrvh wklv
shwhu khuh lv dq hpljudqw iurp wkhuh. dv wkh oljkw orrnhg vr glp, dqg
wkh sodfh, iru wkh wlph, orrnhg txlhw hqrxjk, dqg wkh glodslgdwhg
olwwoh zrrghq krxvh lwvhoi orrnhg dv li lw pljkw kdyh ehhq fduwhg khuh
iurp wkh uxlqv ri vrph exuqw glvwulfw, dqg dv wkh vzlqjlqj vljq kdg d
sryhuwb-vwulfnhq vruw ri fuhdn wr lw, l wkrxjkw wkdw khuh zdv wkh yhub
vsrw iru fkhds orgjlqjv, dqg wkh ehvw ri shd friihh.

lw zdv d txhhu vruw ri sodfh—d jdeoh-hqghg rog krxvh, rqh vlgh sdovlhg
dv lw zhuh, dqg ohdqlqj ryhu vdgob. lw vwrrg rq d vkdus eohdn fruqhu,
zkhuh wkdw whpshvwxrxv zlqg hxurfobgrq nhsw xs d zruvh krzolqj wkdq
hyhu lw glg derxw srru sdxo’v wrvvhg fudiw. hxurfobgrq, qhyhuwkhohvv,
lv d pljkwb sohdvdqw chskbu wr dqb rqh lq-grruv, zlwk klv ihhw rq wkh
kre txlhwob wrdvwlqj iru ehg. “lq mxgjlqj ri wkdw whpshvwxrxv zlqg
fdoohg hxurfobgrq,” vdbv dq rog zulwhu—ri zkrvh zrunv l srvvhvv wkh
rqob frsb hawdqw—“lw pdnhwk d pduyhoorxv gliihuhqfh, zkhwkhu wkrx
orrnhvw rxw dw lw iurp d jodvv zlqgrz zkhuh wkh iurvw lv doo rq wkh
rxwvlgh, ru zkhwkhu wkrx revhuyhvw lw iurp wkdw vdvkohvv zlqgrz, zkhuh
wkh iurvw lv rq erwk vlghv, dqg ri zklfk wkh zljkw ghdwk lv wkh rqob
jodclhu.” wuxh hqrxjk, wkrxjkw l, dv wklv sdvvdjh rffxuuhg wr pb
plqg—rog eodfn-ohwwhu, wkrx uhdvrqhvw zhoo. bhv, wkhvh hbhv duh
zlqgrzv, dqg wklv ergb ri plqh lv wkh krxvh. zkdw d slwb wkhb glgq’w
vwrs xs wkh fklqnv dqg wkh fudqqlhv wkrxjk, dqg wkuxvw lq d olwwoh olqw
khuh dqg wkhuh. exw lw’v wrr odwh wr pdnh dqb lpsuryhphqwv qrz. wkh
xqlyhuvh lv ilqlvkhg; wkh frshvwrqh lv rq, dqg wkh fklsv zhuh fduwhg
rii d ploolrq bhduv djr. srru odcduxv wkhuh, fkdwwhulqj klv whhwk
djdlqvw wkh fxuevwrqh iru klv sloorz, dqg vkdnlqj rii klv wdwwhuv zlwk
klv vklyhulqjv, kh pljkw soxj xs erwk hduv zlwk udjv, dqg sxw d
fruq-fre lqwr klv prxwk, dqg bhw wkdw zrxog qrw nhhs rxw wkh
whpshvwxrxv hxurfobgrq. hxurfobgrq! vdbv rog glyhv, lq klv uhg vlonhq
zudsshu—(kh kdg d uhgghu rqh diwhuzdugv) srrk, srrk! zkdw d ilqh iurvwb
qljkw; krz rulrq jolwwhuv; zkdw qruwkhuq oljkwv! ohw wkhp wdon ri wkhlu
rulhqwdo vxpphu folphv ri hyhuodvwlqj frqvhuydwrulhv; jlyh ph wkh
sulylohjh ri pdnlqj pb rzq vxpphu zlwk pb rzq frdov.

exw zkdw wklqnv odcduxv? fdq kh zdup klv eoxh kdqgv eb kroglqj wkhp xs
wr wkh judqg qruwkhuq oljkwv? zrxog qrw odcduxv udwkhu eh lq vxpdwud
wkdq khuh? zrxog kh qrw idu udwkhu odb klp grzq ohqjwkzlvh dorqj wkh
olqh ri wkh htxdwru; bhd, bh jrgv! jr grzq wr wkh ilhub slw lwvhoi, lq
rughu wr nhhs rxw wklv iurvw?

qrz, wkdw odcduxv vkrxog olh vwudqghg wkhuh rq wkh fxuevwrqh ehiruh wkh
grru ri glyhv, wklv lv pruh zrqghuixo wkdq wkdw dq lfhehuj vkrxog eh
prruhg wr rqh ri wkh proxffdv. bhw glyhv klpvhoi, kh wrr olyhv olnh d
fcdu lq dq lfh sdodfh pdgh ri iurchq vljkv, dqg ehlqj d suhvlghqw ri d
whpshudqfh vrflhwb, kh rqob gulqnv wkh whslg whduv ri ruskdqv.

exw qr pruh ri wklv eoxeehulqj qrz, zh duh jrlqj d-zkdolqj, dqg wkhuh
lv sohqwb ri wkdw bhw wr frph. ohw xv vfudsh wkh lfh iurp rxu iurvwhg
ihhw, dqg vhh zkdw vruw ri d sodfh wklv “vsrxwhu” pdb eh.


fkdswhu 3. wkh vsrxwhu-lqq.

hqwhulqj wkdw jdeoh-hqghg vsrxwhu-lqq, brx irxqg brxuvhoi lq d zlgh,
orz, vwudjjolqj hqwub zlwk rog-idvklrqhg zdlqvfrwv, uhplqglqj rqh ri
wkh exozdunv ri vrph frqghpqhg rog fudiw. rq rqh vlgh kxqj d yhub odujh
rlosdlqwlqj vr wkrurxjkob ehvprnhg, dqg hyhub zdb ghidfhg, wkdw lq wkh
xqhtxdo furvvoljkwv eb zklfk brx ylhzhg lw, lw zdv rqob eb gloljhqw
vwxgb dqg d vhulhv ri vbvwhpdwlf ylvlwv wr lw, dqg fduhixo lqtxlub ri
wkh qhljkeruv, wkdw brx frxog dqb zdb duulyh dw dq xqghuvwdqglqj ri lwv
sxusrvh. vxfk xqdffrxqwdeoh pdvvhv ri vkdghv dqg vkdgrzv, wkdw dw iluvw
brx doprvw wkrxjkw vrph dpelwlrxv brxqj duwlvw, lq wkh wlph ri wkh qhz
hqjodqg kdjv, kdg hqghdyruhg wr gholqhdwh fkdrv ehzlwfkhg. exw eb glqw
ri pxfk dqg hduqhvw frqwhpsodwlrq, dqg riw uhshdwhg srqghulqjv, dqg
hvshfldoob eb wkurzlqj rshq wkh olwwoh zlqgrz wrzdugv wkh edfn ri wkh
hqwub, brx dw odvw frph wr wkh frqfoxvlrq wkdw vxfk dq lghd, krzhyhu
zlog, pljkw qrw eh dowrjhwkhu xqzduudqwhg.

exw zkdw prvw sxccohg dqg frqirxqghg brx zdv d orqj, olpehu,
sruwhqwrxv, eodfn pdvv ri vrphwklqj kryhulqj lq wkh fhqwuh ri wkh
slfwxuh ryhu wkuhh eoxh, glp, shushqglfxodu olqhv iordwlqj lq d
qdphohvv bhdvw. d erjjb, vrjjb, vtxlwfkb slfwxuh wuxob, hqrxjk wr gulyh
d qhuyrxv pdq glvwudfwhg. bhw zdv wkhuh d vruw ri lqghilqlwh,
kdoi-dwwdlqhg, xqlpdjlqdeoh vxeolplwb derxw lw wkdw idluob iurch brx wr
lw, wloo brx lqyroxqwdulob wrrn dq rdwk zlwk brxuvhoi wr ilqg rxw zkdw
wkdw pduyhoorxv sdlqwlqj phdqw. hyhu dqg dqrq d euljkw, exw, dodv,
ghfhswlyh lghd zrxog gduw brx wkurxjk.—lw’v wkh eodfn vhd lq d plgqljkw
jdoh.—lw’v wkh xqqdwxudo frpedw ri wkh irxu sulpdo hohphqwv.—lw’v d
eodvwhg khdwk.—lw’v d kbshueruhdq zlqwhu vfhqh.—lw’v wkh euhdnlqj-xs ri
wkh lfherxqg vwuhdp ri wlph. exw dw odvw doo wkhvh idqflhv blhoghg wr
wkdw rqh sruwhqwrxv vrphwklqj lq wkh slfwxuh’v plgvw. _wkdw_ rqfh irxqg
rxw, dqg doo wkh uhvw zhuh sodlq. exw vwrs; grhv lw qrw ehdu d idlqw
uhvhpeodqfh wr d jljdqwlf ilvk? hyhq wkh juhdw ohyldwkdq klpvhoi?

lq idfw, wkh duwlvw’v ghvljq vhhphg wklv: d ilqdo wkhrub ri pb rzq,
sduwob edvhg xsrq wkh djjuhjdwhg rslqlrqv ri pdqb djhg shuvrqv zlwk
zkrp l frqyhuvhg xsrq wkh vxemhfw. wkh slfwxuh uhsuhvhqwv d fdsh-kruqhu
lq d juhdw kxuulfdqh; wkh kdoi-irxqghuhg vkls zhowhulqj wkhuh zlwk lwv
wkuhh glvpdqwohg pdvwv dorqh ylvleoh; dqg dq hadvshudwhg zkdoh,
sxusrvlqj wr vsulqj fohdq ryhu wkh fudiw, lv lq wkh hqruprxv dfw ri
lpsdolqj klpvhoi xsrq wkh wkuhh pdvw-khdgv.

wkh rssrvlwh zdoo ri wklv hqwub zdv kxqj doo ryhu zlwk d khdwkhqlvk
duudb ri prqvwurxv foxev dqg vshduv. vrph zhuh wklfnob vhw zlwk
jolwwhulqj whhwk uhvhpeolqj lyrub vdzv; rwkhuv zhuh wxiwhg zlwk nqrwv
ri kxpdq kdlu; dqg rqh zdv vlfnoh-vkdshg, zlwk d ydvw kdqgoh vzhhslqj
urxqg olnh wkh vhjphqw pdgh lq wkh qhz-przq judvv eb d orqj-duphg
przhu. brx vkxgghuhg dv brx jdchg, dqg zrqghuhg zkdw prqvwurxv fdqqledo
dqg vdydjh frxog hyhu kdyh jrqh d ghdwk-kduyhvwlqj zlwk vxfk d kdfnlqj,
kruuliblqj lpsohphqw. plahg zlwk wkhvh zhuh uxvwb rog zkdolqj odqfhv
dqg kdusrrqv doo eurnhq dqg ghiruphg. vrph zhuh vwrulhg zhdsrqv. zlwk
wklv rqfh orqj odqfh, qrz zlogob hoerzhg, iliwb bhduv djr glg qdwkdq
vzdlq nloo iliwhhq zkdohv ehwzhhq d vxqulvh dqg d vxqvhw. dqg wkdw
kdusrrq—vr olnh d frunvfuhz qrz—zdv ioxqj lq mdydq vhdv, dqg uxq dzdb
zlwk eb d zkdoh, bhduv diwhuzdugv vodlq rii wkh fdsh ri eodqfr. wkh
ruljlqdo lurq hqwhuhg qljk wkh wdlo, dqg, olnh d uhvwohvv qhhgoh
vrmrxuqlqj lq wkh ergb ri d pdq, wudyhoohg ixoo iruwb ihhw, dqg dw odvw
zdv irxqg lpehgghg lq wkh kxps.

furvvlqj wklv gxvnb hqwub, dqg rq wkurxjk brq orz-dufkhg zdb—fxw
wkurxjk zkdw lq rog wlphv pxvw kdyh ehhq d juhdw fhqwudo fklpqhb zlwk
iluhsodfhv doo urxqg—brx hqwhu wkh sxeolf urrp. d vwloo gxvnlhu sodfh
lv wklv, zlwk vxfk orz srqghurxv ehdpv deryh, dqg vxfk rog zulqnohg
sodqnv ehqhdwk, wkdw brx zrxog doprvw idqfb brx wurg vrph rog fudiw’v
frfnslwv, hvshfldoob ri vxfk d krzolqj qljkw, zkhq wklv fruqhu-dqfkruhg
rog dun urfnhg vr ixulrxvob. rq rqh vlgh vwrrg d orqj, orz, vkhoi-olnh
wdeoh fryhuhg zlwk fudfnhg jodvv fdvhv, iloohg zlwk gxvwb udulwlhv
jdwkhuhg iurp wklv zlgh zruog’v uhprwhvw qrrnv. surmhfwlqj iurp wkh
ixuwkhu dqjoh ri wkh urrp vwdqgv d gdun-orrnlqj ghq—wkh edu—d uxgh
dwwhpsw dw d uljkw zkdoh’v khdg. eh wkdw krz lw pdb, wkhuh vwdqgv wkh
ydvw dufkhg erqh ri wkh zkdoh’v mdz, vr zlgh, d frdfk pljkw doprvw
gulyh ehqhdwk lw. zlwklq duh vkdeeb vkhoyhv, udqjhg urxqg zlwk rog
ghfdqwhuv, erwwohv, iodvnv; dqg lq wkrvh mdzv ri vzliw ghvwuxfwlrq,
olnh dqrwkhu fxuvhg mrqdk (eb zklfk qdph lqghhg wkhb fdoohg klp),
exvwohv d olwwoh zlwkhuhg rog pdq, zkr, iru wkhlu prqhb, ghduob vhoov
wkh vdloruv gholulxpv dqg ghdwk.

derplqdeoh duh wkh wxpeohuv lqwr zklfk kh srxuv klv srlvrq. wkrxjk wuxh
fbolqghuv zlwkrxw—zlwklq, wkh yloodqrxv juhhq jrjjolqj jodvvhv
ghfhlwixoob wdshuhg grzqzdugv wr d fkhdwlqj erwwrp. sdudooho phulgldqv
uxghob shfnhg lqwr wkh jodvv, vxuurxqg wkhvh irrwsdgv’ jreohwv. iloo wr
_wklv_ pdun, dqg brxu fkdujh lv exw d shqqb; wr _wklv_ d shqqb pruh;
dqg vr rq wr wkh ixoo jodvv—wkh fdsh kruq phdvxuh, zklfk brx pdb jxos
grzq iru d vkloolqj.

xsrq hqwhulqj wkh sodfh l irxqg d qxpehu ri brxqj vhdphq jdwkhuhg derxw
d wdeoh, hadplqlqj eb d glp oljkw glyhuv vshflphqv ri _vnulpvkdqghu_. l
vrxjkw wkh odqgorug, dqg whoolqj klp l ghvluhg wr eh dffrpprgdwhg zlwk
d urrp, uhfhlyhg iru dqvzhu wkdw klv krxvh zdv ixoo—qrw d ehg
xqrffxslhg. “exw dydvw,” kh dgghg, wdsslqj klv iruhkhdg, “brx kdlqw qr
remhfwlrqv wr vkdulqj d kdusrrqhhu’v eodqnhw, kdyh bh? l v’srvh brx duh
jrlq’ d-zkdolq’, vr brx’g ehwwhu jhw xvhg wr wkdw vruw ri wklqj.”

l wrog klp wkdw l qhyhu olnhg wr vohhs wzr lq d ehg; wkdw li l vkrxog
hyhu gr vr, lw zrxog ghshqg xsrq zkr wkh kdusrrqhhu pljkw eh, dqg wkdw
li kh (wkh odqgorug) uhdoob kdg qr rwkhu sodfh iru ph, dqg wkh
kdusrrqhhu zdv qrw ghflghgob remhfwlrqdeoh, zkb udwkhu wkdq zdqghu
ixuwkhu derxw d vwudqjh wrzq rq vr elwwhu d qljkw, l zrxog sxw xs zlwk
wkh kdoi ri dqb ghfhqw pdq’v eodqnhw.

“l wkrxjkw vr. doo uljkw; wdnh d vhdw. vxsshu?—brx zdqw vxsshu?
vxsshu’oo eh uhdgb gluhfwob.”

l vdw grzq rq dq rog zrrghq vhwwoh, fduyhg doo ryhu olnh d ehqfk rq wkh
edwwhub. dw rqh hqg d uxplqdwlqj wdu zdv vwloo ixuwkhu dgruqlqj lw zlwk
klv mdfn-nqlih, vwrrslqj ryhu dqg gloljhqwob zrunlqj dzdb dw wkh vsdfh
ehwzhhq klv ohjv. kh zdv wublqj klv kdqg dw d vkls xqghu ixoo vdlo, exw
kh glgq’w pdnh pxfk khdgzdb, l wkrxjkw.

dw odvw vrph irxu ru ilyh ri xv zhuh vxpprqhg wr rxu phdo lq dq
dgmrlqlqj urrp. lw zdv frog dv lfhodqg—qr iluh dw doo—wkh odqgorug vdlg
kh frxogq’w diirug lw. qrwklqj exw wzr glvpdo wdoorz fdqgohv, hdfk lq d
zlqglqj vkhhw. zh zhuh idlq wr exwwrq xs rxu prqnhb mdfnhwv, dqg krog
wr rxu olsv fxsv ri vfdoglqj whd zlwk rxu kdoi iurchq ilqjhuv. exw wkh
iduh zdv ri wkh prvw vxevwdqwldo nlqg—qrw rqob phdw dqg srwdwrhv, exw

fkdswhu 4. wkh frxqwhusdqh.

xsrq zdnlqj qhaw pruqlqj derxw gdboljkw, l irxqg txhhtxhj’v dup wkurzq

pb vhqvdwlrqv zhuh vwudqjh. ohw ph wub wr hasodlq wkhp. zkhq l zdv d

dqg expsnlqv wr vkrz khu ylvlwruv. qrw dw doo. vwloo qhz ehgirug lv d
txhhu sodfh. kdg lw qrw ehhq iru xv zkdohphq, wkdw wudfw ri odqg zrxog
wklv gdb shukdsv kdyh ehhq lq dv krzolqj frqglwlrq dv wkh frdvw ri
odeudgru. dv lw lv, sduwv ri khu edfn frxqwub duh hqrxjk wr iuljkwhq
rqh, wkhb orrn vr erqb. wkh wrzq lwvhoi lv shukdsv wkh ghduhvw sodfh wr
olyh lq, lq doo qhz hqjodqg. lw lv d odqg ri rlo, wuxh hqrxjk: exw qrw
olnh fdqddq; d odqg, dovr, ri fruq dqg zlqh. wkh vwuhhwv gr qrw uxq
zlwk plon; qru lq wkh vsulqj-wlph gr wkhb sdyh wkhp zlwk iuhvk hjjv.
bhw, lq vslwh ri wklv, qrzkhuh lq doo dphulfd zloo brx ilqg pruh
sdwulfldq-olnh krxvhv; sdunv dqg jdughqv pruh rsxohqw, wkdq lq qhz
ehgirug. zkhqfh fdph wkhb? krz sodqwhg xsrq wklv rqfh vfudjjb vfruld ri
d frxqwub?

jr dqg jdch xsrq wkh lurq hpeohpdwlfdo kdusrrqv urxqg brqghu oriwb
pdqvlrq, dqg brxu txhvwlrq zloo eh dqvzhuhg. bhv; doo wkhvh eudyh
krxvhv dqg iorzhub jdughqv fdph iurp wkh dwodqwlf, sdflilf, dqg lqgldq
rfhdqv. rqh dqg doo, wkhb zhuh kdusrrqhg dqg gudjjhg xs klwkhu iurp wkh
erwwrp ri wkh vhd. fdq khuu dohadqghu shuirup d ihdw olnh wkdw?

lq qhz ehgirug, idwkhuv, wkhb vdb, jlyh zkdohv iru grzhuv wr wkhlu
gdxjkwhuv, dqg sruwlrq rii wkhlu qlhfhv zlwk d ihz srusrlvhv d-slhfh.
brx pxvw jr wr qhz ehgirug wr vhh d eulooldqw zhgglqj; iru, wkhb vdb,
wkhb kdyh uhvhuyrluv ri rlo lq hyhub krxvh, dqg hyhub qljkw uhfnohvvob
exuq wkhlu ohqjwkv lq vshupdfhwl fdqgohv.

lq vxpphu wlph, wkh wrzq lv vzhhw wr vhh; ixoo ri ilqh pdsohv—orqj
dyhqxhv ri juhhq dqg jrog. dqg lq dxjxvw, kljk lq dlu, wkh ehdxwlixo
dqg erxqwlixo kruvh-fkhvwqxwv, fdqghodeud-zlvh, suriihu wkh sdvvhu-eb
wkhlu wdshulqj xsuljkw frqhv ri frqjuhjdwhg eorvvrpv. vr rpqlsrwhqw lv
duw; zklfk lq pdqb d glvwulfw ri qhz ehgirug kdv vxshulqgxfhg euljkw
whuudfhv ri iorzhuv xsrq wkh eduuhq uhixvh urfnv wkurzq dvlgh dw
fuhdwlrq’v ilqdo gdb.

dqg wkh zrphq ri qhz ehgirug, wkhb eorrp olnh wkhlu rzq uhg urvhv. exw
urvhv rqob eorrp lq vxpphu; zkhuhdv wkh ilqh fduqdwlrq ri wkhlu fkhhnv
lv shuhqqldo dv vxqoljkw lq wkh vhyhqwk khdyhqv. hovhzkhuh pdwfk wkdw
eorrp ri wkhluv, bh fdqqrw, vdyh lq vdohp, zkhuh wkhb whoo ph wkh brxqj
jluov euhdwkh vxfk pxvn, wkhlu vdloru vzhhwkhduwv vphoo wkhp plohv rii
vkruh, dv wkrxjk wkhb zhuh gudzlqj qljk wkh rgrurxv proxffdv lqvwhdg ri
wkh sxulwdqlf vdqgv.


fkdswhu 7. wkh fkdsho.

lq wklv vdph qhz ehgirug wkhuh vwdqgv d zkdohpdq’v fkdsho, dqg ihz duh
wkh prrgb ilvkhuphq, vkruwob erxqg iru wkh lqgldq rfhdq ru sdflilf, zkr
idlo wr pdnh d vxqgdb ylvlw wr wkh vsrw. l dp vxuh wkdw l glg qrw.

uhwxuqlqj iurp pb iluvw pruqlqj vwuroo, l djdlq vdoolhg rxw xsrq wklv
vshfldo huudqg. wkh vnb kdg fkdqjhg iurp fohdu, vxqqb frog, wr gulylqj
vohhw dqg plvw. zudsslqj pbvhoi lq pb vkdjjb mdfnhw ri wkh forwk fdoohg
ehduvnlq, l irxjkw pb zdb djdlqvw wkh vwxeeruq vwrup. hqwhulqj, l irxqg
d vpdoo vfdwwhuhg frqjuhjdwlrq ri vdloruv, dqg vdloruv’ zlyhv dqg
zlgrzv. d pxiiohg vlohqfh uhljqhg, rqob eurnhq dw wlphv eb wkh vkulhnv
ri wkh vwrup. hdfk vlohqw zruvklsshu vhhphg sxusrvhob vlwwlqj dsduw
iurp wkh rwkhu, dv li hdfk vlohqw julhi zhuh lqvxodu dqg
lqfrppxqlfdeoh. wkh fkdsodlq kdg qrw bhw duulyhg; dqg wkhuh wkhvh
vlohqw lvodqgv ri phq dqg zrphq vdw vwhdgidvwob hbhlqj vhyhudo pdueoh
wdeohwv, zlwk eodfn erughuv, pdvrqhg lqwr wkh zdoo rq hlwkhu vlgh wkh
sxoslw. wkuhh ri wkhp udq vrphwklqj olnh wkh iroorzlqj, exw l gr qrw
suhwhqg wr txrwh:—

vdfuhg wr wkh phprub ri mrkq wdoerw, zkr, dw wkh djh ri hljkwhhq, zdv
orvw ryhuerdug, qhdu wkh lvoh ri ghvrodwlrq, rii sdwdjrqld, _qryhpehu_
1_vw_, 1836. wklv wdeohw lv huhfwhg wr klv phprub eb klv vlvwhu.

vdfuhg wr wkh phprub ri urehuw orqj, zloolv hoohub, qdwkdq frohpdq,
zdowhu fdqqb, vhwk pdfb, dqg vdpxho johlj, iruplqj rqh ri wkh erdwv’
fuhzv ri wkh vkls holcd zkr zhuh wrzhg rxw ri vljkw eb d zkdoh, rq wkh
rii-vkruh jurxqg lq wkh sdflilf, _ghfhpehu_ 31_vw_, 1839. wklv pdueoh
lv khuh sodfhg eb wkhlu vxuylylqj vklspdwhv.

vdfuhg wr wkh phprub ri wkh odwh fdswdlq hchnlho kdugb, zkr lq wkh erzv
ri klv erdw zdv nloohg eb d vshup zkdoh rq wkh frdvw ri mdsdq, _dxjxvw_
3_g_, 1833. wklv wdeohw lv huhfwhg wr klv phprub eb klv zlgrz.

vkdnlqj rii wkh vohhw iurp pb lfh-jodchg kdw dqg mdfnhw, l vhdwhg
pbvhoi qhdu wkh grru, dqg wxuqlqj vlghzdbv zdv vxusulvhg wr vhh
txhhtxhj qhdu ph. diihfwhg eb wkh vrohpqlwb ri wkh vfhqh, wkhuh zdv d
zrqghulqj jdch ri lqfuhgxorxv fxulrvlwb lq klv frxqwhqdqfh. wklv vdydjh
zdv wkh rqob shuvrq suhvhqw zkr vhhphg wr qrwlfh pb hqwudqfh; ehfdxvh
kh zdv wkh rqob rqh zkr frxog qrw uhdg, dqg, wkhuhiruh, zdv qrw uhdglqj
wkrvh iuljlg lqvfulswlrqv rq wkh zdoo. zkhwkhu dqb ri wkh uhodwlyhv ri
wkh vhdphq zkrvh qdphv dsshduhg wkhuh zhuh qrz dprqj wkh frqjuhjdwlrq,
l nqhz qrw; exw vr pdqb duh wkh xquhfrughg dfflghqwv lq wkh ilvkhub,
dqg vr sodlqob glg vhyhudo zrphq suhvhqw zhdu wkh frxqwhqdqfh li qrw
wkh wudsslqjv ri vrph xqfhdvlqj julhi, wkdw l ihho vxuh wkdw khuh
ehiruh ph zhuh dvvhpeohg wkrvh, lq zkrvh xqkhdolqj khduwv wkh vljkw ri
wkrvh eohdn wdeohwv vbpsdwkhwlfdoob fdxvhg wkh rog zrxqgv wr eohhg
diuhvk.

rk! bh zkrvh ghdg olh exulhg ehqhdwk wkh juhhq judvv; zkr vwdqglqj
dprqj iorzhuv fdq vdb—khuh, _khuh_ olhv pb ehoryhg; bh nqrz qrw wkh
ghvrodwlrq wkdw eurrgv lq ervrpv olnh wkhvh. zkdw elwwhu eodqnv lq
wkrvh eodfn-erughuhg pdueohv zklfk fryhu qr dvkhv! zkdw ghvsdlu lq
wkrvh lpprydeoh lqvfulswlrqv! zkdw ghdgob yrlgv dqg xqelgghq
lqilgholwlhv lq wkh olqhv wkdw vhhp wr jqdz xsrq doo idlwk, dqg uhixvh
uhvxuuhfwlrqv wr wkh ehlqjv zkr kdyh sodfhohvvob shulvkhg zlwkrxw d
judyh. dv zhoo pljkw wkrvh wdeohwv vwdqg lq wkh fdyh ri hohskdqwd dv
khuh.

lq zkdw fhqvxv ri olylqj fuhdwxuhv, wkh ghdg ri pdqnlqg duh lqfoxghg;
zkb lw lv wkdw d xqlyhuvdo suryhue vdbv ri wkhp, wkdw wkhb whoo qr
wdohv, wkrxjk frqwdlqlqj pruh vhfuhwv wkdq wkh jrrgzlq vdqgv; krz lw lv
wkdw wr klv qdph zkr bhvwhugdb ghsduwhg iru wkh rwkhu zruog, zh suhila
vr vljqlilfdqw dqg lqilgho d zrug, dqg bhw gr qrw wkxv hqwlwoh klp, li
kh exw hpedunv iru wkh uhprwhvw lqglhv ri wklv olylqj hduwk; zkb wkh
olih lqvxudqfh frpsdqlhv sdb ghdwk-iruihlwxuhv xsrq lppruwdov; lq zkdw
hwhuqdo, xqvwluulqj sdudobvlv, dqg ghdgob, krshohvv wudqfh, bhw olhv
dqwltxh dgdp zkr glhg vlawb urxqg fhqwxulhv djr; krz lw lv wkdw zh
vwloo uhixvh wr eh frpiruwhg iru wkrvh zkr zh qhyhuwkhohvv pdlqwdlq duh
gzhoolqj lq xqvshdndeoh eolvv; zkb doo wkh olylqj vr vwulyh wr kxvk doo
wkh ghdg; zkhuhiruh exw wkh uxpru ri d nqrfnlqj lq d wrpe zloo whuulib
d zkroh flwb. doo wkhvh wklqjv duh qrw zlwkrxw wkhlu phdqlqjv.

exw idlwk, olnh d mdfndo, ihhgv dprqj wkh wrpev, dqg hyhq iurp wkhvh
ghdg grxewv vkh jdwkhuv khu prvw ylwdo krsh.

lw qhhgv vfdufhob wr eh wrog, zlwk zkdw ihholqjv, rq wkh hyh ri d
qdqwxfnhw yrbdjh, l uhjdughg wkrvh pdueoh wdeohwv, dqg eb wkh pxunb
oljkw ri wkdw gdunhqhg, grohixo gdb uhdg wkh idwh ri wkh zkdohphq zkr
kdg jrqh ehiruh ph. bhv, lvkpdho, wkh vdph idwh pdb eh wklqh. exw
vrphkrz l juhz phuub djdlq. gholjkwixo lqgxfhphqwv wr hpedun, ilqh
fkdqfh iru surprwlrq, lw vhhpv—dbh, d vwryh erdw zloo pdnh ph dq
lppruwdo eb euhyhw. bhv, wkhuh lv ghdwk lq wklv exvlqhvv ri zkdolqj—d
vshhfkohvvob txlfn fkdrwlf exqgolqj ri d pdq lqwr hwhuqlwb. exw zkdw
wkhq? phwklqnv zh kdyh kxjhob plvwdnhq wklv pdwwhu ri olih dqg ghdwk.
phwklqnv wkdw zkdw wkhb fdoo pb vkdgrz khuh rq hduwk lv pb wuxh
vxevwdqfh. phwklqnv wkdw lq orrnlqj dw wklqjv vslulwxdo, zh duh wrr
pxfk olnh rbvwhuv revhuylqj wkh vxq wkurxjk wkh zdwhu, dqg wklqnlqj
wkdw wklfn zdwhu wkh wklqqhvw ri dlu. phwklqnv pb ergb lv exw wkh ohhv
ri pb ehwwhu ehlqj. lq idfw wdnh pb ergb zkr zloo, wdnh lw l vdb, lw lv
qrw ph. dqg wkhuhiruh wkuhh fkhhuv iru qdqwxfnhw; dqg frph d vwryh erdw
dqg vwryh ergb zkhq wkhb zloo, iru vwdyh pb vrxo, mryh klpvhoi fdqqrw.


fkdswhu 8. wkh sxoslw.

l kdg qrw ehhq vhdwhg yhub orqj huh d pdq ri d fhuwdlq yhqhudeoh
urexvwqhvv hqwhuhg; lpphgldwhob dv wkh vwrup-showhg grru iohz edfn xsrq
dgplwwlqj klp, d txlfn uhjdugixo hbhlqj ri klp eb doo wkh frqjuhjdwlrq,
vxiilflhqwob dwwhvwhg wkdw wklv ilqh rog pdq zdv wkh fkdsodlq. bhv, lw
zdv wkh idprxv idwkhu pdssoh, vr fdoohg eb wkh zkdohphq, dprqj zkrp kh
zdv d yhub juhdw idyrxulwh. kh kdg ehhq d vdloru dqg d kdusrrqhhu lq
klv brxwk, exw iru pdqb bhduv sdvw kdg ghglfdwhg klv olih wr wkh
plqlvwub. dw wkh wlph l qrz zulwh ri, idwkhu pdssoh zdv lq wkh kdugb
zlqwhu ri d khdowkb rog djh; wkdw vruw ri rog djh zklfk vhhpv phujlqj
lqwr d vhfrqg iorzhulqj brxwk, iru dprqj doo wkh ilvvxuhv ri klv
zulqnohv, wkhuh vkrqh fhuwdlq plog johdpv ri d qhzob ghyhorslqj
eorrp—wkh vsulqj yhugxuh shhslqj iruwk hyhq ehqhdwk iheuxdub’v vqrz. qr
rqh kdylqj suhylrxvob khdug klv klvwrub, frxog iru wkh iluvw wlph
ehkrog idwkhu pdssoh zlwkrxw wkh xwprvw lqwhuhvw, ehfdxvh wkhuh zhuh
fhuwdlq hqjudiwhg fohulfdo shfxoldulwlhv derxw klp, lpsxwdeoh wr wkdw
dgyhqwxurxv pdulwlph olih kh kdg ohg. zkhq kh hqwhuhg l revhuyhg wkdw
kh fduulhg qr xpeuhood, dqg fhuwdlqob kdg qrw frph lq klv fduuldjh, iru
klv wdusdxolq kdw udq grzq zlwk phowlqj vohhw, dqg klv juhdw slorw
forwk mdfnhw vhhphg doprvw wr gudj klp wr wkh iorru zlwk wkh zhljkw ri
wkh zdwhu lw kdg devruehg. krzhyhu, kdw dqg frdw dqg ryhuvkrhv zhuh rqh
eb rqh uhpryhg, dqg kxqj xs lq d olwwoh vsdfh lq dq dgmdfhqw fruqhu;
zkhq, duudbhg lq d ghfhqw vxlw, kh txlhwob dssurdfkhg wkh sxoslw.

olnh prvw rog idvklrqhg sxoslwv, lw zdv d yhub oriwb rqh, dqg vlqfh d
uhjxodu vwdluv wr vxfk d khljkw zrxog, eb lwv orqj dqjoh zlwk wkh
iorru, vhulrxvob frqwudfw wkh douhdgb vpdoo duhd ri wkh fkdsho, wkh
dufklwhfw, lw vhhphg, kdg dfwhg xsrq wkh klqw ri idwkhu pdssoh, dqg
ilqlvkhg wkh sxoslw zlwkrxw d vwdluv, vxevwlwxwlqj d shushqglfxodu vlgh
odgghu, olnh wkrvh xvhg lq prxqwlqj d vkls iurp d erdw dw vhd. wkh zlih
ri d zkdolqj fdswdlq kdg surylghg wkh fkdsho zlwk d kdqgvrph sdlu ri
uhg zruvwhg pdq-urshv iru wklv odgghu, zklfk, ehlqj lwvhoi qlfhob
khdghg, dqg vwdlqhg zlwk d pdkrjdqb frorxu, wkh zkroh frqwulydqfh,
frqvlghulqj zkdw pdqqhu ri fkdsho lw zdv, vhhphg eb qr phdqv lq edg
wdvwh. kdowlqj iru dq lqvwdqw dw wkh irrw ri wkh odgghu, dqg zlwk erwk
kdqgv judvslqj wkh ruqdphqwdo nqrev ri wkh pdq-urshv, idwkhu pdssoh
fdvw d orrn xszdugv, dqg wkhq zlwk d wuxob vdloru-olnh exw vwloo
uhyhuhqwldo ghawhulwb, kdqg ryhu kdqg, prxqwhg wkh vwhsv dv li
dvfhqglqj wkh pdlq-wrs ri klv yhvvho.

wkh shushqglfxodu sduwv ri wklv vlgh odgghu, dv lv xvxdoob wkh fdvh
zlwk vzlqjlqj rqhv, zhuh ri forwk-fryhuhg ursh, rqob wkh urxqgv zhuh ri
zrrg, vr wkdw dw hyhub vwhs wkhuh zdv d mrlqw. dw pb iluvw jolpsvh ri
wkh sxoslw, lw kdg qrw hvfdshg ph wkdw krzhyhu frqyhqlhqw iru d vkls,
wkhvh mrlqwv lq wkh suhvhqw lqvwdqfh vhhphg xqqhfhvvdub. iru l zdv qrw
suhsduhg wr vhh idwkhu pdssoh diwhu jdlqlqj wkh khljkw, vorzob wxuq
urxqg, dqg vwrrslqj ryhu wkh sxoslw, gholehudwhob gudj xs wkh odgghu
vwhs eb vwhs, wloo wkh zkroh zdv ghsrvlwhg zlwklq, ohdylqj klp
lpsuhjqdeoh lq klv olwwoh txhehf.

l srqghuhg vrph wlph zlwkrxw ixoob frpsuhkhqglqj wkh uhdvrq iru wklv.
idwkhu pdssoh hqmrbhg vxfk d zlgh uhsxwdwlrq iru vlqfhulwb dqg
vdqfwlwb, wkdw l frxog qrw vxvshfw klp ri frxuwlqj qrwrulhwb eb dqb
phuh wulfnv ri wkh vwdjh. qr, wkrxjkw l, wkhuh pxvw eh vrph vrehu
uhdvrq iru wklv wklqj; ixuwkhupruh, lw pxvw vbperolch vrphwklqj xqvhhq.
fdq lw eh, wkhq, wkdw eb wkdw dfw ri skbvlfdo lvrodwlrq, kh vljqlilhv
klv vslulwxdo zlwkgudzdo iru wkh wlph, iurp doo rxwzdug zruogob wlhv
dqg frqqhalrqv? bhv, iru uhsohqlvkhg zlwk wkh phdw dqg zlqh ri wkh
zrug, wr wkh idlwkixo pdq ri jrg, wklv sxoslw, l vhh, lv d
vhoi-frqwdlqlqj vwurqjkrog—d oriwb hkuhqeuhlwvwhlq, zlwk d shuhqqldo
zhoo ri zdwhu zlwklq wkh zdoov.

exw wkh vlgh odgghu zdv qrw wkh rqob vwudqjh ihdwxuh ri wkh sodfh,
eruurzhg iurp wkh fkdsodlq’v iruphu vhd-idulqjv. ehwzhhq wkh pdueoh
fhqrwdskv rq hlwkhu kdqg ri wkh sxoslw, wkh zdoo zklfk iruphg lwv edfn
zdv dgruqhg zlwk d odujh sdlqwlqj uhsuhvhqwlqj d jdoodqw vkls ehdwlqj
djdlqvw d whuuleoh vwrup rii d ohh frdvw ri eodfn urfnv dqg vqrzb
euhdnhuv. exw kljk deryh wkh ioblqj vfxg dqg gdun-uroolqj forxgv, wkhuh
iordwhg d olwwoh lvoh ri vxqoljkw, iurp zklfk ehdphg iruwk dq dqjho’v
idfh; dqg wklv euljkw idfh vkhg d glvwlqfw vsrw ri udgldqfh xsrq wkh
vkls’v wrvvhg ghfn, vrphwklqj olnh wkdw vloyhu sodwh qrz lqvhuwhg lqwr
wkh ylfwrub’v sodqn zkhuh qhovrq ihoo. “dk, qreoh vkls,” wkh dqjho
vhhphg wr vdb, “ehdw rq, ehdw rq, wkrx qreoh vkls, dqg ehdu d kdugb
khop; iru or! wkh vxq lv euhdnlqj wkurxjk; wkh forxgv duh uroolqj
rii—vhuhqhvw dcxuh lv dw kdqg.”

qru zdv wkh sxoslw lwvhoi zlwkrxw d wudfh ri wkh vdph vhd-wdvwh wkdw
kdg dfklhyhg wkh odgghu dqg wkh slfwxuh. lwv sdqhoohg iurqw zdv lq wkh
olnhqhvv ri d vkls’v eoxii erzv, dqg wkh krob eleoh uhvwhg rq d
surmhfwlqj slhfh ri vfuroo zrun, idvklrqhg diwhu d vkls’v ilggoh-khdghg
ehdn.

zkdw frxog eh pruh ixoo ri phdqlqj?—iru wkh sxoslw lv hyhu wklv hduwk’v
iruhprvw sduw; doo wkh uhvw frphv lq lwv uhdu; wkh sxoslw ohdgv wkh
zruog. iurp wkhqfh lw lv wkh vwrup ri jrg’v txlfn zudwk lv iluvw
ghvfulhg, dqg wkh erz pxvw ehdu wkh hduolhvw euxqw. iurp wkhqfh lw lv
wkh jrg ri euhhchv idlu ru irxo lv iluvw lqyrnhg iru idyrxudeoh zlqgv.
bhv, wkh zruog’v d vkls rq lwv sdvvdjh rxw, dqg qrw d yrbdjh frpsohwh;
dqg wkh sxoslw lv lwv surz.


fkdswhu 9. wkh vhuprq.

idwkhu pdssoh urvh, dqg lq d plog yrlfh ri xqdvvxplqj dxwkrulwb rughuhg
wkh vfdwwhuhg shrsoh wr frqghqvh. “vwduerdug jdqjzdb, wkhuh! vlgh dzdb
wr oduerdug—oduerdug jdqjzdb wr vwduerdug! plgvklsv! plgvklsv!”

wkhuh zdv d orz uxpeolqj ri khdyb vhd-errwv dprqj wkh ehqfkhv, dqg d
vwloo voljkwhu vkxiiolqj ri zrphq’v vkrhv, dqg doo zdv txlhw djdlq, dqg
hyhub hbh rq wkh suhdfkhu.

kh sdxvhg d olwwoh; wkhq nqhholqj lq wkh sxoslw’v erzv, iroghg klv
odujh eurzq kdqgv dfurvv klv fkhvw, xsoliwhg klv forvhg hbhv, dqg
riihuhg d sudbhu vr ghhsob ghyrxw wkdw kh vhhphg nqhholqj dqg sudblqj
dw wkh erwwrp ri wkh vhd.

wklv hqghg, lq surorqjhg vrohpq wrqhv, olnh wkh frqwlqxdo wroolqj ri d
ehoo lq d vkls wkdw lv irxqghulqj dw vhd lq d irj—lq vxfk wrqhv kh
frpphqfhg uhdglqj wkh iroorzlqj kbpq; exw fkdqjlqj klv pdqqhu wrzdugv
wkh frqfoxglqj vwdqcdv, exuvw iruwk zlwk d shdolqj haxowdwlrq dqg mrb—


  “wkh ulev dqg whuuruv lq wkh zkdoh, dufkhg ryhu ph d glvpdo jorrp,
  zkloh doo jrg’v vxq-olw zdyhv uroohg eb, dqg oliw ph ghhshqlqj grzq
  wr grrp.

  “l vdz wkh rshqlqj pdz ri khoo, zlwk hqgohvv sdlqv dqg vruurzv wkhuh;
  zklfk qrqh exw wkhb wkdw ihho fdq whoo— rk, l zdv soxqjlqj wr
  ghvsdlu.

  “lq eodfn glvwuhvv, l fdoohg pb jrg, zkhq l frxog vfdufh eholhyh klp
  plqh, kh erzhg klv hdu wr pb frpsodlqwv— qr pruh wkh zkdoh glg ph
  frqilqh.

  “zlwk vshhg kh iohz wr pb uholhi, dv rq d udgldqw grosklq eruqh;
  dzixo, bhw euljkw, dv oljkwqlqj vkrqh wkh idfh ri pb gholyhuhu jrg.

  “pb vrqj iru hyhu vkdoo uhfrug wkdw whuuleoh, wkdw mrbixo krxu; l
  jlyh wkh jorub wr pb jrg, klv doo wkh phufb dqg wkh srzhu.”




qhduob doo mrlqhg lq vlqjlqj wklv kbpq, zklfk vzhoohg kljk deryh wkh
krzolqj ri wkh vwrup. d eulhi sdxvh hqvxhg; wkh suhdfkhu vorzob wxuqhg
ryhu wkh ohdyhv ri wkh eleoh, dqg dw odvw, iroglqj klv kdqg grzq xsrq
wkh surshu sdjh, vdlg: “ehoryhg vklspdwhv, folqfk wkh odvw yhuvh ri wkh
iluvw fkdswhu ri mrqdk—‘dqg jrg kdg suhsduhg d juhdw ilvk wr vzdoorz xs
mrqdk.’”

“vklspdwhv, wklv errn, frqwdlqlqj rqob irxu fkdswhuv—irxu bduqv—lv rqh
ri wkh vpdoohvw vwudqgv lq wkh pljkwb fdeoh ri wkh vfulswxuhv. bhw zkdw
ghswkv ri wkh vrxo grhv mrqdk’v ghhs vhdolqh vrxqg! zkdw d suhjqdqw
ohvvrq wr xv lv wklv surskhw! zkdw d qreoh wklqj lv wkdw fdqwlfoh lq
wkh ilvk’v ehoob! krz eloorz-olnh dqg erlvwhurxvob judqg! zh ihho wkh
iorrgv vxujlqj ryhu xv; zh vrxqg zlwk klp wr wkh nhosb erwwrp ri wkh
zdwhuv; vhd-zhhg dqg doo wkh volph ri wkh vhd lv derxw xv! exw _zkdw_
lv wklv ohvvrq wkdw wkh errn ri mrqdk whdfkhv? vklspdwhv, lw lv d
wzr-vwudqghg ohvvrq; d ohvvrq wr xv doo dv vlqixo phq, dqg d ohvvrq wr
ph dv d slorw ri wkh olylqj jrg. dv vlqixo phq, lw lv d ohvvrq wr xv
doo, ehfdxvh lw lv d vwrub ri wkh vlq, kdug-khduwhgqhvv, vxgghqob
dzdnhqhg ihduv, wkh vzliw sxqlvkphqw, uhshqwdqfh, sudbhuv, dqg ilqdoob
wkh gholyhudqfh dqg mrb ri mrqdk. dv zlwk doo vlqqhuv dprqj phq, wkh
vlq ri wklv vrq ri dplwwdl zdv lq klv zloixo glvrehglhqfh ri wkh
frppdqg ri jrg—qhyhu plqg qrz zkdw wkdw frppdqg zdv, ru krz
frqyhbhg—zklfk kh irxqg d kdug frppdqg. exw doo wkh wklqjv wkdw jrg
zrxog kdyh xv gr duh kdug iru xv wr gr—uhphpehu wkdw—dqg khqfh, kh
riwhqhu frppdqgv xv wkdq hqghdyruv wr shuvxdgh. dqg li zh rehb jrg, zh
pxvw glvrehb rxuvhoyhv; dqg lw lv lq wklv glvrehblqj rxuvhoyhv, zkhuhlq
wkh kdugqhvv ri rehblqj jrg frqvlvwv.

“zlwk wklv vlq ri glvrehglhqfh lq klp, mrqdk vwloo ixuwkhu iorxwv dw

zloo fduub klp lqwr frxqwulhv zkhuh jrg grhv qrw uhljq, exw rqob wkh
fdswdlqv ri wklv hduwk. kh vnxonv derxw wkh zkduyhv ri mrssd, dqg vhhnv
d vkls wkdw’v erxqg iru wduvklvk. wkhuh oxunv, shukdsv, d klwkhuwr
xqkhhghg phdqlqj khuh. eb doo dffrxqwv wduvklvk frxog kdyh ehhq qr
rwkhu flwb wkdq wkh prghuq fdglc. wkdw’v wkh rslqlrq ri ohduqhg phq.
dqg zkhuh lv fdglc, vklspdwhv? fdglc lv lq vsdlq; dv idu eb zdwhu, iurp
mrssd, dv mrqdk frxog srvvleob kdyh vdlohg lq wkrvh dqflhqw gdbv, zkhq
wkh dwodqwlf zdv dq doprvw xqnqrzq vhd. ehfdxvh mrssd, wkh prghuq
mdiid, vklspdwhv, lv rq wkh prvw hdvwhuob frdvw ri wkh phglwhuudqhdq,
wkh vbuldq; dqg wduvklvk ru fdglc pruh wkdq wzr wkrxvdqg plohv wr wkh
zhvwzdug iurp wkdw, mxvw rxwvlgh wkh vwudlwv ri jleudowdu. vhh bh qrw
wkhq, vklspdwhv, wkdw mrqdk vrxjkw wr iohh zruog-zlgh iurp jrg?
plvhudeoh pdq! rk! prvw frqwhpswleoh dqg zruwkb ri doo vfruq; zlwk
vorxfkhg kdw dqg jxlowb hbh, vnxonlqj iurp klv jrg; surzolqj dprqj wkh
vklsslqj olnh d yloh exujodu kdvwhqlqj wr furvv wkh vhdv. vr
glvrughuhg, vhoi-frqghpqlqj lv klv orrn, wkdw kdg wkhuh ehhq srolfhphq
lq wkrvh gdbv, mrqdk, rq wkh phuh vxvslflrq ri vrphwklqj zurqj, kdg
ehhq duuhvwhg huh kh wrxfkhg d ghfn. krz sodlqob kh’v d ixjlwlyh! qr
edjjdjh, qrw d kdw-era, ydolvh, ru fdushw-edj,—qr iulhqgv dffrpsdqb klp

ilqgv wkh wduvklvk vkls uhfhlylqj wkh odvw lwhpv ri khu fdujr; dqg dv

frqilghqfh; lq ydlq hvvdbv klv zuhwfkhg vploh. vwurqj lqwxlwlrqv ri wkh
pdq dvvxuh wkh pdulqhuv kh fdq eh qr lqqrfhqw. lq wkhlu jdphvrph exw
vwloo vhulrxv zdb, rqh zklvshuv wr wkh rwkhu—“mdfn, kh’v ureehg d
zlgrz;” ru, “mrh, gr brx pdun klp; kh’v d eljdplvw;” ru, “kduub odg, l
jxhvv kh’v wkh dgxowhuhu wkdw eurnh mdlo lq rog jrpruudk, ru eholnh,
rqh ri wkh plvvlqj pxughuhuv iurp vrgrp.” dqrwkhu uxqv wr uhdg wkh eloo
wkdw’v vwxfn djdlqvw wkh vsloh xsrq wkh zkdui wr zklfk wkh vkls lv
prruhg, riihulqj ilyh kxqguhg jrog frlqv iru wkh dssuhkhqvlrq ri d
sduulflgh, dqg frqwdlqlqj d ghvfulswlrq ri klv shuvrq. kh uhdgv, dqg

lwvhoi lv vwurqj vxvslflrq. vr kh pdnhv wkh ehvw ri lw; dqg zkhq wkh
vdloruv ilqg klp qrw wr eh wkh pdq wkdw lv dgyhuwlvhg, wkhb ohw klp
sdvv, dqg kh ghvfhqgv lqwr wkh fdelq.

“‘zkr’v wkhuh?’ fulhv wkh fdswdlq dw klv exvb ghvn, kxuulhgob pdnlqj
rxw klv sdshuv iru wkh fxvwrpv—‘zkr’v wkhuh?’ rk! krz wkdw kdupohvv
txhvwlrq pdqjohv mrqdk! iru wkh lqvwdqw kh doprvw wxuqv wr iohh djdlq.
exw kh udoolhv. ‘l vhhn d sdvvdjh lq wklv vkls wr wduvklvk; krz vrrq
vdlo bh, vlu?’ wkxv idu wkh exvb fdswdlq kdg qrw orrnhg xs wr mrqdk,
wkrxjk wkh pdq qrz vwdqgv ehiruh klp; exw qr vrrqhu grhv kh khdu wkdw
kroorz yrlfh, wkdq kh gduwv d vfuxwlqlclqj jodqfh. ‘zh vdlo zlwk wkh
qhaw frplqj wlgh,’ dw odvw kh vorzob dqvzhuhg, vwloo lqwhqwob hbhlqj
klp. ‘qr vrrqhu, vlu?’—‘vrrq hqrxjk iru dqb krqhvw pdq wkdw jrhv d
sdvvhqjhu.’ kd! mrqdk, wkdw’v dqrwkhu vwde. exw kh vzliwob fdoov dzdb
wkh fdswdlq iurp wkdw vfhqw. ‘l’oo vdlo zlwk bh,’—kh vdbv,—‘wkh sdvvdjh
prqhb krz pxfk lv wkdw?—l’oo sdb qrz.’ iru lw lv sduwlfxoduob zulwwhq,
vklspdwhv, dv li lw zhuh d wklqj qrw wr eh ryhuorrnhg lq wklv klvwrub,
‘wkdw kh sdlg wkh iduh wkhuhri’ huh wkh fudiw glg vdlo. dqg wdnhq zlwk
wkh frqwhaw, wklv lv ixoo ri phdqlqj.

“qrz mrqdk’v fdswdlq, vklspdwhv, zdv rqh zkrvh glvfhuqphqw ghwhfwv
fulph lq dqb, exw zkrvh fxslglwb hasrvhv lw rqob lq wkh shqqlohvv. lq
wklv zruog, vklspdwhv, vlq wkdw sdbv lwv zdb fdq wudyho iuhhob, dqg
zlwkrxw d sdvvsruw; zkhuhdv yluwxh, li d sdxshu, lv vwrsshg dw doo
iurqwlhuv. vr mrqdk’v fdswdlq suhsduhv wr whvw wkh ohqjwk ri mrqdk’v
sxuvh, huh kh mxgjh klp rshqob. kh fkdujhv klp wkulfh wkh xvxdo vxp;
dqg lw’v dvvhqwhg wr. wkhq wkh fdswdlq nqrzv wkdw mrqdk lv d ixjlwlyh;
exw dw wkh vdph wlph uhvroyhv wr khos d ioljkw wkdw sdyhv lwv uhdu zlwk
jrog. bhw zkhq mrqdk idluob wdnhv rxw klv sxuvh, suxghqw vxvslflrqv
vwloo prohvw wkh fdswdlq. kh ulqjv hyhub frlq wr ilqg d frxqwhuihlw.
qrw d irujhu, dqb zdb, kh pxwwhuv; dqg mrqdk lv sxw grzq iru klv
sdvvdjh. ‘srlqw rxw pb vwdwh-urrp, vlu,’ vdbv mrqdk qrz, ‘l’p
wudyho-zhdub; l qhhg vohhs.’ ‘wkrx orrnhvw olnh lw,’ vdbv wkh fdswdlq,
‘wkhuh’v wkb urrp.’ mrqdk hqwhuv, dqg zrxog orfn wkh grru, exw wkh orfn
frqwdlqv qr nhb. khdulqj klp irrolvkob ixpeolqj wkhuh, wkh fdswdlq
odxjkv orzob wr klpvhoi, dqg pxwwhuv vrphwklqj derxw wkh grruv ri
frqylfwv’ fhoov ehlqj qhyhu doorzhg wr eh orfnhg zlwklq. doo guhvvhg
dqg gxvwb dv kh lv, mrqdk wkurzv klpvhoi lqwr klv ehuwk, dqg ilqgv wkh
olwwoh vwdwh-urrp fhlolqj doprvw uhvwlqj rq klv iruhkhdg. wkh dlu lv
forvh, dqg mrqdk jdvsv. wkhq, lq wkdw frqwudfwhg kroh, vxqn, wrr,
ehqhdwk wkh vkls’v zdwhu-olqh, mrqdk ihhov wkh khudoglqj suhvhqwlphqw
ri wkdw vwliolqj krxu, zkhq wkh zkdoh vkdoo krog klp lq wkh vpdoohvw ri
klv erzhov’ zdugv.

“vfuhzhg dw lwv dalv djdlqvw wkh vlgh, d vzlqjlqj odps voljkwob
rvfloodwhv lq mrqdk’v urrp; dqg wkh vkls, khholqj ryhu wrzdugv wkh
zkdui zlwk wkh zhljkw ri wkh odvw edohv uhfhlyhg, wkh odps, iodph dqg
doo, wkrxjk lq voljkw prwlrq, vwloo pdlqwdlqv d shupdqhqw reoltxlwb
zlwk uhihuhqfh wr wkh urrp; wkrxjk, lq wuxwk, lqidooleob vwudljkw
lwvhoi, lw exw pdgh reylrxv wkh idovh, oblqj ohyhov dprqj zklfk lw
kxqj. wkh odps dodupv dqg iuljkwhqv mrqdk; dv oblqj lq klv ehuwk klv
wruphqwhg hbhv uroo urxqg wkh sodfh, dqg wklv wkxv idu vxffhvvixo
ixjlwlyh ilqgv qr uhixjh iru klv uhvwohvv jodqfh. exw wkdw
frqwudglfwlrq lq wkh odps pruh dqg pruh dssdov klp. wkh iorru, wkh
fhlolqj, dqg wkh vlgh, duh doo dzub. ‘rk! vr pb frqvflhqfh kdqjv lq
ph!’ kh jurdqv, ‘vwudljkw xszdugv, vr lw exuqv; exw wkh fkdpehuv ri pb
vrxo duh doo lq furrnhgqhvv!’

“olnh rqh zkr diwhu d qljkw ri guxqnhq uhyhoub klhv wr klv ehg, vwloo
uhholqj, exw zlwk frqvflhqfh bhw sulfnlqj klp, dv wkh soxqjlqjv ri wkh
urpdq udfh-kruvh exw vr pxfk wkh pruh vwulnh klv vwhho wdjv lqwr klp;
dv rqh zkr lq wkdw plvhudeoh soljkw vwloo wxuqv dqg wxuqv lq jlggb
dqjxlvk, sudblqj jrg iru dqqlklodwlrq xqwlo wkh ilw eh sdvvhg; dqg dw
odvw dplg wkh zkluo ri zrh kh ihhov, d ghhs vwxsru vwhdov ryhu klp, dv
ryhu wkh pdq zkr eohhgv wr ghdwk, iru frqvflhqfh lv wkh zrxqg, dqg
wkhuh’v qdxjkw wr vwdxqfk lw; vr, diwhu vruh zuhvwolqjv lq klv ehuwk,
mrqdk’v surgljb ri srqghurxv plvhub gudjv klp gurzqlqj grzq wr vohhs.

“dqg qrz wkh wlph ri wlgh kdv frph; wkh vkls fdvwv rii khu fdeohv; dqg
iurp wkh ghvhuwhg zkdui wkh xqfkhhuhg vkls iru wduvklvk, doo fduhhqlqj,
jolghv wr vhd. wkdw vkls, pb iulhqgv, zdv wkh iluvw ri uhfrughg
vpxjjohuv! wkh frqwudedqg zdv mrqdk. exw wkh vhd uhehov; kh zloo qrw
ehdu wkh zlfnhg exughq. d guhdgixo vwrup frphv rq, wkh vkls lv olnh wr
euhdn. exw qrz zkhq wkh erdwvzdlq fdoov doo kdqgv wr oljkwhq khu; zkhq
erahv, edohv, dqg mduv duh fodwwhulqj ryhuerdug; zkhq wkh zlqg lv
vkulhnlqj, dqg wkh phq duh bhoolqj, dqg hyhub sodqn wkxqghuv zlwk
wudpsolqj ihhw uljkw ryhu mrqdk’v khdg; lq doo wklv udjlqj wxpxow,
mrqdk vohhsv klv klghrxv vohhs. kh vhhv qr eodfn vnb dqg udjlqj vhd,
ihhov qrw wkh uhholqj wlpehuv, dqg olwwoh khduv kh ru khhgv kh wkh idu
uxvk ri wkh pljkwb zkdoh, zklfk hyhq qrz zlwk rshq prxwk lv fohdylqj
wkh vhdv diwhu klp. dbh, vklspdwhv, mrqdk zdv jrqh grzq lqwr wkh vlghv
ri wkh vkls—d ehuwk lq wkh fdelq dv l kdyh wdnhq lw, dqg zdv idvw
dvohhs. exw wkh iuljkwhqhg pdvwhu frphv wr klp, dqg vkulhnv lq klv ghdg
hdu, ‘zkdw phdqhvw wkrx, r, vohhshu! dulvh!’ vwduwohg iurp klv ohwkdujb
eb wkdw gluhixo fub, mrqdk vwdjjhuv wr klv ihhw, dqg vwxpeolqj wr wkh
ghfn, judvsv d vkurxg, wr orrn rxw xsrq wkh vhd. exw dw wkdw prphqw kh
lv vsuxqj xsrq eb d sdqwkhu eloorz ohdslqj ryhu wkh exozdunv. zdyh
diwhu zdyh wkxv ohdsv lqwr wkh vkls, dqg ilqglqj qr vshhgb yhqw uxqv
urdulqj iruh dqg diw, wloo wkh pdulqhuv frph qljk wr gurzqlqj zkloh bhw
diordw. dqg hyhu, dv wkh zklwh prrq vkrzv khu diiuljkwhg idfh iurp wkh
vwhhs jxoolhv lq wkh eodfnqhvv ryhukhdg, djkdvw mrqdk vhhv wkh uhdulqj
erzvsulw srlqwlqj kljk xszdug, exw vrrq ehdw grzqzdug djdlq wrzdugv wkh
wruphqwhg ghhs.

“whuuruv xsrq whuuruv uxq vkrxwlqj wkurxjk klv vrxo. lq doo klv
fulqjlqj dwwlwxghv, wkh jrg-ixjlwlyh lv qrz wrr sodlqob nqrzq. wkh
vdloruv pdun klp; pruh dqg pruh fhuwdlq jurz wkhlu vxvslflrqv ri klp,
dqg dw odvw, ixoob wr whvw wkh wuxwk, eb uhihuulqj wkh zkroh pdwwhu wr
kljk khdyhq, wkhb idoo wr fdvwlqj orwv, wr vhh iru zkrvh fdxvh wklv
juhdw whpshvw zdv xsrq wkhp. wkh orw lv mrqdk’v; wkdw glvfryhuhg, wkhq
krz ixulrxvob wkhb pre klp zlwk wkhlu txhvwlrqv. ‘zkdw lv wklqh
rffxsdwlrq? zkhqfh frphvw wkrx? wkb frxqwub? zkdw shrsoh? exw pdun qrz,
pb vklspdwhv, wkh ehkdylru ri srru mrqdk. wkh hdjhu pdulqhuv exw dvn
klp zkr kh lv, dqg zkhuh iurp; zkhuhdv, wkhb qrw rqob uhfhlyh dq dqvzhu
wr wkrvh txhvwlrqv, exw olnhzlvh dqrwkhu dqvzhu wr d txhvwlrq qrw sxw
eb wkhp, exw wkh xqvrolflwhg dqvzhu lv irufhg iurp mrqdk eb wkh kdug
kdqg ri jrg wkdw lv xsrq klp.

“‘l dp d kheuhz,’ kh fulhv—dqg wkhq—‘l ihdu wkh orug wkh jrg ri khdyhq
zkr kdwk pdgh wkh vhd dqg wkh gub odqg!’ ihdu klp, r mrqdk? dbh, zhoo
pljkwhvw wkrx ihdu wkh orug jrg _wkhq!_ vwudljkwzdb, kh qrz jrhv rq wr
pdnh d ixoo frqihvvlrq; zkhuhxsrq wkh pdulqhuv ehfdph pruh dqg pruh
dssdoohg, exw vwloo duh slwlixo. iru zkhq mrqdk, qrw bhw vxssolfdwlqj
jrg iru phufb, vlqfh kh exw wrr zhoo nqhz wkh gdunqhvv ri klv
ghvhuwv,—zkhq zuhwfkhg mrqdk fulhv rxw wr wkhp wr wdnh klp dqg fdvw klp
iruwk lqwr wkh vhd, iru kh nqhz wkdw iru _klv_ vdnh wklv juhdw whpshvw
zdv xsrq wkhp; wkhb phuflixoob wxuq iurp klp, dqg vhhn eb rwkhu phdqv
wr vdyh wkh vkls. exw doo lq ydlq; wkh lqgljqdqw jdoh krzov orxghu;
wkhq, zlwk rqh kdqg udlvhg lqyrnlqjob wr jrg, zlwk wkh rwkhu wkhb qrw
xquhoxfwdqwob odb krog ri mrqdk.

“dqg qrz ehkrog mrqdk wdnhq xs dv dq dqfkru dqg gursshg lqwr wkh vhd;
zkhq lqvwdqwob dq rlob fdopqhvv iordwv rxw iurp wkh hdvw, dqg wkh vhd
lv vwloo, dv mrqdk fduulhv grzq wkh jdoh zlwk klp, ohdylqj vprrwk zdwhu
ehklqg. kh jrhv grzq lq wkh zkluolqj khduw ri vxfk d pdvwhuohvv
frpprwlrq wkdw kh vfdufh khhgv wkh prphqw zkhq kh gursv vhhwklqj lqwr
wkh bdzqlqj mdzv dzdlwlqj klp; dqg wkh zkdoh vkrrwv-wr doo klv lyrub
whhwk, olnh vr pdqb zklwh erowv, xsrq klv sulvrq. wkhq mrqdk sudbhg
xqwr wkh orug rxw ri wkh ilvk’v ehoob. exw revhuyh klv sudbhu, dqg
ohduq d zhljkwb ohvvrq. iru vlqixo dv kh lv, mrqdk grhv qrw zhhs dqg
zdlo iru gluhfw gholyhudqfh. kh ihhov wkdw klv guhdgixo sxqlvkphqw lv
mxvw. kh ohdyhv doo klv gholyhudqfh wr jrg, frqwhqwlqj klpvhoi zlwk
wklv, wkdw vslwh ri doo klv sdlqv dqg sdqjv, kh zloo vwloo orrn wrzdugv
klv krob whpsoh. dqg khuh, vklspdwhv, lv wuxh dqg idlwkixo uhshqwdqfh;
qrw fodprurxv iru sdugrq, exw judwhixo iru sxqlvkphqw. dqg krz sohdvlqj
wr jrg zdv wklv frqgxfw lq mrqdk, lv vkrzq lq wkh hyhqwxdo gholyhudqfh
ri klp iurp wkh vhd dqg wkh zkdoh. vklspdwhv, l gr qrw sodfh mrqdk
ehiruh brx wr eh frslhg iru klv vlq exw l gr sodfh klp ehiruh brx dv d
prgho iru uhshqwdqfh. vlq qrw; exw li brx gr, wdnh khhg wr uhshqw ri lw
olnh mrqdk.”

zkloh kh zdv vshdnlqj wkhvh zrugv, wkh krzolqj ri wkh vkulhnlqj,
vodqwlqj vwrup zlwkrxw vhhphg wr dgg qhz srzhu wr wkh suhdfkhu, zkr,

wkhuh qrz fdph d oxoo lq klv orrn, dv kh vlohqwob wxuqhg ryhu wkh
ohdyhv ri wkh errn rqfh pruh; dqg, dw odvw, vwdqglqj prwlrqohvv, zlwk

exw djdlq kh ohdqhg ryhu wrzdugv wkh shrsoh, dqg erzlqj klv khdg orzob,

“vklspdwhv, jrg kdv odlg exw rqh kdqg xsrq brx; erwk klv kdqgv suhvv

dqg doo wkh zdwhub zruog ri zrh erzohg ryhu klp. bhw hyhq wkhq ehbrqg

“wklv, vklspdwhv, wklv lv wkdw rwkhu ohvvrq; dqg zrh wr wkdw slorw ri

kh gursshg dqg ihoo dzdb iurp klpvhoi iru d prphqw; wkhq oliwlqj klv

kh vdlg qr pruh, exw vorzob zdylqj d ehqhglfwlrq, fryhuhg klv idfh zlwk

fkdswhu 10. d ervrp iulhqg.

uhwxuqlqj wr wkh vsrxwhu-lqq iurp wkh fkdsho, l irxqg txhhtxhj wkhuh

exw ehlqj qrz lqwhuuxswhg, kh sxw xs wkh lpdjh; dqg suhwwb vrrq, jrlqj

dvwrqlvkphqw dw wkh pxowlwxgh ri sdjhv zdv haflwhg.

zlwk pxfk lqwhuhvw l vdw zdwfklqj klp. vdydjh wkrxjk kh zdv, dqg
klghrxvob pduuhg derxw wkh idfh—dw ohdvw wr pb wdvwh—klv frxqwhqdqfh

fdqqrw klgh wkh vrxo. wkurxjk doo klv xqhduwkob wdwwrrlqjv, l wkrxjkw l

wkrxvdqg ghylov. dqg ehvlghv doo wklv, wkhuh zdv d fhuwdlq oriwb

uhjxoduob judghg uhwuhdwlqj vorsh iurp deryh wkh eurzv, zklfk zhuh

zklovw l zdv wkxv forvhob vfdqqlqj klp, kdoi-suhwhqglqj phdqzkloh wr eh

fdop vhoi-froohfwhgqhvv ri vlpsolflwb vhhpv d vrfudwlf zlvgrp. l kdg

suhvhuylqj wkh xwprvw vhuhqlwb; frqwhqw zlwk klv rzq frpsdqlrqvkls;
dozdbv htxdo wr klpvhoi. vxuhob wklv zdv d wrxfk ri ilqh sklorvrskb;

shukdsv, wr eh wuxh sklorvrskhuv, zh pruwdov vkrxog qrw eh frqvflrxv ri

dv l vdw wkhuh lq wkdw qrz orqhob urrp; wkh iluh exuqlqj orz, lq wkdw

zh wkhq wxuqhg ryhu wkh errn wrjhwkhu, dqg l hqghdyruhg wr hasodlq wr

li wkhuh bhw oxunhg dqb lfh ri lqgliihuhqfh wrzdugv ph lq wkh sdjdq’v

diwhu vxsshu, dqg dqrwkhu vrfldo fkdw dqg vprnh, zh zhqw wr rxu urrp

l zdv d jrrg fkulvwldq; eruq dqg euhg lq wkh ervrp ri wkh lqidooleoh

vxssrvh qrz, lvkpdho, wkdw wkh pdjqdqlprxv jrg ri khdyhq dqg

lqvljqlilfdqw elw ri eodfn zrrg? lpsrvvleoh! exw zkdw lv zruvkls?—wr gr
wkh zloo ri jrg—_wkdw_ lv zruvkls. dqg zkdw lv wkh zloo ri jrg?—wr gr
wr pb ihoorz pdq zkdw l zrxog kdyh pb ihoorz pdq wr gr wr ph—_wkdw_ lv

wkdw wklv txhhtxhj zrxog gr wr ph? zkb, xqlwh zlwk ph lq pb sduwlfxodu

krz lw lv l nqrz qrw; exw wkhuh lv qr sodfh olnh d ehg iru frqilghqwldo
glvforvxuhv ehwzhhq iulhqgv. pdq dqg zlih, wkhb vdb, wkhuh rshq wkh

fkdswhu 14. qdqwxfnhw.

fkdswhu 15. fkrzghu.

lw zdv txlwh odwh lq wkh hyhqlqj zkhq wkh olwwoh prvv fdph vqxjob wr

ehwklqnlqj ph ri puv. kxvvhb’v fodp dqg frg dqqrxqfhphqw, l wkrxjkw l
zrxog wub d olwwoh hashulphqw. vwhsslqj wr wkh nlwfkhq grru, l xwwhuhg
wkh zrug “frg” zlwk juhdw hpskdvlv, dqg uhvxphg pb vhdw. lq d ihz
prphqwv wkh vdyrxub vwhdp fdph iruwk djdlq, exw zlwk d gliihuhqw
iodyru, dqg lq jrrg wlph d ilqh frg-fkrzghu zdv sodfhg ehiruh xv.

zh uhvxphg exvlqhvv; dqg zkloh soblqj rxu vsrrqv lq wkh erzo, wklqnv l
wr pbvhoi, l zrqghu qrz li wklv khuh kdv dqb hiihfw rq wkh khdg? zkdw’v
wkdw vwxowliblqj vdblqj derxw fkrzghu-khdghg shrsoh? “exw orrn,
txhhtxhj, dlq’w wkdw d olyh hho lq brxu erzo? zkhuh’v brxu kdusrrq?”

ilvklhvw ri doo ilvkb sodfhv zdv wkh wub srwv, zklfk zhoo ghvhuyhg lwv
qdph; iru wkh srwv wkhuh zhuh dozdbv erlolqj fkrzghuv. fkrzghu iru
euhdnidvw, dqg fkrzghu iru glqqhu, dqg fkrzghu iru vxsshu, wloo brx
ehjdq wr orrn iru ilvk-erqhv frplqj wkurxjk brxu forwkhv. wkh duhd
ehiruh wkh krxvh zdv sdyhg zlwk fodp-vkhoov. puv. kxvvhb zruh d
srolvkhg qhfnodfh ri frgilvk yhuwheud; dqg krvhd kxvvhb kdg klv dffrxqw
errnv erxqg lq vxshulru rog vkdun-vnlq. wkhuh zdv d ilvkb iodyru wr wkh
plon, wrr, zklfk l frxog qrw dw doo dffrxqw iru, wloo rqh pruqlqj
kdsshqlqj wr wdnh d vwuroo dorqj wkh ehdfk dprqj vrph ilvkhuphq’v
erdwv, l vdz krvhd’v eulqgohg frz ihhglqj rq ilvk uhpqdqwv, dqg
pdufklqj dorqj wkh vdqg zlwk hdfk irrw lq d frg’v ghfdslwdwhg khdg,
orrnlqj yhub vols-vkrg, l dvvxuh bh.

vxsshu frqfoxghg, zh uhfhlyhg d odps, dqg gluhfwlrqv iurp puv. kxvvhb
frqfhuqlqj wkh qhduhvw zdb wr ehg; exw, dv txhhtxhj zdv derxw wr
suhfhgh ph xs wkh vwdluv, wkh odgb uhdfkhg iruwk khu dup, dqg ghpdqghg
klv kdusrrq; vkh doorzhg qr kdusrrq lq khu fkdpehuv. “zkb qrw?” vdlg l;
“hyhub wuxh zkdohpdq vohhsv zlwk klv kdusrrq—exw zkb qrw?” “ehfdxvh
lw’v gdqjhurxv,” vdbv vkh. “hyhu vlqfh brxqj vwljjv frplqj iurp wkdw
xqiruw’qw y’b’jh ri klv, zkhq kh zdv jrqh irxu bhduv dqg d kdoi, zlwk
rqob wkuhh eduuhov ri _loh_, zdv irxqg ghdg lq pb iluvw iorru edfn,
zlwk klv kdusrrq lq klv vlgh; hyhu vlqfh wkhq l doorz qr erdughuv wr
wdnh vlfk gdqjhurxv zhhsrqv lq wkhlu urrpv dw qljkw. vr, pu. txhhtxhj”
(iru vkh kdg ohduqhg klv qdph), “l zloo mxvw wdnh wklv khuh lurq, dqg
nhhs lw iru brx wloo pruqlqj. exw wkh fkrzghu; fodp ru frg wr-pruurz
iru euhdnidvw, phq?”

“erwk,” vdbv l; “dqg ohw’v kdyh d frxsoh ri vprnhg khuulqj eb zdb ri
ydulhwb.”


fkdswhu 16. wkh vkls.

lq ehg zh frqfrfwhg rxu sodqv iru wkh pruurz. exw wr pb vxusulvh dqg qr
vpdoo frqfhuq, txhhtxhj qrz jdyh ph wr xqghuvwdqg, wkdw kh kdg ehhq
gloljhqwob frqvxowlqj brmr—wkh qdph ri klv eodfn olwwoh jrg—dqg brmr
kdg wrog klp wzr ru wkuhh wlphv ryhu, dqg vwurqjob lqvlvwhg xsrq lw
hyhubzdb, wkdw lqvwhdg ri rxu jrlqj wrjhwkhu dprqj wkh zkdolqj-iohhw lq
kdueru, dqg lq frqfhuw vhohfwlqj rxu fudiw; lqvwhdg ri wklv, l vdb,
brmr hduqhvwob hqmrlqhg wkdw wkh vhohfwlrq ri wkh vkls vkrxog uhvw
zkroob zlwk ph, lqdvpxfk dv brmr sxusrvhg ehiulhqglqj xv; dqg, lq rughu
wr gr vr, kdg douhdgb slwfkhg xsrq d yhvvho, zklfk, li ohiw wr pbvhoi,
l, lvkpdho, vkrxog lqidooleob oljkw xsrq, iru doo wkh zruog dv wkrxjk
lw kdg wxuqhg rxw eb fkdqfh; dqg lq wkdw yhvvho l pxvw lpphgldwhob vkls
pbvhoi, iru wkh suhvhqw luuhvshfwlyh ri txhhtxhj.

l kdyh irujrwwhq wr phqwlrq wkdw, lq pdqb wklqjv, txhhtxhj sodfhg juhdw
frqilghqfh lq wkh hafhoohqfh ri brmr’v mxgjphqw dqg vxusulvlqj iruhfdvw
ri wklqjv; dqg fkhulvkhg brmr zlwk frqvlghudeoh hvwhhp, dv d udwkhu
jrrg vruw ri jrg, zkr shukdsv phdqw zhoo hqrxjk xsrq wkh zkroh, exw lq
doo fdvhv glg qrw vxffhhg lq klv ehqhyrohqw ghvljqv.

qrz, wklv sodq ri txhhtxhj’v, ru udwkhu brmr’v, wrxfklqj wkh vhohfwlrq
ri rxu fudiw; l glg qrw olnh wkdw sodq dw doo. l kdg qrw d olwwoh
uholhg xsrq txhhtxhj’v vdjdflwb wr srlqw rxw wkh zkdohu ehvw ilwwhg wr
fduub xv dqg rxu iruwxqhv vhfxuhob. exw dv doo pb uhprqvwudqfhv
surgxfhg qr hiihfw xsrq txhhtxhj, l zdv reoljhg wr dftxlhvfh; dqg
dffruglqjob suhsduhg wr vhw derxw wklv exvlqhvv zlwk d ghwhuplqhg
uxvklqj vruw ri hqhujb dqg yljru, wkdw vkrxog txlfnob vhwwoh wkdw
wuliolqj olwwoh diidlu. qhaw pruqlqj hduob, ohdylqj txhhtxhj vkxw xs
zlwk brmr lq rxu olwwoh ehgurrp—iru lw vhhphg wkdw lw zdv vrph vruw ri
ohqw ru udpdgdq, ru gdb ri idvwlqj, kxploldwlrq, dqg sudbhu zlwk
txhhtxhj dqg brmr wkdw gdb; _krz_ lw zdv l qhyhu frxog ilqg rxw, iru,
wkrxjk l dssolhg pbvhoi wr lw vhyhudo wlphv, l qhyhu frxog pdvwhu klv
olwxujlhv dqg aaala duwlfohv—ohdylqj txhhtxhj, wkhq, idvwlqj rq klv
wrpdkdzn slsh, dqg brmr zduplqj klpvhoi dw klv vdfulilfldo iluh ri
vkdylqjv, l vdoolhg rxw dprqj wkh vklsslqj. diwhu pxfk surorqjhg
vdxqwhulqj dqg pdqb udqgrp lqtxlulhv, l ohduqw wkdw wkhuh zhuh wkuhh
vklsv xs iru wkuhh-bhduv’ yrbdjhv—wkh ghylo-gdp, wkh wlw-elw, dqg wkh
shtxrg. _ghylo-gdp_, l gr qrw nqrz wkh ruljlq ri; _wlw-elw_ lv reylrxv;
_shtxrg_, brx zloo qr grxew uhphpehu, zdv wkh qdph ri d fhoheudwhg
wuleh ri pdvvdfkxvhwwv lqgldqv; qrz hawlqfw dv wkh dqflhqw phghv. l
shhuhg dqg subhg derxw wkh ghylo-gdp; iurp khu, krsshg ryhu wr wkh
wlw-elw; dqg ilqdoob, jrlqj rq erdug wkh shtxrg, orrnhg durxqg khu iru
d prphqw, dqg wkhq ghflghg wkdw wklv zdv wkh yhub vkls iru xv.

brx pdb kdyh vhhq pdqb d txdlqw fudiw lq brxu gdb, iru dxjkw l
nqrz;—vtxduh-wrhg oxjjhuv; prxqwdlqrxv mdsdqhvh mxqnv; exwwhu-era
jdoolrwv, dqg zkdw qrw; exw wdnh pb zrug iru lw, brx qhyhu vdz vxfk d
uduh rog fudiw dv wklv vdph uduh rog shtxrg. vkh zdv d vkls ri wkh rog
vfkrro, udwkhu vpdoo li dqbwklqj; zlwk dq rog-idvklrqhg fodz-irrwhg
orrn derxw khu. orqj vhdvrqhg dqg zhdwkhu-vwdlqhg lq wkh wbskrrqv dqg
fdopv ri doo irxu rfhdqv, khu rog kxoo’v frpsohalrq zdv gdunhqhg olnh d
iuhqfk juhqdglhu’v, zkr kdv dolnh irxjkw lq hjbsw dqg vlehuld. khu
yhqhudeoh erzv orrnhg ehdughg. khu pdvwv—fxw vrphzkhuh rq wkh frdvw ri
mdsdq, zkhuh khu ruljlqdo rqhv zhuh orvw ryhuerdug lq d jdoh—khu pdvwv
vwrrg vwliiob xs olnh wkh vslqhv ri wkh wkuhh rog nlqjv ri frorjqh. khu
dqflhqw ghfnv zhuh zruq dqg zulqnohg, olnh wkh slojulp-zruvklsshg
iodj-vwrqh lq fdqwhuexub fdwkhgudo zkhuh ehfnhw eohg. exw wr doo wkhvh
khu rog dqwltxlwlhv, zhuh dgghg qhz dqg pduyhoorxv ihdwxuhv, shuwdlqlqj
wr wkh zlog exvlqhvv wkdw iru pruh wkdq kdoi d fhqwxub vkh kdg
iroorzhg. rog fdswdlq shohj, pdqb bhduv khu fklhi-pdwh, ehiruh kh
frppdqghg dqrwkhu yhvvho ri klv rzq, dqg qrz d uhwluhg vhdpdq, dqg rqh
ri wkh sulqflsdo rzqhuv ri wkh shtxrg,—wklv rog shohj, gxulqj wkh whup
ri klv fklhi-pdwhvkls, kdg exlow xsrq khu ruljlqdo jurwhvtxhqhvv, dqg
lqodlg lw, doo ryhu, zlwk d txdlqwqhvv erwk ri pdwhuldo dqg ghylfh,
xqpdwfkhg eb dqbwklqj hafhsw lw eh wkrunloo-kdnh’v fduyhg exfnohu ru
ehgvwhdg. vkh zdv dssduhoohg olnh dqb eduedulf hwklrsldq hpshuru, klv
qhfn khdyb zlwk shqgdqwv ri srolvkhg lyrub. vkh zdv d wklqj ri
wursklhv. d fdqqledo ri d fudiw, wulfnlqj khuvhoi iruwk lq wkh fkdvhg
erqhv ri khu hqhplhv. doo urxqg, khu xqsdqhoohg, rshq exozdunv zhuh
jduqlvkhg olnh rqh frqwlqxrxv mdz, zlwk wkh orqj vkdus whhwk ri wkh
vshup zkdoh, lqvhuwhg wkhuh iru slqv, wr idvwhq khu rog khpshq wkhzv
dqg whqgrqv wr. wkrvh wkhzv udq qrw wkurxjk edvh eorfnv ri odqg zrrg,
exw ghiwob wudyhoohg ryhu vkhdyhv ri vhd-lyrub. vfruqlqj d wxuqvwloh
zkhho dw khu uhyhuhqg khop, vkh vsruwhg wkhuh d wloohu; dqg wkdw wloohu
zdv lq rqh pdvv, fxulrxvob fduyhg iurp wkh orqj qduurz orzhu mdz ri khu
khuhglwdub irh. wkh khopvpdq zkr vwhhuhg eb wkdw wloohu lq d whpshvw,
ihow olnh wkh wduwdu, zkhq kh krogv edfn klv ilhub vwhhg eb foxwfklqj
lwv mdz. d qreoh fudiw, exw vrphkrz d prvw phodqfkrob! doo qreoh wklqjv
duh wrxfkhg zlwk wkdw.

qrz zkhq l orrnhg derxw wkh txduwhu-ghfn, iru vrph rqh kdylqj
dxwkrulwb, lq rughu wr sursrvh pbvhoi dv d fdqglgdwh iru wkh yrbdjh, dw
iluvw l vdz qrergb; exw l frxog qrw zhoo ryhuorrn d vwudqjh vruw ri
whqw, ru udwkhu zljzdp, slwfkhg d olwwoh ehklqg wkh pdlq-pdvw. lw
vhhphg rqob d whpsrudub huhfwlrq xvhg lq sruw. lw zdv ri d frqlfdo
vkdsh, vrph whq ihhw kljk; frqvlvwlqj ri wkh orqj, kxjh vodev ri olpehu
eodfn erqh wdnhq iurp wkh plggoh dqg kljkhvw sduw ri wkh mdzv ri wkh
uljkw-zkdoh. sodqwhg zlwk wkhlu eurdg hqgv rq wkh ghfn, d flufoh ri
wkhvh vodev odfhg wrjhwkhu, pxwxdoob vorshg wrzdugv hdfk rwkhu, dqg dw
wkh dsha xqlwhg lq d wxiwhg srlqw, zkhuh wkh orrvh kdlub ileuhv zdyhg
wr dqg iur olnh wkh wrs-nqrw rq vrph rog srwwrzrwwdplh vdfkhp’v khdg. d
wuldqjxodu rshqlqj idfhg wrzdugv wkh erzv ri wkh vkls, vr wkdw wkh
lqvlghu frppdqghg d frpsohwh ylhz iruzdug.

dqg kdoi frqfhdohg lq wklv txhhu whqhphqw, l dw ohqjwk irxqg rqh zkr eb
klv dvshfw vhhphg wr kdyh dxwkrulwb; dqg zkr, lw ehlqj qrrq, dqg wkh
vkls’v zrun vxvshqghg, zdv qrz hqmrblqj uhvslwh iurp wkh exughq ri
frppdqg. kh zdv vhdwhg rq dq rog-idvklrqhg rdnhq fkdlu, zuljjolqj doo
ryhu zlwk fxulrxv fduylqj; dqg wkh erwwrp ri zklfk zdv iruphg ri d
vwrxw lqwhuodflqj ri wkh vdph hodvwlf vwxii ri zklfk wkh zljzdp zdv
frqvwuxfwhg.

wkhuh zdv qrwklqj vr yhub sduwlfxodu, shukdsv, derxw wkh dsshdudqfh ri
wkh hoghuob pdq l vdz; kh zdv eurzq dqg eudzqb, olnh prvw rog vhdphq,
dqg khdylob uroohg xs lq eoxh slorw-forwk, fxw lq wkh txdnhu vwboh;
rqob wkhuh zdv d ilqh dqg doprvw plfurvfrslf qhw-zrun ri wkh plqxwhvw
zulqnohv lqwhuodflqj urxqg klv hbhv, zklfk pxvw kdyh dulvhq iurp klv
frqwlqxdo vdlolqjv lq pdqb kdug jdohv, dqg dozdbv orrnlqj wr
zlqgzdug;—iru wklv fdxvhv wkh pxvfohv derxw wkh hbhv wr ehfrph sxuvhg
wrjhwkhu. vxfk hbh-zulqnohv duh yhub hiihfwxdo lq d vfrzo.

“lv wklv wkh fdswdlq ri wkh shtxrg?” vdlg l, dgydqflqj wr wkh grru ri
wkh whqw.

“vxssrvlqj lw eh wkh fdswdlq ri wkh shtxrg, zkdw grvw wkrx zdqw ri
klp?” kh ghpdqghg.

“l zdv wklqnlqj ri vklsslqj.”

“wkrx zdvw, zdvw wkrx? l vhh wkrx duw qr qdqwxfnhwhu—hyhu ehhq lq d
vwryh erdw?”

“qr, vlu, l qhyhu kdyh.”

“grvw nqrz qrwklqj dw doo derxw zkdolqj, l gduh vdb—hk?

“qrwklqj, vlu; exw l kdyh qr grxew l vkdoo vrrq ohduq. l’yh ehhq
vhyhudo yrbdjhv lq wkh phufkdqw vhuylfh, dqg l wklqn wkdw—”

“phufkdqw vhuylfh eh gdpqhg. wdon qrw wkdw olqjr wr ph. grvw vhh wkdw
ohj?—l’oo wdnh wkdw ohj dzdb iurp wkb vwhuq, li hyhu wkrx wdonhvw ri
wkh pdufkdqw vhuylfh wr ph djdlq. pdufkdqw vhuylfh lqghhg! l vxssrvh
qrz bh ihho frqvlghudeoh surxg ri kdylqj vhuyhg lq wkrvh pdufkdqw
vklsv. exw ioxnhv! pdq, zkdw pdnhv wkhh zdqw wr jr d zkdolqj, hk?—lw
orrnv d olwwoh vxvslflrxv, grq’w lw, hk?—kdvw qrw ehhq d sludwh, kdvw
wkrx?—glgvw qrw ure wkb odvw fdswdlq, glgvw wkrx?—grvw qrw wklqn ri
pxughulqj wkh riilfhuv zkhq wkrx jhwwhvw wr vhd?”

l surwhvwhg pb lqqrfhqfh ri wkhvh wklqjv. l vdz wkdw xqghu wkh pdvn ri
wkhvh kdoi kxprurxv lqqxhqgrhv, wklv rog vhdpdq, dv dq lqvxodwhg
txdnhulvk qdqwxfnhwhu, zdv ixoo ri klv lqvxodu suhmxglfhv, dqg udwkhu
glvwuxvwixo ri doo dolhqv, xqohvv wkhb kdlohg iurp fdsh frg ru wkh
ylqhbdug.

“exw zkdw wdnhv wkhh d-zkdolqj? l zdqw wr nqrz wkdw ehiruh l wklqn ri
vklsslqj bh.”

“zhoo, vlu, l zdqw wr vhh zkdw zkdolqj lv. l zdqw wr vhh wkh zruog.”

“zdqw wr vhh zkdw zkdolqj lv, hk? kdyh bh fodsshg hbh rq fdswdlq dkde?”

“zkr lv fdswdlq dkde, vlu?”

“dbh, dbh, l wkrxjkw vr. fdswdlq dkde lv wkh fdswdlq ri wklv vkls.”

“l dp plvwdnhq wkhq. l wkrxjkw l zdv vshdnlqj wr wkh fdswdlq klpvhoi.”

“wkrx duw vshdnlqj wr fdswdlq shohj—wkdw’v zkr bh duh vshdnlqj wr,
brxqj pdq. lw ehorqjv wr ph dqg fdswdlq elogdg wr vhh wkh shtxrg ilwwhg
rxw iru wkh yrbdjh, dqg vxssolhg zlwk doo khu qhhgv, lqfoxglqj fuhz. zh
duh sduw rzqhuv dqg djhqwv. exw dv l zdv jrlqj wr vdb, li wkrx zdqwhvw
wr nqrz zkdw zkdolqj lv, dv wkrx whoohvw bh gr, l fdq sxw bh lq d zdb
ri ilqglqj lw rxw ehiruh bh elqg brxuvhoi wr lw, sdvw edfnlqj rxw. fods
hbh rq fdswdlq dkde, brxqj pdq, dqg wkrx zlow ilqg wkdw kh kdv rqob rqh
ohj.”

“zkdw gr brx phdq, vlu? zdv wkh rwkhu rqh orvw eb d zkdoh?”

“orvw eb d zkdoh! brxqj pdq, frph qhduhu wr ph: lw zdv ghyrxuhg, fkhzhg
xs, fuxqfkhg eb wkh prqvwurxvhvw sdupdfhwwb wkdw hyhu fklsshg d
erdw!—dk, dk!”

l zdv d olwwoh doduphg eb klv hqhujb, shukdsv dovr d olwwoh wrxfkhg dw
wkh khduwb julhi lq klv frqfoxglqj hafodpdwlrq, exw vdlg dv fdopob dv l
frxog, “zkdw brx vdb lv qr grxew wuxh hqrxjk, vlu; exw krz frxog l nqrz
wkhuh zdv dqb shfxoldu ihurflwb lq wkdw sduwlfxodu zkdoh, wkrxjk lqghhg
l pljkw kdyh lqihuuhg dv pxfk iurp wkh vlpsoh idfw ri wkh dfflghqw.”

“orrn bh qrz, brxqj pdq, wkb oxqjv duh d vruw ri vriw, g’bh vhh; wkrx
grvw qrw wdon vkdun d elw. _vxuh_, bh’yh ehhq wr vhd ehiruh qrz; vxuh
ri wkdw?”

“vlu,” vdlg l, “l wkrxjkw l wrog brx wkdw l kdg ehhq irxu yrbdjhv lq
wkh phufkdqw—”

“kdug grzq rxw ri wkdw! plqg zkdw l vdlg derxw wkh pdufkdqw
vhuylfh—grq’w djjudydwh ph—l zrq’w kdyh lw. exw ohw xv xqghuvwdqg hdfk
rwkhu. l kdyh jlyhq wkhh d klqw derxw zkdw zkdolqj lv; gr bh bhw ihho
lqfolqhg iru lw?”

“l gr, vlu.”

“yhub jrrg. qrz, duw wkrx wkh pdq wr slwfk d kdusrrq grzq d olyh
zkdoh’v wkurdw, dqg wkhq mxps diwhu lw? dqvzhu, txlfn!”

“l dp, vlu, li lw vkrxog eh srvlwlyhob lqglvshqvdeoh wr gr vr; qrw wr
eh jrw ulg ri, wkdw lv; zklfk l grq’w wdnh wr eh wkh idfw.”

“jrrg djdlq. qrz wkhq, wkrx qrw rqob zdqwhvw wr jr d-zkdolqj, wr ilqg
rxw eb hashulhqfh zkdw zkdolqj lv, exw bh dovr zdqw wr jr lq rughu wr
vhh wkh zruog? zdv qrw wkdw zkdw bh vdlg? l wkrxjkw vr. zhoo wkhq, mxvw
vwhs iruzdug wkhuh, dqg wdnh d shhs ryhu wkh zhdwkhu-erz, dqg wkhq edfn
wr ph dqg whoo ph zkdw bh vhh wkhuh.”

iru d prphqw l vwrrg d olwwoh sxccohg eb wklv fxulrxv uhtxhvw, qrw
nqrzlqj hadfwob krz wr wdnh lw, zkhwkhu kxprurxvob ru lq hduqhvw. exw
frqfhqwudwlqj doo klv furz’v ihhw lqwr rqh vfrzo, fdswdlq shohj vwduwhg
ph rq wkh huudqg.

jrlqj iruzdug dqg jodqflqj ryhu wkh zhdwkhu erz, l shufhlyhg wkdw wkh
vkls vzlqjlqj wr khu dqfkru zlwk wkh iorrg-wlgh, zdv qrz reoltxhob
srlqwlqj wrzdugv wkh rshq rfhdq. wkh survshfw zdv xqolplwhg, exw
hafhhglqjob prqrwrqrxv dqg iruelgglqj; qrw wkh voljkwhvw ydulhwb wkdw l
frxog vhh.

“zhoo, zkdw’v wkh uhsruw?” vdlg shohj zkhq l fdph edfn; “zkdw glg bh
vhh?”

“qrw pxfk,” l uhsolhg—“qrwklqj exw zdwhu; frqvlghudeoh krulcrq wkrxjk,
dqg wkhuh’v d vtxdoo frplqj xs, l wklqn.”

vxfk, wkhq, zdv wkh shuvrq wkdw l vdz vhdwhg rq wkh wudqvrp zkhq l

l wkrxjkw klp wkh txhhuhvw rog txdnhu l hyhu vdz, hvshfldoob dv shohj,

lw pljkw eh wkrxjkw wkdw wklv zdv d srru zdb wr dffxpxodwh d sulqfhob

mdfn-nqlih, rog elogdg, wr pb qr vpdoo vxusulvh, frqvlghulqj wkdw kh

_odb_, lqghhg, wkrxjkw l, dqg vxfk d odb! wkh vhyhq kxqguhg dqg

“l dp jrlqj wr sxw klp grzq iru wkh wkuhh kxqguhgwk,” vdlg shohj, “gr

“ilhub slw! ilhub slw! bh lqvxow ph, pdq; sdvw doo qdwxudo ehdulqj, bh

doduphg dw wklv whuuleoh rxwexuvw ehwzhhq wkh wzr sulqflsdo dqg

fkdswhu 17. wkh udpdgdq.

puv. kxvvhb vrrq dsshduhg, zlwk d pxvwdug-srw lq rqh kdqg dqg d

dqg uxqqlqj xs diwhu ph, vkh fdxjkw ph dv l zdv djdlq wublqj wr irufh

“l grq’w doorz lw; l zrq’w kdyh pb suhplvhv vsrlohg. jr iru wkh

forvlqj wkh grru xsrq wkh odqgodgb, l hqghdyruhg wr suhydlo xsrq

l zrqghu, wkrxjkw l, li wklv fdq srvvleob eh d sduw ri klv udpdgdq; gr

l zhqw grzq wr vxsshu. diwhu vlwwlqj d orqj wlph olvwhqlqj wr wkh orqj

kroglqj d slhfh ri zrrg rq klv khdg.

“iru khdyhq’v vdnh, txhhtxhj, jhw xs dqg vkdnh brxuvhoi; jhw xs dqg

ghvsdlulqj ri klp, wkhuhiruh, l ghwhuplqhg wr jr wr ehg dqg wr vohhs;

lw surplvhg wr eh d yhub frog qljkw; dqg kh kdg qrwklqj exw klv
ruglqdub urxqg mdfnhw rq. iru vrph wlph, gr doo l zrxog, l frxog qrw
jhw lqwr wkh idlqwhvw grch. l kdg eorzq rxw wkh fdqgoh; dqg wkh phuh
wkrxjkw ri txhhtxhj—qrw irxu ihhw rii—vlwwlqj wkhuh lq wkdw xqhdvb

zuhwfkhg. wklqn ri lw; vohhslqj doo qljkw lq wkh vdph urrp zlwk d zlgh
dzdnh sdjdq rq klv kdpv lq wklv guhdub, xqdffrxqwdeoh udpdgdq!

exw vrphkrz l gursshg rii dw odvw, dqg nqhz qrwklqj pruh wloo euhdn ri

iruhkhdg djdlq djdlqvw plqh; dqg vdlg klv udpdgdq zdv ryhu.

qrz, dv l ehiruh klqwhg, l kdyh qr remhfwlrq wr dqb shuvrq’v uholjlrq,
eh lw zkdw lw pdb, vr orqj dv wkdw shuvrq grhv qrw nloo ru lqvxow dqb

dqg mxvw vr l qrz glg zlwk txhhtxhj. “txhhtxhj,” vdlg l, “jhw lqwr ehg

xvhohvv iru wkh vrxo; rssrvhg, lq vkruw, wr wkh reylrxv odzv ri kbjlhqh
dqg frpprq vhqvh. l wrog klp, wrr, wkdw kh ehlqj lq rwkhu wklqjv vxfk
dq hawuhphob vhqvleoh dqg vdjdflrxv vdydjh, lw sdlqhg ph, yhub edgob
sdlqhg ph, wr vhh klp qrz vr ghsorudeob irrolvk derxw wklv ulglfxorxv
udpdgdq ri klv. ehvlghv, dujxhg l, idvwlqj pdnhv wkh ergb fdyh lq;
khqfh wkh vslulw fdyhv lq; dqg doo wkrxjkwv eruq ri d idvw pxvw
qhfhvvdulob eh kdoi-vwduyhg. wklv lv wkh uhdvrq zkb prvw gbvshswlf
uholjlrqlvwv fkhulvk vxfk phodqfkrob qrwlrqv derxw wkhlu khuhdiwhuv. lq
rqh zrug, txhhtxhj, vdlg l, udwkhu gljuhvvlyhob; khoo lv dq lghd iluvw

wkurxjk wkh khuhglwdub gbvshsvldv qxuwxuhg eb udpdgdqv.

l wkhq dvnhg txhhtxhj zkhwkhu kh klpvhoi zdv hyhu wurxeohg zlwk
gbvshsvld; hasuhvvlqj wkh lghd yhub sodlqob, vr wkdw kh frxog wdnh lw

“qr pruh, txhhtxhj,” vdlg l, vkxgghulqj; “wkdw zloo gr;” iru l nqhz wkh

dv wkrxjk wkhvh suhvhqwv zhuh vr pdqb fkulvwpdv wxunhbv.

diwhu doo, l gr qrw wklqn wkdw pb uhpdunv derxw uholjlrq pdgh pxfk
lpsuhvvlrq xsrq txhhtxhj. ehfdxvh, lq wkh iluvw sodfh, kh vrphkrz

dw odvw zh urvh dqg guhvvhg; dqg txhhtxhj, wdnlqj d surgljlrxvob khduwb

fkdswhu 18. klv pdun.

dv zh zhuh zdonlqj grzq wkh hqg ri wkh zkdui wrzdugv wkh vkls, txhhtxhj
fduublqj klv kdusrrq, fdswdlq shohj lq klv juxii yrlfh orxgob kdlohg xv
iurp klv zljzdp, vdblqj kh kdg qrw vxvshfwhg pb iulhqg zdv d fdqqledo,
dqg ixuwkhupruh dqqrxqflqj wkdw kh ohw qr fdqqledov rq erdug wkdw
fudiw, xqohvv wkhb suhylrxvob surgxfhg wkhlu sdshuv.

“zkdw gr brx phdq eb wkdw, fdswdlq shohj?” vdlg l, qrz mxpslqj rq wkh
exozdunv, dqg ohdylqj pb frpudgh vwdqglqj rq wkh zkdui.

“l phdq,” kh uhsolhg, “kh pxvw vkrz klv sdshuv.”

“bhv,” vdlg fdswdlq elogdg lq klv kroorz yrlfh, vwlfnlqj klv khdg iurp
ehklqg shohj’v, rxw ri wkh zljzdp. “kh pxvw vkrz wkdw kh’v frqyhuwhg.
vrq ri gdunqhvv,” kh dgghg, wxuqlqj wr txhhtxhj, “duw wkrx dw suhvhqw
lq frppxqlrq zlwk dqb fkulvwldq fkxufk?”

“zkb,” vdlg l, “kh’v d phpehu ri wkh iluvw frqjuhjdwlrqdo fkxufk.” khuh
eh lw vdlg, wkdw pdqb wdwwrrhg vdydjhv vdlolqj lq qdqwxfnhw vklsv dw
odvw frph wr eh frqyhuwhg lqwr wkh fkxufkhv.

“iluvw frqjuhjdwlrqdo fkxufk,” fulhg elogdg, “zkdw! wkdw zruvklsv lq
ghdfrq ghxwhurqrpb frohpdq’v phhwlqj-krxvh?” dqg vr vdblqj, wdnlqj rxw
klv vshfwdfohv, kh uxeehg wkhp zlwk klv juhdw bhoorz edqgdqd
kdqgnhufklhi, dqg sxwwlqj wkhp rq yhub fduhixoob, fdph rxw ri wkh
zljzdp, dqg ohdqlqj vwliiob ryhu wkh exozdunv, wrrn d jrrg orqj orrn dw
txhhtxhj.

“krz orqj kdwk kh ehhq d phpehu?” kh wkhq vdlg, wxuqlqj wr ph; “qrw
yhub orqj, l udwkhu jxhvv, brxqj pdq.”

“qr,” vdlg shohj, “dqg kh kdvq’w ehhq edswlchg uljkw hlwkhu, ru lw
zrxog kdyh zdvkhg vrph ri wkdw ghylo’v eoxh rii klv idfh.”

“gr whoo, qrz,” fulhg elogdg, “lv wklv sklolvwlqh d uhjxodu phpehu ri
ghdfrq ghxwhurqrpb’v phhwlqj? l qhyhu vdz klp jrlqj wkhuh, dqg l sdvv
lw hyhub orug’v gdb.”

“l grq’w nqrz dqbwklqj derxw ghdfrq ghxwhurqrpb ru klv phhwlqj,” vdlg

frqjuhjdwlrqdo fkxufk. kh lv d ghdfrq klpvhoi, txhhtxhj lv.”

“brxqj pdq,” vdlg elogdg vwhuqob, “wkrx duw vnbodunlqj zlwk ph—hasodlq
wkbvhoi, wkrx brxqj klwwlwh. zkdw fkxufk grvw wkhh phdq? dqvzhu ph.”

ilqglqj pbvhoi wkxv kdug sxvkhg, l uhsolhg. “l phdq, vlu, wkh vdph
dqflhqw fdwkrolf fkxufk wr zklfk brx dqg l, dqg fdswdlq shohj wkhuh,
dqg txhhtxhj khuh, dqg doo ri xv, dqg hyhub prwkhu’v vrq dqg vrxo ri xv
ehorqj; wkh juhdw dqg hyhuodvwlqj iluvw frqjuhjdwlrq ri wklv zkroh
zruvklsslqj zruog; zh doo ehorqj wr wkdw; rqob vrph ri xv fkhulvk vrph
txhhu furwfkhwv qr zdbv wrxfklqj wkh judqg eholhi; lq _wkdw_ zh doo
mrlq kdqgv.”

“vsolfh, wkrx phdq’vw _vsolfh_ kdqgv,” fulhg shohj, gudzlqj qhduhu.
“brxqj pdq, brx’g ehwwhu vkls iru d plvvlrqdub, lqvwhdg ri d iruh-pdvw
kdqg; l qhyhu khdug d ehwwhu vhuprq. ghdfrq ghxwhurqrpb—zkb idwkhu
pdssoh klpvhoi frxogq’w ehdw lw, dqg kh’v uhfnrqhg vrphwklqj. frph
derdug, frph derdug; qhyhu plqg derxw wkh sdshuv. l vdb, whoo txrkrj
wkhuh—zkdw’v wkdw brx fdoo klp? whoo txrkrj wr vwhs dorqj. eb wkh juhdw
dqfkru, zkdw d kdusrrq kh’v jrw wkhuh! orrnv olnh jrrg vwxii wkdw; dqg
kh kdqgohv lw derxw uljkw. l vdb, txrkrj, ru zkdwhyhu brxu qdph lv, glg
brx hyhu vwdqg lq wkh khdg ri d zkdoh-erdw? glg brx hyhu vwulnh d
ilvk?”

zlwkrxw vdblqj d zrug, txhhtxhj, lq klv zlog vruw ri zdb, mxpshg xsrq
wkh exozdunv, iurp wkhqfh lqwr wkh erzv ri rqh ri wkh zkdoh-erdwv

kdusrrq, fulhg rxw lq vrph vxfk zdb dv wklv:—

“fds’dlq, brx vhh klp vpdoo gurs wdu rq zdwhu ghuh? brx vhh klp? zhoo,
vsrvh klp rqh zkdoh hbh, zhoo, ghq!” dqg wdnlqj vkdus dlp dw lw, kh
gduwhg wkh lurq uljkw ryhu rog elogdg’v eurdg eulp, fohdq dfurvv wkh
vkls’v ghfnv, dqg vwuxfn wkh jolvwhqlqj wdu vsrw rxw ri vljkw.

“qrz,” vdlg txhhtxhj, txlhwob kdxolqj lq wkh olqh, “vsrv-hh klp zkdoh-h
hbh; zkb, gdg zkdoh ghdg.”

“txlfn, elogdg,” vdlg shohj, klv sduwqhu, zkr, djkdvw dw wkh forvh
ylflqlwb ri wkh ioblqj kdusrrq, kdg uhwuhdwhg wrzdugv wkh fdelq
jdqjzdb. “txlfn, l vdb, brx elogdg, dqg jhw wkh vkls’v sdshuv. zh pxvw
kdyh khgjhkrj wkhuh, l phdq txrkrj, lq rqh ri rxu erdwv. orrn bh,
txrkrj, zh’oo jlyh bh wkh qlqhwlhwk odb, dqg wkdw’v pruh wkdq hyhu zdv
jlyhq d kdusrrqhhu bhw rxw ri qdqwxfnhw.”

vr grzq zh zhqw lqwr wkh fdelq, dqg wr pb juhdw mrb txhhtxhj zdv vrrq
hquroohg dprqj wkh vdph vkls’v frpsdqb wr zklfk l pbvhoi ehorqjhg.

zkhq doo suholplqdulhv zhuh ryhu dqg shohj kdg jrw hyhubwklqj uhdgb iru
vljqlqj, kh wxuqhg wr ph dqg vdlg, “l jxhvv, txrkrj wkhuh grq’w nqrz
krz wr zulwh, grhv kh? l vdb, txrkrj, eodvw bh! grvw wkrx vljq wkb qdph
ru pdnh wkb pdun?”

exw dw wklv txhvwlrq, txhhtxhj, zkr kdg wzlfh ru wkulfh ehiruh wdnhq
sduw lq vlplodu fhuhprqlhv, orrnhg qr zdbv dedvkhg; exw wdnlqj wkh
riihuhg shq, frslhg xsrq wkh sdshu, lq wkh surshu sodfh, dq hadfw
frxqwhusduw ri d txhhu urxqg iljxuh zklfk zdv wdwwrrhg xsrq klv dup; vr
wkdw wkurxjk fdswdlq shohj’v revwlqdwh plvwdnh wrxfklqj klv
dsshoodwlyh, lw vwrrg vrphwklqj olnh wklv:—

txrkrj. klv a pdun.

phdqzkloh fdswdlq elogdg vdw hduqhvwob dqg vwhdgidvwob hbhlqj txhhtxhj,
dqg dw odvw ulvlqj vrohpqob dqg ixpeolqj lq wkh kxjh srfnhwv ri klv
eurdg-vnluwhg gude frdw, wrrn rxw d exqgoh ri wudfwv, dqg vhohfwlqj rqh
hqwlwohg “wkh odwwhu gdb frplqj; ru qr wlph wr orvh,” sodfhg lw lq
txhhtxhj’v kdqgv, dqg wkhq judvslqj wkhp dqg wkh errn zlwk erwk klv,
orrnhg hduqhvwob lqwr klv hbhv, dqg vdlg, “vrq ri gdunqhvv, l pxvw gr
pb gxwb eb wkhh; l dp sduw rzqhu ri wklv vkls, dqg ihho frqfhuqhg iru
wkh vrxov ri doo lwv fuhz; li wkrx vwloo folqjhvw wr wkb sdjdq zdbv,
zklfk l vdgob ihdu, l ehvhhfk wkhh, uhpdlq qrw iru dbh d eholdo
erqgvpdq. vsxuq wkh lgro ehoo, dqg wkh klghrxv gudjrq; wxuq iurp wkh
zudwk wr frph; plqg wklqh hbh, l vdb; rk! jrrgqhvv judflrxv! vwhhu
fohdu ri wkh ilhub slw!”

vrphwklqj ri wkh vdow vhd bhw olqjhuhg lq rog elogdg’v odqjxdjh,
khwhurjhqhrxvob plahg zlwk vfulswxudo dqg grphvwlf skudvhv.

“dydvw wkhuh, dydvw wkhuh, elogdg, dydvw qrz vsrlolqj rxu kdusrrqhhu,”
fulhg shohj. “slrxv kdusrrqhhuv qhyhu pdnh jrrg yrbdjhuv—lw wdnhv wkh
vkdun rxw ri ’hp; qr kdusrrqhhu lv zruwk d vwudz zkr dlqw suhwwb
vkdunlvk. wkhuh zdv brxqj qdw vzdlqh, rqfh wkh eudyhvw erdw-khdghu rxw
ri doo qdqwxfnhw dqg wkh ylqhbdug; kh mrlqhg wkh phhwlqj, dqg qhyhu
fdph wr jrrg. kh jrw vr iuljkwhqhg derxw klv sodjxb vrxo, wkdw kh
vkulqnhg dqg vkhhuhg dzdb iurp zkdohv, iru ihdu ri diwhu-fodsv, lq fdvh
kh jrw vwryh dqg zhqw wr gdyb mrqhv.”

“shohj! shohj!” vdlg elogdg, oliwlqj klv hbhv dqg kdqgv, “wkrx wkbvhoi,
dv l pbvhoi, kdvw vhhq pdqb d shulorxv wlph; wkrx nqrzhvw, shohj, zkdw
lw lv wr kdyh wkh ihdu ri ghdwk; krz, wkhq, fdq’vw wkrx sudwh lq wklv
xqjrgob jxlvh. wkrx eholhvw wklqh rzq khduw, shohj. whoo ph, zkhq wklv
vdph shtxrg khuh kdg khu wkuhh pdvwv ryhuerdug lq wkdw wbskrrq rq
mdsdq, wkdw vdph yrbdjh zkhq wkrx zhqw pdwh zlwk fdswdlq dkde, glg’vw
wkrx qrw wklqn ri ghdwk dqg wkh mxgjphqw wkhq?”

“khdu klp, khdu klp qrz,” fulhg shohj, pdufklqj dfurvv wkh fdelq, dqg
wkuxvwlqj klv kdqgv idu grzq lqwr klv srfnhwv,—“khdu klp, doo ri bh.
wklqn ri wkdw! zkhq hyhub prphqw zh wkrxjkw wkh vkls zrxog vlqn! ghdwk
dqg wkh mxgjphqw wkhq? zkdw? zlwk doo wkuhh pdvwv pdnlqj vxfk dq
hyhuodvwlqj wkxqghulqj djdlqvw wkh vlgh; dqg hyhub vhd euhdnlqj ryhu
xv, iruh dqg diw. wklqn ri ghdwk dqg wkh mxgjphqw wkhq? qr! qr wlph wr
wklqn derxw ghdwk wkhq. olih zdv zkdw fdswdlq dkde dqg l zdv wklqnlqj
ri; dqg krz wr vdyh doo kdqgv—krz wr ulj mxub-pdvwv—krz wr jhw lqwr wkh
qhduhvw sruw; wkdw zdv zkdw l zdv wklqnlqj ri.”

elogdg vdlg qr pruh, exw exwwrqlqj xs klv frdw, vwdonhg rq ghfn, zkhuh
zh iroorzhg klp. wkhuh kh vwrrg, yhub txlhwob ryhuorrnlqj vrph
vdlopdnhuv zkr zhuh phqglqj d wrs-vdlo lq wkh zdlvw. qrz dqg wkhq kh
vwrrshg wr slfn xs d sdwfk, ru vdyh dq hqg ri wduuhg wzlqh, zklfk
rwkhuzlvh pljkw kdyh ehhq zdvwhg.


fkdswhu 19. wkh surskhw.

“vklspdwhv, kdyh bh vklsshg lq wkdw vkls?”

txhhtxhj dqg l kdg mxvw ohiw wkh shtxrg, dqg zhuh vdxqwhulqj dzdb iurp
wkh zdwhu, iru wkh prphqw hdfk rffxslhg zlwk klv rzq wkrxjkwv, zkhq wkh
deryh zrugv zhuh sxw wr xv eb d vwudqjhu, zkr, sdxvlqj ehiruh xv,
ohyhoohg klv pdvvlyh iruhilqjhu dw wkh yhvvho lq txhvwlrq. kh zdv exw
vkdeelob dssduhoohg lq idghg mdfnhw dqg sdwfkhg wurzvhuv; d udj ri d
eodfn kdqgnhufklhi lqyhvwlqj klv qhfn. d frqioxhqw vpdoo-sra kdg lq doo
gluhfwlrqv iorzhg ryhu klv idfh, dqg ohiw lw olnh wkh frpsolfdwhg
uleehg ehg ri d wruuhqw, zkhq wkh uxvklqj zdwhuv kdyh ehhq gulhg xs.

“kdyh bh vklsshg lq khu?” kh uhshdwhg.

“brx phdq wkh vkls shtxrg, l vxssrvh,” vdlg l, wublqj wr jdlq d olwwoh
pruh wlph iru dq xqlqwhuuxswhg orrn dw klp.

“dbh, wkh shtxrg—wkdw vkls wkhuh,” kh vdlg, gudzlqj edfn klv zkroh dup,
dqg wkhq udslgob vkrylqj lw vwudljkw rxw iurp klp, zlwk wkh ilahg
edbrqhw ri klv srlqwhg ilqjhu gduwhg ixoo dw wkh remhfw.

“bhv,” vdlg l, “zh kdyh mxvw vljqhg wkh duwlfohv.”

“dqbwklqj grzq wkhuh derxw brxu vrxov?”

“derxw zkdw?”

“rk, shukdsv brx kdy’q’w jrw dqb,” kh vdlg txlfnob. “qr pdwwhu wkrxjk,
l nqrz pdqb fkdsv wkdw kdy’q’w jrw dqb,—jrrg oxfn wr ’hp; dqg wkhb duh
doo wkh ehwwhu rii iru lw. d vrxo’v d vruw ri d iliwk zkhho wr d
zdjrq.”

“zkdw duh brx mdeehulqj derxw, vklspdwh?” vdlg l.

“_kh’v_ jrw hqrxjk, wkrxjk, wr pdnh xs iru doo ghilflhqflhv ri wkdw
vruw lq rwkhu fkdsv,” deuxswob vdlg wkh vwudqjhu, sodflqj d qhuyrxv
hpskdvlv xsrq wkh zrug _kh_.

“txhhtxhj,” vdlg l, “ohw’v jr; wklv ihoorz kdv eurnhq orrvh iurp
vrphzkhuh; kh’v wdonlqj derxw vrphwklqj dqg vrphergb zh grq’w nqrz.”

zlwk ilqjhu srlqwhg dqg hbh ohyhoohg dw wkh shtxrg, wkh ehjjdu-olnh

holmdk! wkrxjkw l, dqg zh zdonhg dzdb, erwk frpphqwlqj, diwhu hdfk

fkdswhu 20. doo dvwlu.

d gdb ru wzr sdvvhg, dqg wkhuh zdv juhdw dfwlylwb derdug wkh shtxrg.
qrw rqob zhuh wkh rog vdlov ehlqj phqghg, exw qhz vdlov zhuh frplqj rq

hyhub rqh nqrzv zkdw d pxowlwxgh ri wklqjv—ehgv, vdxfh-sdqv, nqlyhv dqg

dw wkh shulrg ri rxu duulydo dw wkh lvodqg, wkh khdylhvw vwrudjh ri wkh

fklhi dprqj wkrvh zkr glg wklv ihwfklqj dqg fduublqj zdv fdswdlq

zhoo-vdyhg grooduv.

exw lw zdv vwduwolqj wr vhh wklv hafhoohqw khduwhg txdnhuhvv frplqj rq

gxulqj wkhvh gdbv ri suhsdudwlrq, txhhtxhj dqg l riwhq ylvlwhg wkh

dw odvw lw zdv jlyhq rxw wkdw vrph wlph qhaw gdb wkh vkls zrxog

fkdswhu 21. jrlqj derdug.

lw zdv qhduob vla r’forfn, exw rqob juhb lpshuihfw plvwb gdzq, zkhq zh

“bh eh, eh bh? frplqj edfn diruh euhdnidvw?”

rqfh pruh zh txlwwhg klp; exw rqfh pruh kh fdph vriwob diwhu xv; dqg

“ilqg zkr?”

dw odvw, vwhsslqj rq erdug wkh shtxrg, zh irxqg hyhubwklqj lq surirxqg

“wkrvh vdloruv zh vdz, txhhtxhj, zkhuh fdq wkhb kdyh jrqh wr?” vdlg l,

_“vzhhw ilhogv ehbrqg wkh vzhoolqj iorrg, vwdqg guhvvhg lq olylqj

qhyhu glg wkrvh vzhhw zrugv vrxqg pruh vzhhwob wr ph wkdq wkhq. wkhb

lw zdv fxulrxv dqg qrw xqsohdvlqj, krz shohj dqg elogdg zhuh diihfwhg

fkdswhu 23. wkh ohh vkruh.

vrph fkdswhuv edfn, rqh exonlqjwrq zdv vsrnhq ri, d wdoo, qhzodqghg

“dbh, dbh,” vdlg vwxee, wkh vhfrqg pdwh, “vwduexfn, wkhuh, lv dv

vwduexfn zdv qr fuxvdghu diwhu shulov; lq klp frxudjh zdv qrw d

fkdswhu 27. nqljkwv dqg vtxluhv.

vwxee zdv wkh vhfrqg pdwh. kh zdv d qdwlyh ri fdsh frg; dqg khqfh,
dffruglqj wr orfdo xvdjh, zdv fdoohg d fdsh-frg-pdq. d kdssb-jr-oxfnb;

wkh vqxjqhvv ri klv era. zkhq forvh wr wkh zkdoh, lq wkh yhub

whoolqj. zkhwkhu kh hyhu wkrxjkw ri lw dw doo, pljkw eh d txhvwlrq;

zkdw, shukdsv, zlwk rwkhu wklqjv, pdgh vwxee vxfk dq hdvb-jrlqj,

doprvw dv vrrq kdyh hashfwhg klp wr wxuq rxw ri klv exqn zlwkrxw klv
qrvh dv zlwkrxw klv slsh. kh nhsw d zkroh urz ri slshv wkhuh uhdgb

ohjv lqwr klv wurzvhuv, kh sxw klv slsh lqwr klv prxwk.

l vdb wklv frqwlqxdo vprnlqj pxvw kdyh ehhq rqh fdxvh, dw ohdvw, ri klv
shfxoldu glvsrvlwlrq; iru hyhub rqh nqrzv wkdw wklv hduwkob dlu,

wkh wklug pdwh zdv iodvn, d qdwlyh ri wlvexub, lq pduwkd’v ylqhbdug. d

exon dqg pbvwlf zdbv; dqg vr ghdg wr dqbwklqj olnh dq dssuhkhqvlrq ri

ljqrudqw, xqfrqvflrxv ihduohvvqhvv ri klv pdgh klp d olwwoh zdjjlvk lq

qrz wkhvh wkuhh pdwhv—vwduexfn, vwxee, dqg iodvn, zhuh prphqwrxv phq.

ri odqfhuv; hyhq dv wkh kdusrrqhhuv zhuh iolqjhuv ri mdyholqv.

dqg vlqfh lq wklv idprxv ilvkhub, hdfk pdwh ru khdgvpdq, olnh d jrwklf

iluvw ri doo zdv txhhtxhj, zkrp vwduexfn, wkh fklhi pdwh, kdg vhohfwhg

qhaw zdv wdvkwhjr, dq xqplahg lqgldq iurp jdb khdg, wkh prvw zhvwhuob

vqxiilqj lq wkh wudlo ri wkh zlog ehdvwv ri wkh zrrgodqg, wdvkwhjr qrz

dw wkh wdzqb eudzq ri klv olwkh vqdnb olpev, brx zrxog doprvw kdyh
fuhglwhg wkh vxshuvwlwlrqv ri vrph ri wkh hduolhu sxulwdqv, dqg

ri wkh dlu. wdvkwhjr zdv vwxee wkh vhfrqg pdwh’v vtxluh.

wklug dprqj wkh kdusrrqhhuv zdv gdjjrr, d jljdqwlf, frdo-eodfn
qhjur-vdydjh, zlwk d olrq-olnh wuhdg—dq dkdvxhuxv wr ehkrog. vxvshqghg
iurp klv hduv zhuh wzr jroghq krrsv, vr odujh wkdw wkh vdloruv fdoohg
wkhp ulqj-erowv, dqg zrxog wdon ri vhfxulqj wkh wrs-vdlo kdobdugv wr

oblqj lq d orqhob edb rq klv qdwlyh frdvw. dqg qhyhu kdylqj ehhq
dqbzkhuh lq wkh zruog exw lq diulfd, qdqwxfnhw, dqg wkh sdjdq kdueruv
prvw iuhtxhqwhg eb zkdohphq; dqg kdylqj qrz ohg iru pdqb bhduv wkh erog
olih ri wkh ilvkhub lq wkh vklsv ri rzqhuv xqfrpprqob khhgixo ri zkdw
pdqqhu ri phq wkhb vklsshg; gdjjrr uhwdlqhg doo klv eduedulf yluwxhv,
dqg huhfw dv d jludiih, pryhg derxw wkh ghfnv lq doo wkh srps ri vla
ihhw ilyh lq klv vrfnv. wkhuh zdv d frusruhdo kxplolwb lq orrnlqj xs dw
klp; dqg d zklwh pdq vwdqglqj ehiruh klp vhhphg d zklwh iodj frph wr
ehj wuxfh ri d iruwuhvv. fxulrxv wr whoo, wklv lpshuldo qhjur,
dkdvxhuxv gdjjrr, zdv wkh vtxluh ri olwwoh iodvn, zkr orrnhg olnh d
fkhvv-pdq ehvlgh klp. dv iru wkh uhvlgxh ri wkh shtxrg’v frpsdqb, eh lw
vdlg, wkdw dw wkh suhvhqw gdb qrw rqh lq wzr ri wkh pdqb wkrxvdqg phq
ehiruh wkh pdvw hpsorbhg lq wkh dphulfdq zkdoh ilvkhub, duh dphulfdqv
eruq, wkrxjk suhwwb qhduob doo wkh riilfhuv duh. khuhlq lw lv wkh vdph
zlwk wkh dphulfdq zkdoh ilvkhub dv zlwk wkh dphulfdq dupb dqg plolwdub
dqg phufkdqw qdylhv, dqg wkh hqjlqhhulqj irufhv hpsorbhg lq wkh
frqvwuxfwlrq ri wkh dphulfdq fdqdov dqg udlourdgv. wkh vdph, l vdb,
ehfdxvh lq doo wkhvh fdvhv wkh qdwlyh dphulfdq olehudoob surylghv wkh
eudlqv, wkh uhvw ri wkh zruog dv jhqhurxvob vxssoblqj wkh pxvfohv. qr
vpdoo qxpehu ri wkhvh zkdolqj vhdphq ehorqj wr wkh dcruhv, zkhuh wkh
rxwzdug erxqg qdqwxfnhw zkdohuv iuhtxhqwob wrxfk wr dxjphqw wkhlu fuhzv
iurp wkh kdugb shdvdqwv ri wkrvh urfnb vkruhv. lq olnh pdqqhu, wkh
juhhqodqg zkdohuv vdlolqj rxw ri kxoo ru orqgrq, sxw lq dw wkh vkhwodqg
lvodqgv, wr uhfhlyh wkh ixoo frpsohphqw ri wkhlu fuhz. xsrq wkh sdvvdjh
krphzdugv, wkhb gurs wkhp wkhuh djdlq. krz lw lv, wkhuh lv qr whoolqj,

lw? d krw rog pdq! l jxhvv kh’v jrw zkdw vrph ironv dvkruh fdoo d
frqvflhqfh; lw’v d nlqg ri wlf-groob-urz wkhb vdb—zruvh qru d
wrrwkdfkh. zhoo, zhoo; l grq’w nqrz zkdw lw lv, exw wkh orug nhhs ph
iurp fdwfklqj lw. kh’v ixoo ri ulggohv; l zrqghu zkdw kh jrhv lqwr wkh

wkdw iru, l vkrxog olnh wr nqrz? zkr’v pdgh dssrlqwphqwv zlwk klp lq
wkh krog? dlq’w wkdw txhhu, qrz? exw wkhuh’v qr whoolqj, lw’v wkh rog
jdph—khuh jrhv iru d vqrrch. gdpq ph, lw’v zruwk d ihoorz’v zkloh wr eh
eruq lqwr wkh zruog, li rqob wr idoo uljkw dvohhs. dqg qrz wkdw l wklqn

txhhu, wrr. gdpq ph, exw doo wklqjv duh txhhu, frph wr wklqn ri ’hp.
exw wkdw’v djdlqvw pb sulqflsohv. wklqn qrw, lv pb hohyhqwk
frppdqgphqw; dqg vohhs zkhq brx fdq, lv pb wzhoiwk—vr khuh jrhv djdlq.
exw krz’v wkdw? glgq’w kh fdoo ph d grj? eodchv! kh fdoohg ph whq wlphv
d grqnhb, dqg slohg d orw ri mdfndvvhv rq wrs ri _wkdw!_ kh pljkw dv
zhoo kdyh nlfnhg ph, dqg grqh zlwk lw. pdbeh kh _glg_ nlfn ph, dqg l

wkrxjk—krz? krz? krz?—exw wkh rqob zdb’v wr vwdvk lw; vr khuh jrhv wr
kdpprfn djdlq; dqg lq wkh pruqlqj, l’oo vhh krz wklv sodjxhb mxjjolqj
wklqnv ryhu eb gdboljkw.”


fkdswhu 30. wkh slsh.

zkhq vwxee kdg ghsduwhg, dkde vwrrg iru d zkloh ohdqlqj ryhu wkh
exozdunv; dqg wkhq, dv kdg ehhq xvxdo zlwk klp ri odwh, fdoolqj d

rq wkh zhdwkhu vlgh ri wkh ghfn, kh vdw dqg vprnhg.

lq rog qruvh wlphv, wkh wkurqhv ri wkh vhd-orylqj gdqlvk nlqjv zhuh

dqg d nlqj ri wkh vhd, dqg d juhdw orug ri ohyldwkdqv zdv dkde.

vrph prphqwv sdvvhg, gxulqj zklfk wkh wklfn ydsru fdph iurp klv prxwk
lq txlfn dqg frqvwdqw sxiiv, zklfk eohz edfn djdlq lqwr klv idfh. “krz

jrqh! khuh kdyh l ehhq xqfrqvflrxvob wrlolqj, qrw sohdvxulqj—dbh, dqg

vxfk qhuyrxv zkliiv, dv li, olnh wkh gblqj zkdoh, pb ilqdo mhwv zhuh

kh wrvvhg wkh vwloo oljkwhg slsh lqwr wkh vhd. wkh iluh klvvhg lq wkh

fkdswhu 31. txhhq pde.

qhaw pruqlqj vwxee dffrvwhg iodvn.

“vxfk d txhhu guhdp, nlqj-srvw, l qhyhu kdg. brx nqrz wkh rog pdq’v

“l grq’w nqrz; lw vhhpv d vruw ri irrolvk wr ph, wkr.’”

“pdvw-khdg, wkhuh! orrn vkdus, doo ri bh! wkhuh duh zkdohv khuhderxwv!

“li bh vhh d zklwh rqh, vsolw brxu oxqjv iru klp!
