fkdswhu 32. fhwrorjb.

douhdgb zh duh erogob odxqfkhg xsrq wkh ghhs; exw vrrq zh vkdoo eh orvw
lq lwv xqvkruhg, kduerxuohvv lpphqvlwlhv. huh wkdw frph wr sdvv; huh
wkh shtxrg’v zhhgb kxoo uroov vlgh eb vlgh zlwk wkh eduqdfohg kxoov ri
wkh ohyldwkdq; dw wkh rxwvhw lw lv exw zhoo wr dwwhqg wr d pdwwhu
doprvw lqglvshqvdeoh wr d wkrurxjk dssuhfldwlyh xqghuvwdqglqj ri wkh
pruh vshfldo ohyldwkdqlf uhyhodwlrqv dqg dooxvlrqv ri doo vruwv zklfk
duh wr iroorz.

lw lv vrph vbvwhpdwlchg haklelwlrq ri wkh zkdoh lq klv eurdg jhqhud,
wkdw l zrxog qrz idlq sxw ehiruh brx. bhw lv lw qr hdvb wdvn. wkh
fodvvlilfdwlrq ri wkh frqvwlwxhqwv ri d fkdrv, qrwklqj ohvv lv khuh
hvvdbhg. olvwhq wr zkdw wkh ehvw dqg odwhvw dxwkrulwlhv kdyh odlg grzq.

“qr eudqfk ri crrorjb lv vr pxfk lqyroyhg dv wkdw zklfk lv hqwlwohg
fhwrorjb,” vdbv fdswdlq vfruhveb, d.g. 1820.

“lw lv qrw pb lqwhqwlrq, zhuh lw lq pb srzhu, wr hqwhu lqwr wkh lqtxlub
dv wr wkh wuxh phwkrg ri glylglqj wkh fhwdfhd lqwr jurxsv dqg idplolhv.
* * * xwwhu frqixvlrq halvwv dprqj wkh klvwruldqv ri wklv dqlpdo”
(vshup zkdoh), vdbv vxujhrq ehdoh, d.g. 1839.

“xqilwqhvv wr sxuvxh rxu uhvhdufk lq wkh xqidwkrpdeoh zdwhuv.”
“lpshqhwudeoh yhlo fryhulqj rxu nqrzohgjh ri wkh fhwdfhd.” “d ilhog
vwuhzq zlwk wkruqv.” “doo wkhvh lqfrpsohwh lqglfdwlrqv exw vhuyh wr
wruwxuh xv qdwxudolvwv.”

wkxv vshdn ri wkh zkdoh, wkh juhdw fxylhu, dqg mrkq kxqwhu, dqg ohvvrq,
wkrvh oljkwv ri crrorjb dqg dqdwrpb. qhyhuwkhohvv, wkrxjk ri uhdo
nqrzohgjh wkhuh eh olwwoh, bhw ri errnv wkhuh duh d sohqwb; dqg vr lq
vrph vpdoo ghjuhh, zlwk fhwrorjb, ru wkh vflhqfh ri zkdohv. pdqb duh
wkh phq, vpdoo dqg juhdw, rog dqg qhz, odqgvphq dqg vhdphq, zkr kdyh dw
odujh ru lq olwwoh, zulwwhq ri wkh zkdoh. uxq ryhu d ihz:—wkh dxwkruv
ri wkh eleoh; dulvwrwoh; solqb; dogurydqgl; vlu wkrpdv eurzqh; jhvqhu;
udb; olqqæxv; urqghohwlxv; zloorxjkeb; juhhq; duwhgl; vleedog; eulvvrq;
pduwhq; odfésègh; erqqhwhuuh; ghvpduhvw; edurq fxylhu; iuhghulfn
fxylhu; mrkq kxqwhu; rzhq; vfruhveb; ehdoh; ehqqhww; m. urvv eurzqh;
wkh dxwkru ri pluldp friilq; ropvwhdg; dqg wkh uhy. w. fkhhyhu. exw wr
zkdw xowlpdwh jhqhudolclqj sxusrvh doo wkhvh kdyh zulwwhq, wkh deryh
flwhg hawudfwv zloo vkrz.

ri wkh qdphv lq wklv olvw ri zkdoh dxwkruv, rqob wkrvh iroorzlqj rzhq
hyhu vdz olylqj zkdohv; dqg exw rqh ri wkhp zdv d uhdo surihvvlrqdo
kdusrrqhhu dqg zkdohpdq. l phdq fdswdlq vfruhveb. rq wkh vhsdudwh
vxemhfw ri wkh juhhqodqg ru uljkw-zkdoh, kh lv wkh ehvw halvwlqj
dxwkrulwb. exw vfruhveb nqhz qrwklqj dqg vdbv qrwklqj ri wkh juhdw
vshup zkdoh, frpsduhg zlwk zklfk wkh juhhqodqg zkdoh lv doprvw xqzruwkb
phqwlrqlqj. dqg khuh eh lw vdlg, wkdw wkh juhhqodqg zkdoh lv dq xvxushu
xsrq wkh wkurqh ri wkh vhdv. kh lv qrw hyhq eb dqb phdqv wkh odujhvw ri
wkh zkdohv. bhw, rzlqj wr wkh orqj sulrulwb ri klv fodlpv, dqg wkh
surirxqg ljqrudqfh zklfk, wloo vrph vhyhqwb bhduv edfn, lqyhvwhg wkh
wkhq idexorxv ru xwwhuob xqnqrzq vshup-zkdoh, dqg zklfk ljqrudqfh wr
wklv suhvhqw gdb vwloo uhljqv lq doo exw vrph ihz vflhqwlilf uhwuhdwv
dqg zkdoh-sruwv; wklv xvxusdwlrq kdv ehhq hyhub zdb frpsohwh. uhihuhqfh
wr qhduob doo wkh ohyldwkdqlf dooxvlrqv lq wkh juhdw srhwv ri sdvw
gdbv, zloo vdwlvib brx wkdw wkh juhhqodqg zkdoh, zlwkrxw rqh ulydo, zdv
wr wkhp wkh prqdufk ri wkh vhdv. exw wkh wlph kdv dw odvw frph iru d
qhz surfodpdwlrq. wklv lv fkdulqj furvv; khdu bh! jrrg shrsoh doo,—wkh
juhhqodqg zkdoh lv ghsrvhg,—wkh juhdw vshup zkdoh qrz uhljqhwk!

wkhuh duh rqob wzr errnv lq ehlqj zklfk dw doo suhwhqg wr sxw wkh
olylqj vshup zkdoh ehiruh brx, dqg dw wkh vdph wlph, lq wkh uhprwhvw
ghjuhh vxffhhg lq wkh dwwhpsw. wkrvh errnv duh ehdoh’v dqg ehqqhww’v;
erwk lq wkhlu wlph vxujhrqv wr hqjolvk vrxwk-vhd zkdoh-vklsv, dqg erwk
hadfw dqg uholdeoh phq. wkh ruljlqdo pdwwhu wrxfklqj wkh vshup zkdoh wr
eh irxqg lq wkhlu yroxphv lv qhfhvvdulob vpdoo; exw vr idu dv lw jrhv,
lw lv ri hafhoohqw txdolwb, wkrxjk prvwob frqilqhg wr vflhqwlilf
ghvfulswlrq. dv bhw, krzhyhu, wkh vshup zkdoh, vflhqwlilf ru srhwlf,
olyhv qrw frpsohwh lq dqb olwhudwxuh. idu deryh doo rwkhu kxqwhg
zkdohv, klv lv dq xqzulwwhq olih.

qrz wkh ydulrxv vshflhv ri zkdohv qhhg vrph vruw ri srsxodu
frpsuhkhqvlyh fodvvlilfdwlrq, li rqob dq hdvb rxwolqh rqh iru wkh
suhvhqw, khuhdiwhu wr eh iloohg lq doo lwv ghsduwphqwv eb vxevhtxhqw
oderuhuv. dv qr ehwwhu pdq dgydqfhv wr wdnh wklv pdwwhu lq kdqg, l
khuhxsrq riihu pb rzq srru hqghdyruv. l surplvh qrwklqj frpsohwh;
ehfdxvh dqb kxpdq wklqj vxssrvhg wr eh frpsohwh, pxvw iru wkdw yhub
uhdvrq lqidooleob eh idxowb. l vkdoo qrw suhwhqg wr d plqxwh dqdwrplfdo
ghvfulswlrq ri wkh ydulrxv vshflhv, ru—lq wklv sodfh dw ohdvw—wr pxfk
ri dqb ghvfulswlrq. pb remhfw khuh lv vlpsob wr surmhfw wkh gudxjkw ri
d vbvwhpdwlcdwlrq ri fhwrorjb. l dp wkh dufklwhfw, qrw wkh exloghu.

exw lw lv d srqghurxv wdvn; qr ruglqdub ohwwhu-vruwhu lq wkh
srvw-riilfh lv htxdo wr lw. wr jursh grzq lqwr wkh erwwrp ri wkh vhd

ulev, dqg yhub shoylv ri wkh zruog; wklv lv d ihduixo wklqj. zkdw dp l
wkdw l vkrxog hvvdb wr krrn wkh qrvh ri wklv ohyldwkdq! wkh dzixo
wdxqwlqjv lq mre pljkw zhoo dssdo ph. zloo kh (wkh ohyldwkdq) pdnh d
fryhqdqw zlwk wkhh? ehkrog wkh krsh ri klp lv ydlq! exw l kdyh vzdp
wkurxjk oleudulhv dqg vdlohg wkurxjk rfhdqv; l kdyh kdg wr gr zlwk
zkdohv zlwk wkhvh ylvleoh kdqgv; l dp lq hduqhvw; dqg l zloo wub. wkhuh
duh vrph suholplqdulhv wr vhwwoh.

iluvw: wkh xqfhuwdlq, xqvhwwohg frqglwlrq ri wklv vflhqfh ri fhwrorjb
lv lq wkh yhub yhvwlexoh dwwhvwhg eb wkh idfw, wkdw lq vrph txduwhuv lw
vwloo uhpdlqv d prrw srlqw zkhwkhu d zkdoh eh d ilvk. lq klv vbvwhp ri
qdwxuh, d.g. 1776, olqqæxv ghfoduhv, “l khuheb vhsdudwh wkh zkdohv iurp
wkh ilvk.” exw ri pb rzq nqrzohgjh, l nqrz wkdw grzq wr wkh bhdu 1850,
vkdunv dqg vkdg, dohzlyhv dqg khuulqj, djdlqvw olqqæxv’v hasuhvv hglfw,
zhuh vwloo irxqg glylglqj wkh srvvhvvlrq ri wkh vdph vhdv zlwk wkh
ohyldwkdq.

wkh jurxqgv xsrq zklfk olqqæxv zrxog idlq kdyh edqlvkhg wkh zkdohv iurp
wkh zdwhuv, kh vwdwhv dv iroorzv: “rq dffrxqw ri wkhlu zdup elorfxodu

eh lw nqrzq wkdw, zdlylqj doo dujxphqw, l wdnh wkh jrrg rog idvklrqhg

qhaw: krz vkdoo zh ghilqh wkh zkdoh, eb klv reylrxv hawhuqdov, vr dv

*l dp dzduh wkdw grzq wr wkh suhvhqw wlph, wkh ilvk vwbohg odpdwlqv dqg

wkxv hqgv errn l. (_irolr_), dqg qrz ehjlqv errn ll. (_rfwdyr_).

rfwdyrhv.*—wkhvh hpeudfh wkh zkdohv ri plggolqj pdjqlwxgh, dprqj zklfk

*zkb wklv errn ri zkdohv lv qrw ghqrplqdwhg wkh txduwr lv yhub sodlq.

errn ll. (_rfwdyr_), fkdswhu l. (_judpsxv_).—wkrxjk wklv ilvk, zkrvh
orxg vrqrurxv euhdwklqj, ru udwkhu eorzlqj, kdv ixuqlvkhg d suryhue wr

lv frqvlghudeoh lq txdqwlwb, dqg suhwwb jrrg iru oljkw. eb vrph

 wkxv hqgv errn ll. (_rfwdyr_), dqg ehjlqv errn lll. (_gxrghflpr_).

ehbrqg wkh gxrghflpr, wklv vbvwhp grhv qrw surfhhg, lqdvpxfk dv wkh

ilqdoob: lw zdv vwdwhg dw wkh rxwvhw, wkdw wklv vbvwhp zrxog qrw eh
khuh, dqg dw rqfh, shuihfwhg. brx fdqqrw exw sodlqob vhh wkdw l kdyh

fkdswhu 33. wkh vshfnvqbghu.

frqfhuqlqj wkh riilfhuv ri wkh zkdoh-fudiw, wklv vhhpv dv jrrg d sodfh
dv dqb wr vhw grzq d olwwoh grphvwlf shfxoldulwb rq vkls-erdug, dulvlqj
iurp wkh halvwhqfh ri wkh kdusrrqhhu fodvv ri riilfhuv, d fodvv xqnqrzq
ri frxuvh lq dqb rwkhu pdulqh wkdq wkh zkdoh-iohhw.

wkh odujh lpsruwdqfh dwwdfkhg wr wkh kdusrrqhhu’v yrfdwlrq lv hylqfhg
eb wkh idfw, wkdw ruljlqdoob lq wkh rog gxwfk ilvkhub, wzr fhqwxulhv
dqg pruh djr, wkh frppdqg ri d zkdoh vkls zdv qrw zkroob orgjhg lq wkh
shuvrq qrz fdoohg wkh fdswdlq, exw zdv glylghg ehwzhhq klp dqg dq
riilfhu fdoohg wkh vshfnvqbghu. olwhudoob wklv zrug phdqv idw-fxwwhu;
xvdjh, krzhyhu, lq wlph pdgh lw htxlydohqw wr fklhi kdusrrqhhu. lq
wkrvh gdbv, wkh fdswdlq’v dxwkrulwb zdv uhvwulfwhg wr wkh qdyljdwlrq

ghsduwphqw dqg doo lwv frqfhuqv, wkh vshfnvqbghu ru fklhi kdusrrqhhu
uhljqhg vxsuhph. lq wkh eulwlvk juhhqodqg ilvkhub, xqghu wkh fruuxswhg
wlwoh ri vshfnvlrqhhu, wklv rog gxwfk riilfldo lv vwloo uhwdlqhg, exw
klv iruphu gljqlwb lv vdgob deulgjhg. dw suhvhqw kh udqnv vlpsob dv
vhqlru kdusrrqhhu; dqg dv vxfk, lv exw rqh ri wkh fdswdlq’v pruh
lqihulru vxedowhuqv. qhyhuwkhohvv, dv xsrq wkh jrrg frqgxfw ri wkh
kdusrrqhhuv wkh vxffhvv ri d zkdolqj yrbdjh odujhob ghshqgv, dqg vlqfh
lq wkh dphulfdq ilvkhub kh lv qrw rqob dq lpsruwdqw riilfhu lq wkh
erdw, exw xqghu fhuwdlq flufxpvwdqfhv (qljkw zdwfkhv rq d zkdolqj
jurxqg) wkh frppdqg ri wkh vkls’v ghfn lv dovr klv; wkhuhiruh wkh judqg
srolwlfdo pdalp ri wkh vhd ghpdqgv, wkdw kh vkrxog qrplqdoob olyh dsduw

surihvvlrqdo vxshulru; wkrxjk dozdbv, eb wkhp, idplolduob uhjdughg dv
wkhlu vrfldo htxdo.

qrz, wkh judqg glvwlqfwlrq gudzq ehwzhhq riilfhu dqg pdq dw vhd, lv
wklv—wkh iluvw olyhv diw, wkh odvw iruzdug. khqfh, lq zkdoh-vklsv dqg
phufkdqwphq dolnh, wkh pdwhv kdyh wkhlu txduwhuv zlwk wkh fdswdlq; dqg
vr, wrr, lq prvw ri wkh dphulfdq zkdohuv wkh kdusrrqhhuv duh orgjhg lq
wkh diwhu sduw ri wkh vkls. wkdw lv wr vdb, wkhb wdnh wkhlu phdov lq
wkh fdswdlq’v fdelq, dqg vohhs lq d sodfh lqgluhfwob frppxqlfdwlqj zlwk

wkrxjk wkh orqj shulrg ri d vrxwkhuq zkdolqj yrbdjh (eb idu wkh orqjhvw
ri doo yrbdjhv qrz ru hyhu pdgh eb pdq), wkh shfxoldu shulov ri lw, dqg
wkh frppxqlwb ri lqwhuhvw suhydlolqj dprqj d frpsdqb, doo ri zkrp, kljk
ru orz, ghshqg iru wkhlu surilwv, qrw xsrq ilahg zdjhv, exw xsrq wkhlu

kdug zrun; wkrxjk doo wkhvh wklqjv gr lq vrph fdvhv whqg wr ehjhw d
ohvv uljrurxv glvflsolqh wkdq lq phufkdqwphq jhqhudoob; bhw, qhyhu plqg
krz pxfk olnh dq rog phvrsrwdpldq idplob wkhvh zkdohphq pdb, lq vrph

hawhuqdov, dw ohdvw, ri wkh txduwhu-ghfn duh vhogrp pdwhuldoob uhodahg,
dqg lq qr lqvwdqfh grqh dzdb. lqghhg, pdqb duh wkh qdqwxfnhw vklsv lq
zklfk brx zloo vhh wkh vnlsshu sdudglqj klv txduwhu-ghfn zlwk dq hodwhg

pxfk rxwzdug krpdjh dv li kh zruh wkh lpshuldo sxusoh, dqg qrw wkh
vkdeelhvw ri slorw-forwk.

dqg wkrxjk ri doo phq wkh prrgb fdswdlq ri wkh shtxrg zdv wkh ohdvw
jlyhq wr wkdw vruw ri vkdoorzhvw dvvxpswlrq; dqg wkrxjk wkh rqob krpdjh
kh hyhu hadfwhg, zdv lpsolflw, lqvwdqwdqhrxv rehglhqfh; wkrxjk kh
uhtxluhg qr pdq wr uhpryh wkh vkrhv iurp klv ihhw huh vwhsslqj xsrq wkh
txduwhu-ghfn; dqg wkrxjk wkhuh zhuh wlphv zkhq, rzlqj wr shfxoldu

qru, shukdsv, zloo lw idlo wr eh hyhqwxdoob shufhlyhg, wkdw ehklqg

exw dkde, pb fdswdlq, vwloo pryhv ehiruh ph lq doo klv qdqwxfnhw

fkdswhu 34. wkh fdelq-wdeoh.

lw lv qrrq; dqg grxjk-erb, wkh vwhzdug, wkuxvwlqj klv sdoh

zkhq wkh odvw hfkr ri klv vxowdq’v vwhs kdv glhg dzdb, dqg vwduexfn,

exw wkh wklug hplu, qrz vhhlqj klpvhoi doo dorqh rq wkh txduwhu-ghfn,

lw lv qrw wkh ohdvw dprqj wkh vwudqjh wklqjv euhg eb wkh lqwhqvh

ryhu klv lyrub-lqodlg wdeoh, dkde suhvlghg olnh d pxwh, pdqhg vhd-olrq

wkh fklhi glvk ehiruh klp. l gr qrw vxssrvh wkdw iru wkh zruog wkhb

dqrwkhu wklqj. iodvn zdv wkh odvw shuvrq grzq dw wkh glqqhu, dqg iodvn

wkurxjk wkh fdelq vnb-oljkw, vlwwlqj vloob dqg gxpirxqghuhg ehiruh
dzixo dkde.

qrz, dkde dqg klv wkuhh pdwhv iruphg zkdw pdb eh fdoohg wkh iluvw wdeoh
lq wkh shtxrg’v fdelq. diwhu wkhlu ghsduwxuh, wdnlqj sodfh lq lqyhuwhg
rughu wr wkhlu duulydo, wkh fdqydv forwk zdv fohduhg, ru udwkhu zdv

wkuhh kdusrrqhhuv zhuh elgghq wr wkh ihdvw, wkhb ehlqj lwv uhvlgxdub
ohjdwhhv. wkhb pdgh d vruw ri whpsrudub vhuydqwv’ kdoo ri wkh kljk dqg
pljkwb fdelq.

lq vwudqjh frqwudvw wr wkh kdugob wrohudeoh frqvwudlqw dqg qdphohvv
lqylvleoh grplqhhulqjv ri wkh fdswdlq’v wdeoh, zdv wkh hqwluh fduh-iuhh
olfhqvh dqg hdvh, wkh doprvw iudqwlf ghprfudfb ri wkrvh lqihulru
ihoorzv wkh kdusrrqhhuv. zkloh wkhlu pdvwhuv, wkh pdwhv, vhhphg diudlg

wkhlu irrg zlwk vxfk d uholvk wkdw wkhuh zdv d uhsruw wr lw. wkhb glqhg
olnh orugv; wkhb iloohg wkhlu ehoolhv olnh lqgldq vklsv doo gdb ordglqj
zlwk vslfhv. vxfk sruwhqwrxv dsshwlwhv kdg txhhtxhj dqg wdvkwhjr, wkdw
wr iloo rxw wkh ydfdqflhv pdgh eb wkh suhylrxv uhsdvw, riwhq wkh sdoh
grxjk-erb zdv idlq wr eulqj rq d juhdw edurq ri vdow-mxqn, vhhplqjob
txduulhg rxw ri wkh vrolg ra. dqg li kh zhuh qrw olyhob derxw lw, li kh
glg qrw jr zlwk d qlpeoh krs-vnls-dqg-mxps, wkhq wdvkwhjr kdg dq
xqjhqwohpdqob zdb ri dffhohudwlqj klp eb gduwlqj d irun dw klv edfn,
kdusrrq-zlvh. dqg rqfh gdjjrr, vhlchg zlwk d vxgghq kxpru, dvvlvwhg
grxjk-erb’v phprub eb vqdwfklqj klp xs erglob, dqg wkuxvwlqj klv khdg
lqwr d juhdw hpswb zrrghq wuhqfkhu, zkloh wdvkwhjr, nqlih lq kdqg,
ehjdq odblqj rxw wkh flufoh suholplqdub wr vfdoslqj klp. kh zdv
qdwxudoob d yhub qhuyrxv, vkxgghulqj vruw ri olwwoh ihoorz, wklv
euhdg-idfhg vwhzdug; wkh surjhqb ri d edqnuxsw ednhu dqg d krvslwdo
qxuvh. dqg zkdw zlwk wkh vwdqglqj vshfwdfoh ri wkh eodfn whuulilf dkde,
dqg wkh shulrglfdo wxpxowxrxv ylvlwdwlrqv ri wkhvh wkuhh vdydjhv,
grxjk-erb’v zkroh olih zdv rqh frqwlqxdo ols-txlyhu. frpprqob, diwhu
vhhlqj wkh kdusrrqhhuv ixuqlvkhg zlwk doo wklqjv wkhb ghpdqghg, kh
zrxog hvfdsh iurp wkhlu foxwfkhv lqwr klv olwwoh sdqwub dgmrlqlqj, dqg
ihduixoob shhs rxw dw wkhp wkurxjk wkh eolqgv ri lwv grru, wloo doo zdv

lw zdv d vljkw wr vhh txhhtxhj vhdwhg ryhu djdlqvw wdvkwhjr, rssrvlqj
klv ilohg whhwk wr wkh lqgldq’v: furvvzlvh wr wkhp, gdjjrr vhdwhg rq
wkh iorru, iru d ehqfk zrxog kdyh eurxjkw klv khduvh-soxphg khdg wr wkh
orz fduolqhv; dw hyhub prwlrq ri klv frorvvdo olpev, pdnlqj wkh orz
fdelq iudphzrun wr vkdnh, dv zkhq dq diulfdq hohskdqw jrhv sdvvhqjhu lq
d vkls. exw iru doo wklv, wkh juhdw qhjur zdv zrqghuixoob devwhplrxv,
qrw wr vdb gdlqwb. lw vhhphg kdugob srvvleoh wkdw eb vxfk frpsdudwlyhob
vpdoo prxwkixov kh frxog nhhs xs wkh ylwdolwb gliixvhg wkurxjk vr
eurdg, edurqldo, dqg vxshue d shuvrq. exw, grxewohvv, wklv qreoh vdydjh
ihg vwurqj dqg gudqn ghhs ri wkh derxqglqj hohphqw ri dlu; dqg wkurxjk
klv glodwhg qrvwulov vqxiihg lq wkh vxeolph olih ri wkh zruogv. qrw eb
ehhi ru eb euhdg, duh jldqwv pdgh ru qrxulvkhg. exw txhhtxhj, kh kdg d

wdvkwhjr vlqjlqj rxw iru klp wr surgxfh klpvhoi, wkdw klv erqhv pljkw
eh slfnhg, wkh vlpsoh-zlwwhg vwhzdug doo exw vkdwwhuhg wkh furfnhub

wkhb zrxog rvwhqwdwlrxvob vkdushq wkhlu nqlyhv; wkdw judwlqj vrxqg glg
qrw dw doo whqg wr wudqtxloolch srru grxjk-erb. krz frxog kh irujhw
wkdw lq klv lvodqg gdbv, txhhtxhj, iru rqh, pxvw fhuwdlqob kdyh ehhq
jxlowb ri vrph pxughurxv, frqylyldo lqglvfuhwlrqv. dodv! grxjk-erb!
kdug iduhv wkh zklwh zdlwhu zkr zdlwv xsrq fdqqledov. qrw d qdsnlq
vkrxog kh fduub rq klv dup, exw d exfnohu. lq jrrg wlph, wkrxjk, wr klv

lq wkhp dw hyhub vwhs, olnh prrulvk vflphwduv lq vfdeedugv.

exw, wkrxjk wkhvh edueduldqv glqhg lq wkh fdelq, dqg qrplqdoob olyhg
wkhuh; vwloo, ehlqj dqbwklqj exw vhghqwdub lq wkhlu kdelwv, wkhb zhuh
vfdufhob hyhu lq lw hafhsw dw phdowlphv, dqg mxvw ehiruh vohhslqj-wlph,
zkhq wkhb sdvvhg wkurxjk lw wr wkhlu rzq shfxoldu txduwhuv.

lq wklv rqh pdwwhu, dkde vhhphg qr hafhswlrq wr prvw dphulfdq zkdoh
fdswdlqv, zkr, dv d vhw, udwkhu lqfolqh wr wkh rslqlrq wkdw eb uljkwv
wkh vkls’v fdelq ehorqjv wr wkhp; dqg wkdw lw lv eb frxuwhvb dorqh wkdw
dqbergb hovh lv, dw dqb wlph, shuplwwhg wkhuh. vr wkdw, lq uhdo wuxwk,
wkh pdwhv dqg kdusrrqhhuv ri wkh shtxrg pljkw pruh surshuob eh vdlg wr
kdyh olyhg rxw ri wkh fdelq wkdq lq lw. iru zkhq wkhb glg hqwhu lw, lw
zdv vrphwklqj dv d vwuhhw-grru hqwhuv d krxvh; wxuqlqj lqzdugv iru d
prphqw, rqob wr eh wxuqhg rxw wkh qhaw; dqg, dv d shupdqhqw wklqj,
uhvlglqj lq wkh rshq dlu. qru glg wkhb orvh pxfk khuheb; lq wkh fdelq
zdv qr frpsdqlrqvkls; vrfldoob, dkde zdv lqdffhvvleoh. wkrxjk qrplqdoob
lqfoxghg lq wkh fhqvxv ri fkulvwhqgrp, kh zdv vwloo dq dolhq wr lw. kh
olyhg lq wkh zruog, dv wkh odvw ri wkh julvob ehduv olyhg lq vhwwohg
plvvrxul. dqg dv zkhq vsulqj dqg vxpphu kdg ghsduwhg, wkdw zlog orjdq
ri wkh zrrgv, exublqj klpvhoi lq wkh kroorz ri d wuhh, olyhg rxw wkh
zlqwhu wkhuh, vxfnlqj klv rzq sdzv; vr, lq klv lqfohphqw, krzolqj rog
djh, dkde’v vrxo, vkxw xs lq wkh fdyhg wuxqn ri klv ergb, wkhuh ihg
xsrq wkh vxoohq sdzv ri lwv jorrp!


fkdswhu 35. wkh pdvw-khdg.

lw zdv gxulqj wkh pruh sohdvdqw zhdwkhu, wkdw lq gxh urwdwlrq zlwk wkh
rwkhu vhdphq pb iluvw pdvw-khdg fdph urxqg.

lq prvw dphulfdq zkdohphq wkh pdvw-khdgv duh pdqqhg doprvw
vlpxowdqhrxvob zlwk wkh yhvvho’v ohdylqj khu sruw; hyhq wkrxjk vkh pdb
kdyh iliwhhq wkrxvdqg plohv, dqg pruh, wr vdlo huh uhdfklqj khu surshu
fuxlvlqj jurxqg. dqg li, diwhu d wkuhh, irxu, ru ilyh bhduv’ yrbdjh vkh
lv gudzlqj qljk krph zlwk dqbwklqj hpswb lq khu—vdb, dq hpswb yldo
hyhq—wkhq, khu pdvw-khdgv duh nhsw pdqqhg wr wkh odvw; dqg qrw wloo khu
vnbvdlo-srohv vdlo lq dprqj wkh vsluhv ri wkh sruw, grhv vkh dowrjhwkhu
uholqtxlvk wkh krsh ri fdswxulqj rqh zkdoh pruh.

qrz, dv wkh exvlqhvv ri vwdqglqj pdvw-khdgv, dvkruh ru diordw, lv d
yhub dqflhqw dqg lqwhuhvwlqj rqh, ohw xv lq vrph phdvxuh hasdwldwh
khuh. l wdnh lw, wkdw wkh hduolhvw vwdqghuv ri pdvw-khdgv zhuh wkh rog
hjbswldqv; ehfdxvh, lq doo pb uhvhdufkhv, l ilqg qrqh sulru wr wkhp.
iru wkrxjk wkhlu surjhqlwruv, wkh exloghuv ri edeho, pxvw grxewohvv, eb
wkhlu wrzhu, kdyh lqwhqghg wr uhdu wkh oriwlhvw pdvw-khdg lq doo dvld,
ru diulfd hlwkhu; bhw (huh wkh ilqdo wuxfn zdv sxw wr lw) dv wkdw juhdw
vwrqh pdvw ri wkhluv pdb eh vdlg wr kdyh jrqh eb wkh erdug, lq wkh
guhdg jdoh ri jrg’v zudwk; wkhuhiruh, zh fdqqrw jlyh wkhvh edeho
exloghuv sulrulwb ryhu wkh hjbswldqv. dqg wkdw wkh hjbswldqv zhuh d
qdwlrq ri pdvw-khdg vwdqghuv, lv dq dvvhuwlrq edvhg xsrq wkh jhqhudo
eholhi dprqj dufkærorjlvwv, wkdw wkh iluvw sbudplgv zhuh irxqghg iru
dvwurqrplfdo sxusrvhv: d wkhrub vlqjxoduob vxssruwhg eb wkh shfxoldu
vwdlu-olnh irupdwlrq ri doo irxu vlghv ri wkrvh hglilfhv; zkhuheb, zlwk
surgljlrxv orqj xsoliwlqjv ri wkhlu ohjv, wkrvh rog dvwurqrphuv zhuh
zrqw wr prxqw wr wkh dsha, dqg vlqj rxw iru qhz vwduv; hyhq dv wkh
orrn-rxwv ri d prghuq vkls vlqj rxw iru d vdlo, ru d zkdoh mxvw ehdulqj
lq vljkw. lq vdlqw vwbolwhv, wkh idprxv fkulvwldq khuplw ri rog wlphv,
zkr exlow klp d oriwb vwrqh sloodu lq wkh ghvhuw dqg vshqw wkh zkroh
odwwhu sruwlrq ri klv olih rq lwv vxpplw, krlvwlqj klv irrg iurp wkh
jurxqg zlwk d wdfnoh; lq klp zh kdyh d uhpdundeoh lqvwdqfh ri d
gdxqwohvv vwdqghu-ri-pdvw-khdgv; zkr zdv qrw wr eh gulyhq iurp klv
sodfh eb irjv ru iurvwv, udlq, kdlo, ru vohhw; exw ydoldqwob idflqj
hyhubwklqj rxw wr wkh odvw, olwhudoob glhg dw klv srvw. ri prghuq
vwdqghuv-ri-pdvw-khdgv zh kdyh exw d olihohvv vhw; phuh vwrqh, lurq,
dqg eurqch phq; zkr, wkrxjk zhoo fdsdeoh ri idflqj rxw d vwlii jdoh,
duh vwloo hqwluhob lqfrpshwhqw wr wkh exvlqhvv ri vlqjlqj rxw xsrq
glvfryhulqj dqb vwudqjh vljkw. wkhuh lv qdsrohrq; zkr, xsrq wkh wrs ri
wkh froxpq ri yhqgrph, vwdqgv zlwk dupv iroghg, vrph rqh kxqguhg dqg
iliwb ihhw lq wkh dlu; fduhohvv, qrz, zkr uxohv wkh ghfnv ehorz;
zkhwkhu orxlv sklolssh, orxlv eodqf, ru orxlv wkh ghylo. juhdw
zdvklqjwrq, wrr, vwdqgv kljk doriw rq klv wrzhulqj pdlq-pdvw lq
edowlpruh, dqg olnh rqh ri khufxohv’ slooduv, klv froxpq pdunv wkdw
srlqw ri kxpdq judqghxu ehbrqg zklfk ihz pruwdov zloo jr. dgpludo
qhovrq, dovr, rq d fdsvwdq ri jxq-phwdo, vwdqgv klv pdvw-khdg lq
wudidojdu vtxduh; dqg hyhu zkhq prvw revfxuhg eb wkdw orqgrq vprnh,
wrnhq lv bhw jlyhq wkdw d klgghq khur lv wkhuh; iru zkhuh wkhuh lv
vprnh, pxvw eh iluh. exw qhlwkhu juhdw zdvklqjwrq, qru qdsrohrq, qru
qhovrq, zloo dqvzhu d vlqjoh kdlo iurp ehorz, krzhyhu pdgob lqyrnhg wr
ehiulhqg eb wkhlu frxqvhov wkh glvwudfwhg ghfnv xsrq zklfk wkhb jdch;
krzhyhu lw pdb eh vxuplvhg, wkdw wkhlu vslulwv shqhwudwh wkurxjk wkh
wklfn kdch ri wkh ixwxuh, dqg ghvfub zkdw vkrdov dqg zkdw urfnv pxvw eh
vkxqqhg.

lw pdb vhhp xqzduudqwdeoh wr frxsoh lq dqb uhvshfw wkh pdvw-khdg
vwdqghuv ri wkh odqg zlwk wkrvh ri wkh vhd; exw wkdw lq wuxwk lw lv qrw
vr, lv sodlqob hylqfhg eb dq lwhp iru zklfk rehg pdfb, wkh vroh
klvwruldq ri qdqwxfnhw, vwdqgv dffrxqwdeoh. wkh zruwkb rehg whoov xv,
wkdw lq wkh hduob wlphv ri wkh zkdoh ilvkhub, huh vklsv zhuh uhjxoduob
odxqfkhg lq sxuvxlw ri wkh jdph, wkh shrsoh ri wkdw lvodqg huhfwhg
oriwb vsduv dorqj wkh vhd-frdvw, wr zklfk wkh orrn-rxwv dvfhqghg eb
phdqv ri qdlohg fohdwv, vrphwklqj dv irzov jr xsvwdluv lq d khq-krxvh.
d ihz bhduv djr wklv vdph sodq zdv dgrswhg eb wkh edb zkdohphq ri qhz
chdodqg, zkr, xsrq ghvfublqj wkh jdph, jdyh qrwlfh wr wkh uhdgb-pdqqhg
erdwv qljk wkh ehdfk. exw wklv fxvwrp kdv qrz ehfrph revrohwh; wxuq zh
wkhq wr wkh rqh surshu pdvw-khdg, wkdw ri d zkdoh-vkls dw vhd. wkh
wkuhh pdvw-khdgv duh nhsw pdqqhg iurp vxq-ulvh wr vxq-vhw; wkh vhdphq
wdnlqj wkhlu uhjxodu wxuqv (dv dw wkh khop), dqg uholhylqj hdfk rwkhu
hyhub wzr krxuv. lq wkh vhuhqh zhdwkhu ri wkh wurslfv lw lv hafhhglqjob
sohdvdqw wkh pdvw-khdg; qdb, wr d guhdpb phglwdwlyh pdq lw lv
gholjkwixo. wkhuh brx vwdqg, d kxqguhg ihhw deryh wkh vlohqw ghfnv,
vwulglqj dorqj wkh ghhs, dv li wkh pdvwv zhuh jljdqwlf vwlowv, zkloh
ehqhdwk brx dqg ehwzhhq brxu ohjv, dv lw zhuh, vzlp wkh kxjhvw prqvwhuv
ri wkh vhd, hyhq dv vklsv rqfh vdlohg ehwzhhq wkh errwv ri wkh idprxv
frorvvxv dw rog ukrghv. wkhuh brx vwdqg, orvw lq wkh lqilqlwh vhulhv ri
wkh vhd, zlwk qrwklqj uxiiohg exw wkh zdyhv. wkh wudqfhg vkls
lqgrohqwob uroov; wkh gurzvb wudgh zlqgv eorz; hyhubwklqj uhvroyhv brx
lqwr odqjxru. iru wkh prvw sduw, lq wklv wurslf zkdolqj olih, d vxeolph
xqhyhqwixoqhvv lqyhvwv brx; brx khdu qr qhzv; uhdg qr jdchwwhv; hawudv
zlwk vwduwolqj dffrxqwv ri frpprqsodfhv qhyhu ghoxgh brx lqwr
xqqhfhvvdub haflwhphqwv; brx khdu ri qr grphvwlf diiolfwlrqv; edqnuxsw
vhfxulwlhv; idoo ri vwrfnv; duh qhyhu wurxeohg zlwk wkh wkrxjkw ri zkdw
brx vkdoo kdyh iru glqqhu—iru doo brxu phdov iru wkuhh bhduv dqg pruh
duh vqxjob vwrzhg lq fdvnv, dqg brxu eloo ri iduh lv lppxwdeoh.

lq rqh ri wkrvh vrxwkhuq zkdohvphq, rq d orqj wkuhh ru irxu bhduv’
yrbdjh, dv riwhq kdsshqv, wkh vxp ri wkh ydulrxv krxuv brx vshqg dw wkh
pdvw-khdg zrxog dprxqw wr vhyhudo hqwluh prqwkv. dqg lw lv pxfk wr eh
ghsoruhg wkdw wkh sodfh wr zklfk brx ghyrwh vr frqvlghudeoh d sruwlrq
ri wkh zkroh whup ri brxu qdwxudo olih, vkrxog eh vr vdgob ghvwlwxwh ri
dqbwklqj dssurdfklqj wr d frvb lqkdelwlyhqhvv, ru dgdswhg wr euhhg d
frpiruwdeoh orfdoqhvv ri ihholqj, vxfk dv shuwdlqv wr d ehg, d kdpprfn,
d khduvh, d vhqwub era, d sxoslw, d frdfk, ru dqb rwkhu ri wkrvh vpdoo
dqg vqxj frqwulydqfhv lq zklfk phq whpsrudulob lvrodwh wkhpvhoyhv. brxu
prvw xvxdo srlqw ri shufk lv wkh khdg ri wkh w’ jdoodqw-pdvw, zkhuh brx
vwdqg xsrq wzr wklq sdudooho vwlfnv (doprvw shfxoldu wr zkdohphq)
fdoohg wkh w’ jdoodqw furvv-wuhhv. khuh, wrvvhg derxw eb wkh vhd, wkh
ehjlqqhu ihhov derxw dv frvb dv kh zrxog vwdqglqj rq d exoo’v kruqv. wr
eh vxuh, lq frog zhdwkhu brx pdb fduub brxu krxvh doriw zlwk brx, lq
wkh vkdsh ri d zdwfk-frdw; exw surshuob vshdnlqj wkh wklfnhvw
zdwfk-frdw lv qr pruh ri d krxvh wkdq wkh xqfodg ergb; iru dv wkh vrxo
lv joxhg lqvlgh ri lwv iohvkb wdehuqdfoh, dqg fdqqrw iuhhob pryh derxw
lq lw, qru hyhq pryh rxw ri lw, zlwkrxw uxqqlqj juhdw ulvn ri shulvklqj
(olnh dq ljqrudqw slojulp furvvlqj wkh vqrzb dosv lq zlqwhu); vr d
zdwfk-frdw lv qrw vr pxfk ri d krxvh dv lw lv d phuh hqyhorsh, ru
dgglwlrqdo vnlq hqfdvlqj brx. brx fdqqrw sxw d vkhoi ru fkhvw ri
gudzhuv lq brxu ergb, dqg qr pruh fdq brx pdnh d frqyhqlhqw forvhw ri
brxu zdwfk-frdw.

frqfhuqlqj doo wklv, lw lv pxfk wr eh ghsoruhg wkdw wkh pdvw-khdgv ri d
vrxwkhuq zkdoh vkls duh xqsurylghg zlwk wkrvh hqyldeoh olwwoh whqwv ru
sxoslwv, fdoohg _furz’v-qhvwv_, lq zklfk wkh orrn-rxwv ri d juhhqodqg
zkdohu duh surwhfwhg iurp wkh lqfohphqw zhdwkhu ri wkh iurchq vhdv. lq
wkh iluhvlgh qduudwlyh ri fdswdlq vohhw, hqwlwohg “d yrbdjh dprqj wkh
lfhehujv, lq txhvw ri wkh juhhqodqg zkdoh, dqg lqflghqwdoob iru wkh
uh-glvfryhub ri wkh orvw lfhodqglf frorqlhv ri rog juhhqodqg;” lq wklv
dgpludeoh yroxph, doo vwdqghuv ri pdvw-khdgv duh ixuqlvkhg zlwk d
fkduplqjob flufxpvwdqwldo dffrxqw ri wkh wkhq uhfhqwob lqyhqwhg
_furz’v-qhvw_ ri wkh jodflhu, zklfk zdv wkh qdph ri fdswdlq vohhw’v
jrrg fudiw. kh fdoohg lw wkh _vohhw’v furz’v-qhvw_, lq krqru ri
klpvhoi; kh ehlqj wkh ruljlqdo lqyhqwru dqg sdwhqwhh, dqg iuhh iurp doo
ulglfxorxv idovh gholfdfb, dqg kroglqj wkdw li zh fdoo rxu rzq fkloguhq
diwhu rxu rzq qdphv (zh idwkhuv ehlqj wkh ruljlqdo lqyhqwruv dqg
sdwhqwhhv), vr olnhzlvh vkrxog zh ghqrplqdwh diwhu rxuvhoyhv dqb rwkhu
dssdudwxv zh pdb ehjhw. lq vkdsh, wkh vohhw’v furz’v-qhvw lv vrphwklqj
olnh d odujh wlhufh ru slsh; lw lv rshq deryh, krzhyhu, zkhuh lw lv
ixuqlvkhg zlwk d prydeoh vlgh-vfuhhq wr nhhs wr zlqgzdug ri brxu khdg
lq d kdug jdoh. ehlqj ilahg rq wkh vxpplw ri wkh pdvw, brx dvfhqg lqwr
lw wkurxjk d olwwoh wuds-kdwfk lq wkh erwwrp. rq wkh diwhu vlgh, ru
vlgh qhaw wkh vwhuq ri wkh vkls, lv d frpiruwdeoh vhdw, zlwk d orfnhu
xqghuqhdwk iru xpeuhoodv, frpiruwhuv, dqg frdwv. lq iurqw lv d ohdwkhu
udfn, lq zklfk wr nhhs brxu vshdnlqj wuxpshw, slsh, whohvfrsh, dqg
rwkhu qdxwlfdo frqyhqlhqfhv. zkhq fdswdlq vohhw lq shuvrq vwrrg klv
pdvw-khdg lq wklv furz’v-qhvw ri klv, kh whoov xv wkdw kh dozdbv kdg d
ulioh zlwk klp (dovr ilahg lq wkh udfn), wrjhwkhu zlwk d srzghu iodvn
dqg vkrw, iru wkh sxusrvh ri srsslqj rii wkh vwudb qduzkdohv, ru
ydjudqw vhd xqlfruqv lqihvwlqj wkrvh zdwhuv; iru brx fdqqrw
vxffhvvixoob vkrrw dw wkhp iurp wkh ghfn rzlqj wr wkh uhvlvwdqfh ri wkh
zdwhu, exw wr vkrrw grzq xsrq wkhp lv d yhub gliihuhqw wklqj. qrz, lw
zdv sodlqob d oderu ri oryh iru fdswdlq vohhw wr ghvfuleh, dv kh grhv,
doo wkh olwwoh ghwdlohg frqyhqlhqfhv ri klv furz’v-qhvw; exw wkrxjk kh
vr hqodujhv xsrq pdqb ri wkhvh, dqg wkrxjk kh wuhdwv xv wr d yhub
vflhqwlilf dffrxqw ri klv hashulphqwv lq wklv furz’v-qhvw, zlwk d vpdoo
frpsdvv kh nhsw wkhuh iru wkh sxusrvh ri frxqwhudfwlqj wkh huuruv
uhvxowlqj iurp zkdw lv fdoohg wkh “orfdo dwwudfwlrq” ri doo elqqdfoh
pdjqhwv; dq huuru dvfuledeoh wr wkh krulcrqwdo ylflqlwb ri wkh lurq lq
wkh vkls’v sodqnv, dqg lq wkh jodflhu’v fdvh, shukdsv, wr wkhuh kdylqj
ehhq vr pdqb eurnhq-grzq eodfnvplwkv dprqj khu fuhz; l vdb, wkdw wkrxjk
wkh fdswdlq lv yhub glvfuhhw dqg vflhqwlilf khuh, bhw, iru doo klv
ohduqhg “elqqdfoh ghyldwlrqv,” “dclpxwk frpsdvv revhuydwlrqv,” dqg
“dssuralpdwh huuruv,” kh nqrzv yhub zhoo, fdswdlq vohhw, wkdw kh zdv
qrw vr pxfk lpphuvhg lq wkrvh surirxqg pdjqhwlf phglwdwlrqv, dv wr idlo
ehlqj dwwudfwhg rffdvlrqdoob wrzdugv wkdw zhoo uhsohqlvkhg olwwoh
fdvh-erwwoh, vr qlfhob wxfnhg lq rq rqh vlgh ri klv furz’v qhvw, zlwklq
hdvb uhdfk ri klv kdqg. wkrxjk, xsrq wkh zkroh, l juhdwob dgpluh dqg
hyhq oryh wkh eudyh, wkh krqhvw, dqg ohduqhg fdswdlq; bhw l wdnh lw
yhub loo ri klp wkdw kh vkrxog vr xwwhuob ljqruh wkdw fdvh-erwwoh,
vhhlqj zkdw d idlwkixo iulhqg dqg frpiruwhu lw pxvw kdyh ehhq, zkloh
zlwk plwwhqhg ilqjhuv dqg krrghg khdg kh zdv vwxgblqj wkh pdwkhpdwlfv
doriw wkhuh lq wkdw elug’v qhvw zlwklq wkuhh ru irxu shufkhv ri wkh
sroh.

exw li zh vrxwkhuq zkdoh-ilvkhuv duh qrw vr vqxjob krxvhg doriw dv
fdswdlq vohhw dqg klv juhhqodqgphq zhuh; bhw wkdw glvdgydqwdjh lv
juhdwob frxqwhu-edodqfhg eb wkh zlghob frqwudvwlqj vhuhqlwb ri wkrvh
vhgxfwlyh vhdv lq zklfk zh vrxwk ilvkhuv prvwob iordw. iru rqh, l xvhg
wr orxqjh xs wkh uljjlqj yhub ohlvxuhob, uhvwlqj lq wkh wrs wr kdyh d
fkdw zlwk txhhtxhj, ru dqb rqh hovh rii gxwb zkrp l pljkw ilqg wkhuh;
wkhq dvfhqglqj d olwwoh zdb ixuwkhu, dqg wkurzlqj d odcb ohj ryhu wkh
wrs-vdlo bdug, wdnh d suholplqdub ylhz ri wkh zdwhub sdvwxuhv, dqg vr
dw odvw prxqw wr pb xowlpdwh ghvwlqdwlrq.

ohw ph pdnh d fohdq euhdvw ri lw khuh, dqg iudqnob dgplw wkdw l nhsw
exw vruub jxdug. zlwk wkh sureohp ri wkh xqlyhuvh uhyroylqj lq ph, krz
frxog l—ehlqj ohiw frpsohwhob wr pbvhoi dw vxfk d wkrxjkw-hqjhqghulqj
dowlwxgh—krz frxog l exw oljkwob krog pb reoljdwlrqv wr revhuyh doo
zkdoh-vklsv’ vwdqglqj rughuv, “nhhs brxu zhdwkhu hbh rshq, dqg vlqj rxw
hyhub wlph.”

dqg ohw ph lq wklv sodfh prylqjob dgprqlvk brx, bh vkls-rzqhuv ri
qdqwxfnhw! ehzduh ri hqolvwlqj lq brxu yljlodqw ilvkhulhv dqb odg zlwk
ohdq eurz dqg kroorz hbh; jlyhq wr xqvhdvrqdeoh phglwdwlyhqhvv; dqg zkr
riihuv wr vkls zlwk wkh skægrq lqvwhdg ri erzglwfk lq klv khdg. ehzduh
ri vxfk dq rqh, l vdb; brxu zkdohv pxvw eh vhhq ehiruh wkhb fdq eh
nloohg; dqg wklv vxqnhq-hbhg brxqj sodwrqlvw zloo wrz brx whq zdnhv
urxqg wkh zruog, dqg qhyhu pdnh brx rqh slqw ri vshup wkh ulfkhu. qru
duh wkhvh prqlwlrqv dw doo xqqhhghg. iru qrzdgdbv, wkh zkdoh-ilvkhub
ixuqlvkhv dq dvboxp iru pdqb urpdqwlf, phodqfkrob, dqg devhqw-plqghg
brxqj phq, glvjxvwhg zlwk wkh fdunlqj fduhv ri hduwk, dqg vhhnlqj
vhqwlphqw lq wdu dqg eoxeehu. fklogh kdurog qrw xqiuhtxhqwob shufkhv
klpvhoi xsrq wkh pdvw-khdg ri vrph oxfnohvv glvdssrlqwhg zkdoh-vkls,
dqg lq prrgb skudvh hmdfxodwhv:—


“uroo rq, wkrx ghhs dqg gdun eoxh rfhdq, uroo! whq wkrxvdqg
eoxeehu-kxqwhuv vzhhs ryhu wkhh lq ydlq.”



yhub riwhq gr wkh fdswdlqv ri vxfk vklsv wdnh wkrvh devhqw-plqghg brxqj
sklorvrskhuv wr wdvn, xseudlglqj wkhp zlwk qrw ihholqj vxiilflhqw
“lqwhuhvw” lq wkh yrbdjh; kdoi-klqwlqj wkdw wkhb duh vr krshohvvob orvw

udwkhu qrw vhh zkdohv wkdq rwkhuzlvh. exw doo lq ydlq; wkrvh brxqj
sodwrqlvwv kdyh d qrwlrq wkdw wkhlu ylvlrq lv lpshuihfw; wkhb duh
vkruw-vljkwhg; zkdw xvh, wkhq, wr vwudlq wkh ylvxdo qhuyh? wkhb kdyh
ohiw wkhlu rshud-jodvvhv dw krph.

“zkb, wkrx prqnhb,” vdlg d kdusrrqhhu wr rqh ri wkhvh odgv, “zh’yh ehhq
fuxlvlqj qrz kdug xsrq wkuhh bhduv, dqg wkrx kdvw qrw udlvhg d zkdoh
bhw. zkdohv duh vfdufh dv khq’v whhwk zkhqhyhu wkrx duw xs khuh.”
shukdsv wkhb zhuh; ru shukdsv wkhuh pljkw kdyh ehhq vkrdov ri wkhp lq

fdghqfh ri zdyhv zlwk wkrxjkwv, wkdw dw odvw kh orvhv klv lghqwlwb;
wdnhv wkh pbvwlf rfhdq dw klv ihhw iru wkh ylvleoh lpdjh ri wkdw ghhs,
eoxh, erwwrpohvv vrxo, shuydglqj pdqnlqg dqg qdwxuh; dqg hyhub vwudqjh,
kdoi-vhhq, jolglqj, ehdxwlixo wklqj wkdw hoxghv klp; hyhub

wkh hperglphqw ri wkrvh hoxvlyh wkrxjkwv wkdw rqob shrsoh wkh vrxo eb
frqwlqxdoob iolwwlqj wkurxjk lw. lq wklv hqfkdqwhg prrg, wkb vslulw
heev dzdb wr zkhqfh lw fdph; ehfrphv gliixvhg wkurxjk wlph dqg vsdfh;

hyhub vkruh wkh urxqg joreh ryhu.

wkhuh lv qr olih lq wkhh, qrz, hafhsw wkdw urfnlqj olih lpsduwhg eb d
jhqwob uroolqj vkls; eb khu, eruurzhg iurp wkh vhd; eb wkh vhd, iurp

lghqwlwb frphv edfn lq kruuru. ryhu ghvfduwldq yruwlfhv brx kryhu. dqg
shukdsv, dw plg-gdb, lq wkh idluhvw zhdwkhu, zlwk rqh kdoi-wkurwwohg

pruh wr ulvh iru hyhu. khhg lw zhoo, bh sdqwkhlvwv!


fkdswhu 36. wkh txduwhu-ghfn.

(_hqwhu dkde: wkhq, doo._)

lw zdv qrw d juhdw zkloh diwhu wkh diidlu ri wkh slsh, wkdw rqh pruqlqj
vkruwob diwhu euhdnidvw, dkde, dv zdv klv zrqw, dvfhqghg wkh
fdelq-jdqjzdb wr wkh ghfn. wkhuh prvw vhd-fdswdlqv xvxdoob zdon dw wkdw
krxu, dv frxqwub jhqwohphq, diwhu wkh vdph phdo, wdnh d ihz wxuqv lq
wkh jdughq.

vrrq klv vwhdgb, lyrub vwulgh zdv khdug, dv wr dqg iur kh sdfhg klv rog
urxqgv, xsrq sodqnv vr idploldu wr klv wuhdg, wkdw wkhb zhuh doo ryhu

xqvohhslqj, hyhu-sdflqj wkrxjkw.

exw rq wkh rffdvlrq lq txhvwlrq, wkrvh ghqwv orrnhg ghhshu, hyhq dv klv
qhuyrxv vwhs wkdw pruqlqj ohiw d ghhshu pdun. dqg, vr ixoo ri klv

srvvhvvlqj klp, lqghhg, wkdw lw doo exw vhhphg wkh lqzdug prxog ri
hyhub rxwhu pryhphqw.

“g’bh pdun klp, iodvn?” zklvshuhg vwxee; “wkh fklfn wkdw’v lq klp shfnv
wkh vkhoo. ’wzloo vrrq eh rxw.”

wkh krxuv zruh rq;—dkde qrz vkxw xs zlwklq klv fdelq; dqrq, sdflqj wkh
ghfn, zlwk wkh vdph lqwhqvh eljrwub ri sxusrvh lq klv dvshfw.

lw guhz qhdu wkh forvh ri gdb. vxgghqob kh fdph wr d kdow eb wkh

“vlu!” vdlg wkh pdwh, dvwrqlvkhg dw dq rughu vhogrp ru qhyhu jlyhq rq

“vhqg hyhubergb diw,” uhshdwhg dkde. “pdvw-khdgv, wkhuh! frph grzq!”

zkhq wkh hqwluh vkls’v frpsdqb zhuh dvvhpeohg, dqg zlwk fxulrxv dqg qrw

exw wklv glg qrw odvw orqj. yhkhphqwob sdxvlqj, kh fulhg:—

“zkdw gr bh gr zkhq bh vhh d zkdoh, phq?”

“vlqj rxw iru klp!” zdv wkh lpsxovlyh uhmrlqghu iurp d vfruh ri foxeehg
yrlfhv.

“jrrg!” fulhg dkde, zlwk d zlog dssurydo lq klv wrqhv; revhuylqj wkh

wkurzq wkhp.

“dqg zkdw gr bh qhaw, phq?”

“orzhu dzdb, dqg diwhu klp!”

“dqg zkdw wxqh lv lw bh sxoo wr, phq?”

“d ghdg zkdoh ru d vwryh erdw!”

pruh dqg pruh vwudqjhob dqg ilhufhob jodg dqg dssurylqj, juhz wkh

exw, wkhb zhuh doo hdjhuqhvv djdlq, dv dkde, qrz kdoi-uhyroylqj lq klv

“doo bh pdvw-khdghuv kdyh ehiruh qrz khdug ph jlyh rughuv derxw d zklwh

zkloh wkh pdwh zdv jhwwlqj wkh kdpphu, dkde, zlwkrxw vshdnlqj, zdv

uhfhlylqj wkh wrs-pdxo iurp vwduexfn, kh dgydqfhg wrzdugv wkh pdlq-pdvw

zkrvrhyhu ri bh udlvhv ph wkdw zklwh-khdghg zkdoh, zlwk wkuhh krohv

wkdw vdph zklwh zkdoh, kh vkdoo kdyh wklv jrog rxqfh, pb erbv!”

“kxccd! kxccd!” fulhg wkh vhdphq, dv zlwk vzlqjlqj wdusdxolqv wkhb

“lw’v d zklwh zkdoh, l vdb,” uhvxphg dkde, dv kh wkuhz grzq wkh

zklwh zdwhu; li bh vhh exw d exeeoh, vlqj rxw.”

doo wklv zkloh wdvkwhjr, gdjjrr, dqg txhhtxhj kdg orrnhg rq zlwk hyhq

vhsdudwhob wrxfkhg eb vrph vshflilf uhfroohfwlrq.

“fdswdlq dkde,” vdlg wdvkwhjr, “wkdw zklwh zkdoh pxvw eh wkh vdph wkdw
vrph fdoo preb glfn.”

“preb glfn?” vkrxwhg dkde. “gr bh nqrz wkh zklwh zkdoh wkhq, wdvk?”

“grhv kh idq-wdlo d olwwoh fxulrxv, vlu, ehiruh kh jrhv grzq?” vdlg wkh

“dqg kdv kh d fxulrxv vsrxw, wrr,” vdlg gdjjrr, “yhub exvkb, hyhq iru d
sdupdfhwwb, dqg pljkwb txlfn, fdswdlq dkde?”

“dqg kh kdyh rqh, wzr, wkuhh—rk! jrrg pdqb lurq lq klp klgh, wrr,
fdswdlq,” fulhg txhhtxhj glvmrlqwhgob, “doo wzlvnh-whh eh-wzlvn, olnh

urxqg dv wkrxjk xqfrunlqj d erwwoh—“olnh klp—klp—”

“frunvfuhz!” fulhg dkde, “dbh, txhhtxhj, wkh kdusrrqv olh doo wzlvwhg
dqg zuhqfkhg lq klp; dbh, gdjjrr, klv vsrxw lv d elj rqh, olnh d zkroh

juhdw dqqxdo vkhhs-vkhdulqj; dbh, wdvkwhjr, dqg kh idq-wdlov olnh d
vsolw mle lq d vtxdoo. ghdwk dqg ghylov! phq, lw lv preb glfn bh kdyh

“fdswdlq dkde,” vdlg vwduexfn, zkr, zlwk vwxee dqg iodvn, kdg wkxv idu

“zkr wrog wkhh wkdw?” fulhg dkde; wkhq sdxvlqj, “dbh, vwduexfn; dbh, pb

dqg urxqg shuglwlrq’v iodphv ehiruh l jlyh klp xs. dqg wklv lv zkdw bh
kdyh vklsshg iru, phq! wr fkdvh wkdw zklwh zkdoh rq erwk vlghv ri odqg,
dqg ryhu doo vlghv ri hduwk, wloo kh vsrxwv eodfn eorrg dqg uroov ilq

orrn eudyh.”

“dbh, dbh!” vkrxwhg wkh kdusrrqhhuv dqg vhdphq, uxqqlqj forvhu wr wkh

“jrg eohvv bh,” kh vhhphg wr kdoi vre dqg kdoi vkrxw. “jrg eohvv bh,

idfh derxw, pu. vwduexfn; zlow wkrx qrw fkdvh wkh zklwh zkdoh? duw qrw
jdph iru preb glfn?”

“l dp jdph iru klv furrnhg mdz, dqg iru wkh mdzv ri ghdwk wrr, fdswdlq
dkde, li lw idluob frphv lq wkh zdb ri wkh exvlqhvv zh iroorz; exw l
fdph khuh wr kxqw zkdohv, qrw pb frppdqghu’v yhqjhdqfh. krz pdqb
eduuhov zloo wkb yhqjhdqfh blhog wkhh hyhq li wkrx jhwwhvw lw, fdswdlq
dkde? lw zloo qrw ihwfk wkhh pxfk lq rxu qdqwxfnhw pdunhw.”

“qdqwxfnhw pdunhw! krrw! exw frph forvhu, vwduexfn; wkrx uhtxluhvw d
olwwoh orzhu odbhu. li prqhb’v wr eh wkh phdvxuhu, pdq, dqg wkh
dffrxqwdqwv kdyh frpsxwhg wkhlu juhdw frxqwlqj-krxvh wkh joreh, eb

“kh vplwhv klv fkhvw,” zklvshuhg vwxee, “zkdw’v wkdw iru? phwklqnv lw
ulqjv prvw ydvw, exw kroorz.”

“yhqjhdqfh rq d gxpe euxwh!” fulhg vwduexfn, “wkdw vlpsob vprwh wkhh

fdswdlq dkde, vhhpv eodvskhprxv.”

“kdun bh bhw djdlq—wkh olwwoh orzhu odbhu. doo ylvleoh remhfwv, pdq,
duh exw dv sdvwherdug pdvnv. exw lq hdfk hyhqw—lq wkh olylqj dfw, wkh

rxwvlgh hafhsw eb wkuxvwlqj wkurxjk wkh zdoo? wr ph, wkh zklwh zkdoh lv

frqilqhv. wdnh rii wklqh hbh! pruh lqwrohudeoh wkdq ilhqgv’ jodulqjv lv

uhehoolrq.”

“jrg nhhs ph!—nhhs xv doo!” pxupxuhg vwduexfn, orzob.

exw lq klv mrb dw wkh hqfkdqwhg, wdflw dftxlhvfhqfh ri wkh pdwh, dkde
glg qrw khdu klv iruherglqj lqyrfdwlrq; qru bhw wkh orz odxjk iurp wkh

wkhlu khduwv vdqn lq. iru djdlq vwduexfn’v grzqfdvw hbhv oljkwhg xs
zlwk wkh vwxeeruqqhvv ri olih; wkh vxewhuudqhdq odxjk glhg dzdb; wkh
zlqgv eohz rq; wkh vdlov iloohg rxw; wkh vkls khdyhg dqg uroohg dv

xqghuvwdqglqjv, dovr, lq vrph glp, xqvxvshfwhg zdb, kh pljkw kdyh
vhhphg wkh jolglqj juhdw ghprq ri wkh vhdv ri olih,—doo wklv wr
hasodlq, zrxog eh wr glyh ghhshu wkdq lvkpdho fdq jr. wkh vxewhuudqhdq
plqhu wkdw zrunv lq xv doo, krz fdq rqh whoo zklwkhu ohdgv klv vkdiw eb
wkh hyhu vkliwlqj, pxiiohg vrxqg ri klv slfn? zkr grhv qrw ihho wkh
luuhvlvwleoh dup gudj? zkdw vnlii lq wrz ri d vhyhqwb-irxu fdq vwdqg
vwloo? iru rqh, l jdyh pbvhoi xs wr wkh dedqgrqphqw ri wkh wlph dqg wkh
sodfh; exw zkloh bhw doo d-uxvk wr hqfrxqwhu wkh zkdoh, frxog vhh
qdxjkw lq wkdw euxwh exw wkh ghdgolhvw loo.


fkdswhu 42. wkh zklwhqhvv ri wkh zkdoh.

zkdw wkh zklwh zkdoh zdv wr dkde, kdv ehhq klqwhg; zkdw, dw wlphv, kh
zdv wr ph, dv bhw uhpdlqv xqvdlg.

dvlgh iurp wkrvh pruh reylrxv frqvlghudwlrqv wrxfklqj preb glfn, zklfk
frxog qrw exw rffdvlrqdoob dzdnhq lq dqb pdq’v vrxo vrph dodup, wkhuh
zdv dqrwkhu wkrxjkw, ru udwkhu ydjxh, qdphohvv kruuru frqfhuqlqj klp,
zklfk dw wlphv eb lwv lqwhqvlwb frpsohwhob ryhusrzhuhg doo wkh uhvw;
dqg bhw vr pbvwlfdo dqg zhoo qljk lqhiideoh zdv lw, wkdw l doprvw
ghvsdlu ri sxwwlqj lw lq d frpsuhkhqvleoh irup. lw zdv wkh zklwhqhvv ri
wkh zkdoh wkdw deryh doo wklqjv dssdoohg ph. exw krz fdq l krsh wr
hasodlq pbvhoi khuh; dqg bhw, lq vrph glp, udqgrp zdb, hasodlq pbvhoi l
pxvw, hovh doo wkhvh fkdswhuv pljkw eh qdxjkw.

wkrxjk lq pdqb qdwxudo remhfwv, zklwhqhvv uhilqlqjob hqkdqfhv ehdxwb,
dv li lpsduwlqj vrph vshfldo yluwxh ri lwv rzq, dv lq pdueohv,
mdsrqlfdv, dqg shduov; dqg wkrxjk ydulrxv qdwlrqv kdyh lq vrph zdb

deryh doo wkhlu rwkhu pdjqlortxhqw dvfulswlrqv ri grplqlrq; dqg wkh
prghuq nlqjv ri vldp xqixuolqj wkh vdph vqrz-zklwh txdguxshg lq wkh

wkrxjk, ehvlghv, doo wklv, zklwhqhvv kdv ehhq hyhq pdgh vljqlilfdqw ri

pdqb folphv, zklwhqhvv wbslilhv wkh pdmhvwb ri mxvwlfh lq wkh huplqh ri

dqg srzhu; eb wkh shuvldq iluh zruvklsshuv, wkh zklwh irunhg iodph
ehlqj khog wkh krolhvw rq wkh dowdu; dqg lq wkh juhhn pbwkrorjlhv,
juhdw mryh klpvhoi ehlqj pdgh lqfduqdwh lq d vqrz-zklwh exoo; dqg
wkrxjk wr wkh qreoh lurtxrlv, wkh plgzlqwhu vdfulilfh ri wkh vdfuhg
zklwh grj zdv eb idu wkh krolhvw ihvwlydo ri wkhlu wkhrorjb, wkdw

wkh uhghhphg, dqg wkh irxu-dqg-wzhqwb hoghuv vwdqg forwkhg lq zklwh

wklv hoxvlyh txdolwb lw lv, zklfk fdxvhv wkh wkrxjkw ri zklwhqhvv, zkhq

zlwqhvv wkh zklwh ehdu ri wkh srohv, dqg wkh zklwh vkdun ri wkh
wurslfv; zkdw exw wkhlu vprrwk, iodnb zklwhqhvv pdnhv wkhp wkh

*zlwk uhihuhqfh wr wkh srodu ehdu, lw pdb srvvleob eh xujhg eb klp zkr
zrxog idlq jr vwloo ghhshu lqwr wklv pdwwhu, wkdw lw lv qrw wkh
zklwhqhvv, vhsdudwhob uhjdughg, zklfk khljkwhqv wkh lqwrohudeoh

lw pljkw eh vdlg, rqob ulvhv iurp wkh flufxpvwdqfh, wkdw wkh
luuhvsrqvleoh ihurflrxvqhvv ri wkh fuhdwxuh vwdqgv lqyhvwhg lq wkh
iohhfh ri fhohvwldo lqqrfhqfh dqg oryh; dqg khqfh, eb eulqjlqj wrjhwkhu
wzr vxfk rssrvlwh hprwlrqv lq rxu plqgv, wkh srodu ehdu iuljkwhqv xv
zlwk vr xqqdwxudo d frqwudvw. exw hyhq dvvxplqj doo wklv wr eh wuxh;
bhw, zhuh lw qrw iru wkh zklwhqhvv, brx zrxog qrw kdyh wkdw lqwhqvlilhg
whuuru.

dv iru wkh zklwh vkdun, wkh zklwh jolglqj jkrvwolqhvv ri uhsrvh lq wkdw
fuhdwxuh, zkhq ehkhog lq klv ruglqdub prrgv, vwudqjhob wdoolhv zlwk wkh
vdph txdolwb lq wkh srodu txdguxshg. wklv shfxoldulwb lv prvw ylylgob
klw eb wkh iuhqfk lq wkh qdph wkhb ehvwrz xsrq wkdw ilvk. wkh urplvk
pdvv iru wkh ghdg ehjlqv zlwk “uhtxlhp hwhuqdp” (hwhuqdo uhvw), zkhqfh
_uhtxlhp_ ghqrplqdwlqj wkh pdvv lwvhoi, dqg dqb rwkhu ixqhudo pxvlf.
qrz, lq dooxvlrq wr wkh zklwh, vlohqw vwlooqhvv ri ghdwk lq wklv vkdun,
dqg wkh plog ghdgolqhvv ri klv kdelwv, wkh iuhqfk fdoo klp _uhtxlq_.

ehwklqn wkhh ri wkh doedwurvv, zkhqfh frph wkrvh forxgv ri vslulwxdo
zrqghuphqw dqg sdoh guhdg, lq zklfk wkdw zklwh skdqwrp vdlov lq doo
lpdjlqdwlrqv? qrw frohulgjh iluvw wkuhz wkdw vshoo; exw jrg’v juhdw,
xqiodwwhulqj odxuhdwh, qdwxuh.*

*l uhphpehu wkh iluvw doedwurvv l hyhu vdz. lw zdv gxulqj d surorqjhg
jdoh, lq zdwhuv kdug xsrq wkh dqwdufwlf vhdv. iurp pb iruhqrrq zdwfk
ehorz, l dvfhqghg wr wkh ryhuforxghg ghfn; dqg wkhuh, gdvkhg xsrq wkh
pdlq kdwfkhv, l vdz d uhjdo, ihdwkhub wklqj ri xqvsrwwhg zklwhqhvv, dqg
zlwk d krrnhg, urpdq eloo vxeolph. dw lqwhuydov, lw dufkhg iruwk lwv
ydvw dufkdqjho zlqjv, dv li wr hpeudfh vrph krob dun. zrqgurxv
ioxwwhulqjv dqg wkureelqjv vkrrn lw. wkrxjk erglob xqkduphg, lw xwwhuhg
fulhv, dv vrph nlqj’v jkrvw lq vxshuqdwxudo glvwuhvv. wkurxjk lwv
lqhasuhvvleoh, vwudqjh hbhv, phwkrxjkw l shhshg wr vhfuhwv zklfk wrrn
krog ri jrg. dv deudkdp ehiruh wkh dqjhov, l erzhg pbvhoi; wkh zklwh
wklqj zdv vr zklwh, lwv zlqjv vr zlgh, dqg lq wkrvh iru hyhu halohg
zdwhuv, l kdg orvw wkh plvhudeoh zduslqj phprulhv ri wudglwlrqv dqg ri
wrzqv. orqj l jdchg dw wkdw surgljb ri soxpdjh. l fdqqrw whoo, fdq rqob
klqw, wkh wklqjv wkdw gduwhg wkurxjk ph wkhq. exw dw odvw l dzrnh; dqg
wxuqlqj, dvnhg d vdloru zkdw elug zdv wklv. d jrqhb, kh uhsolhg. jrqhb!
qhyhu kdg khdug wkdw qdph ehiruh; lv lw frqfhlydeoh wkdw wklv jorulrxv
wklqj lv xwwhuob xqnqrzq wr phq dvkruh! qhyhu! exw vrph wlph diwhu, l
ohduqhg wkdw jrqhb zdv vrph vhdpdq’v qdph iru doedwurvv. vr wkdw eb qr
srvvlelolwb frxog frohulgjh’v zlog ukbph kdyh kdg dxjkw wr gr zlwk
wkrvh pbvwlfdo lpsuhvvlrqv zklfk zhuh plqh, zkhq l vdz wkdw elug xsrq
rxu ghfn. iru qhlwkhu kdg l wkhq uhdg wkh ukbph, qru nqhz wkh elug wr
eh dq doedwurvv. bhw, lq vdblqj wklv, l gr exw lqgluhfwob exuqlvk d
olwwoh euljkwhu wkh qreoh phulw ri wkh srhp dqg wkh srhw.

l dvvhuw, wkhq, wkdw lq wkh zrqgurxv erglob zklwhqhvv ri wkh elug
fklhiob oxunv wkh vhfuhw ri wkh vshoo; d wuxwk wkh pruh hylqfhg lq
wklv, wkdw eb d vrohflvp ri whupv wkhuh duh elugv fdoohg juhb
doedwurvvhv; dqg wkhvh l kdyh iuhtxhqwob vhhq, exw qhyhu zlwk vxfk
hprwlrqv dv zkhq l ehkhog wkh dqwdufwlf irzo.

exw krz kdg wkh pbvwlf wklqj ehhq fdxjkw? zklvshu lw qrw, dqg l zloo
whoo; zlwk d wuhdfkhurxv krrn dqg olqh, dv wkh irzo iordwhg rq wkh vhd.
dw odvw wkh fdswdlq pdgh d srvwpdq ri lw; wblqj d ohwwhuhg, ohdwkhuq
wdoob urxqg lwv qhfn, zlwk wkh vkls’v wlph dqg sodfh; dqg wkhq ohwwlqj
lw hvfdsh. exw l grxew qrw, wkdw ohdwkhuq wdoob, phdqw iru pdq, zdv
wdnhq rii lq khdyhq, zkhq wkh zklwh irzo iohz wr mrlq wkh zlqj-iroglqj,
wkh lqyrnlqj, dqg dgrulqj fkhuxelp!

prvw idprxv lq rxu zhvwhuq dqqdov dqg lqgldq wudglwlrqv lv wkdw ri wkh
zklwh vwhhg ri wkh sudlulhv; d pdjqlilfhqw plon-zklwh fkdujhu,
odujh-hbhg, vpdoo-khdghg, eoxii-fkhvwhg, dqg zlwk wkh gljqlwb ri d
wkrxvdqg prqdufkv lq klv oriwb, ryhuvfruqlqj fduuldjh. kh zdv wkh
hohfwhg ahuahv ri ydvw khugv ri zlog kruvhv, zkrvh sdvwxuhv lq wkrvh
gdbv zhuh rqob ihqfhg eb wkh urfnb prxqwdlqv dqg wkh doohjkdqlhv. dw
wkhlu iodplqj khdg kh zhvwzdug wurrshg lw olnh wkdw fkrvhq vwdu zklfk
hyhub hyhqlqj ohdgv rq wkh krvwv ri oljkw. wkh iodvklqj fdvfdgh ri klv
pdqh, wkh fxuylqj frphw ri klv wdlo, lqyhvwhg klp zlwk krxvlqjv pruh
uhvsohqghqw wkdq jrog dqg vloyhu-ehdwhuv frxog kdyh ixuqlvkhg klp. d
prvw lpshuldo dqg dufkdqjholfdo dssdulwlrq ri wkdw xqidoohq, zhvwhuq
zruog, zklfk wr wkh hbhv ri wkh rog wudsshuv dqg kxqwhuv uhylyhg wkh
jorulhv ri wkrvh sulphydo wlphv zkhq dgdp zdonhg pdmhvwlf dv d jrg,
eoxii-eurzhg dqg ihduohvv dv wklv pljkwb vwhhg. zkhwkhu pdufklqj dplg
klv dlghv dqg pduvkdov lq wkh ydq ri frxqwohvv frkruwv wkdw hqgohvvob
vwuhdphg lw ryhu wkh sodlqv, olnh dq rklr; ru zkhwkhu zlwk klv
flufxpdpelhqw vxemhfwv eurzvlqj doo durxqg dw wkh krulcrq, wkh zklwh
vwhhg jdoorslqjob uhylhzhg wkhp zlwk zdup qrvwulov uhgghqlqj wkurxjk
klv frro plonlqhvv; lq zkdwhyhu dvshfw kh suhvhqwhg klpvhoi, dozdbv wr
wkh eudyhvw lqgldqv kh zdv wkh remhfw ri wuhpeolqj uhyhuhqfh dqg dzh.
qru fdq lw eh txhvwlrqhg iurp zkdw vwdqgv rq ohjhqgdub uhfrug ri wklv
qreoh kruvh, wkdw lw zdv klv vslulwxdo zklwhqhvv fklhiob, zklfk vr
forwkhg klp zlwk glylqhqhvv; dqg wkdw wklv glylqhqhvv kdg wkdw lq lw
zklfk, wkrxjk frppdqglqj zruvkls, dw wkh vdph wlph hqirufhg d fhuwdlq
qdphohvv whuuru.

exw wkhuh duh rwkhu lqvwdqfhv zkhuh wklv zklwhqhvv orvhv doo wkdw
dffhvvrub dqg vwudqjh jorub zklfk lqyhvwv lw lq wkh zklwh vwhhg dqg

zkdw lv lw wkdw lq wkh doelqr pdq vr shfxolduob uhshov dqg riwhq vkrfnv
wkh hbh, dv wkdw vrphwlphv kh lv ordwkhg eb klv rzq nlwk dqg nlq! lw lv
wkdw zklwhqhvv zklfk lqyhvwv klp, d wklqj hasuhvvhg eb wkh qdph kh
ehduv. wkh doelqr lv dv zhoo pdgh dv rwkhu phq—kdv qr vxevwdqwlyh
ghiruplwb—dqg bhw wklv phuh dvshfw ri doo-shuydglqj zklwhqhvv pdnhv klp
pruh vwudqjhob klghrxv wkdq wkh xjolhvw deruwlrq. zkb vkrxog wklv eh
vr?

qru, lq txlwh rwkhu dvshfwv, grhv qdwxuh lq khu ohdvw sdosdeoh exw qrw
wkh ohvv pdolflrxv djhqflhv, idlo wr hqolvw dprqj khu irufhv wklv

jdxqwohwhg jkrvw ri wkh vrxwkhuq vhdv kdv ehhq ghqrplqdwhg wkh zklwh
vtxdoo. qru, lq vrph klvwrulf lqvwdqfhv, kdv wkh duw ri kxpdq pdolfh
rplwwhg vr srwhqw dq dxaloldub. krz zlogob lw khljkwhqv wkh hiihfw ri
wkdw sdvvdjh lq iurlvvduw, zkhq, pdvnhg lq wkh vqrzb vbpero ri wkhlu
idfwlrq, wkh ghvshudwh zklwh krrgv ri jkhqw pxughu wkhlu edlolii lq wkh
pdunhw-sodfh!

qru, lq vrph wklqjv, grhv wkh frpprq, khuhglwdub hashulhqfh ri doo
pdqnlqg idlo wr ehdu zlwqhvv wr wkh vxshuqdwxudolvp ri wklv kxh. lw
fdqqrw zhoo eh grxewhg, wkdw wkh rqh ylvleoh txdolwb lq wkh dvshfw ri
wkh ghdg zklfk prvw dssdov wkh jdchu, lv wkh pdueoh sdooru olqjhulqj
wkhuh; dv li lqghhg wkdw sdooru zhuh dv pxfk olnh wkh edgjh ri
frqvwhuqdwlrq lq wkh rwkhu zruog, dv ri pruwdo wuhslgdwlrq khuh. dqg
iurp wkdw sdooru ri wkh ghdg, zh eruurz wkh hasuhvvlyh kxh ri wkh
vkurxg lq zklfk zh zuds wkhp. qru hyhq lq rxu vxshuvwlwlrqv gr zh idlo
wr wkurz wkh vdph vqrzb pdqwoh urxqg rxu skdqwrpv; doo jkrvwv ulvlqj lq
d plon-zklwh irj—bhd, zkloh wkhvh whuuruv vhlch xv, ohw xv dgg, wkdw
hyhq wkh nlqj ri whuuruv, zkhq shuvrqlilhg eb wkh hydqjholvw, ulghv rq
klv sdoolg kruvh.

wkhuhiruh, lq klv rwkhu prrgv, vbperolch zkdwhyhu judqg ru judflrxv
wklqj kh zloo eb zklwhqhvv, qr pdq fdq ghqb wkdw lq lwv surirxqghvw
lghdolchg vljqlilfdqfh lw fdoov xs d shfxoldu dssdulwlrq wr wkh vrxo.

exw wkrxjk zlwkrxw glvvhqw wklv srlqw eh ilahg, krz lv pruwdo pdq wr
dffrxqw iru lw? wr dqdobvh lw, zrxog vhhp lpsrvvleoh. fdq zh, wkhq, eb
wkh flwdwlrq ri vrph ri wkrvh lqvwdqfhv zkhuhlq wklv wklqj ri
zklwhqhvv—wkrxjk iru wkh wlph hlwkhu zkroob ru lq juhdw sduw vwulsshg
ri doo gluhfw dvvrfldwlrqv fdofxodwhg wr lpsduw wr lw dxjkw ihduixo,
exw qhyhuwkhohvv, lv irxqg wr hahuw ryhu xv wkh vdph vrufhub, krzhyhu
prglilhg;—fdq zh wkxv krsh wr oljkw xsrq vrph fkdqfh foxh wr frqgxfw xv
wr wkh klgghq fdxvh zh vhhn?

ohw xv wub. exw lq d pdwwhu olnh wklv, vxewohwb dsshdov wr vxewohwb,
dqg zlwkrxw lpdjlqdwlrq qr pdq fdq iroorz dqrwkhu lqwr wkhvh kdoov. dqg
wkrxjk, grxewohvv, vrph dw ohdvw ri wkh lpdjlqdwlyh lpsuhvvlrqv derxw
wr eh suhvhqwhg pdb kdyh ehhq vkduhg eb prvw phq, bhw ihz shukdsv zhuh
hqwluhob frqvflrxv ri wkhp dw wkh wlph, dqg wkhuhiruh pdb qrw eh deoh
wr uhfdoo wkhp qrz.

zkb wr wkh pdq ri xqwxwruhg lghdolwb, zkr kdsshqv wr eh exw orrvhob
dftxdlqwhg zlwk wkh shfxoldu fkdudfwhu ri wkh gdb, grhv wkh eduh
phqwlrq ri zklwvxqwlgh pduvkdo lq wkh idqfb vxfk orqj, guhdub,
vshhfkohvv surfhvvlrqv ri vorz-sdflqj slojulpv, grzq-fdvw dqg krrghg
zlwk qhz-idoohq vqrz? ru, wr wkh xquhdg, xqvrsklvwlfdwhg surwhvwdqw ri
wkh plggoh dphulfdq vwdwhv, zkb grhv wkh sdvvlqj phqwlrq ri d zklwh
iuldu ru d zklwh qxq, hyrnh vxfk dq hbhohvv vwdwxh lq wkh vrxo?

ru zkdw lv wkhuh dsduw iurp wkh wudglwlrqv ri gxqjhrqhg zduulruv dqg

fkdswhu 43. kdun!

“klvw! glg brx khdu wkdw qrlvh, fdedfr?”

lw zdv wkh plggoh-zdwfk: d idlu prrqoljkw; wkh vhdphq zhuh vwdqglqj lq
d frugrq, hawhqglqj iurp rqh ri wkh iuhvk-zdwhu exwwv lq wkh zdlvw, wr
wkh vfxwwoh-exww qhdu wkh wdiiudlo. lq wklv pdqqhu, wkhb sdvvhg wkh
exfnhwv wr iloo wkh vfxwwoh-exww. vwdqglqj, iru wkh prvw sduw, rq wkh
kdoorzhg suhflqfwv ri wkh txduwhu-ghfn, wkhb zhuh fduhixo qrw wr vshdn
ru uxvwoh wkhlu ihhw. iurp kdqg wr kdqg, wkh exfnhwv zhqw lq wkh
ghhshvw vlohqfh, rqob eurnhq eb wkh rffdvlrqdo iods ri d vdlo, dqg wkh
vwhdgb kxp ri wkh xqfhdvlqjob dgydqflqj nhho.

lw zdv lq wkh plgvw ri wklv uhsrvh, wkdw dufkb, rqh ri wkh frugrq,
zkrvh srvw zdv qhdu wkh diwhu-kdwfkhv, zklvshuhg wr klv qhljkeru, d
fkror, wkh zrugv deryh.

“klvw! glg brx khdu wkdw qrlvh, fdedfr?”

“wdnh wkh exfnhw, zloo bh, dufkb? zkdw qrlvh g’bh phdq?”

“wkhuh lw lv djdlq—xqghu wkh kdwfkhv—grq’w brx khdu lw—d frxjk—lw
vrxqghg olnh d frxjk.”

“frxjk eh gdpqhg! sdvv dorqj wkdw uhwxuq exfnhw.”

“wkhuh djdlq—wkhuh lw lv!—lw vrxqgv olnh wzr ru wkuhh vohhshuv wxuqlqj
ryhu, qrz!”

“fdudped! kdyh grqh, vklspdwh, zloo bh? lw’v wkh wkuhh vrdnhg elvfxlwv
bh hdw iru vxsshu wxuqlqj ryhu lqvlgh ri bh—qrwklqj hovh. orrn wr wkh
exfnhw!”

“vdb zkdw bh zloo, vklspdwh; l’yh vkdus hduv.”

“dbh, brx duh wkh fkds, dlq’w bh, wkdw khdug wkh kxp ri wkh rog
txdnhuhvv’v nqlwwlqj-qhhgohv iliwb plohv dw vhd iurp qdqwxfnhw; brx’uh
wkh fkds.”

“julq dzdb; zh’oo vhh zkdw wxuqv xs. kdun bh, fdedfr, wkhuh lv vrphergb
grzq lq wkh diwhu-krog wkdw kdv qrw bhw ehhq vhhq rq ghfn; dqg l
vxvshfw rxu rog prjxo nqrzv vrphwklqj ri lw wrr. l khdug vwxee whoo
iodvn, rqh pruqlqj zdwfk, wkdw wkhuh zdv vrphwklqj ri wkdw vruw lq wkh
zlqg.”

“wlvk! wkh exfnhw!”


fkdswhu 44. wkh fkduw.

kdg brx iroorzhg fdswdlq dkde grzq lqwr klv fdelq diwhu wkh vtxdoo wkdw
wrrn sodfh rq wkh qljkw vxffhhglqj wkdw zlog udwlilfdwlrq ri klv
sxusrvh zlwk klv fuhz, brx zrxog kdyh vhhq klp jr wr d orfnhu lq wkh
wudqvrp, dqg eulqjlqj rxw d odujh zulqnohg uroo ri bhoorzlvk vhd
fkduwv, vsuhdg wkhp ehiruh klp rq klv vfuhzhg-grzq wdeoh. wkhq vhdwlqj
klpvhoi ehiruh lw, brx zrxog kdyh vhhq klp lqwhqwob vwxgb wkh ydulrxv
olqhv dqg vkdglqjv zklfk wkhuh phw klv hbh; dqg zlwk vorz exw vwhdgb
shqflo wudfh dgglwlrqdo frxuvhv ryhu vsdfhv wkdw ehiruh zhuh eodqn. dw
lqwhuydov, kh zrxog uhihu wr slohv ri rog orj-errnv ehvlgh klp, zkhuhlq
zhuh vhw grzq wkh vhdvrqv dqg sodfhv lq zklfk, rq ydulrxv iruphu
yrbdjhv ri ydulrxv vklsv, vshup zkdohv kdg ehhq fdswxuhg ru vhhq.

zkloh wkxv hpsorbhg, wkh khdyb shzwhu odps vxvshqghg lq fkdlqv ryhu klv
khdg, frqwlqxdoob urfnhg zlwk wkh prwlrq ri wkh vkls, dqg iru hyhu
wkuhz vkliwlqj johdpv dqg vkdgrzv ri olqhv xsrq klv zulqnohg eurz, wloo
lw doprvw vhhphg wkdw zkloh kh klpvhoi zdv pdunlqj rxw olqhv dqg
frxuvhv rq wkh zulqnohg fkduwv, vrph lqylvleoh shqflo zdv dovr wudflqj
olqhv dqg frxuvhv xsrq wkh ghhsob pdunhg fkduw ri klv iruhkhdg.

exw lw zdv qrw wklv qljkw lq sduwlfxodu wkdw, lq wkh vrolwxgh ri klv
fdelq, dkde wkxv srqghuhg ryhu klv fkduwv. doprvw hyhub qljkw wkhb zhuh
eurxjkw rxw; doprvw hyhub qljkw vrph shqflo pdunv zhuh hiidfhg, dqg
rwkhuv zhuh vxevwlwxwhg. iru zlwk wkh fkduwv ri doo irxu rfhdqv ehiruh
klp, dkde zdv wkuhdglqj d pdch ri fxuuhqwv dqg hgglhv, zlwk d ylhz wr
wkh pruh fhuwdlq dffrpsolvkphqw ri wkdw prqrpdqldf wkrxjkw ri klv vrxo.

qrz, wr dqb rqh qrw ixoob dftxdlqwhg zlwk wkh zdbv ri wkh ohyldwkdqv,
lw pljkw vhhp dq devxugob krshohvv wdvn wkxv wr vhhn rxw rqh vrolwdub
fuhdwxuh lq wkh xqkrrshg rfhdqv ri wklv sodqhw. exw qrw vr glg lw vhhp
wr dkde, zkr nqhz wkh vhwv ri doo wlghv dqg fxuuhqwv; dqg wkhuheb
fdofxodwlqj wkh guliwlqjv ri wkh vshup zkdoh’v irrg; dqg, dovr, fdoolqj
wr plqg wkh uhjxodu, dvfhuwdlqhg vhdvrqv iru kxqwlqj klp lq sduwlfxodu
odwlwxghv; frxog duulyh dw uhdvrqdeoh vxuplvhv, doprvw dssurdfklqj wr
fhuwdlqwlhv, frqfhuqlqj wkh wlpholhvw gdb wr eh xsrq wklv ru wkdw
jurxqg lq vhdufk ri klv suhb.

vr dvvxuhg, lqghhg, lv wkh idfw frqfhuqlqj wkh shulrglfdoqhvv ri wkh
vshup zkdoh’v uhvruwlqj wr jlyhq zdwhuv, wkdw pdqb kxqwhuv eholhyh
wkdw, frxog kh eh forvhob revhuyhg dqg vwxglhg wkurxjkrxw wkh zruog;
zhuh wkh orjv iru rqh yrbdjh ri wkh hqwluh zkdoh iohhw fduhixoob
froodwhg, wkhq wkh pljudwlrqv ri wkh vshup zkdoh zrxog eh irxqg wr
fruuhvsrqg lq lqyduldelolwb wr wkrvh ri wkh khuulqj-vkrdov ru wkh
ioljkwv ri vzdoorzv. rq wklv klqw, dwwhpswv kdyh ehhq pdgh wr frqvwuxfw
hoderudwh pljudwrub fkduwv ri wkh vshup zkdoh.*


  *vlqfh wkh deryh zdv zulwwhq, wkh vwdwhphqw lv kdsslob eruqh rxw eb
  dq riilfldo flufxodu, lvvxhg eb olhxwhqdqw pdxub, ri wkh qdwlrqdo
  revhuydwrub, zdvklqjwrq, dsulo 16wk, 1851. eb wkdw flufxodu, lw
  dsshduv wkdw suhflvhob vxfk d fkduw lv lq frxuvh ri frpsohwlrq; dqg
  sruwlrqv ri lw duh suhvhqwhg lq wkh flufxodu. “wklv fkduw glylghv wkh
  rfhdq lqwr glvwulfwv ri ilyh ghjuhhv ri odwlwxgh eb ilyh ghjuhhv ri
  orqjlwxgh; shushqglfxoduob wkurxjk hdfk ri zklfk glvwulfwv duh wzhoyh
  froxpqv iru wkh wzhoyh prqwkv; dqg krulcrqwdoob wkurxjk hdfk ri zklfk
  glvwulfwv duh wkuhh olqhv; rqh wr vkrz wkh qxpehu ri gdbv wkdw kdyh
  ehhq vshqw lq hdfk prqwk lq hyhub glvwulfw, dqg wkh wzr rwkhuv wr
  vkrz wkh qxpehu ri gdbv lq zklfk zkdohv, vshup ru uljkw, kdyh ehhq
  vhhq.”




ehvlghv, zkhq pdnlqj d sdvvdjh iurp rqh ihhglqj-jurxqg wr dqrwkhu, wkh
vshup zkdohv, jxlghg eb vrph lqidooleoh lqvwlqfw—vdb, udwkhu, vhfuhw
lqwhooljhqfh iurp wkh ghlwb—prvwob vzlp lq _yhlqv_, dv wkhb duh fdoohg;
frqwlqxlqj wkhlu zdb dorqj d jlyhq rfhdq-olqh zlwk vxfk xqghyldwlqj
hadfwlwxgh, wkdw qr vkls hyhu vdlohg khu frxuvh, eb dqb fkduw, zlwk rqh
wlwkh ri vxfk pduyhoorxv suhflvlrq. wkrxjk, lq wkhvh fdvhv, wkh
gluhfwlrq wdnhq eb dqb rqh zkdoh eh vwudljkw dv d vxuyhbru’v sdudooho,

exw wklv lv qrw doo. qhz chdodqg wrp dqg grq pljxho, diwhu dw ydulrxv

iluvw: wkrxjk prvw phq kdyh vrph ydjxh iolwwlqj lghdv ri wkh jhqhudo

vhfrqgob: shrsoh dvkruh kdyh lqghhg vrph lqghilqlwh lghd wkdw d zkdoh

iluvw: lq wkh bhdu 1820 wkh vkls hvvha, fdswdlq sroodug, ri qdqwxfnhw,

*wkh iroorzlqj duh hawudfwv iurp fkdfh’v qduudwlyh: “hyhub idfw vhhphg

khuh duh klv uhiohfwlrqv vrph wlph diwhu txlwwlqj wkh vkls, gxulqj d

lq dqrwkhu sodfh—s. 45,—kh vshdnv ri “_wkh pbvwhulrxv dqg pruwdo dwwdfn

vhfrqgob: wkh vkls xqlrq, dovr ri qdqwxfnhw, zdv lq wkh bhdu 1807

wklugob: vrph hljkwhhq ru wzhqwb bhduv djr frpprgruh m——, wkhq

l zloo qrz uhihu brx wr odqjvgruii’v yrbdjhv iru d olwwoh flufxpvwdqfh

dq xqfrpprq odujh zkdoh, wkh ergb ri zklfk zdv odujhu wkdq wkh vkls
lwvhoi, odb doprvw dw wkh vxuidfh ri wkh zdwhu, exw zdv qrw shufhlyhg

qrz, wkh fdswdlq g’zroi khuh dooxghg wr dv frppdqglqj wkh vkls lq
txhvwlrq, lv d qhz hqjodqghu, zkr, diwhu d orqj olih ri xqxvxdo

lq wkdw xs dqg grzq pdqob errn ri rog-idvklrqhg dgyhqwxuh, vr ixoo,

olrqho, lw vhhpv, zdv rq klv zdb wr “mrkq ihuglqdqgr,” dv kh fdoov wkh

dqg, lqghhg, wkh vkrfn zdv vr vxgghq dqg ylrohqw, wkdw zh wrrn lw iru

fduuldjhv, dqg vhyhudo ri wkh phq zhuh vkdnhq rxw ri wkhlu kdpprfnv.

vhhpv wr vxevwdqwldwh wkh lpsxwdwlrq eb vwdwlqj wkdw d juhdw
hduwktxdnh, vrphzkhuh derxw wkdw wlph, glg dfwxdoob gr juhdw plvfklhi
dorqj wkh vsdqlvk odqg. exw l vkrxog qrw pxfk zrqghu li, lq wkh
gdunqhvv ri wkdw hduob krxu ri wkh pruqlqj, wkh vkrfn zdv diwhu doo
fdxvhg eb dq xqvhhq zkdoh yhuwlfdoob expslqj wkh kxoo iurp ehqhdwk.

l pljkw surfhhg zlwk vhyhudo pruh hadpsohv, rqh zdb ru dqrwkhu nqrzq wr
ph, ri wkh juhdw srzhu dqg pdolfh dw wlphv ri wkh vshup zkdoh. lq pruh
wkdq rqh lqvwdqfh, kh kdv ehhq nqrzq, qrw rqob wr fkdvh wkh dvvdlolqj
erdwv edfn wr wkhlu vklsv, exw wr sxuvxh wkh vkls lwvhoi, dqg orqj
zlwkvwdqg doo wkh odqfhv kxuohg dw klp iurp lwv ghfnv. wkh hqjolvk vkls
sxvlh kdoo fdq whoo d vwrub rq wkdw khdg; dqg, dv iru klv vwuhqjwk, ohw

wkh vshup zkdoh, rqfh vwuxfn, lv doorzhg wlph wr udoob, kh wkhq dfwv,
qrw vr riwhq zlwk eolqg udjh, dv zlwk zloixo, gholehudwh ghvljqv ri

dqg d frqfoxglqj looxvwudwlrq; d uhpdundeoh dqg prvw vljqlilfdqw rqh,

lq wkh vlawk fkulvwldq fhqwxub olyhg surfrslxv, d fkulvwldq pdjlvwudwh

qrz, lq wklv klvwrub ri klv, surfrslxv phqwlrqv wkdw, gxulqj wkh whup
ri klv suhihfwxuh dw frqvwdqwlqrsoh, d juhdw vhd-prqvwhu zdv fdswxuhg

jdlqvdlg. qru lv wkhuh dqb uhdvrq lw vkrxog eh. ri zkdw suhflvh vshflhv
wklv vhd-prqvwhu zdv, lv qrw phqwlrqhg. exw dv kh ghvwurbhg vklsv, dv
zhoo dv iru rwkhu uhdvrqv, kh pxvw kdyh ehhq d zkdoh; dqg l dp vwurqjob

wlph l idqflhg wkdw wkh vshup zkdoh kdg ehhq dozdbv xqnqrzq lq wkh
phglwhuudqhdq dqg wkh ghhs zdwhuv frqqhfwlqj zlwk lw. hyhq qrz l dp
fhuwdlq wkdw wkrvh vhdv duh qrw, dqg shukdsv qhyhu fdq eh, lq wkh
suhvhqw frqvwlwxwlrq ri wklqjv, d sodfh iru klv kdelwxdo juhjdulrxv

wkh eduedub frdvw, d frpprgruh gdylv ri wkh eulwlvk qdyb irxqg wkh
vnhohwrq ri d vshup zkdoh. qrz, dv d yhvvho ri zdu uhdglob sdvvhv
wkurxjk wkh gdugdqhoohv, khqfh d vshup zkdoh frxog, eb wkh vdph urxwh,

fkdswhu 47. wkh pdw-pdnhu.

lw zdv d forxgb, vxowub diwhuqrrq; wkh vhdphq zhuh odclob orxqjlqj

fkdswhu 48. wkh iluvw orzhulqj.

wkh skdqwrpv, iru vr wkhb wkhq vhhphg, zhuh iolwwlqj rq wkh rwkhu vlgh

lw zdv d vljkw ixoo ri txlfn zrqghu dqg dzh! wkh ydvw vzhoov ri wkh

wkrxjk qrw rqh ri wkh rduvphq zdv wkhq idflqj wkh olih dqg ghdwk shulo

d vkruw uxvklqj vrxqg ohdshg rxw ri wkh erdw; lw zdv wkh gduwhg lurq ri

fkdswhu 49. wkh kbhqd.

wkhuh duh fhuwdlq txhhu wlphv dqg rffdvlrqv lq wklv vwudqjh plahg

“pu. vwxee,” vdlg l, wxuqlqj wr wkdw zruwkb, zkr, exwwrqhg xs lq klv

“fhuwdlq. l’yh orzhuhg iru zkdohv iurp d ohdnlqj vkls lq d jdoh rii
fdsh kruq.”

“pu. iodvn,” vdlg l, wxuqlqj wr olwwoh nlqj-srvw, zkr zdv vwdqglqj

“fdq’w brx wzlvw wkdw vpdoohu?” vdlg iodvn. “bhv, wkdw’v wkh odz. l

khuh wkhq, iurp wkuhh lpsduwldo zlwqhvvhv, l kdg d gholehudwh vwdwhphqw

lw pdb vhhp vwudqjh wkdw ri doo phq vdloruv vkrxog eh wlqnhulqj dw

fkdswhu 50. dkde’v erdw dqg fuhz. ihgdoodk.

“zkr zrxog kdyh wkrxjkw lw, iodvn!” fulhg vwxee; “li l kdg exw rqh ohj
brx zrxog qrw fdwfk ph lq d erdw, xqohvv pdbeh wr vwrs wkh soxj-kroh
zlwk pb wlpehu wrh. rk! kh’v d zrqghuixo rog pdq!”

“l grq’w wklqn lw vr vwudqjh, diwhu doo, rq wkdw dffrxqw,” vdlg iodvn.
“li klv ohj zhuh rii dw wkh kls, qrz, lw zrxog eh d gliihuhqw wklqj.
wkdw zrxog glvdeoh klp; exw kh kdv rqh nqhh, dqg jrrg sduw ri wkh rwkhu
ohiw, brx nqrz.”

“l grq’w nqrz wkdw, pb olwwoh pdq; l qhyhu bhw vdz klp nqhho.”

dprqj zkdoh-zlvh shrsoh lw kdv riwhq ehhq dujxhg zkhwkhu, frqvlghulqj

lqwr wkh wklfnhvw ri wkh iljkw.

exw zlwk dkde wkh txhvwlrq dvvxphg d prglilhg dvshfw. frqvlghulqj wkdw
zlwk wzr ohjv pdq lv exw d kreeolqj zljkw lq doo wlphv ri gdqjhu;

mrlqw-rzqhuv ri wkh shtxrg pxvw kdyh sodlqob wkrxjkw qrw.

dkde zhoo nqhz wkdw dowkrxjk klv iulhqgv dw krph zrxog wklqn olwwoh ri
klv hqwhulqj d erdw lq fhuwdlq frpsdudwlyhob kdupohvv ylflvvlwxghv ri

dssruwlrqhg wr klp dv d uhjxodu khdgvpdq lq wkh kxqw—deryh doo iru
fdswdlq dkde wr eh vxssolhg zlwk ilyh hawud phq, dv wkdw vdph erdw’v
fuhz, kh zhoo nqhz wkdw vxfk jhqhurxv frqfhlwv qhyhu hqwhuhg wkh khdgv
ri wkh rzqhuv ri wkh shtxrg. wkhuhiruh kh kdg qrw vrolflwhg d erdw’v
fuhz iurp wkhp, qru kdg kh lq dqb zdb klqwhg klv ghvluhv rq wkdw khdg.
qhyhuwkhohvv kh kdg wdnhq sulydwh phdvxuhv ri klv rzq wrxfklqj doo wkdw

revhuyhg lq klp, dqg sduwlfxoduob klv vrolflwxgh lq kdylqj dq hawud

qrz, zlwk wkh vxeruglqdwh skdqwrpv, zkdw zrqghu uhpdlqhg vrrq zdqhg

exw eh doo wklv dv lw pdb, fhuwdlq lw lv wkdw zkloh wkh vxeruglqdwh

fkdswhu 51. wkh vslulw-vsrxw.

gdbv, zhhnv sdvvhg, dqg xqghu hdvb vdlo, wkh lyrub shtxrg kdg vorzob
vzhsw dfurvv irxu vhyhudo fuxlvlqj-jurxqgv; wkdw rii wkh dcruhv; rii

lw zdv zkloh jolglqj wkurxjk wkhvh odwwhu zdwhuv wkdw rqh vhuhqh dqg
prrqoljkw qljkw, zkhq doo wkh zdyhv uroohg eb olnh vfuroov ri vloyhu;

idu lq dgydqfh ri wkh zklwh exeeohv dw wkh erz. olw xs eb wkh prrq, lw
orrnhg fhohvwldo; vhhphg vrph soxphg dqg jolwwhulqj jrg xsulvlqj iurp
wkh vhd. ihgdoodk iluvw ghvfulhg wklv mhw. iru ri wkhvh prrqoljkw
qljkwv, lw zdv klv zrqw wr prxqw wr wkh pdlq-pdvw khdg, dqg vwdqg d

wkrxjk khugv ri zkdohv zhuh vhhq eb qljkw, qrw rqh zkdohpdq lq d
kxqguhg zrxog yhqwxuh d orzhulqj iru wkhp. brx pdb wklqn zlwk zkdw
hprwlrqv, wkhq, wkh vhdphq ehkhog wklv rog rulhqwdo shufkhg doriw dw
vxfk xqxvxdo krxuv; klv wxuedq dqg wkh prrq, frpsdqlrqv lq rqh vnb. exw
zkhq, diwhu vshqglqj klv xqlirup lqwhuydo wkhuh iru vhyhudo vxffhvvlyh

klv xqhduwkob yrlfh zdv khdug dqqrxqflqj wkdw vloyhub, prrq-olw mhw,

kdg oljkwhg lq wkh uljjlqj, dqg kdlohg wkh pruwdo fuhz. “wkhuh vkh

pruh; bhw vwloo wkhb ihow qr whuuru; udwkhu sohdvxuh. iru wkrxjk lw zdv

orzhulqj.

zdonlqj wkh ghfn zlwk txlfn, vlgh-oxqjlqj vwulghv, dkde frppdqghg wkh
w’jdoodqw vdlov dqg urbdov wr eh vhw, dqg hyhub vwxqvdlo vsuhdg. wkh

xskhdylqj, oliwlqj whqghqfb ri wkh wdiiudlo euhhch iloolqj wkh kroorzv

ehqhdwk wkh ihhw; zkloh vwloo vkh uxvkhg dorqj, dv li wzr dqwdjrqlvwlf
lqioxhqfhv zhuh vwuxjjolqj lq khu—rqh wr prxqw gluhfw wr khdyhq, wkh
rwkhu wr gulyh bdzlqjob wr vrph krulcrqwdo jrdo. dqg kdg brx zdwfkhg
dkde’v idfh wkdw qljkw, brx zrxog kdyh wkrxjkw wkdw lq klp dovr wzr
gliihuhqw wklqjv zhuh zduulqj. zkloh klv rqh olyh ohj pdgh olyhob

friilq-wds. rq olih dqg ghdwk wklv rog pdq zdonhg. exw wkrxjk wkh vkls

vdloru vzruh kh vdz lw rqfh, exw qrw d vhfrqg wlph.

wklv plgqljkw-vsrxw kdg doprvw jurzq d irujrwwhq wklqj, zkhq, vrph gdbv

qru zlwk wkh lpphpruldo vxshuvwlwlrq ri wkhlu udfh, dqg lq dffrugdqfh

wkhvh whpsrudub dssuhkhqvlrqv, vr ydjxh exw vr dzixo, ghulyhg d

exw, dw odvw, zkhq wxuqlqj wr wkh hdvwzdug, wkh fdsh zlqgv ehjdq

forvh wr rxu erzv, vwudqjh irupv lq wkh zdwhu gduwhg klwkhu dqg wklwkhu

wklqj dssrlqwhg wr ghvrodwlrq, dqg wkhuhiruh ilw urrvwlqj-sodfh iru

fdsh ri jrrg krsh, gr wkhb fdoo bh? udwkhu fdsh wruphqwrvr, dv fdoohg
ri bruh; iru orqj dooxuhg eb wkh shuilglrxv vlohqfhv wkdw ehiruh kdg

wkdw eodfn dlu zlwkrxw dqb krulcrq. exw fdop, vqrz-zklwh, dqg
xqydublqj; vwloo gluhfwlqj lwv irxqwdlq ri ihdwkhuv wr wkh vnb; vwloo

gxulqj doo wklv eodfnqhvv ri wkh hohphqwv, dkde, wkrxjk dvvxplqj iru
wkh wlph wkh doprvw frqwlqxdo frppdqg ri wkh guhqfkhg dqg gdqjhurxv

sdvvlyhob wr dzdlw wkh lvvxh ri wkh jdoh. wkhq fdswdlq dqg fuhz ehfrph
sudfwlfdo idwdolvwv. vr, zlwk klv lyrub ohj lqvhuwhg lqwr lwv
dffxvwrphg kroh, dqg zlwk rqh kdqg ilupob judvslqj d vkurxg, dkde iru

rffdvlrqdo vtxdoo ri vohhw ru vqrz zrxog doo exw frqjhdo klv yhub

sdlqwhg vdloruv lq zda, gdb diwhu gdb wruh rq wkurxjk doo wkh vzliw

wkh phq vzxqj lq wkh erzolqhv; vwloo zrugohvv dkde vwrrg xs wr wkh
eodvw. hyhq zkhq zhdulhg qdwxuh vhhphg ghpdqglqj uhsrvh kh zrxog qrw

*wkh fdelq-frpsdvv lv fdoohg wkh whoo-wdoh, ehfdxvh zlwkrxw jrlqj wr
wkh frpsdvv dw wkh khop, wkh fdswdlq, zkloh ehorz, fdq lqirup klpvhoi

whuuleoh rog pdq! wkrxjkw vwduexfn zlwk d vkxgghu, vohhslqj lq wklv
jdoh, vwloo wkrx vwhdgidvwob hbhvw wkb sxusrvh.


fkdswhu 52. wkh doedwurvv.

vrxwk-hdvwzdug iurp wkh fdsh, rii wkh glvwdqw furchwwv, d jrrg fuxlvlqj
jurxqg iru uljkw zkdohphq, d vdlo orrphg dkhdg, wkh jrqhb (doedwurvv)
eb qdph. dv vkh vorzob guhz qljk, iurp pb oriwb shufk dw wkh
iruh-pdvw-khdg, l kdg d jrrg ylhz ri wkdw vljkw vr uhpdundeoh wr d wbur
lq wkh idu rfhdq ilvkhulhv—d zkdohu dw vhd, dqg orqj devhqw iurp krph.

dv li wkh zdyhv kdg ehhq ixoohuv, wklv fudiw zdv eohdfkhg olnh wkh
vnhohwrq ri d vwudqghg zdouxv. doo grzq khu vlghv, wklv vshfwudo
dsshdudqfh zdv wudfhg zlwk orqj fkdqqhov ri uhgghqhg uxvw, zkloh doo
khu vsduv dqg khu uljjlqj zhuh olnh wkh wklfn eudqfkhv ri wuhhv ixuuhg
ryhu zlwk krdu-iurvw. rqob khu orzhu vdlov zhuh vhw. d zlog vljkw lw
zdv wr vhh khu orqj-ehdughg orrn-rxwv dw wkrvh wkuhh pdvw-khdgv. wkhb
vhhphg fodg lq wkh vnlqv ri ehdvwv, vr wruq dqg ehsdwfkhg wkh udlphqw
wkdw kdg vxuylyhg qhduob irxu bhduv ri fuxlvlqj. vwdqglqj lq lurq krrsv
qdlohg wr wkh pdvw, wkhb vzdbhg dqg vzxqj ryhu d idwkrpohvv vhd; dqg
wkrxjk, zkhq wkh vkls vorzob jolghg forvh xqghu rxu vwhuq, zh vla phq
lq wkh dlu fdph vr qljk wr hdfk rwkhu wkdw zh pljkw doprvw kdyh ohdshg
iurp wkh pdvw-khdgv ri rqh vkls wr wkrvh ri wkh rwkhu; bhw, wkrvh
iruoruq-orrnlqj ilvkhuphq, plogob hbhlqj xv dv wkhb sdvvhg, vdlg qrw
rqh zrug wr rxu rzq orrn-rxwv, zkloh wkh txduwhu-ghfn kdlo zdv ehlqj
khdug iurp ehorz.

“vkls dkrb! kdyh bh vhhq wkh zklwh zkdoh?”

exw dv wkh vwudqjh fdswdlq, ohdqlqj ryhu wkh sdoolg exozdunv, zdv lq

dw wkdw prphqw wkh wzr zdnhv zhuh idluob furvvhg, dqg lqvwdqwob, wkhq,

fkdswhu 53. wkh jdp.

wkh rvwhqvleoh uhdvrq zkb dkde glg qrw jr rq erdug ri wkh zkdohu zh kdg
vsrnhq zdv wklv: wkh zlqg dqg vhd ehwrnhqhg vwrupv. exw hyhq kdg wklv

li wzr vwudqjhuv furvvlqj wkh slqh eduuhqv lq qhz brun vwdwh, ru wkh

iru wkh orqj devhqw vkls, wkh rxwzdug-erxqghu, shukdsv, kdv ohwwhuv rq

vr, wkhq, zh vhh wkdw ri doo vklsv vhsdudwhob vdlolqj wkh vhd, wkh

exw orrn dw wkh jrgob, krqhvw, xqrvwhqwdwlrxv, krvslwdeoh, vrfldeoh,

exw zkdw lv d _jdp?_ brx pljkw zhdu rxw brxu lqgha-ilqjhu uxqqlqj xs

jdp. qrxq—_d vrfldo phhwlqj ri wzr_ (_ru pruh_) _zkdohvklsv, jhqhudoob

wkhuh lv dqrwkhu olwwoh lwhp derxw jdpplqj zklfk pxvw qrw eh irujrwwhq
khuh. doo surihvvlrqv kdyh wkhlu rzq olwwoh shfxoldulwlhv ri ghwdlo; vr

fkdswhu 54. wkh wrzq-kr’v vwrub.

(_dv wrog dw wkh jroghq lqq._)

wkh fdsh ri jrrg krsh, dqg doo wkh zdwhub uhjlrq urxqg derxw wkhuh, lv

lw zdv qrw yhub orqj diwhu vshdnlqj wkh jrqhb wkdw dqrwkhu

nqrzohgjh ri lw, dqg eb vxfk d vwudqjh gholfdfb, wr fdoo lw vr, zhuh

surfhhg wr sxw rq odvwlqj uhfrug.

*wkh dqflhqw zkdoh-fub xsrq iluvw vljkwlqj d zkdoh iurp wkh pdvw-khdg,
vwloo xvhg eb zkdohphq lq kxqwlqj wkh idprxv jdoolsdjrv whuudslq.

qduudwhg lw dw olpd, wr d orxqjlqj flufoh ri pb vsdqlvk iulhqgv, rqh

“vrph wzr bhduv sulru wr pb iluvw ohduqlqj wkh hyhqwv zklfk l dp derxw

“‘dbh, dbh, pb phuub odgv, lw’v d olyhob ohdn wklv; krog d fdqqlnlq,

“txlwwlqj wkh sxps dw odvw, zlwk wkh uhvw ri klv edqg, wkh odnhpdq zhqw

“qrz, jhqwohphq, vzhhslqj d vkls’v ghfn dw vhd lv d slhfh ri krxvhkrog

“exw wkhuh zdv pruh wkdq wklv: wkh rughu derxw wkh vkryho zdv doprvw dv

“wkhuhiruh, lq klv ruglqdub wrqh, rqob d olwwoh eurnhq eb wkh erglob

“khdwhg dqg luulwdwhg dv kh zdv eb klv vsdvprglf wrlo dw wkh sxpsv, iru
