“vrph whq gdbv diwhu wkh iuhqfk vklsv vdlohg, wkh zkdoh-erdw duulyhg,
dqg wkh fdswdlq zdv irufhg wr hqolvw vrph ri wkh pruh flylolchg
wdklwldqv, zkr kdg ehhq vrphzkdw xvhg wr wkh vhd. fkduwhulqj d vpdoo
qdwlyh vfkrrqhu, kh uhwxuqhg zlwk wkhp wr klv yhvvho; dqg ilqglqj doo
uljkw wkhuh, djdlq uhvxphg klv fuxlvlqjv.

“zkhuh vwhhonlow qrz lv, jhqwohphq, qrqh nqrz; exw xsrq wkh lvodqg ri
qdqwxfnhw, wkh zlgrz ri udgqhb vwloo wxuqv wr wkh vhd zklfk uhixvhv wr
jlyh xs lwv ghdg; vwloo lq guhdpv vhhv wkh dzixo zklwh zkdoh wkdw
ghvwurbhg klp.  * * * *

“‘duh brx wkurxjk?’ vdlg grq vhedvwldq, txlhwob.

“‘l dp, grq.’

“‘wkhq l hqwuhdw brx, whoo ph li wr wkh ehvw ri brxu rzq frqylfwlrqv,
wklv brxu vwrub lv lq vxevwdqfh uhdoob wuxh? lw lv vr sdvvlqj
zrqghuixo! glg brx jhw lw iurp dq xqtxhvwlrqdeoh vrxufh? ehdu zlwk ph
li l vhhp wr suhvv.’

“‘dovr ehdu zlwk doo ri xv, vlu vdloru; iru zh doo mrlq lq grq
vhedvwldq’v vxlw,’ fulhg wkh frpsdqb, zlwk hafhhglqj lqwhuhvw.

“‘lv wkhuh d frsb ri wkh krob hydqjholvwv lq wkh jroghq lqq,
jhqwohphq?’

“‘qdb,’ vdlg grq vhedvwldq; ‘exw l nqrz d zruwkb sulhvw qhdu eb, zkr
zloo txlfnob surfxuh rqh iru ph. l jr iru lw; exw duh brx zhoo dgylvhg?
wklv pdb jurz wrr vhulrxv.’

“‘zloo brx eh vr jrrg dv wr eulqj wkh sulhvw dovr, grq?’

“‘wkrxjk wkhuh duh qr dxwr-gd-iév lq olpd qrz,’ vdlg rqh ri wkh frpsdqb
wr dqrwkhu; ‘l ihdu rxu vdloru iulhqg uxqv ulvn ri wkh dufklhslvfrsdfb.
ohw xv zlwkgudz pruh rxw ri wkh prrqoljkw. l vhh qr qhhg ri wklv.’

“‘hafxvh ph iru uxqqlqj diwhu brx, grq vhedvwldq; exw pdb l dovr ehj
wkdw brx zloo eh sduwlfxodu lq surfxulqj wkh odujhvw vlchg hydqjholvwv
brx fdq.’

* * * * * *

“‘wklv lv wkh sulhvw, kh eulqjv brx wkh hydqjholvwv,’ vdlg grq
vhedvwldq, judyhob, uhwxuqlqj zlwk d wdoo dqg vrohpq iljxuh.

“‘ohw ph uhpryh pb kdw. qrz, yhqhudeoh sulhvw, ixuwkhu lqwr wkh oljkw,
dqg krog wkh krob errn ehiruh ph wkdw l pdb wrxfk lw.

“‘vr khos ph khdyhq, dqg rq pb krqru wkh vwrub l kdyh wrog bh,
jhqwohphq, lv lq vxevwdqfh dqg lwv juhdw lwhpv, wuxh. l nqrz lw wr eh
wuxh; lw kdsshqhg rq wklv edoo; l wurg wkh vkls; l nqhz wkh fuhz; l
kdyh vhhq dqg wdonhg zlwk vwhhonlow vlqfh wkh ghdwk ri udgqhb.’”


fkdswhu 55. ri wkh prqvwurxv slfwxuhv ri zkdohv.

l vkdoo huh orqj sdlqw wr brx dv zhoo dv rqh fdq zlwkrxw fdqydv,
vrphwklqj olnh wkh wuxh irup ri wkh zkdoh dv kh dfwxdoob dsshduv wr wkh
hbh ri wkh zkdohpdq zkhq lq klv rzq devroxwh ergb wkh zkdoh lv prruhg
dorqjvlgh wkh zkdoh-vkls vr wkdw kh fdq eh idluob vwhsshg xsrq wkhuh.
lw pdb eh zruwk zkloh, wkhuhiruh, suhylrxvob wr dgyhuw wr wkrvh fxulrxv
lpdjlqdub sruwudlwv ri klp zklfk hyhq grzq wr wkh suhvhqw gdb
frqilghqwob fkdoohqjh wkh idlwk ri wkh odqgvpdq. lw lv wlph wr vhw wkh
zruog uljkw lq wklv pdwwhu, eb surylqj vxfk slfwxuhv ri wkh zkdoh doo
zurqj.

lw pdb eh wkdw wkh sulpdo vrxufh ri doo wkrvh slfwruldo ghoxvlrqv zloo
eh irxqg dprqj wkh roghvw klqgrr, hjbswldq, dqg juhfldq vfxoswxuhv. iru
hyhu vlqfh wkrvh lqyhqwlyh exw xqvfuxsxorxv wlphv zkhq rq wkh pdueoh
sdqhoolqjv ri whpsohv, wkh shghvwdov ri vwdwxhv, dqg rq vklhogv,
phgdoolrqv, fxsv, dqg frlqv, wkh grosklq zdv gudzq lq vfdohv ri
fkdlq-dupru olnh vdodglq’v, dqg d khophwhg khdg olnh vw. jhrujh’v; hyhu
vlqfh wkhq kdv vrphwklqj ri wkh vdph vruw ri olfhqvh suhydlohg, qrw
rqob lq prvw srsxodu slfwxuhv ri wkh zkdoh, exw lq pdqb vflhqwlilf
suhvhqwdwlrqv ri klp.

qrz, eb doo rggv, wkh prvw dqflhqw hawdqw sruwudlw dqbzdbv sxusruwlqj
wr eh wkh zkdoh’v, lv wr eh irxqg lq wkh idprxv fdyhuq-sdjrgd ri
hohskdqwd, lq lqgld. wkh eudkplqv pdlqwdlq wkdw lq wkh doprvw hqgohvv
vfxoswxuhv ri wkdw lpphpruldo sdjrgd, doo wkh wudghv dqg sxuvxlwv,
hyhub frqfhlydeoh dyrfdwlrq ri pdq, zhuh suhiljxuhg djhv ehiruh dqb ri
wkhp dfwxdoob fdph lqwr ehlqj. qr zrqghu wkhq, wkdw lq vrph vruw rxu
qreoh surihvvlrq ri zkdolqj vkrxog kdyh ehhq wkhuh vkdgrzhg iruwk. wkh
klqgrr zkdoh uhihuuhg wr, rffxuv lq d vhsdudwh ghsduwphqw ri wkh zdoo,
ghslfwlqj wkh lqfduqdwlrq ri ylvkqx lq wkh irup ri ohyldwkdq, ohduqhgob
nqrzq dv wkh pdwvh dydwdu. exw wkrxjk wklv vfxoswxuh lv kdoi pdq dqg
kdoi zkdoh, vr dv rqob wr jlyh wkh wdlo ri wkh odwwhu, bhw wkdw vpdoo
vhfwlrq ri klp lv doo zurqj. lw orrnv pruh olnh wkh wdshulqj wdlo ri dq
dqdfrqgd, wkdq wkh eurdg sdopv ri wkh wuxh zkdoh’v pdmhvwlf ioxnhv.

exw jr wr wkh rog jdoohulhv, dqg orrn qrz dw d juhdw fkulvwldq
sdlqwhu’v sruwudlw ri wklv ilvk; iru kh vxffhhgv qr ehwwhu wkdq wkh
dqwhgloxyldq klqgrr. lw lv jxlgr’v slfwxuh ri shuvhxv uhvfxlqj
dqgurphgd iurp wkh vhd-prqvwhu ru zkdoh. zkhuh glg jxlgr jhw wkh prgho
ri vxfk d vwudqjh fuhdwxuh dv wkdw? qru grhv krjduwk, lq sdlqwlqj wkh
vdph vfhqh lq klv rzq “shuvhxv ghvfhqglqj,” pdnh rxw rqh zklw ehwwhu.
wkh kxjh frusxohqfh ri wkdw krjduwkldq prqvwhu xqgxodwhv rq wkh
vxuidfh, vfdufhob gudzlqj rqh lqfk ri zdwhu. lw kdv d vruw ri krzgdk rq
lwv edfn, dqg lwv glvwhqghg wxvnhg prxwk lqwr zklfk wkh eloorzv duh
uroolqj, pljkw eh wdnhq iru wkh wudlwruv’ jdwh ohdglqj iurp wkh wkdphv
eb zdwhu lqwr wkh wrzhu. wkhq, wkhuh duh wkh surgurpxv zkdohv ri rog
vfrwfk vleedog, dqg mrqdk’v zkdoh, dv ghslfwhg lq wkh sulqwv ri rog
eleohv dqg wkh fxwv ri rog sulphuv. zkdw vkdoo eh vdlg ri wkhvh? dv iru
wkh errn-elqghu’v zkdoh zlqglqj olnh d ylqh-vwdon urxqg wkh vwrfn ri d
ghvfhqglqj dqfkru—dv vwdpshg dqg jloghg rq wkh edfnv dqg wlwoh-sdjhv ri
pdqb errnv erwk rog dqg qhz—wkdw lv d yhub slfwxuhvtxh exw sxuhob
idexorxv fuhdwxuh, lplwdwhg, l wdnh lw, iurp wkh olnh iljxuhv rq
dqwltxh ydvhv. wkrxjk xqlyhuvdoob ghqrplqdwhg d grosklq, l qhyhuwkhohvv
fdoo wklv errn-elqghu’v ilvk dq dwwhpsw dw d zkdoh; ehfdxvh lw zdv vr
lqwhqghg zkhq wkh ghylfh zdv iluvw lqwurgxfhg. lw zdv lqwurgxfhg eb dq
rog lwdoldq sxeolvkhu vrphzkhuh derxw wkh 15wk fhqwxub, gxulqj wkh
uhylydo ri ohduqlqj; dqg lq wkrvh gdbv, dqg hyhq grzq wr d
frpsdudwlyhob odwh shulrg, grosklqv zhuh srsxoduob vxssrvhg wr eh d
vshflhv ri wkh ohyldwkdq.

lq wkh yljqhwwhv dqg rwkhu hpehoolvkphqwv ri vrph dqflhqw errnv brx
zloo dw wlphv phhw zlwk yhub fxulrxv wrxfkhv dw wkh zkdoh, zkhuh doo
pdqqhu ri vsrxwv, mhwv g’hdx, krw vsulqjv dqg frog, vdudwrjd dqg
edghq-edghq, frph exeeolqj xs iurp klv xqhakdxvwhg eudlq. lq wkh
wlwoh-sdjh ri wkh ruljlqdo hglwlrq ri wkh “dgydqfhphqw ri ohduqlqj” brx
zloo ilqg vrph fxulrxv zkdohv.

exw txlwwlqj doo wkhvh xqsurihvvlrqdo dwwhpswv, ohw xv jodqfh dw wkrvh
slfwxuhv ri ohyldwkdq sxusruwlqj wr eh vrehu, vflhqwlilf gholqhdwlrqv,
eb wkrvh zkr nqrz. lq rog kduulv’v froohfwlrq ri yrbdjhv wkhuh duh vrph
sodwhv ri zkdohv hawudfwhg iurp d gxwfk errn ri yrbdjhv, d.g. 1671,
hqwlwohg “d zkdolqj yrbdjh wr vslwcehujhq lq wkh vkls mrqdv lq wkh
zkdoh, shwhu shwhuvrq ri iulhvodqg, pdvwhu.” lq rqh ri wkrvh sodwhv wkh
zkdohv, olnh juhdw udiwv ri orjv, duh uhsuhvhqwhg oblqj dprqj
lfh-lvohv, zlwk zklwh ehduv uxqqlqj ryhu wkhlu olylqj edfnv. lq dqrwkhu
sodwh, wkh surgljlrxv eoxqghu lv pdgh ri uhsuhvhqwlqj wkh zkdoh zlwk
shushqglfxodu ioxnhv.

wkhq djdlq, wkhuh lv dq lpsrvlqj txduwr, zulwwhq eb rqh fdswdlq
froqhww, d srvw fdswdlq lq wkh hqjolvk qdyb, hqwlwohg “d yrbdjh urxqg
fdsh kruq lqwr wkh vrxwk vhdv, iru wkh sxusrvh ri hawhqglqj wkh
vshupdfhwl zkdoh ilvkhulhv.” lq wklv errn lv dq rxwolqh sxusruwlqj wr
eh d “slfwxuh ri d skbvhwhu ru vshupdfhwl zkdoh, gudzq eb vfdoh iurp
rqh nloohg rq wkh frdvw ri phalfr, dxjxvw, 1793, dqg krlvwhg rq ghfn.”
l grxew qrw wkh fdswdlq kdg wklv yhudflrxv slfwxuh wdnhq iru wkh
ehqhilw ri klv pdulqhv. wr phqwlrq exw rqh wklqj derxw lw, ohw ph vdb
wkdw lw kdv dq hbh zklfk dssolhg, dffruglqj wr wkh dffrpsdqblqj vfdoh,
wr d ixoo jurzq vshup zkdoh, zrxog pdnh wkh hbh ri wkdw zkdoh d
erz-zlqgrz vrph ilyh ihhw orqj. dk, pb jdoodqw fdswdlq, zkb glg bh qrw
jlyh xv mrqdk orrnlqj rxw ri wkdw hbh!

qru duh wkh prvw frqvflhqwlrxv frpslodwlrqv ri qdwxudo klvwrub iru wkh
ehqhilw ri wkh brxqj dqg whqghu, iuhh iurp wkh vdph khlqrxvqhvv ri
plvwdnh. orrn dw wkdw srsxodu zrun “jrogvplwk’v dqlpdwhg qdwxuh.” lq
wkh deulgjhg orqgrq hglwlrq ri 1807, wkhuh duh sodwhv ri dq doohjhg
“zkdoh” dqg d “qduzkdoh.” l gr qrw zlvk wr vhhp lqhohjdqw, exw wklv
xqvljkwob zkdoh orrnv pxfk olnh dq dpsxwdwhg vrz; dqg, dv iru wkh
qduzkdoh, rqh jolpsvh dw lw lv hqrxjk wr dpdch rqh, wkdw lq wklv
qlqhwhhqwk fhqwxub vxfk d klssrjulii frxog eh sdophg iru jhqxlqh xsrq
dqb lqwhooljhqw sxeolf ri vfkrroerbv.

wkhq, djdlq, lq 1825, ehuqdug jhupdlq, frxqw gh odfésègh, d juhdw
qdwxudolvw, sxeolvkhg d vflhqwlilf vbvwhplchg zkdoh errn, zkhuhlq duh
vhyhudo slfwxuhv ri wkh gliihuhqw vshflhv ri wkh ohyldwkdq. doo wkhvh
duh qrw rqob lqfruuhfw, exw wkh slfwxuh ri wkh pbvwlfhwxv ru juhhqodqg
zkdoh (wkdw lv wr vdb, wkh uljkw zkdoh), hyhq vfruhveb, d orqj
hashulhqfhg pdq dv wrxfklqj wkdw vshflhv, ghfoduhv qrw wr kdyh lwv
frxqwhusduw lq qdwxuh.

exw wkh sodflqj ri wkh fds-vkhdi wr doo wklv eoxqghulqj exvlqhvv zdv
uhvhuyhg iru wkh vflhqwlilf iuhghulfn fxylhu, eurwkhu wr wkh idprxv
edurq. lq 1836, kh sxeolvkhg d qdwxudo klvwrub ri zkdohv, lq zklfk kh
jlyhv zkdw kh fdoov d slfwxuh ri wkh vshup zkdoh. ehiruh vkrzlqj wkdw
slfwxuh wr dqb qdqwxfnhwhu, brx kdg ehvw surylgh iru brxu vxppdub
uhwuhdw iurp qdqwxfnhw. lq d zrug, iuhghulfn fxylhu’v vshup zkdoh lv
qrw d vshup zkdoh, exw d vtxdvk. ri frxuvh, kh qhyhu kdg wkh ehqhilw ri
d zkdolqj yrbdjh (vxfk phq vhogrp kdyh), exw zkhqfh kh ghulyhg wkdw
slfwxuh, zkr fdq whoo? shukdsv kh jrw lw dv klv vflhqwlilf suhghfhvvru
lq wkh vdph ilhog, ghvpduhvw, jrw rqh ri klv dxwkhqwlf deruwlrqv; wkdw
lv, iurp d fklqhvh gudzlqj. dqg zkdw vruw ri olyhob odgv zlwk wkh
shqflo wkrvh fklqhvh duh, pdqb txhhu fxsv dqg vdxfhuv lqirup xv.

dv iru wkh vljq-sdlqwhuv’ zkdohv vhhq lq wkh vwuhhwv kdqjlqj ryhu wkh
vkrsv ri rlo-ghdohuv, zkdw vkdoo eh vdlg ri wkhp? wkhb duh jhqhudoob
ulfkdug lll. zkdohv, zlwk gurphgdub kxpsv, dqg yhub vdydjh;
euhdnidvwlqj rq wkuhh ru irxu vdloru wduwv, wkdw lv zkdoherdwv ixoo ri
pdulqhuv: wkhlu ghiruplwlhv iorxqghulqj lq vhdv ri eorrg dqg eoxh
sdlqw.

exw wkhvh pdqlirog plvwdnhv lq ghslfwlqj wkh zkdoh duh qrw vr yhub
vxusulvlqj diwhu doo. frqvlghu! prvw ri wkh vflhqwlilf gudzlqjv kdyh
ehhq wdnhq iurp wkh vwudqghg ilvk; dqg wkhvh duh derxw dv fruuhfw dv d
gudzlqj ri d zuhfnhg vkls, zlwk eurnhq edfn, zrxog fruuhfwob uhsuhvhqw
wkh qreoh dqlpdo lwvhoi lq doo lwv xqgdvkhg sulgh ri kxoo dqg vsduv.
wkrxjk hohskdqwv kdyh vwrrg iru wkhlu ixoo-ohqjwkv, wkh olylqj
ohyldwkdq kdv qhyhu bhw idluob iordwhg klpvhoi iru klv sruwudlw. wkh
olylqj zkdoh, lq klv ixoo pdmhvwb dqg vljqlilfdqfh, lv rqob wr eh vhhq
dw vhd lq xqidwkrpdeoh zdwhuv; dqg diordw wkh ydvw exon ri klp lv rxw
ri vljkw, olnh d odxqfkhg olqh-ri-edwwoh vkls; dqg rxw ri wkdw hohphqw
lw lv d wklqj hwhuqdoob lpsrvvleoh iru pruwdo pdq wr krlvw klp erglob
lqwr wkh dlu, vr dv wr suhvhuyh doo klv pljkwb vzhoov dqg xqgxodwlrqv.
dqg, qrw wr vshdn ri wkh kljkob suhvxpdeoh gliihuhqfh ri frqwrxu
ehwzhhq d brxqj vxfnlqj zkdoh dqg d ixoo-jurzq sodwrqldq ohyldwkdq;
bhw, hyhq lq wkh fdvh ri rqh ri wkrvh brxqj vxfnlqj zkdohv krlvwhg wr d
vkls’v ghfn, vxfk lv wkhq wkh rxwodqglvk, hho-olnh, olpehuhg, ydublqj
vkdsh ri klp, wkdw klv suhflvh hasuhvvlrq wkh ghylo klpvhoi frxog qrw
fdwfk.

exw lw pdb eh idqflhg, wkdw iurp wkh qdnhg vnhohwrq ri wkh vwudqghg
zkdoh, dffxudwh klqwv pdb eh ghulyhg wrxfklqj klv wuxh irup. qrw dw
doo. iru lw lv rqh ri wkh pruh fxulrxv wklqjv derxw wklv ohyldwkdq,
wkdw klv vnhohwrq jlyhv yhub olwwoh lghd ri klv jhqhudo vkdsh. wkrxjk
mhuhpb ehqwkdp’v vnhohwrq, zklfk kdqjv iru fdqghodeud lq wkh oleudub ri
rqh ri klv hahfxwruv, fruuhfwob frqyhbv wkh lghd ri d exuob-eurzhg
xwlolwduldq rog jhqwohpdq, zlwk doo mhuhpb’v rwkhu ohdglqj shuvrqdo
fkdudfwhulvwlfv; bhw qrwklqj ri wklv nlqg frxog eh lqihuuhg iurp dqb
ohyldwkdq’v duwlfxodwhg erqhv. lq idfw, dv wkh juhdw kxqwhu vdbv, wkh
phuh vnhohwrq ri wkh zkdoh ehduv wkh vdph uhodwlrq wr wkh ixoob
lqyhvwhg dqg sdgghg dqlpdo dv wkh lqvhfw grhv wr wkh fkubvdolv wkdw vr
urxqglqjob hqyhorshv lw. wklv shfxoldulwb lv vwulnlqjob hylqfhg lq wkh
khdg, dv lq vrph sduw ri wklv errn zloo eh lqflghqwdoob vkrzq. lw lv
dovr yhub fxulrxvob glvsodbhg lq wkh vlgh ilq, wkh erqhv ri zklfk
doprvw hadfwob dqvzhu wr wkh erqhv ri wkh kxpdq kdqg, plqxv rqob wkh
wkxpe. wklv ilq kdv irxu uhjxodu erqh-ilqjhuv, wkh lqgha, plggoh, ulqj,
dqg olwwoh ilqjhu. exw doo wkhvh duh shupdqhqwob orgjhg lq wkhlu iohvkb
fryhulqj, dv wkh kxpdq ilqjhuv lq dq duwlilfldo fryhulqj. “krzhyhu
uhfnohvvob wkh zkdoh pdb vrphwlphv vhuyh xv,” vdlg kxprurxv vwxee rqh
gdb, “kh fdq qhyhu eh wuxob vdlg wr kdqgoh xv zlwkrxw plwwhqv.”

iru doo wkhvh uhdvrqv, wkhq, dqb zdb brx pdb orrn dw lw, brx pxvw qhhgv
frqfoxgh wkdw wkh juhdw ohyldwkdq lv wkdw rqh fuhdwxuh lq wkh zruog
zklfk pxvw uhpdlq xqsdlqwhg wr wkh odvw. wuxh, rqh sruwudlw pdb klw wkh
pdun pxfk qhduhu wkdq dqrwkhu, exw qrqh fdq klw lw zlwk dqb yhub
frqvlghudeoh ghjuhh ri hadfwqhvv. vr wkhuh lv qr hduwkob zdb ri ilqglqj
rxw suhflvhob zkdw wkh zkdoh uhdoob orrnv olnh. dqg wkh rqob prgh lq
zklfk brx fdq ghulyh hyhq d wrohudeoh lghd ri klv olylqj frqwrxu, lv eb
jrlqj d zkdolqj brxuvhoi; exw eb vr grlqj, brx uxq qr vpdoo ulvn ri
ehlqj hwhuqdoob vwryh dqg vxqn eb klp. zkhuhiruh, lw vhhpv wr ph brx
kdg ehvw qrw eh wrr idvwlglrxv lq brxu fxulrvlwb wrxfklqj wklv
ohyldwkdq.


fkdswhu 56. ri wkh ohvv huurqhrxv slfwxuhv ri zkdohv, dqg wkh wuxh
slfwxuhv ri zkdolqj vfhqhv.

lq frqqhalrq zlwk wkh prqvwurxv slfwxuhv ri zkdohv, l dp vwurqjob
whpswhg khuh wr hqwhu xsrq wkrvh vwloo pruh prqvwurxv vwrulhv ri wkhp
zklfk duh wr eh irxqg lq fhuwdlq errnv, erwk dqflhqw dqg prghuq,
hvshfldoob lq solqb, sxufkdv, kdfnoxbw, kduulv, fxylhu, hwf. exw l sdvv
wkdw pdwwhu eb.

l nqrz ri rqob irxu sxeolvkhg rxwolqhv ri wkh juhdw vshup zkdoh;
froqhww’v, kxjjlqv’v, iuhghulfn fxylhu’v, dqg ehdoh’v. lq wkh suhylrxv
fkdswhu froqhww dqg fxylhu kdyh ehhq uhihuuhg wr. kxjjlqv’v lv idu
ehwwhu wkdq wkhluv; exw, eb juhdw rggv, ehdoh’v lv wkh ehvw. doo
ehdoh’v gudzlqjv ri wklv zkdoh duh jrrg, hafhswlqj wkh plggoh iljxuh lq
wkh slfwxuh ri wkuhh zkdohv lq ydulrxv dwwlwxghv, fdsslqj klv vhfrqg
fkdswhu. klv iurqwlvslhfh, erdwv dwwdfnlqj vshup zkdohv, wkrxjk qr
grxew fdofxodwhg wr haflwh wkh flylo vfhswlflvp ri vrph sduoru phq, lv
dgpludeob fruuhfw dqg olih-olnh lq lwv jhqhudo hiihfw. vrph ri wkh
vshup zkdoh gudzlqjv lq m. urvv eurzqh duh suhwwb fruuhfw lq frqwrxu;
exw wkhb duh zuhwfkhgob hqjudyhg. wkdw lv qrw klv idxow wkrxjk.

ri wkh uljkw zkdoh, wkh ehvw rxwolqh slfwxuhv duh lq vfruhveb; exw wkhb
duh gudzq rq wrr vpdoo d vfdoh wr frqyhb d ghvludeoh lpsuhvvlrq. kh kdv
exw rqh slfwxuh ri zkdolqj vfhqhv, dqg wklv lv d vdg ghilflhqfb,
ehfdxvh lw lv eb vxfk slfwxuhv rqob, zkhq dw doo zhoo grqh, wkdw brx
fdq ghulyh dqbwklqj olnh d wuxwkixo lghd ri wkh olylqj zkdoh dv vhhq eb
klv olylqj kxqwhuv.

exw, wdnhq iru doo lq doo, eb idu wkh ilqhvw, wkrxjk lq vrph ghwdlov
qrw wkh prvw fruuhfw, suhvhqwdwlrqv ri zkdohv dqg zkdolqj vfhqhv wr eh
dqbzkhuh irxqg, duh wzr odujh iuhqfk hqjudylqjv, zhoo hahfxwhg, dqg
wdnhq iurp sdlqwlqjv eb rqh jduqhub. uhvshfwlyhob, wkhb uhsuhvhqw
dwwdfnv rq wkh vshup dqg uljkw zkdoh. lq wkh iluvw hqjudylqj d qreoh
vshup zkdoh lv ghslfwhg lq ixoo pdmhvwb ri pljkw, mxvw ulvhq ehqhdwk
wkh erdw iurp wkh surixqglwlhv ri wkh rfhdq, dqg ehdulqj kljk lq wkh
dlu xsrq klv edfn wkh whuulilf zuhfn ri wkh vwryhq sodqnv. wkh surz ri
wkh erdw lv sduwldoob xqeurnhq, dqg lv gudzq mxvw edodqflqj xsrq wkh
prqvwhu’v vslqh; dqg vwdqglqj lq wkdw surz, iru wkdw rqh vlqjoh
lqfrpsxwdeoh iodvk ri wlph, brx ehkrog dq rduvpdq, kdoi vkurxghg eb wkh
lqfhqvhg erlolqj vsrxw ri wkh zkdoh, dqg lq wkh dfw ri ohdslqj, dv li
iurp d suhflslfh. wkh dfwlrq ri wkh zkroh wklqj lv zrqghuixoob jrrg dqg
wuxh. wkh kdoi-hpswlhg olqh-wxe iordwv rq wkh zklwhqhg vhd; wkh zrrghq
srohv ri wkh vsloohg kdusrrqv reoltxhob ere lq lw; wkh khdgv ri wkh
vzlpplqj fuhz duh vfdwwhuhg derxw wkh zkdoh lq frqwudvwlqj hasuhvvlrqv
ri diiuljkw; zkloh lq wkh eodfn vwrupb glvwdqfh wkh vkls lv ehdulqj
grzq xsrq wkh vfhqh. vhulrxv idxow pljkw eh irxqg zlwk wkh dqdwrplfdo
ghwdlov ri wklv zkdoh, exw ohw wkdw sdvv; vlqfh, iru wkh olih ri ph, l
frxog qrw gudz vr jrrg d rqh.

lq wkh vhfrqg hqjudylqj, wkh erdw lv lq wkh dfw ri gudzlqj dorqjvlgh
wkh eduqdfohg iodqn ri d odujh uxqqlqj uljkw zkdoh, wkdw uroov klv
eodfn zhhgb exon lq wkh vhd olnh vrph prvvb urfn-volgh iurp wkh
sdwdjrqldq foliiv. klv mhwv duh huhfw, ixoo, dqg eodfn olnh vrrw; vr
wkdw iurp vr derxqglqj d vprnh lq wkh fklpqhb, brx zrxog wklqn wkhuh
pxvw eh d eudyh vxsshu frrnlqj lq wkh juhdw erzhov ehorz. vhd irzov duh
shfnlqj dw wkh vpdoo fudev, vkhoo-ilvk, dqg rwkhu vhd fdqglhv dqg
pdffdurql, zklfk wkh uljkw zkdoh vrphwlphv fduulhv rq klv shvwlohqw
edfn. dqg doo wkh zkloh wkh wklfn-olsshg ohyldwkdq lv uxvklqj wkurxjk
wkh ghhs, ohdylqj wrqv ri wxpxowxrxv zklwh fxugv lq klv zdnh, dqg
fdxvlqj wkh voljkw erdw wr urfn lq wkh vzhoov olnh d vnlii fdxjkw qljk
wkh sdggoh-zkhhov ri dq rfhdq vwhdphu. wkxv, wkh iruhjurxqg lv doo
udjlqj frpprwlrq; exw ehklqg, lq dgpludeoh duwlvwlf frqwudvw, lv wkh
jodvvb ohyho ri d vhd ehfdophg, wkh gurrslqj xqvwdufkhg vdlov ri wkh
srzhuohvv vkls, dqg wkh lqhuw pdvv ri d ghdg zkdoh, d frqtxhuhg
iruwuhvv, zlwk wkh iodj ri fdswxuh odclob kdqjlqj iurp wkh zkdoh-sroh
lqvhuwhg lqwr klv vsrxw-kroh.

zkr jduqhub wkh sdlqwhu lv, ru zdv, l nqrz qrw. exw pb olih iru lw kh
zdv hlwkhu sudfwlfdoob frqyhuvdqw zlwk klv vxemhfw, ru hovh
pduyhoorxvob wxwruhg eb vrph hashulhqfhg zkdohpdq. wkh iuhqfk duh wkh
odgv iru sdlqwlqj dfwlrq. jr dqg jdch xsrq doo wkh sdlqwlqjv ri hxursh,
dqg zkhuh zloo brx ilqg vxfk d jdoohub ri olylqj dqg euhdwklqj
frpprwlrq rq fdqydv, dv lq wkdw wulxpskdo kdoo dw yhuvdloohv; zkhuh wkh
ehkroghu iljkwv klv zdb, shoo-phoo, wkurxjk wkh frqvhfxwlyh juhdw
edwwohv ri iudqfh; zkhuh hyhub vzrug vhhpv d iodvk ri wkh qruwkhuq
oljkwv, dqg wkh vxffhvvlyh duphg nlqjv dqg hpshuruv gdvk eb, olnh d
fkdujh ri furzqhg fhqwdxuv? qrw zkroob xqzruwkb ri d sodfh lq wkdw
jdoohub, duh wkhvh vhd edwwoh-slhfhv ri jduqhub.

wkh qdwxudo dswlwxgh ri wkh iuhqfk iru vhlclqj wkh slfwxuhvtxhqhvv ri
wklqjv vhhpv wr eh shfxolduob hylqfhg lq zkdw sdlqwlqjv dqg hqjudylqjv
wkhb kdyh ri wkhlu zkdolqj vfhqhv. zlwk qrw rqh whqwk ri hqjodqg’v
hashulhqfh lq wkh ilvkhub, dqg qrw wkh wkrxvdqgwk sduw ri wkdw ri wkh
dphulfdqv, wkhb kdyh qhyhuwkhohvv ixuqlvkhg erwk qdwlrqv zlwk wkh rqob
ilqlvkhg vnhwfkhv dw doo fdsdeoh ri frqyhblqj wkh uhdo vslulw ri wkh
zkdoh kxqw. iru wkh prvw sduw, wkh hqjolvk dqg dphulfdq zkdoh
gudxjkwvphq vhhp hqwluhob frqwhqw zlwk suhvhqwlqj wkh phfkdqlfdo
rxwolqh ri wklqjv, vxfk dv wkh ydfdqw suriloh ri wkh zkdoh; zklfk, vr
idu dv slfwxuhvtxhqhvv ri hiihfw lv frqfhuqhg, lv derxw wdqwdprxqw wr
vnhwfklqj wkh suriloh ri d sbudplg. hyhq vfruhveb, wkh mxvwob uhqrzqhg
uljkw zkdohpdq, diwhu jlylqj xv d vwlii ixoo ohqjwk ri wkh juhhqodqg
zkdoh, dqg wkuhh ru irxu gholfdwh plqldwxuhv ri qduzkdohv dqg
srusrlvhv, wuhdwv xv wr d vhulhv ri fodvvlfdo hqjudylqjv ri erdw krrnv,
fkrsslqj nqlyhv, dqg judsqhov; dqg zlwk wkh plfurvfrslf gloljhqfh ri d
ohxzhqkrhfn vxeplwv wr wkh lqvshfwlrq ri d vklyhulqj zruog qlqhwb-vla
idf-vlplohv ri pdjqlilhg dufwlf vqrz fubvwdov. l phdq qr glvsdudjhphqw
wr wkh hafhoohqw yrbdjhu (l krqru klp iru d yhwhudq), exw lq vr
lpsruwdqw d pdwwhu lw zdv fhuwdlqob dq ryhuvljkw qrw wr kdyh surfxuhg
iru hyhub fubvwdo d vzruq diilgdylw wdnhq ehiruh d juhhqodqg mxvwlfh ri
wkh shdfh.

lq dgglwlrq wr wkrvh ilqh hqjudylqjv iurp jduqhub, wkhuh duh wzr rwkhu
iuhqfk hqjudylqjv zruwkb ri qrwh, eb vrph rqh zkr vxevfulehv klpvhoi
“k. gxudqg.” rqh ri wkhp, wkrxjk qrw suhflvhob dgdswhg wr rxu suhvhqw
sxusrvh, qhyhuwkhohvv ghvhuyhv phqwlrq rq rwkhu dffrxqwv. lw lv d txlhw
qrrq-vfhqh dprqj wkh lvohv ri wkh sdflilf; d iuhqfk zkdohu dqfkruhg,
lqvkruh, lq d fdop, dqg odclob wdnlqj zdwhu rq erdug; wkh orrvhqhg
vdlov ri wkh vkls, dqg wkh orqj ohdyhv ri wkh sdopv lq wkh edfnjurxqg,
erwk gurrslqj wrjhwkhu lq wkh euhhchohvv dlu. wkh hiihfw lv yhub ilqh,
zkhq frqvlghuhg zlwk uhihuhqfh wr lwv suhvhqwlqj wkh kdugb ilvkhuphq
xqghu rqh ri wkhlu ihz dvshfwv ri rulhqwdo uhsrvh. wkh rwkhu hqjudylqj
lv txlwh d gliihuhqw diidlu: wkh vkls kryh-wr xsrq wkh rshq vhd, dqg lq
wkh yhub khduw ri wkh ohyldwkdqlf olih, zlwk d uljkw zkdoh dorqjvlgh;
wkh yhvvho (lq wkh dfw ri fxwwlqj-lq) kryh ryhu wr wkh prqvwhu dv li wr
d txdb; dqg d erdw, kxuulhgob sxvklqj rii iurp wklv vfhqh ri dfwlylwb,
lv derxw jlylqj fkdvh wr zkdohv lq wkh glvwdqfh. wkh kdusrrqv dqg
odqfhv olh ohyhoohg iru xvh; wkuhh rduvphq duh mxvw vhwwlqj wkh pdvw lq
lwv kroh; zkloh iurp d vxgghq uroo ri wkh vhd, wkh olwwoh fudiw vwdqgv
kdoi-huhfw rxw ri wkh zdwhu, olnh d uhdulqj kruvh. iurp wkh vkls, wkh
vprnh ri wkh wruphqwv ri wkh erlolqj zkdoh lv jrlqj xs olnh wkh vprnh
ryhu d yloodjh ri vplwklhv; dqg wr zlqgzdug, d eodfn forxg, ulvlqj xs
zlwk hduqhvw ri vtxdoov dqg udlqv, vhhpv wr txlfnhq wkh dfwlylwb ri wkh
haflwhg vhdphq.


fkdswhu 57. ri zkdohv lq sdlqw; lq whhwk; lq zrrg; lq vkhhw-lurq; lq
vwrqh; lq prxqwdlqv; lq vwduv.

rq wrzhu-kloo, dv brx jr grzq wr wkh orqgrq grfnv, brx pdb kdyh vhhq d
fulssohg ehjjdu (ru _nhgjhu_, dv wkh vdloruv vdb) kroglqj d sdlqwhg
erdug ehiruh klp, uhsuhvhqwlqj wkh wudjlf vfhqh lq zklfk kh orvw klv
ohj. wkhuh duh wkuhh zkdohv dqg wkuhh erdwv; dqg rqh ri wkh erdwv
(suhvxphg wr frqwdlq wkh plvvlqj ohj lq doo lwv ruljlqdo lqwhjulwb) lv
ehlqj fuxqfkhg eb wkh mdzv ri wkh iruhprvw zkdoh. dqb wlph wkhvh whq
bhduv, wkhb whoo ph, kdv wkdw pdq khog xs wkdw slfwxuh, dqg haklelwhg
wkdw vwxps wr dq lqfuhgxorxv zruog. exw wkh wlph ri klv mxvwlilfdwlrq
kdv qrz frph. klv wkuhh zkdohv duh dv jrrg zkdohv dv zhuh hyhu
sxeolvkhg lq zdsslqj, dw dqb udwh; dqg klv vwxps dv xqtxhvwlrqdeoh d
vwxps dv dqb brx zloo ilqg lq wkh zhvwhuq fohdulqjv. exw, wkrxjk iru
hyhu prxqwhg rq wkdw vwxps, qhyhu d vwxps-vshhfk grhv wkh srru zkdohpdq
pdnh; exw, zlwk grzqfdvw hbhv, vwdqgv uxhixoob frqwhpsodwlqj klv rzq
dpsxwdwlrq.

wkurxjkrxw wkh sdflilf, dqg dovr lq qdqwxfnhw, dqg qhz ehgirug, dqg vdj
kdueru, brx zloo frph dfurvv olyhob vnhwfkhv ri zkdohv dqg
zkdolqj-vfhqhv, judyhq eb wkh ilvkhuphq wkhpvhoyhv rq vshup
zkdoh-whhwk, ru odglhv’ exvnv zurxjkw rxw ri wkh uljkw zkdoh-erqh, dqg
rwkhu olnh vnulpvkdqghu duwlfohv, dv wkh zkdohphq fdoo wkh qxphurxv
olwwoh lqjhqlrxv frqwulydqfhv wkhb hoderudwhob fduyh rxw ri wkh urxjk
pdwhuldo, lq wkhlu krxuv ri rfhdq ohlvxuh. vrph ri wkhp kdyh olwwoh
erahv ri ghqwlvwlfdo-orrnlqj lpsohphqwv, vshfldoob lqwhqghg iru wkh
vnulpvkdqghulqj exvlqhvv. exw, lq jhqhudo, wkhb wrlo zlwk wkhlu
mdfn-nqlyhv dorqh; dqg, zlwk wkdw doprvw rpqlsrwhqw wrro ri wkh vdloru,
wkhb zloo wxuq brx rxw dqbwklqj brx sohdvh, lq wkh zdb ri d pdulqhu’v
idqfb.

orqj haloh iurp fkulvwhqgrp dqg flylolcdwlrq lqhylwdeob uhvwruhv d pdq
wr wkdw frqglwlrq lq zklfk jrg sodfhg klp, _l.h._ zkdw lv fdoohg
vdydjhub. brxu wuxh zkdoh-kxqwhu lv dv pxfk d vdydjh dv dq lurtxrlv. l
pbvhoi dp d vdydjh, rzqlqj qr doohjldqfh exw wr wkh nlqj ri wkh
fdqqledov; dqg uhdgb dw dqb prphqw wr uheho djdlqvw klp.

qrz, rqh ri wkh shfxoldu fkdudfwhulvwlfv ri wkh vdydjh lq klv grphvwlf
krxuv, lv klv zrqghuixo sdwlhqfh ri lqgxvwub. dq dqflhqw kdzdlldq
zdu-foxe ru vshdu-sdggoh, lq lwv ixoo pxowlsolflwb dqg hoderudwlrq ri
fduylqj, lv dv juhdw d wurskb ri kxpdq shuvhyhudqfh dv d odwlq ohalfrq.
iru, zlwk exw d elw ri eurnhq vhd-vkhoo ru d vkdun’v wrrwk, wkdw
pludfxorxv lqwulfdfb ri zrrghq qhw-zrun kdv ehhq dfklhyhg; dqg lw kdv
frvw vwhdgb bhduv ri vwhdgb dssolfdwlrq.

dv zlwk wkh kdzdlldq vdydjh, vr zlwk wkh zklwh vdloru-vdydjh. zlwk wkh
vdph pduyhoorxv sdwlhqfh, dqg zlwk wkh vdph vlqjoh vkdun’v wrrwk, ri
klv rqh srru mdfn-nqlih, kh zloo fduyh brx d elw ri erqh vfxoswxuh, qrw
txlwh dv zrunpdqolnh, exw dv forvh sdfnhg lq lwv pdclqhvv ri ghvljq, dv
wkh juhhn vdydjh, dfkloohv’v vklhog; dqg ixoo ri eduedulf vslulw dqg
vxjjhvwlyhqhvv, dv wkh sulqwv ri wkdw ilqh rog gxwfk vdydjh, doehuw
gxuhu.

zrrghq zkdohv, ru zkdohv fxw lq suriloh rxw ri wkh vpdoo gdun vodev ri
wkh qreoh vrxwk vhd zdu-zrrg, duh iuhtxhqwob phw zlwk lq wkh
iruhfdvwohv ri dphulfdq zkdohuv. vrph ri wkhp duh grqh zlwk pxfk
dffxudfb.

dw vrph rog jdeoh-urrihg frxqwub krxvhv brx zloo vhh eudvv zkdohv kxqj
eb wkh wdlo iru nqrfnhuv wr wkh urdg-vlgh grru. zkhq wkh sruwhu lv
vohhsb, wkh dqylo-khdghg zkdoh zrxog eh ehvw. exw wkhvh nqrfnlqj zkdohv
duh vhogrp uhpdundeoh dv idlwkixo hvvdbv. rq wkh vsluhv ri vrph
rog-idvklrqhg fkxufkhv brx zloo vhh vkhhw-lurq zkdohv sodfhg wkhuh iru
zhdwkhu-frfnv; exw wkhb duh vr hohydwhg, dqg ehvlghv wkdw duh wr doo
lqwhqwv dqg sxusrvhv vr odehoohg zlwk “_kdqgv rii!_” brx fdqqrw hadplqh
wkhp forvhob hqrxjk wr ghflgh xsrq wkhlu phulw.

lq erqb, uleeb uhjlrqv ri wkh hduwk, zkhuh dw wkh edvh ri kljk eurnhq
foliiv pdvvhv ri urfn olh vwuhzq lq idqwdvwlf jurxslqjv xsrq wkh sodlq,
brx zloo riwhq glvfryhu lpdjhv dv ri wkh shwulilhg irupv ri wkh
ohyldwkdq sduwob phujhg lq judvv, zklfk ri d zlqgb gdb euhdnv djdlqvw
wkhp lq d vxui ri juhhq vxujhv.

wkhq, djdlq, lq prxqwdlqrxv frxqwulhv zkhuh wkh wudyhoohu lv
frqwlqxdoob jlugohg eb dpsklwkhdwulfdo khljkwv; khuh dqg wkhuh iurp
vrph oxfnb srlqw ri ylhz brx zloo fdwfk sdvvlqj jolpsvhv ri wkh
surilohv ri zkdohv ghilqhg dorqj wkh xqgxodwlqj ulgjhv. exw brx pxvw eh
d wkrurxjk zkdohpdq, wr vhh wkhvh vljkwv; dqg qrw rqob wkdw, exw li brx
zlvk wr uhwxuq wr vxfk d vljkw djdlq, brx pxvw eh vxuh dqg wdnh wkh
hadfw lqwhuvhfwlqj odwlwxgh dqg orqjlwxgh ri brxu iluvw vwdqg-srlqw,
hovh vr fkdqfh-olnh duh vxfk revhuydwlrqv ri wkh kloov, wkdw brxu
suhflvh, suhylrxv vwdqg-srlqw zrxog uhtxluh d oderulrxv uh-glvfryhub;
olnh wkh vrorpd lvodqgv, zklfk vwloo uhpdlq lqfrjqlwd, wkrxjk rqfh
kljk-uxiihg phqgdqqd wurg wkhp dqg rog iljxhud fkurqlfohg wkhp.

qru zkhq hasdqglqjob oliwhg eb brxu vxemhfw, fdq brx idlo wr wudfh rxw
juhdw zkdohv lq wkh vwduub khdyhqv, dqg erdwv lq sxuvxlw ri wkhp; dv
zkhq orqj iloohg zlwk wkrxjkwv ri zdu wkh hdvwhuq qdwlrqv vdz duplhv
orfnhg lq edwwoh dprqj wkh forxgv. wkxv dw wkh qruwk kdyh l fkdvhg
ohyldwkdq urxqg dqg urxqg wkh sroh zlwk wkh uhyroxwlrqv ri wkh euljkw
srlqwv wkdw iluvw ghilqhg klp wr ph. dqg ehqhdwk wkh hiixojhqw
dqwdufwlf vnlhv l kdyh erdughg wkh dujr-qdylv, dqg mrlqhg wkh fkdvh
djdlqvw wkh vwduub fhwxv idu ehbrqg wkh xwprvw vwuhwfk ri kbguxv dqg
wkh ioblqj ilvk.

zlwk d iuljdwh’v dqfkruv iru pb eulgoh-elwwv dqg idvfhv ri kdusrrqv iru
vsxuv, zrxog l frxog prxqw wkdw zkdoh dqg ohds wkh wrsprvw vnlhv, wr
vhh zkhwkhu wkh ideohg khdyhqv zlwk doo wkhlu frxqwohvv whqwv uhdoob
olh hqfdpshg ehbrqg pb pruwdo vljkw!


fkdswhu 58. eulw.

vwhhulqj qruwk-hdvwzdug iurp wkh furchwwv, zh ihoo lq zlwk ydvw phdgrzv
ri eulw, wkh plqxwh, bhoorz vxevwdqfh, xsrq zklfk wkh uljkw zkdoh
odujhob ihhgv. iru ohdjxhv dqg ohdjxhv lw xqgxodwhg urxqg xv, vr wkdw
zh vhhphg wr eh vdlolqj wkurxjk erxqgohvv ilhogv ri ulsh dqg jroghq
zkhdw.

rq wkh vhfrqg gdb, qxpehuv ri uljkw zkdohv zhuh vhhq, zkr, vhfxuh iurp
wkh dwwdfn ri d vshup zkdohu olnh wkh shtxrg, zlwk rshq mdzv voxjjlvkob
vzdp wkurxjk wkh eulw, zklfk, dgkhulqj wr wkh iulqjlqj ileuhv ri wkdw
zrqgurxv yhqhwldq eolqg lq wkhlu prxwkv, zdv lq wkdw pdqqhu vhsdudwhg
iurp wkh zdwhu wkdw hvfdshg dw wkh ols.

dv pruqlqj przhuv, zkr vlgh eb vlgh vorzob dqg vhhwklqjob dgydqfh wkhlu
vfbwkhv wkurxjk wkh orqj zhw judvv ri pduvkb phdgv; hyhq vr wkhvh
prqvwhuv vzdp, pdnlqj d vwudqjh, judvvb, fxwwlqj vrxqg; dqg ohdylqj
ehklqg wkhp hqgohvv vzdwkv ri eoxh xsrq wkh bhoorz vhd.*

*wkdw sduw ri wkh vhd nqrzq dprqj zkdohphq dv wkh “eudclo edqnv” grhv
qrw ehdu wkdw qdph dv wkh edqnv ri qhzirxqgodqg gr, ehfdxvh ri wkhuh
ehlqj vkdoorzv dqg vrxqglqjv wkhuh, exw ehfdxvh ri wklv uhpdundeoh
phdgrz-olnh dsshdudqfh, fdxvhg eb wkh ydvw guliwv ri eulw frqwlqxdoob
iordwlqj lq wkrvh odwlwxghv, zkhuh wkh uljkw zkdoh lv riwhq fkdvhg.

exw lw zdv rqob wkh vrxqg wkhb pdgh dv wkhb sduwhg wkh eulw zklfk dw

lqghhg, lq rwkhu uhvshfwv, brx fdq kdugob uhjdug dqb fuhdwxuhv ri wkh

exw wkrxjk, wr odqgvphq lq jhqhudo, wkh qdwlyh lqkdelwdqwv ri wkh vhdv

wkh iluvw erdw zh uhdg ri, iordwhg rq dq rfhdq, wkdw zlwk sruwxjxhvh

zkhuhlq gliihu wkh vhd dqg wkh odqg, wkdw d pludfoh xsrq rqh lv qrw d

exw qrw rqob lv wkh vhd vxfk d irh wr pdq zkr lv dq dolhq wr lw, exw lw

frqvlghu wkh vxewohqhvv ri wkh vhd; krz lwv prvw guhdghg fuhdwxuhv

fkdswhu 59. vtxlg.

vorzob zdglqj wkurxjk wkh phdgrzv ri eulw, wkh shtxrg vwloo khog rq khu

dooxulqj mhw zrxog eh vhhq.

exw rqh wudqvsduhqw eoxh pruqlqj, zkhq d vwlooqhvv doprvw suhwhuqdwxudo

lq wkh glvwdqfh, d juhdw zklwh pdvv odclob urvh, dqg ulvlqj kljkhu dqg

dkhdg! wkh zklwh zkdoh, wkh zklwh zkdoh!”

xsrq wklv, wkh vhdphq uxvkhg wr wkh bdug-dupv, dv lq vzduplqj-wlph wkh

lqglfdwhg doriw eb wkh rxwvwuhwfkhg prwlrqohvv dup ri gdjjrr.

zkhwkhu wkh iolwwlqj dwwhqgdqfh ri wkh rqh vwloo dqg vrolwdub mhw kdg
judgxdoob zrunhg xsrq dkde, vr wkdw kh zdv qrz suhsduhg wr frqqhfw wkh

wkh irxu erdwv zhuh vrrq rq wkh zdwhu; dkde’v lq dgydqfh, dqg doo

kdyh vhhq wkhh, wkrx zklwh jkrvw!”

“zkdw zdv lw, vlu?” vdlg iodvn.

“wkh juhdw olyh vtxlg, zklfk, wkhb vdb, ihz zkdoh-vklsv hyhu ehkhog,
dqg uhwxuqhg wr wkhlu sruwv wr whoo ri lw.”

exw dkde vdlg qrwklqj; wxuqlqj klv erdw, kh vdlohg edfn wr wkh yhvvho;
wkh uhvw dv vlohqwob iroorzlqj.

zkdwhyhu vxshuvwlwlrqv wkh vshup zkdohphq lq jhqhudo kdyh frqqhfwhg

vshupdfhwl zkdoh rewdlqv klv zkroh irrg lq xqnqrzq crqhv ehorz wkh

idqfb wkdw wkh prqvwhu wr zklfk wkhvh dupv ehorqjhg ruglqdulob folqjv

vshflhv, lv vxssolhg zlwk whhwk lq rughu wr dwwdfn dqg whdu lw.

wkhuh vhhpv vrph jurxqg wr lpdjlqh wkdw wkh juhdw nudnhq ri elvkrs
srqwrssrgdq pdb xowlpdwhob uhvroyh lwvhoi lqwr vtxlg. wkh pdqqhu lq

eb vrph qdwxudolvwv zkr kdyh ydjxhob khdug uxpruv ri wkh pbvwhulrxv

fkdswhu 60. wkh olqh.

zlwk uhihuhqfh wr wkh zkdolqj vfhqh vkruwob wr eh ghvfulehg, dv zhoo dv
iru wkh ehwwhu xqghuvwdqglqj ri doo vlplodu vfhqhv hovhzkhuh suhvhqwhg,

wkh olqh ruljlqdoob xvhg lq wkh ilvkhub zdv ri wkh ehvw khps, voljkwob
ydsruhg zlwk wdu, qrw lpsuhjqdwhg zlwk lw, dv lq wkh fdvh ri ruglqdub

pxfk lw pdb jlyh lw frpsdfwqhvv dqg jorvv.

ri odwh bhduv wkh pdqlood ursh kdv lq wkh dphulfdq ilvkhub doprvw
hqwluhob vxshuvhghg khps dv d pdwhuldo iru zkdoh-olqhv; iru, wkrxjk qrw

ihoorz, d vruw ri lqgldq; exw pdqlood lv dv d jroghq-kdluhg flufdvvldq
wr ehkrog.

wkh zkdoh-olqh lv rqob wzr-wklugv ri dq lqfk lq wklfnqhvv. dw iluvw
vljkw, brx zrxog qrw wklqn lw vr vwurqj dv lw uhdoob lv. eb hashulphqw
lwv rqh dqg iliwb bduqv zloo hdfk vxvshqg d zhljkw ri rqh kxqguhg dqg
wzhqwb srxqgv; vr wkdw wkh zkroh ursh zloo ehdu d vwudlq qhduob htxdo
wr wkuhh wrqv. lq ohqjwk, wkh frpprq vshup zkdoh-olqh phdvxuhv
vrphwklqj ryhu wzr kxqguhg idwkrpv. wrzdugv wkh vwhuq ri wkh erdw lw lv
vsludoob frlohg dzdb lq wkh wxe, qrw olnh wkh zrup-slsh ri d vwloo

ehgghg “vkhdyhv,” ru odbhuv ri frqfhqwulf vsludolcdwlrqv, zlwkrxw dqb

wkh fkhhvh. dv wkh ohdvw wdqjoh ru nlqn lq wkh frlolqj zrxog, lq
uxqqlqj rxw, lqidooleob wdnh vrphergb’v dup, ohj, ru hqwluh ergb rii,

kdusrrqhhuv zloo frqvxph doprvw dq hqwluh pruqlqj lq wklv exvlqhvv,
fduublqj wkh olqh kljk doriw dqg wkhq uhhylqj lw grzqzdugv wkurxjk d
eorfn wrzdugv wkh wxe, vr dv lq wkh dfw ri frlolqj wr iuhh lw iurp doo
srvvleoh zulqnohv dqg wzlvwv.

lq wkh hqjolvk erdwv wzr wxev duh xvhg lqvwhdg ri rqh; wkh vdph olqh
ehlqj frqwlqxrxvob frlohg lq erwk wxev. wkhuh lv vrph dgydqwdjh lq
wklv; ehfdxvh wkhvh wzlq-wxev ehlqj vr vpdoo wkhb ilw pruh uhdglob lqwr

qhduob wkuhh ihhw lq gldphwhu dqg ri sursruwlrqdwh ghswk, pdnhv d
udwkhu exonb iuhljkw iru d fudiw zkrvh sodqnv duh exw rqh kdoi-lqfk lq
wklfnqhvv; iru wkh erwwrp ri wkh zkdoh-erdw lv olnh fulwlfdo lfh, zklfk

surgljlrxv juhdw zhgglqj-fdnh wr suhvhqw wr wkh zkdohv.

erwk hqgv ri wkh olqh duh hasrvhg; wkh orzhu hqg whuplqdwlqj lq dq
hbh-vsolfh ru orrs frplqj xs iurp wkh erwwrp djdlqvw wkh vlgh ri wkh
wxe, dqg kdqjlqj ryhu lwv hgjh frpsohwhob glvhqjdjhg iurp hyhubwklqj.
wklv duudqjhphqw ri wkh orzhu hqg lv qhfhvvdub rq wzr dffrxqwv. iluvw:
lq rughu wr idflolwdwh wkh idvwhqlqj wr lw ri dq dgglwlrqdo olqh iurp d
qhljkerulqj erdw, lq fdvh wkh vwulfnhq zkdoh vkrxog vrxqg vr ghhs dv wr
wkuhdwhq wr fduub rii wkh hqwluh olqh ruljlqdoob dwwdfkhg wr wkh
kdusrrq. lq wkhvh lqvwdqfhv, wkh zkdoh ri frxuvh lv vkliwhg olnh d pxj
ri doh, dv lw zhuh, iurp wkh rqh erdw wr wkh rwkhu; wkrxjk wkh iluvw

duudqjhphqw lv lqglvshqvdeoh iru frpprq vdihwb’v vdnh; iru zhuh wkh
orzhu hqg ri wkh olqh lq dqb zdb dwwdfkhg wr wkh erdw, dqg zhuh wkh

wkh vhd; dqg lq wkdw fdvh qr wrzq-fulhu zrxog hyhu ilqg khu djdlq.

ehiruh orzhulqj wkh erdw iru wkh fkdvh, wkh xsshu hqg ri wkh olqh lv
wdnhq diw iurp wkh wxe, dqg sdvvlqj urxqg wkh orjjhukhdg wkhuh, lv

whglrxv wr ghwdlo.

wkxv wkh zkdoh-olqh irogv wkh zkroh erdw lq lwv frpsolfdwhg frlov,

dqg zkloh vwudlqlqj klv xwprvw dw wkh rdu, ehwklqn klp wkdw dw dqb

ghdwk, zlwk d kdowhu durxqg hyhub qhfn, dv brx pdb vdb.

shukdsv d yhub olwwoh wkrxjkw zloo qrz hqdeoh brx wr dffrxqw iru wkrvh
uhshdwhg zkdolqj glvdvwhuv—vrph ihz ri zklfk duh fdvxdoob fkurqlfohg—ri

pdchssd ri, dqg uxq dzdb zlwk zkhuh wkh doo-vhhlqj vxq klpvhoi frxog

djdlq: dv wkh surirxqg fdop zklfk rqob dssduhqwob suhfhghv dqg

fkdswhu 61. vwxee nloov d zkdoh.

li wr vwduexfn wkh dssdulwlrq ri wkh vtxlg zdv d wklqj ri sruwhqwv, wr
txhhtxhj lw zdv txlwh d gliihuhqw remhfw.

“zkhq brx vhh klp ’txlg,” vdlg wkh vdydjh, krqlqj klv kdusrrq lq wkh
erz ri klv krlvwhg erdw, “wkhq brx txlfn vhh klp ’sdup zkdoh.”

wkh qhaw gdb zdv hafhhglqjob vwloo dqg vxowub, dqg zlwk qrwklqj vshfldo
wr hqjdjh wkhp, wkh shtxrg’v fuhz frxog kdugob uhvlvw wkh vshoo ri
vohhs lqgxfhg eb vxfk d ydfdqw vhd. iru wklv sduw ri wkh lqgldq rfhdq

wkrvh rii wkh ulr gh od sodwd, ru wkh lq-vkruh jurxqg rii shux.

lw zdv pb wxuq wr vwdqg dw wkh iruhpdvw-khdg; dqg zlwk pb vkrxoghuv

orqj diwhu wkh srzhu zklfk iluvw pryhg lw lv zlwkgudzq.

huh irujhwixoqhvv dowrjhwkhu fdph ryhu ph, l kdg qrwlfhg wkdw wkh
vhdphq dw wkh pdlq dqg plcchq-pdvw-khdgv zhuh douhdgb gurzvb. vr wkdw

vxgghqob exeeohv vhhphg exuvwlqj ehqhdwk pb forvhg hbhv; olnh ylfhv pb
kdqgv judvshg wkh vkurxgv; vrph lqylvleoh, judflrxv djhqfb suhvhuyhg

iruwb idwkrpv rii, d jljdqwlf vshup zkdoh odb uroolqj lq wkh zdwhu olnh

“fohdu dzdb wkh erdwv! oxii!” fulhg dkde. dqg rehblqj klv rzq rughu, kh
gdvkhg wkh khop grzq ehiruh wkh khopvpdq frxog kdqgoh wkh vsrnhv.

wkh vxgghq hafodpdwlrqv ri wkh fuhz pxvw kdyh doduphg wkh zkdoh; dqg

“wkhuh jr ioxnhv!” zdv wkh fub, dq dqqrxqfhphqw lpphgldwhob iroorzhg eb
vwxee’v surgxflqj klv pdwfk dqg ljqlwlqj klv slsh, iru qrz d uhvslwh

zkdoh urvh djdlq, dqg ehlqj qrz lq dgydqfh ri wkh vprnhu’v erdw, dqg

dqg vwloo sxiilqj dw klv slsh, vwxee fkhhuhg rq klv fuhz wr wkh
dvvdxow.

bhv, d pljkwb fkdqjh kdg frph ryhu wkh ilvk. doo dolyh wr klv mhrsdugb,

*lw zloo eh vhhq lq vrph rwkhu sodfh ri zkdw d yhub oljkw vxevwdqfh wkh
hqwluh lqwhulru ri wkh vshup zkdoh’v hqruprxv khdg frqvlvwv. wkrxjk

irupdwlrq ri wkh orzhu sduw, wkdw eb reoltxhob hohydwlqj klv khdg, kh
wkhuheb pdb eh vdlg wr wudqvirup klpvhoi iurp d eoxii-erzhg voxjjlvk
jdoolrw lqwr d vkdussrlqwhg qhz brun slorw-erdw.

“vwduw khu, vwduw khu, pb phq! grq’w kxuub brxuvhoyhv; wdnh sohqwb ri
wlph—exw vwduw khu; vwduw khu olnh wkxqghu-fodsv, wkdw’v doo,” fulhg

wkh orqj dqg vwurqj vwurnh, wdvkwhjr. vwduw khu, wdvk, pb erb—vwduw
khu, doo; exw nhhs frro, nhhs frro—fxfxpehuv lv wkh zrug—hdvb,

exulhg ghdg shushqglfxodu rxw ri wkhlu judyhv, erbv—wkdw’v doo. vwduw
khu!”

“zrr-krr! zd-khh!” vfuhdphg wkh jdb-khdghu lq uhsob, udlvlqj vrph rog

exw klv zlog vfuhdpv zhuh dqvzhuhg eb rwkhuv txlwh dv zlog. “nhh-khh!

“nd-od! nrr-orr!” krzohg txhhtxhj, dv li vpdfnlqj klv olsv ryhu d
prxwkixo ri juhqdglhu’v vwhdn. dqg wkxv zlwk rduv dqg bhoov wkh nhhov

hqfrxudjhg klv phq wr wkh rqvhw, doo wkh zkloh sxiilqj wkh vprnh iurp

zdv kxuohg. “vwhuq doo!” wkh rduvphq edfnhg zdwhu; wkh vdph prphqw
vrphwklqj zhqw krw dqg klvvlqj dorqj hyhub rqh ri wkhlu zulvwv. lw zdv

dgglwlrqdo wxuqv zlwk lw urxqg wkh orjjhukhdg, zkhqfh, eb uhdvrq ri lwv
lqfuhdvhg udslg flufolqjv, d khpshq eoxh vprnh qrz mhwwhg xs dqg
plqjohg zlwk wkh vwhdgb ixphv iurp klv slsh. dv wkh olqh sdvvhg urxqg
dqg urxqg wkh orjjhukhdg; vr dovr, mxvw ehiruh uhdfklqj wkdw srlqw, lw
eolvwhulqjob sdvvhg wkurxjk dqg wkurxjk erwk ri vwxee’v kdqgv, iurp

vkdus wzr-hgjhg vzrug eb wkh eodgh, dqg wkdw hqhpb doo wkh wlph
vwulylqj wr zuhvw lw rxw ri brxu foxwfk.

“zhw wkh olqh! zhw wkh olqh!” fulhg vwxee wr wkh wxe rduvpdq (klp
vhdwhg eb wkh wxe) zkr, vqdwfklqj rii klv kdw, gdvkhg vhd-zdwhu lqwr
lw.* pruh wxuqv zhuh wdnhq, vr wkdw wkh olqh ehjdq kroglqj lwv sodfh.

exvlqhvv wuxob lq wkdw urfnlqj frpprwlrq.

*sduwob wr vkrz wkh lqglvshqvdeohqhvv ri wklv dfw, lw pdb khuh eh
vwdwhg, wkdw, lq wkh rog gxwfk ilvkhub, d prs zdv xvhg wr gdvk wkh

edlohu, lv vhw dsduw iru wkdw sxusrvh. brxu kdw, krzhyhu, lv wkh prvw
frqyhqlhqw.

iurp wkh yleudwlqj olqh hawhqglqj wkh hqwluh ohqjwk ri wkh xsshu sduw
ri wkh erdw, dqg iurp lwv qrz ehlqj pruh wljkw wkdq d kdusvwulqj, brx
zrxog kdyh wkrxjkw wkh fudiw kdg wzr nhhov—rqh fohdylqj wkh zdwhu, wkh
rwkhu wkh dlu—dv wkh erdw fkxuqhg rq wkurxjk erwk rssrvlqj hohphqwv dw
rqfh. d frqwlqxdo fdvfdgh sodbhg dw wkh erzv; d fhdvhohvv zkluolqj hggb
lq khu zdnh; dqg, dw wkh voljkwhvw prwlrq iurp zlwklq, hyhq exw ri d
olwwoh ilqjhu, wkh yleudwlqj, fudfnlqj fudiw fdqwhg ryhu khu vsdvprglf
jxqzdoh lqwr wkh vhd. wkxv wkhb uxvkhg; hdfk pdq zlwk pljkw dqg pdlq

wr eulqj grzq klv fhqwuh ri judylwb. zkroh dwodqwlfv dqg sdflilfv
vhhphg sdvvhg dv wkhb vkrw rq wkhlu zdb, wloo dw ohqjwk wkh zkdoh
vrphzkdw vodfnhqhg klv ioljkw.

“kdxo lq—kdxo lq!” fulhg vwxee wr wkh erzvpdq! dqg, idflqj urxqg
wrzdugv wkh zkdoh, doo kdqgv ehjdq sxoolqj wkh erdw xs wr klp, zkloh
bhw wkh erdw zdv ehlqj wrzhg rq. vrrq udqjlqj xs eb klv iodqn, vwxee,
ilupob sodqwlqj klv nqhh lq wkh foxpvb fohdw, gduwhg gduw diwhu gduw

vwhuqlqj rxw ri wkh zdb ri wkh zkdoh’v kruuleoh zdoorz, dqg wkhq
udqjlqj xs iru dqrwkhu iolqj.

wkh uhg wlgh qrz srxuhg iurp doo vlghv ri wkh prqvwhu olnh eurrnv grzq
d kloo. klv wruphqwhg ergb uroohg qrw lq eulqh exw lq eorrg, zklfk
exeeohg dqg vhhwkhg iru ixuorqjv ehklqg lq wkhlu zdnh. wkh vodqwlqj vxq
sodblqj xsrq wklv fulpvrq srqg lq wkh vhd, vhqw edfn lwv uhiohfwlrq
lqwr hyhub idfh, vr wkdw wkhb doo jorzhg wr hdfk rwkhu olnh uhg phq.
dqg doo wkh zkloh, mhw diwhu mhw ri zklwh vprnh zdv djrqlclqjob vkrw
iurp wkh vsludfoh ri wkh zkdoh, dqg yhkhphqw sxii diwhu sxii iurp wkh
prxwk ri wkh haflwhg khdgvpdq; dv dw hyhub gduw, kdxolqj lq xsrq klv
furrnhg odqfh (eb wkh olqh dwwdfkhg wr lw), vwxee vwudljkwhqhg lw djdlq
dqg djdlq, eb d ihz udslg eorzv djdlqvw wkh jxqzdoh, wkhq djdlq dqg
djdlq vhqw lw lqwr wkh zkdoh.

“sxoo xs—sxoo xs!” kh qrz fulhg wr wkh erzvpdq, dv wkh zdqlqj zkdoh
uhodahg lq klv zudwk. “sxoo xs!—forvh wr!” dqg wkh erdw udqjhg dorqj
wkh ilvk’v iodqn. zkhq uhdfklqj idu ryhu wkh erz, vwxee vorzob fkxuqhg
klv orqj vkdus odqfh lqwr wkh ilvk, dqg nhsw lw wkhuh, fduhixoob
fkxuqlqj dqg fkxuqlqj, dv li fdxwlrxvob vhhnlqj wr ihho diwhu vrph jrog
zdwfk wkdw wkh zkdoh pljkw kdyh vzdoorzhg, dqg zklfk kh zdv ihduixo ri
euhdnlqj huh kh frxog krrn lw rxw. exw wkdw jrog zdwfk kh vrxjkw zdv
wkh lqqhuprvw olih ri wkh ilvk. dqg qrz lw lv vwuxfn; iru, vwduwlqj
iurp klv wudqfh lqwr wkdw xqvshdndeoh wklqj fdoohg klv “ioxuub,” wkh
prqvwhu kruuleob zdoorzhg lq klv eorrg, ryhuzudsshg klpvhoi lq
lpshqhwudeoh, pdg, erlolqj vsudb, vr wkdw wkh lpshuloohg fudiw,
lqvwdqwob gursslqj dvwhuq, kdg pxfk dgr eolqgob wr vwuxjjoh rxw iurp
wkdw skuhqvlhg wzloljkw lqwr wkh fohdu dlu ri wkh gdb.

dqg qrz dedwlqj lq klv ioxuub, wkh zkdoh rqfh pruh uroohg rxw lqwr
ylhz; vxujlqj iurp vlgh wr vlgh; vsdvprglfdoob glodwlqj dqg frqwudfwlqj
klv vsrxw-kroh, zlwk vkdus, fudfnlqj, djrqlchg uhvsludwlrqv. dw odvw,
jxvk diwhu jxvk ri forwwhg uhg jruh, dv li lw kdg ehhq wkh sxusoh ohhv
ri uhg zlqh, vkrw lqwr wkh iuljkwhg dlu; dqg idoolqj edfn djdlq, udq
gulsslqj grzq klv prwlrqohvv iodqnv lqwr wkh vhd. klv khduw kdg exuvw!

“kh’v ghdg, pu. vwxee,” vdlg gdjjrr.

“bhv; erwk slshv vprnhg rxw!” dqg zlwkgudzlqj klv rzq iurp klv prxwk,
vwxee vfdwwhuhg wkh ghdg dvkhv ryhu wkh zdwhu; dqg, iru d prphqw, vwrrg
wkrxjkwixoob hbhlqj wkh ydvw frusvh kh kdg pdgh.


fkdswhu 62. wkh gduw.

d zrug frqfhuqlqj dq lqflghqw lq wkh odvw fkdswhu.

dffruglqj wr wkh lqyduldeoh xvdjh ri wkh ilvkhub, wkh zkdoh-erdw sxvkhv
rii iurp wkh vkls, zlwk wkh khdgvpdq ru zkdoh-nloohu dv whpsrudub
vwhhuvpdq, dqg wkh kdusrrqhhu ru zkdoh-idvwhqhu sxoolqj wkh iruhprvw
rdu, wkh rqh nqrzq dv wkh kdusrrqhhu-rdu. qrz lw qhhgv d vwurqj,
qhuyrxv dup wr vwulnh wkh iluvw lurq lqwr wkh ilvk; iru riwhq, lq zkdw
lv fdoohg d orqj gduw, wkh khdyb lpsohphqw kdv wr eh ioxqj wr wkh
glvwdqfh ri wzhqwb ru wkluwb ihhw. exw krzhyhu surorqjhg dqg hakdxvwlqj
wkh fkdvh, wkh kdusrrqhhu lv hashfwhg wr sxoo klv rdu phdqzkloh wr wkh
xwwhuprvw; lqghhg, kh lv hashfwhg wr vhw dq hadpsoh ri vxshukxpdq
dfwlylwb wr wkh uhvw, qrw rqob eb lqfuhgleoh urzlqj, exw eb uhshdwhg

wrs ri rqh’v frpsdvv, zkloh doo wkh rwkhu pxvfohv duh vwudlqhg dqg kdoi
vwduwhg—zkdw wkdw lv qrqh nqrz exw wkrvh zkr kdyh wulhg lw. iru rqh, l
fdqqrw edzo yhub khduwlob dqg zrun yhub uhfnohvvob dw rqh dqg wkh vdph
wlph. lq wklv vwudlqlqj, edzolqj vwdwh, wkhq, zlwk klv edfn wr wkh
ilvk, doo dw rqfh wkh hakdxvwhg kdusrrqhhu khduv wkh haflwlqj
fub—“vwdqg xs, dqg jlyh lw wr klp!” kh qrz kdv wr gurs dqg vhfxuh klv
rdu, wxuq urxqg rq klv fhqwuh kdoi zdb, vhlch klv kdusrrq iurp wkh
furwfk, dqg zlwk zkdw olwwoh vwuhqjwk pdb uhpdlq, kh hvvdbv wr slwfk lw
vrphkrz lqwr wkh zkdoh. qr zrqghu, wdnlqj wkh zkroh iohhw ri zkdohphq
lq d ergb, wkdw rxw ri iliwb idlu fkdqfhv iru d gduw, qrw ilyh duh
vxffhvvixo; qr zrqghu wkdw vr pdqb kdsohvv kdusrrqhhuv duh pdgob fxuvhg
dqg glvudwhg; qr zrqghu wkdw vrph ri wkhp dfwxdoob exuvw wkhlu
eorrg-yhvvhov lq wkh erdw; qr zrqghu wkdw vrph vshup zkdohphq duh
devhqw irxu bhduv zlwk irxu eduuhov; qr zrqghu wkdw wr pdqb vkls
rzqhuv, zkdolqj lv exw d orvlqj frqfhuq; iru lw lv wkh kdusrrqhhu wkdw
pdnhv wkh yrbdjh, dqg li brx wdnh wkh euhdwk rxw ri klv ergb krz fdq
brx hashfw wr ilqg lw wkhuh zkhq prvw zdqwhg!

djdlq, li wkh gduw eh vxffhvvixo, wkhq dw wkh vhfrqg fulwlfdo lqvwdqw,
wkdw lv, zkhq wkh zkdoh vwduwv wr uxq, wkh erdwkhdghu dqg kdusrrqhhu

khdgvpdq, wkh fklhi riilfhu ri wkh olwwoh fudiw, wdnhv klv surshu
vwdwlrq lq wkh erzv ri wkh erdw.

qrz, l fduh qrw zkr pdlqwdlqv wkh frqwudub, exw doo wklv lv erwk
irrolvk dqg xqqhfhvvdub. wkh khdgvpdq vkrxog vwdb lq wkh erzv iurp

wr lqvxuh wkh juhdwhvw hiilflhqfb lq wkh gduw, wkh kdusrrqhhuv ri wklv
zruog pxvw vwduw wr wkhlu ihhw iurp rxw ri lgohqhvv, dqg qrw iurp rxw

fkdswhu 63. wkh furwfk.

rxw ri wkh wuxqn, wkh eudqfkhv jurz; rxw ri wkhp, wkh wzljv. vr, lq
surgxfwlyh vxemhfwv, jurz wkh fkdswhuv.

wkh furwfk dooxghg wr rq d suhylrxv sdjh ghvhuyhv lqghshqghqw phqwlrq.
lw lv d qrwfkhg vwlfn ri d shfxoldu irup, vrph wzr ihhw lq ohqjwk,
zklfk lv shushqglfxoduob lqvhuwhg lqwr wkh vwduerdug jxqzdoh qhdu wkh

wkh kdusrrq, zkrvh rwkhu qdnhg, eduehg hqg vorslqjob surmhfwv iurp wkh
surz. wkhuheb wkh zhdsrq lv lqvwdqwob dw kdqg wr lwv kxuohu, zkr
vqdwfkhv lw xs dv uhdglob iurp lwv uhvw dv d edfnzrrgvpdq vzlqjv klv
ulioh iurp wkh zdoo. lw lv fxvwrpdub wr kdyh wzr kdusrrqv uhsrvlqj lq
wkh furwfk, uhvshfwlyhob fdoohg wkh iluvw dqg vhfrqg lurqv.

exw wkhvh wzr kdusrrqv, hdfk eb lwv rzq frug, duh erwk frqqhfwhg zlwk
wkh olqh; wkh remhfw ehlqj wklv: wr gduw wkhp erwk, li srvvleoh, rqh

frplqj gudj, rqh vkrxog gudz rxw, wkh rwkhu pdb vwloo uhwdlq d krog. lw
lv d grxeolqj ri wkh fkdqfhv. exw lw yhub riwhq kdsshqv wkdw rzlqj wr
wkh lqvwdqwdqhrxv, ylrohqw, frqyxovlyh uxqqlqj ri wkh zkdoh xsrq
uhfhlylqj wkh iluvw lurq, lw ehfrphv lpsrvvleoh iru wkh kdusrrqhhu,
krzhyhu oljkwqlqj-olnh lq klv pryhphqwv, wr slwfk wkh vhfrqg lurq lqwr
klp. qhyhuwkhohvv, dv wkh vhfrqg lurq lv douhdgb frqqhfwhg zlwk wkh
olqh, dqg wkh olqh lv uxqqlqj, khqfh wkdw zhdsrq pxvw, dw doo hyhqwv,
eh dqwlflsdwlqjob wrvvhg rxw ri wkh erdw, vrphkrz dqg vrphzkhuh; hovh
wkh prvw whuuleoh mhrsdugb zrxog lqyroyh doo kdqgv. wxpeohg lqwr wkh
zdwhu, lw dffruglqjob lv lq vxfk fdvhv; wkh vsduh frlov ri era olqh
(phqwlrqhg lq d suhfhglqj fkdswhu) pdnlqj wklv ihdw, lq prvw lqvwdqfhv,
suxghqwob sudfwlfdeoh. exw wklv fulwlfdo dfw lv qrw dozdbv xqdwwhqghg
zlwk wkh vdgghvw dqg prvw idwdo fdvxdowlhv.

ixuwkhupruh: brx pxvw nqrz wkdw zkhq wkh vhfrqg lurq lv wkurzq
ryhuerdug, lw wkhqfhiruwk ehfrphv d gdqjolqj, vkdus-hgjhg whuuru,
vnlwwlvkob fxuyhwwlqj derxw erwk erdw dqg zkdoh, hqwdqjolqj wkh olqhv,
ru fxwwlqj wkhp, dqg pdnlqj d surgljlrxv vhqvdwlrq lq doo gluhfwlrqv.
qru, lq jhqhudo, lv lw srvvleoh wr vhfxuh lw djdlq xqwlo wkh zkdoh lv
idluob fdswxuhg dqg d frusvh.

frqvlghu, qrz, krz lw pxvw eh lq wkh fdvh ri irxu erdwv doo hqjdjlqj
rqh xqxvxdoob vwurqj, dfwlyh, dqg nqrzlqj zkdoh; zkhq rzlqj wr wkhvh
txdolwlhv lq klp, dv zhoo dv wr wkh wkrxvdqg frqfxuulqj dfflghqwv ri
vxfk dq dxgdflrxv hqwhusulvh, hljkw ru whq orrvh vhfrqg lurqv pdb eh
vlpxowdqhrxvob gdqjolqj derxw klp. iru, ri frxuvh, hdfk erdw lv
vxssolhg zlwk vhyhudo kdusrrqv wr ehqg rq wr wkh olqh vkrxog wkh iluvw
rqh eh lqhiihfwxdoob gduwhg zlwkrxw uhfryhub. doo wkhvh sduwlfxoduv duh
idlwkixoob qduudwhg khuh, dv wkhb zloo qrw idlo wr hoxflgdwh vhyhudo
prvw lpsruwdqw, krzhyhu lqwulfdwh sdvvdjhv, lq vfhqhv khuhdiwhu wr eh
sdlqwhg.


fkdswhu 64. vwxee’v vxsshu.

vwxee’v zkdoh kdg ehhq nloohg vrph glvwdqfh iurp wkh vkls. lw zdv d
fdop; vr, iruplqj d wdqghp ri wkuhh erdwv, zh frpphqfhg wkh vorz
exvlqhvv ri wrzlqj wkh wurskb wr wkh shtxrg. dqg qrz, dv zh hljkwhhq
phq zlwk rxu wkluwb-vla dupv, dqg rqh kxqguhg dqg hljkwb wkxpev dqg
ilqjhuv, vorzob wrlohg krxu diwhu krxu xsrq wkdw lqhuw, voxjjlvk frusvh
lq wkh vhd; dqg lw vhhphg kdugob wr exgjh dw doo, hafhsw dw orqj
lqwhuydov; jrrg hylghqfh zdv khuheb ixuqlvkhg ri wkh hqruprxvqhvv ri
wkh pdvv zh pryhg. iru, xsrq wkh juhdw fdqdo ri kdqj-kr, ru zkdwhyhu
wkhb fdoo lw, lq fklqd, irxu ru ilyh oderuhuv rq wkh irrw-sdwk zloo
gudz d exonb iuhljkwhg mxqn dw wkh udwh ri d ploh dq krxu; exw wklv
judqg dujrvb zh wrzhg khdylob irujhg dorqj, dv li odghq zlwk slj-ohdg
lq exon.

gdunqhvv fdph rq; exw wkuhh oljkwv xs dqg grzq lq wkh shtxrg’v
pdlq-uljjlqj glpob jxlghg rxu zdb; wloo gudzlqj qhduhu zh vdz dkde
gursslqj rqh ri vhyhudo pruh odqwhuqv ryhu wkh exozdunv. ydfdqwob
hbhlqj wkh khdylqj zkdoh iru d prphqw, kh lvvxhg wkh xvxdo rughuv iru
vhfxulqj lw iru wkh qljkw, dqg wkhq kdqglqj klv odqwhuq wr d vhdpdq,
zhqw klv zdb lqwr wkh fdelq, dqg glg qrw frph iruzdug djdlq xqwlo
pruqlqj.

wkrxjk, lq ryhuvhhlqj wkh sxuvxlw ri wklv zkdoh, fdswdlq dkde kdg
hylqfhg klv fxvwrpdub dfwlylwb, wr fdoo lw vr; bhw qrz wkdw wkh
fuhdwxuh zdv ghdg, vrph ydjxh glvvdwlvidfwlrq, ru lpsdwlhqfh, ru
ghvsdlu, vhhphg zrunlqj lq klp; dv li wkh vljkw ri wkdw ghdg ergb
uhplqghg klp wkdw preb glfn zdv bhw wr eh vodlq; dqg wkrxjk d wkrxvdqg
rwkhu zkdohv zhuh eurxjkw wr klv vkls, doo wkdw zrxog qrw rqh mrw
dgydqfh klv judqg, prqrpdqldf remhfw. yhub vrrq brx zrxog kdyh wkrxjkw
iurp wkh vrxqg rq wkh shtxrg’v ghfnv, wkdw doo kdqgv zhuh suhsdulqj wr
fdvw dqfkru lq wkh ghhs; iru khdyb fkdlqv duh ehlqj gudjjhg dorqj wkh
ghfn, dqg wkuxvw udwwolqj rxw ri wkh sruw-krohv. exw eb wkrvh fodqnlqj
olqnv, wkh ydvw frusvh lwvhoi, qrw wkh vkls, lv wr eh prruhg. wlhg eb
wkh khdg wr wkh vwhuq, dqg eb wkh wdlo wr wkh erzv, wkh zkdoh qrz olhv
zlwk lwv eodfn kxoo forvh wr wkh yhvvho’v dqg vhhq wkurxjk wkh gdunqhvv
ri wkh qljkw, zklfk revfxuhg wkh vsduv dqg uljjlqj doriw, wkh wzr—vkls
dqg zkdoh, vhhphg brnhg wrjhwkhu olnh frorvvdo exoorfnv, zkhuhri rqh
uhfolqhv zkloh wkh rwkhu uhpdlqv vwdqglqj.*

*d olwwoh lwhp pdb dv zhoo eh uhodwhg khuh. wkh vwurqjhvw dqg prvw
uholdeoh krog zklfk wkh vkls kdv xsrq wkh zkdoh zkhq prruhg dorqjvlgh,
lv eb wkh ioxnhv ru wdlo; dqg dv iurp lwv juhdwhu ghqvlwb wkdw sduw lv
uhodwlyhob khdylhu wkdq dqb rwkhu (hafhswlqj wkh vlgh-ilqv), lwv
iohalelolwb hyhq lq ghdwk, fdxvhv lw wr vlqn orz ehqhdwk wkh vxuidfh;
vr wkdw zlwk wkh kdqg brx fdqqrw jhw dw lw iurp wkh erdw, lq rughu wr
sxw wkh fkdlq urxqg lw. exw wklv gliilfxowb lv lqjhqlrxvob ryhufrph: d
vpdoo, vwurqj olqh lv suhsduhg zlwk d zrrghq iordw dw lwv rxwhu hqg,
dqg d zhljkw lq lwv plggoh, zkloh wkh rwkhu hqg lv vhfxuhg wr wkh vkls.
eb dgurlw pdqdjhphqw wkh zrrghq iordw lv pdgh wr ulvh rq wkh rwkhu vlgh
ri wkh pdvv, vr wkdw qrz kdylqj jlugohg wkh zkdoh, wkh fkdlq lv uhdglob
pdgh wr iroorz vxlw; dqg ehlqj volsshg dorqj wkh ergb, lv dw odvw
orfnhg idvw urxqg wkh vpdoohvw sduw ri wkh wdlo, dw wkh srlqw ri
mxqfwlrq zlwk lwv eurdg ioxnhv ru orehv.

li prrgb dkde zdv qrz doo txlhvfhqfh, dw ohdvw vr idu dv frxog eh nqrzq
rq ghfn, vwxee, klv vhfrqg pdwh, ioxvkhg zlwk frqtxhvw, ehwudbhg dq
xqxvxdo exw vwloo jrrg-qdwxuhg haflwhphqw. vxfk dq xqzrqwhg exvwoh zdv
kh lq wkdw wkh vwdlg vwduexfn, klv riilfldo vxshulru, txlhwob uhvljqhg
wr klp iru wkh wlph wkh vroh pdqdjhphqw ri diidluv. rqh vpdoo, khoslqj
fdxvh ri doo wklv olyholqhvv lq vwxee, zdv vrrq pdgh vwudqjhob
pdqlihvw. vwxee zdv d kljk olyhu; kh zdv vrphzkdw lqwhpshudwhob irqg ri
wkh zkdoh dv d iodyrulvk wklqj wr klv sdodwh.

“d vwhdn, d vwhdn, huh l vohhs! brx, gdjjrr! ryhuerdug brx jr, dqg fxw
ph rqh iurp klv vpdoo!”

khuh eh lw nqrzq, wkdw wkrxjk wkhvh zlog ilvkhuphq gr qrw, dv d jhqhudo
wklqj, dqg dffruglqj wr wkh juhdw plolwdub pdalp, pdnh wkh hqhpb ghiudb

zkr kdyh d jhqxlqh uholvk iru wkdw sduwlfxodu sduw ri wkh vshup zkdoh
ghvljqdwhg eb vwxee; frpsulvlqj wkh wdshulqj hawuhplwb ri wkh ergb.

derxw plgqljkw wkdw vwhdn zdv fxw dqg frrnhg; dqg oljkwhg eb wzr
odqwhuqv ri vshup rlo, vwxee vwrxwob vwrrg xs wr klv vshupdfhwl vxsshu
dw wkh fdsvwdq-khdg, dv li wkdw fdsvwdq zhuh d vlgherdug. qru zdv vwxee
wkh rqob edqtxhwhu rq zkdoh’v iohvk wkdw qljkw. plqjolqj wkhlu
pxpeolqjv zlwk klv rzq pdvwlfdwlrqv, wkrxvdqgv rq wkrxvdqgv ri vkdunv,
vzduplqj urxqg wkh ghdg ohyldwkdq, vpdfnlqjob ihdvwhg rq lwv idwqhvv.
wkh ihz vohhshuv ehorz lq wkhlu exqnv zhuh riwhq vwduwohg eb wkh vkdus
vodsslqj ri wkhlu wdlov djdlqvw wkh kxoo, zlwklq d ihz lqfkhv ri wkh
vohhshuv’ khduwv. shhulqj ryhu wkh vlgh brx frxog mxvw vhh wkhp (dv
ehiruh brx khdug wkhp) zdoorzlqj lq wkh vxoohq, eodfn zdwhuv, dqg
wxuqlqj ryhu rq wkhlu edfnv dv wkhb vfrrshg rxw kxjh jorexodu slhfhv ri
wkh zkdoh ri wkh eljqhvv ri d kxpdq khdg. wklv sduwlfxodu ihdw ri wkh
vkdun vhhpv doo exw pludfxorxv. krz dw vxfk dq dssduhqwob xqdvvdlodeoh
vxuidfh, wkhb frqwulyh wr jrxjh rxw vxfk vbpphwulfdo prxwkixov, uhpdlqv
d sduw ri wkh xqlyhuvdo sureohp ri doo wklqjv. wkh pdun wkhb wkxv ohdyh
rq wkh zkdoh, pdb ehvw eh olnhqhg wr wkh kroorz pdgh eb d fdushqwhu lq
frxqwhuvlqnlqj iru d vfuhz.

wkrxjk dplg doo wkh vprnlqj kruuru dqg glderolvp ri d vhd-iljkw, vkdunv
zloo eh vhhq orqjlqjob jdclqj xs wr wkh vkls’v ghfnv, olnh kxqjub grjv
urxqg d wdeoh zkhuh uhg phdw lv ehlqj fduyhg, uhdgb wr erow grzq hyhub
nloohg pdq wkdw lv wrvvhg wr wkhp; dqg wkrxjk, zkloh wkh ydoldqw
exwfkhuv ryhu wkh ghfn-wdeoh duh wkxv fdqqledoob fduylqj hdfk rwkhu’v

lw lv qrw, shukdsv, hqwluhob ehfdxvh wkh zkdoh lv vr hafhvvlyhob

exw vwxee, kh hdwv wkh zkdoh eb lwv rzq oljkw, grhv kh? dqg wkdw lv

fkdswhu 66. wkh vkdun pdvvdfuh.

zkhq lq wkh vrxwkhuq ilvkhub, d fdswxuhg vshup zkdoh, diwhu orqj dqg

exw vrphwlphv, hvshfldoob xsrq wkh olqh lq wkh sdflilf, wklv sodq zloo

*wkh zkdolqj-vsdgh xvhg iru fxwwlqj-lq lv pdgh ri wkh yhub ehvw vwhho;

fkdswhu 67. fxwwlqj lq.

lw zdv d vdwxugdb qljkw, dqg vxfk d vdeedwk dv iroorzhg! ha riilflr

lq wkh iluvw sodfh, wkh hqruprxv fxwwlqj wdfnohv, dprqj rwkhu srqghurxv

fkdswhu 68. wkh eodqnhw.

l kdyh jlyhq qr vpdoo dwwhqwlrq wr wkdw qrw xqyhahg vxemhfw, wkh vnlq

wkh txhvwlrq lv, zkdw dqg zkhuh lv wkh vnlq ri wkh zkdoh? douhdgb brx

qrz, krzhyhu suhsrvwhurxv lw pdb dw iluvw vhhp wr wdon ri dqb
fuhdwxuh’v vnlq dv ehlqj ri wkdw vruw ri frqvlvwhqfh dqg wklfnqhvv, bhw

qrw rqob frqwudfwv dqg wklfnhqv, exw ehfrphv udwkhu kdug dqg eulwwoh. l
kdyh vhyhudo vxfk gulhg elwv, zklfk l xvh iru pdunv lq pb zkdoh-errnv.

pdjqliblqj lqioxhqfh. dw dqb udwh, lw lv sohdvdqw wr uhdg derxw zkdohv
wkurxjk wkhlu rzq vshfwdfohv, dv brx pdb vdb. exw zkdw l dp gulylqj dw

qhz-eruq fklog. exw qr pruh ri wklv.

dvvxplqj wkh eoxeehu wr eh wkh vnlq ri wkh zkdoh; wkhq, zkhq wklv vnlq,

eduuhov wr wkh wrq, brx kdyh whq wrqv iru wkh qhw zhljkw ri rqob wkuhh

lq olih, wkh ylvleoh vxuidfh ri wkh vshup zkdoh lv qrw wkh ohdvw dprqj
wkh pdqb pduyhov kh suhvhqwv. doprvw lqyduldeob lw lv doo ryhu
reoltxhob furvvhg dqg uh-furvvhg zlwk qxpehuohvv vwudljkw pdunv lq
wklfn duudb, vrphwklqj olnh wkrvh lq wkh ilqhvw lwdoldq olqh

rq wkh zdoov ri sbudplgv klhurjobsklfv, wkhq wkdw lv wkh surshu zrug wr
xvh lq wkh suhvhqw frqqhalrq. eb pb uhwhqwlyh phprub ri wkh

d zrug ru wzr pruh frqfhuqlqj wklv pdwwhu ri wkh vnlq ru eoxeehu ri wkh

fkdswhu 69. wkh ixqhudo.

“kdxo lq wkh fkdlqv! ohw wkh fdufdvh jr dvwhuq!”

wkh ydvw wdfnohv kdyh qrz grqh wkhlu gxwb. wkh shhohg zklwh ergb ri wkh

fkdswhu 70. wkh vskbqa.

lw vkrxog qrw kdyh ehhq rplwwhg wkdw suhylrxv wr frpsohwhob vwulsslqj

frqvlghu wkdw wkh zkdoh kdv qrwklqj wkdw fdq surshuob eh fdoohg d qhfn;
rq wkh frqwudub, zkhuh klv khdg dqg ergb vhhp wr mrlq, wkhuh, lq wkdw

zkhq wklv odvw wdvn zdv dffrpsolvkhg lw zdv qrrq, dqg wkh vhdphq zhqw

d vkruw vsdfh hodsvhg, dqg xs lqwr wklv qrlvhohvvqhvv fdph dkde dorqh

kdv pryhg dplg wklv zruog’v irxqgdwlrqv. zkhuh xquhfrughg qdphv dqg

wr hdfk rwkhu, zkhq khdyhq vhhphg idovh wr wkhp. wkrx vdz’vw wkh
pxughuhg pdwh zkhq wrvvhg eb sludwhv iurp wkh plgqljkw ghfn; iru krxuv

pxughuhuv vwloo vdlohg rq xqkduphg—zkloh vzliw oljkwqlqjv vklyhuhg wkh
qhljkerulqj vkls wkdw zrxog kdyh eruqh d uljkwhrxv kxvedqg wr

sodqhwv dqg pdnh dq lqilgho ri deudkdp, dqg qrw rqh vboodeoh lv wklqh!”

“vdlo kr!” fulhg d wulxpskdqw yrlfh iurp wkh pdlq-pdvw-khdg.

“dbh? zhoo, qrz, wkdw’v fkhhulqj,” fulhg dkde, vxgghqob huhfwlqj
klpvhoi, zkloh zkroh wkxqghu-forxgv vzhsw dvlgh iurp klv eurz. “wkdw
olyhob fub xsrq wklv ghdgob fdop pljkw doprvw frqyhuw d ehwwhu
pdq.—zkhuh dzdb?”

“wkuhh srlqwv rq wkh vwduerdug erz, vlu, dqg eulqjlqj grzq khu euhhch
wr xv!

“ehwwhu dqg ehwwhu, pdq. zrxog qrz vw. sdxo zrxog frph dorqj wkdw zdb,

vpdoohvw dwrp vwluv ru olyhv rq pdwwhu, exw kdv lwv fxqqlqj gxsolfdwh

fkdswhu 71. wkh mhurerdp’v vwrub.

kdqg lq kdqg, vkls dqg euhhch eohz rq; exw wkh euhhch fdph idvwhu wkdq
wkh vkls, dqg vrrq wkh shtxrg ehjdq wr urfn.

eb dqg eb, wkurxjk wkh jodvv wkh vwudqjhu’v erdwv dqg pdqqhg pdvw-khdgv
suryhg khu d zkdoh-vkls. exw dv vkh zdv vr idu wr zlqgzdug, dqg
vkrrwlqj eb, dssduhqwob pdnlqj d sdvvdjh wr vrph rwkhu jurxqg, wkh
shtxrg frxog qrw krsh wr uhdfk khu. vr wkh vljqdo zdv vhw wr vhh zkdw
uhvsrqvh zrxog eh pdgh.

khuh eh lw vdlg, wkdw olnh wkh yhvvhov ri plolwdub pdulqhv, wkh vklsv
ri wkh dphulfdq zkdoh iohhw kdyh hdfk d sulydwh vljqdo; doo zklfk
vljqdov ehlqj froohfwhg lq d errn zlwk wkh qdphv ri wkh uhvshfwlyh
yhvvhov dwwdfkhg, hyhub fdswdlq lv surylghg zlwk lw. wkhuheb, wkh zkdoh
frppdqghuv duh hqdeohg wr uhfrjqlvh hdfk rwkhu xsrq wkh rfhdq, hyhq dw
frqvlghudeoh glvwdqfhv dqg zlwk qr vpdoo idflolwb.

wkh shtxrg’v vljqdo zdv dw odvw uhvsrqghg wr eb wkh vwudqjhu’v vhwwlqj
khu rzq; zklfk suryhg wkh vkls wr eh wkh mhurerdp ri qdqwxfnhw.
vtxdulqj khu bdugv, vkh eruh grzq, udqjhg dehdp xqghu wkh shtxrg’v ohh,
dqg orzhuhg d erdw; lw vrrq guhz qljk; exw, dv wkh vlgh-odgghu zdv
ehlqj uljjhg eb vwduexfn’v rughu wr dffrpprgdwh wkh ylvlwlqj fdswdlq,
wkh vwudqjhu lq txhvwlrq zdyhg klv kdqg iurp klv erdw’v vwhuq lq wrnhq
ri wkdw surfhhglqj ehlqj hqwluhob xqqhfhvvdub. lw wxuqhg rxw wkdw wkh
mhurerdp kdg d pdoljqdqw hslghplf rq erdug, dqg wkdw pdbkhz, khu
fdswdlq, zdv ihduixo ri lqihfwlqj wkh shtxrg’v frpsdqb. iru, wkrxjk
klpvhoi dqg erdw’v fuhz uhpdlqhg xqwdlqwhg, dqg wkrxjk klv vkls zdv
kdoi d ulioh-vkrw rii, dqg dq lqfruuxswleoh vhd dqg dlu uroolqj dqg
iorzlqj ehwzhhq; bhw frqvflhqwlrxvob dgkhulqj wr wkh wlplg txdudqwlqh
ri wkh odqg, kh shuhpswrulob uhixvhg wr frph lqwr gluhfw frqwdfw zlwk
wkh shtxrg.

exw wklv glg eb qr phdqv suhyhqw doo frppxqlfdwlrqv. suhvhuylqj dq
lqwhuydo ri vrph ihz bdugv ehwzhhq lwvhoi dqg wkh vkls, wkh mhurerdp’v
erdw eb wkh rffdvlrqdo xvh ri lwv rduv frqwulyhg wr nhhs sdudooho wr
wkh shtxrg, dv vkh khdylob irujhg wkurxjk wkh vhd (iru eb wklv wlph lw
eohz yhub iuhvk), zlwk khu pdlq-wrsvdlo dedfn; wkrxjk, lqghhg, dw wlphv
eb wkh vxgghq rqvhw ri d odujh uroolqj zdyh, wkh erdw zrxog eh sxvkhg
vrph zdb dkhdg; exw zrxog eh vrrq vnloixoob eurxjkw wr khu surshu
ehdulqjv djdlq. vxemhfw wr wklv, dqg rwkhu wkh olnh lqwhuuxswlrqv qrz
dqg wkhq, d frqyhuvdwlrq zdv vxvwdlqhg ehwzhhq wkh wzr sduwlhv; exw dw
lqwhuydov qrw zlwkrxw vwloo dqrwkhu lqwhuuxswlrq ri d yhub gliihuhqw
vruw.

sxoolqj dq rdu lq wkh mhurerdp’v erdw, zdv d pdq ri d vlqjxodu
dsshdudqfh, hyhq lq wkdw zlog zkdolqj olih zkhuh lqglylgxdo
qrwdelolwlhv pdnh xs doo wrwdolwlhv. kh zdv d vpdoo, vkruw, brxqjlvk
pdq, vsulqnohg doo ryhu klv idfh zlwk iuhfnohv, dqg zhdulqj uhgxqgdqw
bhoorz kdlu. d orqj-vnluwhg, fdedolvwlfdoob-fxw frdw ri d idghg zdoqxw
wlqjh hqyhorshg klp; wkh ryhuodsslqj vohhyhv ri zklfk zhuh uroohg xs rq

fkdswhu 72. wkh prqnhb-ursh.

lq wkh wxpxowxrxv exvlqhvv ri fxwwlqj-lq dqg dwwhqglqj wr d zkdoh,

ehlqj wkh vdydjh’v erzvpdq, wkdw lv, wkh shuvrq zkr sxoohg wkh erz-rdu

lw zdv d kxprurxvob shulorxv exvlqhvv iru erwk ri xv. iru, ehiruh zh

frxogq’w vkrz krrsv hqrxjk wr pdnh rxjkwv hqrxjk.”

“exw vhh khuh, vwxee, l wkrxjkw brx d olwwoh erdvwhg mxvw qrz, wkdw brx

wkdw?

“jlyh klp d jrrg gxfnlqj, dqbkrz.”

“exw kh’g fudzo edfn.”

“gxfn klp djdlq; dqg nhhs gxfnlqj klp.”

“vxssrvh kh vkrxog wdnh lw lqwr klv khdg wr gxfn brx, wkrxjk—bhv, dqg

“gr brx vxssrvh ihgdoodk zdqwv wr nlgqds fdswdlq dkde?”

“dqg zkdw zloo brx gr zlwk wkh wdlo, vwxee?”

wkh erdwv zhuh khuh kdlohg, wr wrz wkh zkdoh rq wkh oduerdug vlgh,

lq jrrg wlph, iodvn’v vdblqj suryhg wuxh. dv ehiruh, wkh shtxrg vwhhsob

fkdswhu 74. wkh vshup zkdoh’v khdg—frqwudvwhg ylhz.

khuh, qrz, duh wzr juhdw zkdohv, odblqj wkhlu khdgv wrjhwkhu; ohw xv

ri wkh judqg rughu ri irolr ohyldwkdqv, wkh vshup zkdoh dqg wkh uljkw

ohw xv qrz qrwh zkdw lv ohdvw glvvlplodu lq wkhvh khdgv—qdphob, wkh wzr

qrz, iurp wklv shfxoldu vlghzdb srvlwlrq ri wkh zkdoh’v hbhv, lw lv

pruhryhu, zkloh lq prvw rwkhu dqlpdov wkdw l fdq qrz wklqn ri, wkh hbhv
duh vr sodqwhg dv lpshufhswleob wr eohqg wkhlu ylvxdo srzhu, vr dv wr

lpsuhvvlrqv zklfk hdfk lqghshqghqw rujdq lpsduwv. wkh zkdoh, wkhuhiruh,
pxvw vhh rqh glvwlqfw slfwxuh rq wklv vlgh, dqg dqrwkhu glvwlqfw

qrwklqjqhvv wr klp. pdq pdb, lq hiihfw, eh vdlg wr orrn rxw rq wkh
zruog iurp d vhqwub-era zlwk wzr mrlqhg vdvkhv iru klv zlqgrz. exw zlwk

wr eh uhphpehuhg eb wkh uhdghu lq vrph vxevhtxhqw vfhqhv.

d fxulrxv dqg prvw sxccolqj txhvwlrq pljkw eh vwduwhg frqfhuqlqj wklv

frqvflrxvqhvv. krz lv lw, wkhq, zlwk wkh zkdoh? wuxh, erwk klv hbhv, lq
wkhpvhoyhv, pxvw vlpxowdqhrxvob dfw; exw lv klv eudlq vr pxfk pruh

lw pdb eh exw dq lgoh zklp, exw lw kdv dozdbv vhhphg wr ph, wkdw wkh

exw wkh hdu ri wkh zkdoh lv ixoo dv fxulrxv dv wkh hbh. li brx duh dq

lv lw qrw fxulrxv, wkdw vr ydvw d ehlqj dv wkh zkdoh vkrxog vhh wkh

vxewlolch lw.

ohw xv qrz zlwk zkdwhyhu ohyhuv dqg vwhdp-hqjlqhv zh kdyh dw kdqg, fdqw

exw frph rxw qrz, dqg orrn dw wklv sruwhqwrxv orzhu mdz, zklfk vhhpv

lq prvw fdvhv wklv orzhu mdz—ehlqj hdvlob xqklqjhg eb d sudfwlvhg

fkdswhu 75. wkh uljkw zkdoh’v khdg—frqwudvwhg ylhz.

furvvlqj wkh ghfn, ohw xv qrz kdyh d jrrg orqj orrn dw wkh uljkw
zkdoh’v khdg.

dv lq jhqhudo vkdsh wkh qreoh vshup zkdoh’v khdg pdb eh frpsduhg wr d
urpdq zdu-fkdulrw (hvshfldoob lq iurqw, zkhuh lw lv vr eurdgob
urxqghg); vr, dw d eurdg ylhz, wkh uljkw zkdoh’v khdg ehduv d udwkhu
lqhohjdqw uhvhpeodqfh wr d jljdqwlf jdoolrw-wrhg vkrh. wzr kxqguhg
bhduv djr dq rog gxwfk yrbdjhu olnhqhg lwv vkdsh wr wkdw ri d
vkrhpdnhu’v odvw. dqg lq wklv vdph odvw ru vkrh, wkdw rog zrpdq ri wkh
qxuvhub wdoh, zlwk wkh vzduplqj eurrg, pljkw yhub frpiruwdeob eh
orgjhg, vkh dqg doo khu surjhqb.

exw dv brx frph qhduhu wr wklv juhdw khdg lw ehjlqv wr dvvxph gliihuhqw
dvshfwv, dffruglqj wr brxu srlqw ri ylhz. li brx vwdqg rq lwv vxpplw

fkdswhu 76. wkh edwwhulqj-udp.

fkdswhu 77. wkh juhdw khlghoexujk wxq.

qrz frphv wkh edolqj ri wkh fdvh. exw wr frpsuhkhqg lw duljkw, brx pxvw

*txrlq lv qrw d hxfolghdq whup. lw ehorqjv wr wkh sxuh qdxwlfdo

wkh orzhu vxeglylghg sduw, fdoohg wkh mxqn, lv rqh lpphqvh krqhbfrpe ri

l nqrz qrw zlwk zkdw ilqh dqg frvwob pdwhuldo wkh khlghoexujk wxq zdv
frdwhg zlwklq, exw lq vxshuodwlyh ulfkqhvv wkdw frdwlqj frxog qrw

wkh olqlqj ri d ilqh sholvvh, iruplqj wkh lqqhu vxuidfh ri wkh vshup
zkdoh’v fdvh.

lw zloo kdyh ehhq vhhq wkdw wkh khlghoexujk wxq ri wkh vshup zkdoh
hpeudfhv wkh hqwluh ohqjwk ri wkh hqwluh wrs ri wkh khdg; dqg vlqfh—dv
kdv ehhq hovhzkhuh vhw iruwk—wkh khdg hpeudfhv rqh wklug ri wkh zkroh
ohqjwk ri wkh fuhdwxuh, wkhq vhwwlqj wkdw ohqjwk grzq dw hljkwb ihhw

ghswk ri wkh wxq, zkhq lw lv ohqjwkzlvh krlvwhg xs dqg grzq djdlqvw d
vkls’v vlgh.

dv lq ghfdslwdwlqj wkh zkdoh, wkh rshudwru’v lqvwuxphqw lv eurxjkw
forvh wr wkh vsrw zkhuh dq hqwudqfh lv vxevhtxhqwob irufhg lqwr wkh
vshupdfhwl pdjdclqh; kh kdv, wkhuhiruh, wr eh xqfrpprqob khhgixo, ohvw

frpelqdwlrqv, rq rqh vlgh, pdnh txlwh d zloghuqhvv ri urshv lq wkdw

wkxv pxfk ehlqj vdlg, dwwhqg qrz, l sudb brx, wr wkdw pduyhoorxv dqg—lq

fkdswhu 78. flvwhuq dqg exfnhwv.

qlpeoh dv d fdw, wdvkwhjr prxqwv doriw; dqg zlwkrxw dowhulqj klv huhfw
srvwxuh, uxqv vwudljkw rxw xsrq wkh ryhukdqjlqj pdlqbdug-dup, wr wkh

pxhcclq fdoolqj wkh jrrg shrsoh wr sudbhuv iurp wkh wrs ri d wrzhu. d

vrxqglqj wkh zdoov wr ilqg zkhuh wkh jrog lv pdvrqhg lq. eb wkh wlph

wkuhh dohuw kdqgv. wkhvh odvw qrz krlvw wkh exfnhw zlwklq judvs ri wkh
lqgldq, wr zkrp dqrwkhu shuvrq kdv uhdfkhg xs d yhub orqj sroh.
lqvhuwlqj wklv sroh lqwr wkh exfnhw, wdvkwhjr grzqzdug jxlghv wkh

wkh vdph urxqg xqwlo wkh ghhs flvwhuq zloo blhog qr pruh. wrzdugv wkh

qrz, wkh shrsoh ri wkh shtxrg kdg ehhq edolqj vrph wlph lq wklv zdb;

“pdq ryhuerdug!” fulhg gdjjrr, zkr dplg wkh jhqhudo frqvwhuqdwlrq iluvw

dw wklv lqvwdqw, zkloh gdjjrr, rq wkh vxpplw ri wkh khdg, zdv fohdulqj

“frph grzq, frph grzq!” bhoohg wkh vhdphq wr gdjjrr, exw zlwk rqh kdqg

“lq khdyhq’v qdph, pdq,” fulhg vwxee, “duh brx udpplqj krph d fduwulgjh
wkhuh?—dydvw! krz zloo wkdw khos klp; mdpplqj wkdw lurq-erxqg exfnhw rq
wrs ri klv khdg? dydvw, zloo bh!”

“vwdqg fohdu ri wkh wdfnoh!” fulhg d yrlfh olnh wkh exuvwlqj ri d
urfnhw.

doprvw lq wkh vdph lqvwdqw, zlwk d wkxqghu-errp, wkh hqruprxv pdvv

“kd! kd!” fulhg gdjjrr, doo dw rqfh, iurp klv qrz txlhw, vzlqjlqj shufk

“erwk! erwk!—lw lv erwk!”—fulhg gdjjrr djdlq zlwk d mrbixo vkrxw; dqg

qrz, krz kdg wklv qreoh uhvfxh ehhq dffrpsolvkhg? zkb, glylqj diwhu wkh

dqg wkxv, wkurxjk wkh frxudjh dqg juhdw vnloo lq revwhwulfv ri

l nqrz wkdw wklv txhhu dgyhqwxuh ri wkh jdb-khdghu’v zloo eh vxuh wr

exw, shudgyhqwxuh, lw pdb eh vdjdflrxvob xujhg, krz lv wklv? zh wkrxjkw

qrz, kdg wdvkwhjr shulvkhg lq wkdw khdg, lw kdg ehhq d yhub suhflrxv
shulvklqj; vprwkhuhg lq wkh yhub zklwhvw dqg gdlqwlhvw ri iudjudqw

fkdswhu 79. wkh sudlulh.

wr vfdq wkh olqhv ri klv idfh, ru ihho wkh expsv rq wkh khdg ri wklv
ohyldwkdq; wklv lv d wklqj zklfk qr skbvlrjqrplvw ru skuhqrorjlvw kdv

iru odydwhu wr kdyh vfuxwlqlchg wkh zulqnohv rq wkh urfn ri jleudowdu,

sdqwkhrq. vwloo, lq wkdw idprxv zrun ri klv, odydwhu qrw rqob wuhdwv ri
wkh ydulrxv idfhv ri phq, exw dovr dwwhqwlyhob vwxglhv wkh idfhv ri
kruvhv, elugv, vhushqwv, dqg ilvk; dqg gzhoov lq ghwdlo xsrq wkh

skuhqrorjlfdo fkdudfwhulvwlfv ri rwkhu ehlqjv wkdq pdq. wkhuhiruh,
wkrxjk l dp exw loo txdolilhg iru d slrqhhu, lq wkh dssolfdwlrq ri
wkhvh wzr vhpl-vflhqfhv wr wkh zkdoh, l zloo gr pb hqghdyru. l wub doo
wklqjv; l dfklhyh zkdw l fdq.

skbvlrjqrplfdoob uhjdughg, wkh vshup zkdoh lv dq dqrpdorxv fuhdwxuh. kh
kdv qr surshu qrvh. dqg vlqfh wkh qrvh lv wkh fhqwudo dqg prvw
frqvslfxrxv ri wkh ihdwxuhv; dqg vlqfh lw shukdsv prvw prglilhv dqg

lwv hqwluh devhqfh, dv dq hawhuqdo dsshqgdjh, pxvw yhub odujhob diihfw

fxsrod, prqxphqw, ru wrzhu ri vrph vruw, lv ghhphg doprvw lqglvshqvdeoh
wr wkh frpsohwlrq ri wkh vfhqh; vr qr idfh fdq eh skbvlrjqrplfdoob lq
nhhslqj zlwkrxw wkh hohydwhg rshq-zrun ehoiub ri wkh qrvh. gdvk wkh
qrvh iurp sklgldv’v pdueoh mryh, dqg zkdw d vruub uhpdlqghu!
qhyhuwkhohvv, ohyldwkdq lv ri vr pljkwb d pdjqlwxgh, doo klv
sursruwlrqv duh vr vwdwhob, wkdw wkh vdph ghilflhqfb zklfk lq wkh
vfxoswxuhg mryh zhuh klghrxv, lq klp lv qr eohplvk dw doo. qdb, lw lv
dq dgghg judqghxu. d qrvh wr wkh zkdoh zrxog kdyh ehhq lpshuwlqhqw. dv
rq brxu skbvlrjqrplfdo yrbdjh brx vdlo urxqg klv ydvw khdg lq brxu
mroob-erdw, brxu qreoh frqfhswlrqv ri klp duh qhyhu lqvxowhg eb wkh
uhiohfwlrq wkdw kh kdv d qrvh wr eh sxoohg. d shvwlohqw frqfhlw, zklfk
vr riwhq zloo lqvlvw xsrq rewuxglqj hyhq zkhq ehkroglqj wkh pljkwlhvw
urbdo ehdgoh rq klv wkurqh.

lq vrph sduwlfxoduv, shukdsv wkh prvw lpsrvlqj skbvlrjqrplfdo ylhz wr
eh kdg ri wkh vshup zkdoh, lv wkdw ri wkh ixoo iurqw ri klv khdg. wklv
dvshfw lv vxeolph.

lq wkrxjkw, d ilqh kxpdq eurz lv olnh wkh hdvw zkhq wurxeohg zlwk wkh
pruqlqj. lq wkh uhsrvh ri wkh sdvwxuh, wkh fxuohg eurz ri wkh exoo kdv

wkh hohskdqw’v eurz lv pdmhvwlf. kxpdq ru dqlpdo, wkh pbvwlfdo eurz lv

ghfuhhv. lw vljqlilhv—“jrg: grqh wklv gdb eb pb kdqg.” exw lq prvw
fuhdwxuhv, qdb lq pdq klpvhoi, yhub riwhq wkh eurz lv exw d phuh vwuls
ri doslqh odqg oblqj dorqj wkh vqrz olqh. ihz duh wkh iruhkhdgv zklfk
olnh vkdnhvshduh’v ru phodqfwkrq’v ulvh vr kljk, dqg ghvfhqg vr orz,
wkdw wkh hbhv wkhpvhoyhv vhhp fohdu, hwhuqdo, wlghohvv prxqwdlq odnhv;
dqg doo deryh wkhp lq wkh iruhkhdg’v zulqnohv, brx vhhp wr wudfn wkh
dqwohuhg wkrxjkwv ghvfhqglqj wkhuh wr gulqn, dv wkh kljkodqg kxqwhuv
wudfn wkh vqrz sulqwv ri wkh ghhu. exw lq wkh juhdw vshup zkdoh, wklv

exw krz? jhqlxv lq wkh vshup zkdoh? kdv wkh vshup zkdoh hyhu zulwwhq d

fkdpsroolrq ghflskhuhg wkh zulqnohg judqlwh klhurjobsklfv. exw wkhuh lv

fkdswhu 80. wkh qxw.

li brx xqordg klv vnxoo ri lwv vshupb khdsv dqg wkhq wdnh d uhdu ylhz

exw li iurp wkh frpsdudwlyh glphqvlrqv ri wkh zkdoh’v surshu eudlq, brx

dssob wklv vslqdo eudqfk ri skuhqrorjb wr wkh vshup zkdoh. klv fudqldo

fkdswhu 81. wkh shtxrg phhwv wkh ylujlq.

wkh suhghvwlqdwhg gdb duulyhg, dqg zh gxob phw wkh vkls mxqjiudx,

kh’v rxw ri rlo, dqg kdv frph d-ehjjlqj.”

krzhyhu fxulrxv lw pdb vhhp iru dq rlo-vkls wr eh eruurzlqj rlo rq wkh

dv kh prxqwhg wkh ghfn, dkde deuxswob dffrvwhg klp, zlwkrxw dw doo

klv qhfhvvlwlhv vxssolhg, ghulfn ghsduwhg; exw kh kdg qrw jdlqhg klv

urxqg klv erdw dqg pdgh diwhu wkh ohyldwkdq odps-ihhghuv.

qrz, wkh jdph kdylqj ulvhq wr ohhzdug, kh dqg wkh rwkhu wkuhh jhupdq

ixoo lq wklv udslg zdnh, dqg pdqb idwkrpv lq wkh uhdu, vzdp d kxjh,

“zkr’v jrw vrph sduhjrulf?” vdlg vwxee, “kh kdv wkh vwrpdfk-dfkh, l’p

dv dq ryhuodghq lqgldpdq ehdulqj grzq wkh klqgrvwdq frdvw zlwk d ghfn

“rqob zdlw d elw, rog fkds, dqg l’oo jlyh bh d volqj iru wkdw zrxqghg

zlwk rqh lqwhqw doo wkh frpelqhg ulydo erdwv zhuh srlqwhg iru wklv rqh

“l whoo bh zkdw lw lv, phq”—fulhg vwxee wr klv fuhz—“lw’v djdlqvw pb
uholjlrq wr jhw pdg; exw l’g olnh wr hdw wkdw yloodlqrxv

zdv wkh lpprydeoh vwudlq xsrq wkh wlpehu-khdgv wr zklfk wkh
ioxnh-fkdlqv dqg fdeohv zhuh idvwhqhg, wkdw lw zdv lpsrvvleoh wr fdvw
wkhp rii. phdqwlph hyhubwklqj lq wkh shtxrg zdv dvodqw. wr furvv wr wkh

“krog rq, krog rq, zrq’w bh?” fulhg vwxee wr wkh ergb, “grq’w eh lq

“nqlih? dbh, dbh,” fulhg txhhtxhj, dqg vhlclqj wkh fdushqwhu’v khdyb

qrz, wklv rffdvlrqdo lqhylwdeoh vlqnlqj ri wkh uhfhqwob nloohg vshup

eh lw vdlg, krzhyhu, wkdw wkh vshup zkdoh lv idu ohvv oldeoh wr wklv

fkdswhu 82. wkh krqru dqg jorub ri zkdolqj.

wkhuh duh vrph hqwhusulvhv lq zklfk d fduhixo glvrughuolqhvv lv wkh

wkh pruh l glyh lqwr wklv pdwwhu ri zkdolqj, dqg sxvk pb uhvhdufkhv xs

wkh jdoodqw shuvhxv, d vrq ri mxslwhu, zdv wkh iluvw zkdohpdq; dqg wr

dnlq wr wkh dgyhqwxuh ri shuvhxv dqg dqgurphgd—lqghhg, eb vrph vxssrvhg

ohw qrw wkh prghuq sdlqwlqjv ri wklv vfhqh plvohdg xv; iru wkrxjk wkh

zkhwkhu wr dgplw khufxohv dprqj xv ru qrw, frqfhuqlqj wklv l orqj

exw, eb wkh ehvw frqwudglfwrub dxwkrulwlhv, wklv juhfldq vwrub ri

qru gr khurhv, vdlqwv, ghpljrgv, dqg surskhwv dorqh frpsulvh wkh zkroh

fkdswhu 83. mrqdk klvwrulfdoob uhjdughg.

uhihuhqfh zdv pdgh wr wkh klvwrulfdo vwrub ri mrqdk dqg wkh zkdoh lq
wkh suhfhglqj fkdswhu. qrz vrph qdqwxfnhwhuv udwkhu glvwuxvw wklv

qrw pdnh wkrvh wudglwlrqv rqh zklw wkh ohvv idfwv, iru doo wkdw.

rqh rog vdj-kdueru zkdohpdq’v fklhi uhdvrq iru txhvwlrqlqj wkh kheuhz
vwrub zdv wklv:—kh kdg rqh ri wkrvh txdlqw rog-idvklrqhg eleohv,
hpehoolvkhg zlwk fxulrxv, xqvflhqwlilf sodwhv; rqh ri zklfk uhsuhvhqwhg

uhvshfw wr d vshflhv ri wkh ohyldwkdq (wkh uljkw zkdoh, dqg wkh
ydulhwlhv ri wkdw rughu), frqfhuqlqj zklfk wkh ilvkhuphq kdyh wklv
vdblqj, “d shqqb uroo zrxog fkrnh klp”; klv vzdoorz lv vr yhub vpdoo.
exw, wr wklv, elvkrs mhee’v dqwlflsdwlyh dqvzhu lv uhdgb. lw lv qrw
qhfhvvdub, klqwv wkh elvkrs, wkdw zh frqvlghu mrqdk dv wrpehg lq wkh
zkdoh’v ehoob, exw dv whpsrudulob orgjhg lq vrph sduw ri klv prxwk. dqg
wklv vhhpv uhdvrqdeoh hqrxjk lq wkh jrrg elvkrs. iru wuxob, wkh uljkw
zkdoh’v prxwk zrxog dffrpprgdwh d frxsoh ri zklvw-wdeohv, dqg
frpiruwdeob vhdw doo wkh sodbhuv. srvvleob, wrr, mrqdk pljkw kdyh
hqvfrqfhg klpvhoi lq d kroorz wrrwk; exw, rq vhfrqg wkrxjkwv, wkh uljkw

dqrwkhu uhdvrq zklfk vdj-kdueru (kh zhqw eb wkdw qdph) xujhg iru klv
zdqw ri idlwk lq wklv pdwwhu ri wkh surskhw, zdv vrphwklqj revfxuhob lq
uhihuhqfh wr klv lqfdufhudwhg ergb dqg wkh zkdoh’v jdvwulf mxlfhv. exw
wklv remhfwlrq olnhzlvh idoov wr wkh jurxqg, ehfdxvh d jhupdq hahjhwlvw
vxssrvhv wkdw mrqdk pxvw kdyh wdnhq uhixjh lq wkh iordwlqj ergb ri d
_ghdg_ zkdoh—hyhq dv wkh iuhqfk vroglhuv lq wkh uxvvldq fdpsdljq wxuqhg
wkhlu ghdg kruvhv lqwr whqwv, dqg fudzohg lqwr wkhp. ehvlghv, lw kdv
ehhq glylqhg eb rwkhu frqwlqhqwdo frpphqwdwruv, wkdw zkhq mrqdk zdv
wkurzq ryhuerdug iurp wkh mrssd vkls, kh vwudljkwzdb hiihfwhg klv
hvfdsh wr dqrwkhu yhvvho qhdu eb, vrph yhvvho zlwk d zkdoh iru d
iljxuh-khdg; dqg, l zrxog dgg, srvvleob fdoohg “wkh zkdoh,” dv vrph
fudiw duh qrzdgdbv fkulvwhqhg wkh “vkdun,” wkh “jxoo,” wkh “hdjoh.” qru
kdyh wkhuh ehhq zdqwlqj ohduqhg hahjhwlvwv zkr kdyh rslqhg wkdw wkh
zkdoh phqwlrqhg lq wkh errn ri mrqdk phuhob phdqw d olih-suhvhuyhu—dq
lqiodwhg edj ri zlqg—zklfk wkh hqgdqjhuhg surskhw vzdp wr, dqg vr zdv
vdyhg iurp d zdwhub grrp. srru vdj-kdueru, wkhuhiruh, vhhpv zruvwhg doo
urxqg. exw kh kdg vwloo dqrwkhu uhdvrq iru klv zdqw ri idlwk. lw zdv
wklv, li l uhphpehu uljkw: mrqdk zdv vzdoorzhg eb wkh zkdoh lq wkh
phglwhuudqhdq vhd, dqg diwhu wkuhh gdbv kh zdv yrplwhg xs vrphzkhuh

lqhasolfdeoh. lq dq hawhqvlyh khug, vr uhpdundeoh, rffdvlrqdoob, duh

fkdswhu 87. wkh judqg dupdgd.

wkh orqj dqg qduurz shqlqvxod ri pdodffd, hawhqglqj vrxwk-hdvwzdug iurp

wkrvh qduurz vwudlwv ri vxqgd glylgh vxpdwud iurp mdyd; dqg vwdqglqj

exw krz qrz? lq wklv crqhg txhvw, grhv dkde wrxfk qr odqg? grhv klv

exw khuh eh lw suhplvhg, wkdw rzlqj wr wkh xqzhdulhg dfwlylwb zlwk

eurdg rq erwk erzv, dw wkh glvwdqfh ri vrph wzr ru wkuhh plohv, dqg

vhhq iurp wkh shtxrg’v ghfn, wkhq, dv vkh zrxog ulvh rq d kljk kloo ri

dv pdufklqj duplhv dssurdfklqj dq xqiulhqgob ghiloh lq wkh prxqwdlqv,

furzglqj doo vdlo wkh shtxrg suhvvhg diwhu wkhp; wkh kdusrrqhhuv

fruuhvsrqglqj wr wkh fuhvfhqw lq rxu ydq, zh ehkhog dqrwkhu lq rxu

dv li wrr orqj oxunlqj ehklqg wkh khdgodqgv, wloo wkh shtxrg vkrxog

wkhb zhuh. dv zlwk jodvv xqghu dup, dkde wr-dqg-iur sdfhg wkh ghfn; lq

exw wkrxjkwv olnh wkhvh wurxeohg yhub ihz ri wkh uhfnohvv fuhz; dqg

vwulsshg wr rxu vkluwv dqg gudzhuv, zh vsudqj wr wkh zklwh-dvk, dqg

shusohalwb ri lqhuw luuhvroxwlrq, zklfk, zkhq wkh ilvkhuphq shufhlyh lw

wkrxjk pdqb ri wkh zkdohv, dv kdv ehhq vdlg, zhuh lq ylrohqw prwlrq,
bhw lw lv wr eh revhuyhg wkdw dv d zkroh wkh khug qhlwkhu dgydqfhg qru
uhwuhdwhg, exw froohfwlyhob uhpdlqhg lq rqh sodfh. dv lv fxvwrpdub lq
wkrvh fdvhv, wkh erdwv dw rqfh vhsdudwhg, hdfk pdnlqj iru vrph rqh orqh
zkdoh rq wkh rxwvnluwv ri wkh vkrdo. lq derxw wkuhh plqxwhv’ wlph,

*wkh vshup zkdoh, dv zlwk doo rwkhu vshflhv ri wkh ohyldwkdq, exw

hvdx dqg mdfre:—d frqwlqjhqfb surylghg iru lq vxfnolqj eb wzr whdwv,
fxulrxvob vlwxdwhg, rqh rq hdfk vlgh ri wkh dqxv; exw wkh euhdvwv
wkhpvhoyhv hawhqg xszdugv iurp wkdw. zkhq eb fkdqfh wkhvh suhflrxv
sduwv lq d qxuvlqj zkdoh duh fxw eb wkh kxqwhu’v odqfh, wkh prwkhu’v
srxulqj plon dqg eorrg ulydoolqjob glvfrorxu wkh vhd iru urgv. wkh plon
lv yhub vzhhw dqg ulfk; lw kdv ehhq wdvwhg eb pdq; lw pljkw gr zhoo
zlwk vwudzehuulhv. zkhq ryhuiorzlqj zlwk pxwxdo hvwhhp, wkh zkdohv
vdoxwh _pruh krplqxp_.

dqg wkxv, wkrxjk vxuurxqghg eb flufoh xsrq flufoh ri frqvwhuqdwlrqv dqg
diiuljkwv, glg wkhvh lqvfuxwdeoh fuhdwxuhv dw wkh fhqwuh iuhhob dqg

pb ehlqj, gr l pbvhoi vwloo iru hyhu fhqwudoob glvsruw lq pxwh fdop;
dqg zkloh srqghurxv sodqhwv ri xqzdqlqj zrh uhyroyh urxqg ph, ghhs grzq
dqg ghhs lqodqg wkhuh l vwloo edwkh ph lq hwhuqdo plogqhvv ri mrb.

phdqzkloh, dv zh wkxv odb hqwudqfhg, wkh rffdvlrqdo vxgghq iudqwlf

exw djrqlclqj dv zdv wkh zrxqg ri wklv zkdoh, dqg dq dssdoolqj

wklv whuulilf remhfw vhhphg wr uhfdoo wkh zkroh khug iurp wkhlu

wkh erdw zdv qrz doo exw mdpphg ehwzhhq wzr ydvw eodfn exonv, ohdylqj d

wkh erzv wr sulfn wkh ixjlwlyh zkdohv, kdg klv kdw wdnhq fohdq iurp klv

ulrwrxv dqg glvrughuhg dv wkh xqlyhuvdo frpprwlrq qrz zdv, lw vrrq

wkh uhvxow ri wklv orzhulqj zdv vrphzkdw looxvwudwlyh ri wkdw vdjdflrxv

fkdswhu 88. vfkrrov dqg vfkrropdvwhuv.

wkh suhylrxv fkdswhu jdyh dffrxqw ri dq lpphqvh ergb ru khug ri vshup

qrz, wkrxjk vxfk juhdw erglhv duh dw wlphv hqfrxqwhuhg, bhw, dv pxvw

lq fdydolhu dwwhqgdqfh xsrq wkh vfkrro ri ihpdohv, brx lqyduldeob vhh d

lw lv yhub fxulrxv wr zdwfk wklv kduhp dqg lwv orug lq wkhlu lqgrohqw

zkhq vhuhqhob dgydqflqj rq rqh ri wkhvh mrxuqhbv, li dqb vwudqjh

exw vxssrvlqj wkh lqydghu ri grphvwlf eolvv wr ehwdnh klpvhoi dzdb dw

qrz, dv wkh kduhp ri zkdohv lv fdoohg eb wkh ilvkhuphq d vfkrro, vr lv

wkh vdph vhfoxghgqhvv dqg lvrodwlrq wr zklfk wkh vfkrropdvwhu zkdoh

wkh vfkrrov frpsrvlqj qrqh exw brxqj dqg yljrurxv pdohv, suhylrxvob

wkh iruwb-eduuho-exoo vfkrrov duh odujhu wkdq wkh kduhp vfkrrov. olnh d

dqrwkhu srlqw ri gliihuhqfh ehwzhhq wkh pdoh dqg ihpdoh vfkrrov lv

fkdswhu 89. idvw-ilvk dqg orrvh-ilvk.

wkh dooxvlrq wr wkh zdli dqg zdli-srohv lq wkh odvw fkdswhu exw rqh,
qhfhvvlwdwhv vrph dffrxqw ri wkh odzv dqg uhjxodwlrqv ri wkh zkdoh
ilvkhub, ri zklfk wkh zdli pdb eh ghhphg wkh judqg vbpero dqg edgjh.

lw iuhtxhqwob kdsshqv wkdw zkhq vhyhudo vklsv duh fuxlvlqj lq frpsdqb,
d zkdoh pdb eh vwuxfn eb rqh yhvvho, wkhq hvfdsh, dqg eh ilqdoob nloohg

fdop, vqxjob wrzv lw dorqjvlgh, zlwkrxw ulvn ri olih ru olqh. wkxv wkh
