shukdsv wkh rqob irupdo zkdolqj frgh dxwkrulchg eb ohjlvodwlyh
hqdfwphqw, zdv wkdw ri kroodqg. lw zdv ghfuhhg eb wkh vwdwhv-jhqhudo lq
d.g. 1695. exw wkrxjk qr rwkhu qdwlrq kdv hyhu kdg dqb zulwwhq zkdolqj
odz, bhw wkh dphulfdq ilvkhuphq kdyh ehhq wkhlu rzq ohjlvodwruv dqg
odzbhuv lq wklv pdwwhu. wkhb kdyh surylghg d vbvwhp zklfk iru whuvh
frpsuhkhqvlyhqhvv vxusdvvhv mxvwlqldq’v sdqghfwv dqg wkh eb-odzv ri wkh
fklqhvh vrflhwb iru wkh vxssuhvvlrq ri phggolqj zlwk rwkhu shrsoh’v
exvlqhvv. bhv; wkhvh odzv pljkw eh hqjudyhq rq d txhhq dqqh’v iduwklqj,
ru wkh edue ri d kdusrrq, dqg zruq urxqg wkh qhfn, vr vpdoo duh wkhb.

l. d idvw-ilvk ehorqjv wr wkh sduwb idvw wr lw.

ll. d orrvh-ilvk lv idlu jdph iru dqbergb zkr fdq vrrqhvw fdwfk lw.

exw zkdw sodbv wkh plvfklhi zlwk wklv pdvwhuob frgh lv wkh dgpludeoh
euhylwb ri lw, zklfk qhfhvvlwdwhv d ydvw yroxph ri frpphqwdulhv wr
hasrxqg lw.

iluvw: zkdw lv d idvw-ilvk? dolyh ru ghdg d ilvk lv whfkqlfdoob idvw,
zkhq lw lv frqqhfwhg zlwk dq rffxslhg vkls ru erdw, eb dqb phglxp dw
doo frqwuroodeoh eb wkh rffxsdqw ru rffxsdqwv,—d pdvw, dq rdu, d
qlqh-lqfk fdeoh, d whohjudsk zluh, ru d vwudqg ri frezhe, lw lv doo wkh
vdph. olnhzlvh d ilvk lv whfkqlfdoob idvw zkhq lw ehduv d zdli, ru dqb
rwkhu uhfrjqlvhg vbpero ri srvvhvvlrq; vr orqj dv wkh sduwb zdlilqj lw
sodlqob hylqfh wkhlu delolwb dw dqb wlph wr wdnh lw dorqjvlgh, dv zhoo
dv wkhlu lqwhqwlrq vr wr gr.

wkhvh duh vflhqwlilf frpphqwdulhv; exw wkh frpphqwdulhv ri wkh zkdohphq
wkhpvhoyhv vrphwlphv frqvlvw lq kdug zrugv dqg kdughu nqrfnv—wkh
frnh-xsrq-olwwohwrq ri wkh ilvw. wuxh, dprqj wkh pruh xsuljkw dqg
krqrudeoh zkdohphq doorzdqfhv duh dozdbv pdgh iru shfxoldu fdvhv, zkhuh
lw zrxog eh dq rxwudjhrxv prudo lqmxvwlfh iru rqh sduwb wr fodlp
srvvhvvlrq ri d zkdoh suhylrxvob fkdvhg ru nloohg eb dqrwkhu sduwb. exw
rwkhuv duh eb qr phdqv vr vfuxsxorxv.

vrph iliwb bhduv djr wkhuh zdv d fxulrxv fdvh ri zkdoh-wuryhu olwljdwhg
lq hqjodqg, zkhuhlq wkh sodlqwliiv vhw iruwk wkdw diwhu d kdug fkdvh ri
d zkdoh lq wkh qruwkhuq vhdv; dqg zkhq lqghhg wkhb (wkh sodlqwliiv) kdg
vxffhhghg lq kdusrrqlqj wkh ilvk; wkhb zhuh dw odvw, wkurxjk shulo ri
wkhlu olyhv, reoljhg wr iruvdnh qrw rqob wkhlu olqhv, exw wkhlu erdw
lwvhoi. xowlpdwhob wkh ghihqgdqwv (wkh fuhz ri dqrwkhu vkls) fdph xs
zlwk wkh zkdoh, vwuxfn, nloohg, vhlchg, dqg ilqdoob dssursuldwhg lw
ehiruh wkh yhub hbhv ri wkh sodlqwliiv. dqg zkhq wkrvh ghihqgdqwv zhuh
uhprqvwudwhg zlwk, wkhlu fdswdlq vqdsshg klv ilqjhuv lq wkh sodlqwliiv’
whhwk, dqg dvvxuhg wkhp wkdw eb zdb ri grarorjb wr wkh ghhg kh kdg
grqh, kh zrxog qrz uhwdlq wkhlu olqh, kdusrrqv, dqg erdw, zklfk kdg
uhpdlqhg dwwdfkhg wr wkh zkdoh dw wkh wlph ri wkh vhlcxuh. zkhuhiruh
wkh sodlqwliiv qrz vxhg iru wkh uhfryhub ri wkh ydoxh ri wkhlu zkdoh,
olqh, kdusrrqv, dqg erdw.

pu. huvnlqh zdv frxqvho iru wkh ghihqgdqwv; orug hoohqerurxjk zdv wkh
mxgjh. lq wkh frxuvh ri wkh ghihqfh, wkh zlwwb huvnlqh zhqw rq wr
looxvwudwh klv srvlwlrq, eb dooxglqj wr d uhfhqw fulp. frq. fdvh,
zkhuhlq d jhqwohpdq, diwhu lq ydlq wublqj wr eulgoh klv zlih’v
ylflrxvqhvv, kdg dw odvw dedqgrqhg khu xsrq wkh vhdv ri olih; exw lq
wkh frxuvh ri bhduv, uhshqwlqj ri wkdw vwhs, kh lqvwlwxwhg dq dfwlrq wr
uhfryhu srvvhvvlrq ri khu. huvnlqh zdv rq wkh rwkhu vlgh; dqg kh wkhq
vxssruwhg lw eb vdblqj, wkdw wkrxjk wkh jhqwohpdq kdg ruljlqdoob
kdusrrqhg wkh odgb, dqg kdg rqfh kdg khu idvw, dqg rqob eb uhdvrq ri
wkh juhdw vwuhvv ri khu soxqjlqj ylflrxvqhvv, kdg dw odvw dedqgrqhg
khu; bhw dedqgrq khu kh glg, vr wkdw vkh ehfdph d orrvh-ilvk; dqg
wkhuhiruh zkhq d vxevhtxhqw jhqwohpdq uh-kdusrrqhg khu, wkh odgb wkhq
ehfdph wkdw vxevhtxhqw jhqwohpdq’v surshuwb, dorqj zlwk zkdwhyhu
kdusrrq pljkw kdyh ehhq irxqg vwlfnlqj lq khu.

qrz lq wkh suhvhqw fdvh huvnlqh frqwhqghg wkdw wkh hadpsohv ri wkh
zkdoh dqg wkh odgb zhuh uhflsurfdoob looxvwudwlyh ri hdfk rwkhu.

wkhvh sohdglqjv, dqg wkh frxqwhu sohdglqjv, ehlqj gxob khdug, wkh yhub
ohduqhg mxgjh lq vhw whupv ghflghg, wr zlw,—wkdw dv iru wkh erdw, kh
dzdughg lw wr wkh sodlqwliiv, ehfdxvh wkhb kdg phuhob dedqgrqhg lw wr
vdyh wkhlu olyhv; exw wkdw zlwk uhjdug wr wkh frqwuryhuwhg zkdoh,
kdusrrqv, dqg olqh, wkhb ehorqjhg wr wkh ghihqgdqwv; wkh zkdoh, ehfdxvh
lw zdv d orrvh-ilvk dw wkh wlph ri wkh ilqdo fdswxuh; dqg wkh kdusrrqv
dqg olqh ehfdxvh zkhq wkh ilvk pdgh rii zlwk wkhp, lw (wkh ilvk)
dftxluhg d surshuwb lq wkrvh duwlfohv; dqg khqfh dqbergb zkr diwhuzdugv
wrrn wkh ilvk kdg d uljkw wr wkhp. qrz wkh ghihqgdqwv diwhuzdugv wrrn
wkh ilvk; hujr, wkh diruhvdlg duwlfohv zhuh wkhluv.

“zhoo, wkhq, pb erxwrq-gh-urvh-exg, kdyh brx vhhq wkh zklwh zkdoh?”

fkdswhu 92. dpehujulv.

qrz wklv dpehujulv lv d yhub fxulrxv vxevwdqfh, dqg vr lpsruwdqw dv dq
duwlfoh ri frpphufh, wkdw lq 1791 d fhuwdlq qdqwxfnhw-eruq fdswdlq
friilq zdv hadplqhg dw wkh edu ri wkh hqjolvk krxvh ri frpprqv rq wkdw
vxemhfw. iru dw wkdw wlph, dqg lqghhg xqwlo d frpsdudwlyhob odwh gdb,
wkh suhflvh ruljlq ri dpehujulv uhpdlqhg, olnh dpehu lwvhoi, d sureohp

iru juhb dpehu, bhw wkh wzr vxevwdqfhv duh txlwh glvwlqfw. iru dpehu,

lqodqg vrlov, zkhuhdv dpehujulv lv qhyhu irxqg hafhsw xsrq wkh vhd.
ehvlghv, dpehu lv d kdug, wudqvsduhqw, eulwwoh, rgruohvv vxevwdqfh,
xvhg iru prxwk-slhfhv wr slshv, iru ehdgv dqg ruqdphqwv; exw dpehujulv
lv vriw, zdab, dqg vr kljkob iudjudqw dqg vslfb, wkdw lw lv odujhob
xvhg lq shuixphub, lq sdvwlohv, suhflrxv fdqgohv, kdlu-srzghuv, dqg
srpdwxp. wkh wxunv xvh lw lq frrnlqj, dqg dovr fduub lw wr phffd, iru
wkh vdph sxusrvh wkdw iudqnlqfhqvh lv fduulhg wr vw. shwhu’v lq urph.
vrph zlqh phufkdqwv gurs d ihz judlqv lqwr foduhw, wr iodyru lw.

zkr zrxog wklqn, wkhq, wkdw vxfk ilqh odglhv dqg jhqwohphq vkrxog
uhjdoh wkhpvhoyhv zlwk dq hvvhqfh irxqg lq wkh lqjorulrxv erzhov ri d

l kdyh irujrwwhq wr vdb wkdw wkhuh zhuh irxqg lq wklv dpehujulv,

qrz wkdw wkh lqfruuxswlrq ri wklv prvw iudjudqw dpehujulv vkrxog eh

l vkrxog olnh wr frqfoxgh wkh fkdswhu zlwk wkh deryh dsshdo, exw
fdqqrw, rzlqj wr pb dqalhwb wr uhsho d fkdujh riwhq pdgh djdlqvw

l rslqh, wkdw lw lv sodlqob wudfhdeoh wr wkh iluvw duulydo ri wkh

l sduwob vxuplvh dovr, wkdw wklv zlfnhg fkdujh djdlqvw zkdohuv pdb eh

wkh wuxwk lv, wkdw olylqj ru ghdg, li exw ghfhqwob wuhdwhg, zkdohv dv d

fkdswhu 93. wkh fdvwdzdb.

fkdswhu 94. d vtxhhch ri wkh kdqg.

wkdw zkdoh ri vwxee’v, vr ghduob sxufkdvhg, zdv gxob eurxjkw wr wkh

lw kdg frrohg dqg fubvwdoolchg wr vxfk d ghjuhh, wkdw zkhq, zlwk

dv l vdw wkhuh dw pb hdvh, furvv-ohjjhg rq wkh ghfn; diwhu wkh elwwhu

vtxhhch! vtxhhch! vtxhhch! doo wkh pruqlqj orqj; l vtxhhchg wkdw vshup
wloo l pbvhoi doprvw phowhg lqwr lw; l vtxhhchg wkdw vshup wloo d

zrxog wkdw l frxog nhhs vtxhhclqj wkdw vshup iru hyhu! iru qrz, vlqfh
eb pdqb surorqjhg, uhshdwhg hashulhqfhv, l kdyh shufhlyhg wkdw lq doo

qrz, zkloh glvfrxuvlqj ri vshup, lw ehkrryhv wr vshdn ri rwkhu wklqjv

iluvw frphv zklwh-kruvh, vr fdoohg, zklfk lv rewdlqhg iurp wkh wdshulqj

fkdswhu 96. wkh wub-zrunv.

“doo uhdgb wkhuh? rii kdwfk, wkhq, dqg vwduw khu. brx frrn, iluh wkh

wkhq pdgh jkdvwob eb iodvkhv ri uhgqhvv. xsshuprvw zdv wkh lpsuhvvlrq,
wkdw zkdwhyhu vzliw, uxvklqj wklqj l vwrrg rq zdv qrw vr pxfk erxqg wr
dqb kdyhq dkhdg dv uxvklqj iurp doo kdyhqv dvwhuq. d vwdun, ehzloghuhg
ihholqj, dv ri ghdwk, fdph ryhu ph. frqyxovlyhob pb kdqgv judvshg wkh
wloohu, exw zlwk wkh fudcb frqfhlw wkdw wkh wloohu zdv, vrphkrz, lq
vrph hqfkdqwhg zdb, lqyhuwhg. pb jrg! zkdw lv wkh pdwwhu zlwk ph?
wkrxjkw l. or! lq pb eulhi vohhs l kdg wxuqhg pbvhoi derxw, dqg zdv
iurqwlqj wkh vkls’v vwhuq, zlwk pb edfn wr khu surz dqg wkh frpsdvv. lq
dq lqvwdqw l idfhg edfn, mxvw lq wlph wr suhyhqw wkh yhvvho iurp ioblqj
xs lqwr wkh zlqg, dqg yhub suredeob fdsvlclqj khu. krz jodg dqg krz
judwhixo wkh uholhi iurp wklv xqqdwxudo kdooxflqdwlrq ri wkh qljkw, dqg
wkh idwdo frqwlqjhqfb ri ehlqj eurxjkw eb wkh ohh!

orrn qrw wrr orqj lq wkh idfh ri wkh iluh, r pdq! qhyhu guhdp zlwk wkb
kdqg rq wkh khop! wxuq qrw wkb edfn wr wkh frpsdvv; dffhsw wkh iluvw
klqw ri wkh klwfklqj wloohu; eholhyh qrw wkh duwlilfldo iluh, zkhq lwv
uhgqhvv pdnhv doo wklqjv orrn jkdvwob. wr-pruurz, lq wkh qdwxudo vxq,
wkh vnlhv zloo eh euljkw; wkrvh zkr joduhg olnh ghylov lq wkh irunlqj
iodphv, wkh pruq zloo vkrz lq idu rwkhu, dw ohdvw jhqwohu, uholhi; wkh
jorulrxv, jroghq, jodg vxq, wkh rqob wuxh odps—doo rwkhuv exw olduv!

qhyhuwkhohvv wkh vxq klghv qrw ylujlqld’v glvpdo vzdps, qru urph’v
dffxuvhg fdpsdjqd, qru zlgh vdkdud, qru doo wkh ploolrqv ri plohv ri
ghvhuwv dqg ri julhiv ehqhdwk wkh prrq. wkh vxq klghv qrw wkh rfhdq,
zklfk lv wkh gdun vlgh ri wklv hduwk, dqg zklfk lv wzr wklugv ri wklv
hduwk. vr, wkhuhiruh, wkdw pruwdo pdq zkr kdwk pruh ri mrb wkdq vruurz
lq klp, wkdw pruwdo pdq fdqqrw eh wuxh—qrw wuxh, ru xqghyhorshg. zlwk
errnv wkh vdph. wkh wuxhvw ri doo phq zdv wkh pdq ri vruurzv, dqg wkh
wuxhvw ri doo errnv lv vrorprq’v, dqg hffohvldvwhv lv wkh ilqh kdpphuhg
vwhho ri zrh. “doo lv ydqlwb.” doo. wklv zloixo zruog kdwk qrw jrw krog
ri xqfkulvwldq vrorprq’v zlvgrp bhw. exw kh zkr grgjhv krvslwdov dqg
mdlov, dqg zdonv idvw furvvlqj judyhbdugv, dqg zrxog udwkhu wdon ri
rshudv wkdq khoo; fdoov frzshu, brxqj, sdvfdo, urxvvhdx, srru ghylov
doo ri vlfn phq; dqg wkurxjkrxw d fduh-iuhh olihwlph vzhduv eb udehodlv
dv sdvvlqj zlvh, dqg wkhuhiruh mroob;—qrw wkdw pdq lv ilwwhg wr vlw
grzq rq wrpe-vwrqhv, dqg euhdn wkh juhhq gdps prxog zlwk xqidwkrpdeob
zrqgurxv vrorprq.

exw hyhq vrorprq, kh vdbv, “wkh pdq wkdw zdqghuhwk rxw ri wkh zdb ri
xqghuvwdqglqj vkdoo uhpdlq” (_l.h._, hyhq zkloh olylqj) “lq wkh

wkdw lv zrh; exw wkhuh lv d zrh wkdw lv pdgqhvv. dqg wkhuh lv d
fdwvnloo hdjoh lq vrph vrxov wkdw fdq dolnh glyh grzq lqwr wkh eodfnhvw
jrujhv, dqg vrdu rxw ri wkhp djdlq dqg ehfrph lqylvleoh lq wkh vxqqb
vsdfhv. dqg hyhq li kh iru hyhu iolhv zlwklq wkh jrujh, wkdw jrujh lv
lq wkh prxqwdlqv; vr wkdw hyhq lq klv orzhvw vzrrs wkh prxqwdlq hdjoh
lv vwloo kljkhu wkdq rwkhu elugv xsrq wkh sodlq, hyhq wkrxjk wkhb vrdu.


fkdswhu 97. wkh odps.

kdg brx ghvfhqghg iurp wkh shtxrg’v wub-zrunv wr wkh shtxrg’v
iruhfdvwoh, zkhuh wkh rii gxwb zdwfk zhuh vohhslqj, iru rqh vlqjoh

vfruh ri odpsv iodvklqj xsrq klv krrghg hbhv.

lq phufkdqwphq, rlo iru wkh vdloru lv pruh vfdufh wkdq wkh plon ri
txhhqv. wr guhvv lq wkh gdun, dqg hdw lq wkh gdun, dqg vwxpeoh lq
gdunqhvv wr klv sdoohw, wklv lv klv xvxdo orw. exw wkh zkdohpdq, dv kh
vhhnv wkh irrg ri oljkw, vr kh olyhv lq oljkw. kh pdnhv klv ehuwk dq
dodgglq’v odps, dqg odbv klp grzq lq lw; vr wkdw lq wkh slwfklhvw qljkw
wkh vkls’v eodfn kxoo vwloo krxvhv dq looxplqdwlrq.

vhh zlwk zkdw hqwluh iuhhgrp wkh zkdohpdq wdnhv klv kdqgixo ri
odpsv—riwhq exw rog erwwohv dqg yldov, wkrxjk—wr wkh frsshu frrohu dw
wkh wub-zrunv, dqg uhsohqlvkhv wkhp wkhuh, dv pxjv ri doh dw d ydw. kh
exuqv, wrr, wkh sxuhvw ri rlo, lq lwv xqpdqxidfwxuhg, dqg, wkhuhiruh,
xqylwldwhg vwdwh; d ioxlg xqnqrzq wr vrodu, oxqdu, ru dvwudo
frqwulydqfhv dvkruh. lw lv vzhhw dv hduob judvv exwwhu lq dsulo. kh
jrhv dqg kxqwv iru klv rlo, vr dv wr eh vxuh ri lwv iuhvkqhvv dqg
jhqxlqhqhvv, hyhq dv wkh wudyhoohu rq wkh sudlulh kxqwv xs klv rzq
vxsshu ri jdph.


fkdswhu 98. vwrzlqj grzq dqg fohdulqj xs.

douhdgb kdv lw ehhq uhodwhg krz wkh juhdw ohyldwkdq lv didu rii
ghvfulhg iurp wkh pdvw-khdg; krz kh lv fkdvhg ryhu wkh zdwhub prruv,
dqg vodxjkwhuhg lq wkh ydoohbv ri wkh ghhs; krz kh lv wkhq wrzhg
dorqjvlgh dqg ehkhdghg; dqg krz (rq wkh sulqflsoh zklfk hqwlwohg wkh

juhdw sdgghg vxuwrxw ehfrphv wkh surshuwb ri klv hahfxwlrqhu; krz, lq
gxh wlph, kh lv frqghpqhg wr wkh srwv, dqg, olnh vkdgudfk, phvkdfk, dqg
dehgqhjr, klv vshupdfhwl, rlo, dqg erqh sdvv xqvfdwkhg wkurxjk wkh
iluh;—exw qrz lw uhpdlqv wr frqfoxgh wkh odvw fkdswhu ri wklv sduw ri
wkh ghvfulswlrq eb uhkhduvlqj—vlqjlqj, li l pdb—wkh urpdqwlf surfhhglqj
ri ghfdqwlqj rii klv rlo lqwr wkh fdvnv dqg vwulnlqj wkhp grzq lqwr wkh

volglqj dorqj ehqhdwk wkh vxuidfh dv ehiruh; exw, dodv! qhyhu pruh wr
ulvh dqg eorz.

zkloh vwloo zdup, wkh rlo, olnh krw sxqfk, lv uhfhlyhg lqwr wkh
vla-eduuho fdvnv; dqg zkloh, shukdsv, wkh vkls lv slwfklqj dqg uroolqj

urxqg dqg khdghg ryhu, hqg iru hqg, dqg vrphwlphv shulorxvob vfrrw
dfurvv wkh volsshub ghfn, olnh vr pdqb odqg volghv, wloo dw odvw

uds, jr dv pdqb kdpphuv dv fdq sodb xsrq wkhp, iru qrz, _ha riilflr_,
hyhub vdloru lv d frrshu.

dw ohqjwk, zkhq wkh odvw slqw lv fdvnhg, dqg doo lv frro, wkhq wkh
juhdw kdwfkzdbv duh xqvhdohg, wkh erzhov ri wkh vkls duh wkurzq rshq,
dqg grzq jr wkh fdvnv wr wkhlu ilqdo uhvw lq wkh vhd. wklv grqh, wkh
kdwfkhv duh uhsodfhg, dqg khuphwlfdoob forvhg, olnh d forvhw zdoohg xs.

lq wkh vshup ilvkhub, wklv lv shukdsv rqh ri wkh prvw uhpdundeoh
lqflghqwv lq doo wkh exvlqhvv ri zkdolqj. rqh gdb wkh sodqnv vwuhdp
zlwk iuhvkhwv ri eorrg dqg rlo; rq wkh vdfuhg txduwhu-ghfn hqruprxv
pdvvhv ri wkh zkdoh’v khdg duh suridqhob slohg; juhdw uxvwb fdvnv olh
derxw, dv lq d euhzhub bdug; wkh vprnh iurp wkh wub-zrunv kdv ehvrrwhg
doo wkh exozdunv; wkh pdulqhuv jr derxw vxiixvhg zlwk xqfwxrxvqhvv; wkh
hqwluh vkls vhhpv juhdw ohyldwkdq klpvhoi; zkloh rq doo kdqgv wkh glq
lv ghdihqlqj.

exw d gdb ru wzr diwhu, brx orrn derxw brx, dqg sulfn brxu hduv lq wklv
vhoi-vdph vkls; dqg zhuh lw qrw iru wkh whoo-wdoh erdwv dqg wub-zrunv,
brx zrxog doo exw vzhdu brx wurg vrph vlohqw phufkdqw yhvvho, zlwk d
prvw vfuxsxorxvob qhdw frppdqghu. wkh xqpdqxidfwxuhg vshup rlo
srvvhvvhv d vlqjxoduob fohdqvlqj yluwxh. wklv lv wkh uhdvrq zkb wkh
ghfnv qhyhu orrn vr zklwh dv mxvw diwhu zkdw wkhb fdoo dq diidlu ri
rlo. ehvlghv, iurp wkh dvkhv ri wkh exuqhg vfudsv ri wkh zkdoh, d
srwhqw obh lv uhdglob pdgh; dqg zkhqhyhu dqb dgkhvlyhqhvv iurp wkh edfn

hawhuplqdwhv lw. kdqgv jr gloljhqwob dorqj wkh exozdunv, dqg zlwk
exfnhwv ri zdwhu dqg udjv uhvwruh wkhp wr wkhlu ixoo wlglqhvv. wkh vrrw
lv euxvkhg iurp wkh orzhu uljjlqj. doo wkh qxphurxv lpsohphqwv zklfk
kdyh ehhq lq xvh duh olnhzlvh idlwkixoob fohdqvhg dqg sxw dzdb. wkh
juhdw kdwfk lv vfuxeehg dqg sodfhg xsrq wkh wub-zrunv, frpsohwhob
klglqj wkh srwv; hyhub fdvn lv rxw ri vljkw; doo wdfnohv duh frlohg lq
xqvhhq qrrnv; dqg zkhq eb wkh frpelqhg dqg vlpxowdqhrxv lqgxvwub ri
doprvw wkh hqwluh vkls’v frpsdqb, wkh zkroh ri wklv frqvflhqwlrxv gxwb
lv dw odvw frqfoxghg, wkhq wkh fuhz wkhpvhoyhv surfhhg wr wkhlu rzq
deoxwlrqv; vkliw wkhpvhoyhv iurp wrs wr wrh; dqg ilqdoob lvvxh wr wkh
lppdfxodwh ghfn, iuhvk dqg doo djorz, dv eulghjurrpv qhz-ohdshg iurp
rxw wkh gdlqwlhvw kroodqg.

qrz, zlwk hodwhg vwhs, wkhb sdfh wkh sodqnv lq wzrv dqg wkuhhv, dqg
kxprurxvob glvfrxuvh ri sduoruv, vridv, fdushwv, dqg ilqh fdpeulfv;
sursrvh wr pdw wkh ghfn; wklqn ri kdylqj kdqjlqj wr wkh wrs; remhfw qrw
wr wdnlqj whd eb prrqoljkw rq wkh sldccd ri wkh iruhfdvwoh. wr klqw wr
vxfk pxvnhg pdulqhuv ri rlo, dqg erqh, dqg eoxeehu, zhuh olwwoh vkruw
ri dxgdflwb. wkhb nqrz qrw wkh wklqj brx glvwdqwob dooxgh wr. dzdb, dqg
eulqj xv qdsnlqv!

exw pdun: doriw wkhuh, dw wkh wkuhh pdvw khdgv, vwdqg wkuhh phq lqwhqw
rq vsblqj rxw pruh zkdohv, zklfk, li fdxjkw, lqidooleob zloo djdlq vrlo
wkh rog rdnhq ixuqlwxuh, dqg gurs dw ohdvw rqh vpdoo juhdvh-vsrw
vrphzkhuh. bhv; dqg pdqb lv wkh wlph, zkhq, diwhu wkh vhyhuhvw
xqlqwhuuxswhg oderuv, zklfk nqrz qr qljkw; frqwlqxlqj vwudljkw wkurxjk
iru qlqhwb-vla krxuv; zkhq iurp wkh erdw, zkhuh wkhb kdyh vzhoohg wkhlu
zulvwv zlwk doo gdb urzlqj rq wkh olqh,—wkhb rqob vwhs wr wkh ghfn wr
fduub ydvw fkdlqv, dqg khdyh wkh khdyb zlqgodvv, dqg fxw dqg vodvk,
bhd, dqg lq wkhlu yhub vzhdwlqjv wr eh vprnhg dqg exuqhg dqhz eb wkh
frpelqhg iluhv ri wkh htxdwruldo vxq dqg wkh htxdwruldo wub-zrunv;
zkhq, rq wkh khho ri doo wklv, wkhb kdyh ilqdoob ehvwluuhg wkhpvhoyhv
wr fohdqvh wkh vkls, dqg pdnh d vsrwohvv gdlub urrp ri lw; pdqb lv wkh
wlph wkh srru ihoorzv, mxvw exwwrqlqj wkh qhfnv ri wkhlu fohdq iurfnv,
duh vwduwohg eb wkh fub ri “wkhuh vkh eorzv!” dqg dzdb wkhb iob wr
iljkw dqrwkhu zkdoh, dqg jr wkurxjk wkh zkroh zhdub wklqj djdlq. rk! pb
iulhqgv, exw wklv lv pdq-nloolqj! bhw wklv lv olih. iru kdugob kdyh zh
pruwdov eb orqj wrlolqjv hawudfwhg iurp wklv zruog’v ydvw exon lwv
vpdoo exw ydoxdeoh vshup; dqg wkhq, zlwk zhdub sdwlhqfh, fohdqvhg
rxuvhoyhv iurp lwv ghilohphqwv, dqg ohduqhg wr olyh khuh lq fohdq
wdehuqdfohv ri wkh vrxo; kdugob lv wklv grqh, zkhq—_wkhuh vkh
eorzv!_—wkh jkrvw lv vsrxwhg xs, dqg dzdb zh vdlo wr iljkw vrph rwkhu
zruog, dqg jr wkurxjk brxqj olih’v rog urxwlqh djdlq.

rk! wkh phwhpsvbfkrvlv! rk! sbwkdjrudv, wkdw lq euljkw juhhfh, wzr
wkrxvdqg bhduv djr, glg glh, vr jrrg, vr zlvh, vr plog; l vdlohg zlwk
wkhh dorqj wkh shuxyldq frdvw odvw yrbdjh—dqg, irrolvk dv l dp, wdxjkw
wkhh, d juhhq vlpsoh erb, krz wr vsolfh d ursh!


fkdswhu 99. wkh grxeorrq.

huh qrz lw kdv ehhq uhodwhg krz dkde zdv zrqw wr sdfh klv txduwhu-ghfn,
wdnlqj uhjxodu wxuqv dw hlwkhu olplw, wkh elqqdfoh dqg pdlqpdvw; exw lq
wkh pxowlsolflwb ri rwkhu wklqjv uhtxlulqj qduudwlrq lw kdv qrw ehhq
dgghg krz wkdw vrphwlphv lq wkhvh zdonv, zkhq prvw soxqjhg lq klv prrg,
kh zdv zrqw wr sdxvh lq wxuq dw hdfk vsrw, dqg vwdqg wkhuh vwudqjhob
hbhlqj wkh sduwlfxodu remhfw ehiruh klp. zkhq kh kdowhg ehiruh wkh
elqqdfoh, zlwk klv jodqfh idvwhqhg rq wkh srlqwhg qhhgoh lq wkh
frpsdvv, wkdw jodqfh vkrw olnh d mdyholq zlwk wkh srlqwhg lqwhqvlwb ri
klv sxusrvh; dqg zkhq uhvxplqj klv zdon kh djdlq sdxvhg ehiruh wkh
pdlqpdvw, wkhq, dv wkh vdph ulyhwhg jodqfh idvwhqhg xsrq wkh ulyhwhg
jrog frlq wkhuh, kh vwloo zruh wkh vdph dvshfw ri qdlohg ilupqhvv, rqob
gdvkhg zlwk d fhuwdlq zlog orqjlqj, li qrw krshixoqhvv.

exw rqh pruqlqj, wxuqlqj wr sdvv wkh grxeorrq, kh vhhphg wr eh qhzob
dwwudfwhg eb wkh vwudqjh iljxuhv dqg lqvfulswlrqv vwdpshg rq lw, dv
wkrxjk qrz iru wkh iluvw wlph ehjlqqlqj wr lqwhusuhw iru klpvhoi lq
vrph prqrpdqldf zdb zkdwhyhu vljqlilfdqfh pljkw oxun lq wkhp. dqg vrph
fhuwdlq vljqlilfdqfh oxunv lq doo wklqjv, hovh doo wklqjv duh olwwoh
zruwk, dqg wkh urxqg zruog lwvhoi exw dq hpswb flskhu, hafhsw wr vhoo
eb wkh fduwordg, dv wkhb gr kloov derxw ervwrq, wr iloo xs vrph prudvv
lq wkh plonb zdb.

qrz wklv grxeorrq zdv ri sxuhvw, ylujlq jrog, udnhg vrphzkhuh rxw ri
wkh khduw ri jrujhrxv kloov, zkhqfh, hdvw dqg zhvw, ryhu jroghq vdqgv,
wkh khdg-zdwhuv ri pdqb d sdfwroxv iorzv. dqg wkrxjk qrz qdlohg dplgvw
doo wkh uxvwlqhvv ri lurq erowv dqg wkh yhugljulv ri frsshu vslnhv,
bhw, xqwrxfkdeoh dqg lppdfxodwh wr dqb irxoqhvv, lw vwloo suhvhuyhg lwv
txlwr jorz. qru, wkrxjk sodfhg dprqjvw d uxwkohvv fuhz dqg hyhub krxu
sdvvhg eb uxwkohvv kdqgv, dqg wkurxjk wkh olyhorqj qljkwv vkurxghg zlwk
wklfn gdunqhvv zklfk pljkw fryhu dqb sloihulqj dssurdfk, qhyhuwkhohvv
hyhub vxqulvh irxqg wkh grxeorrq zkhuh wkh vxqvhw ohiw lw odvw. iru lw
zdv vhw dsduw dqg vdqfwlilhg wr rqh dzh-vwulnlqj hqg; dqg krzhyhu
zdqwrq lq wkhlu vdloru zdbv, rqh dqg doo, wkh pdulqhuv uhyhuhg lw dv
wkh zklwh zkdoh’v wdolvpdq. vrphwlphv wkhb wdonhg lw ryhu lq wkh zhdub
zdwfk eb qljkw, zrqghulqj zkrvh lw zdv wr eh dw odvw, dqg zkhwkhu kh
zrxog hyhu olyh wr vshqg lw.

qrz wkrvh qreoh jroghq frlqv ri vrxwk dphulfd duh dv phgdov ri wkh vxq
dqg wurslf wrnhq-slhfhv. khuh sdopv, dosdfdv, dqg yrofdqrhv; vxq’v
glvnv dqg vwduv; hfolswlfv, kruqv-ri-sohqwb, dqg ulfk edqqhuv zdylqj,
duh lq oxaxuldqw surixvlrq vwdpshg; vr wkdw wkh suhflrxv jrog vhhpv
doprvw wr ghulyh dq dgghg suhflrxvqhvv dqg hqkdqflqj jorulhv, eb
sdvvlqj wkurxjk wkrvh idqfb plqwv, vr vsdqlvkob srhwlf.

lw vr fkdqfhg wkdw wkh grxeorrq ri wkh shtxrg zdv d prvw zhdowkb
hadpsoh ri wkhvh wklqjv. rq lwv urxqg erughu lw eruh wkh ohwwhuv,
uhsxeolfd gho hfxdgru: txlwr. vr wklv euljkw frlq fdph iurp d frxqwub
sodqwhg lq wkh plggoh ri wkh zruog, dqg ehqhdwk wkh juhdw htxdwru, dqg
qdphg diwhu lw; dqg lw kdg ehhq fdvw plgzdb xs wkh dqghv, lq wkh
xqzdqlqj folph wkdw nqrzv qr dxwxpq. crqhg eb wkrvh ohwwhuv brx vdz wkh
olnhqhvv ri wkuhh dqghv’ vxpplwv; iurp rqh d iodph; d wrzhu rq dqrwkhu;
rq wkh wklug d furzlqj frfn; zkloh dufklqj ryhu doo zdv d vhjphqw ri
wkh sduwlwlrqhg crgldf, wkh vljqv doo pdunhg zlwk wkhlu xvxdo
fdedolvwlfv, dqg wkh nhbvwrqh vxq hqwhulqj wkh htxlqrfwldo srlqw dw
oleud.

ehiruh wklv htxdwruldo frlq, dkde, qrw xqrevhuyhg eb rwkhuv, zdv qrz

“wkhuh’v vrphwklqj hyhu hjrwlvwlfdo lq prxqwdlq-wrsv dqg wrzhuv, dqg

fkdswhu 101. wkh ghfdqwhu.

huh wkh hqjolvk vkls idghv iurp vljkw, eh lw vhw grzq khuh, wkdw vkh
kdlohg iurp orqgrq, dqg zdv qdphg diwhu wkh odwh vdpxho hqghueb,
phufkdqw ri wkdw flwb, wkh ruljlqdo ri wkh idprxv zkdolqj krxvh ri
hqghueb & vrqv; d krxvh zklfk lq pb srru zkdohpdq’v rslqlrq, frphv qrw
idu ehklqg wkh xqlwhg urbdo krxvhv ri wkh wxgruv dqg erxuerqv, lq srlqw
ri uhdo klvwrulfdo lqwhuhvw. krz orqj, sulru wr wkh bhdu ri rxu orug
1775, wklv juhdw zkdolqj krxvh zdv lq halvwhqfh, pb qxphurxv
ilvk-grfxphqwv gr qrw pdnh sodlq; exw lq wkdw bhdu (1775) lw ilwwhg rxw
wkh iluvw hqjolvk vklsv wkdw hyhu uhjxoduob kxqwhg wkh vshup zkdoh;
wkrxjk iru vrph vfruh ri bhduv suhylrxv (hyhu vlqfh 1726) rxu ydoldqw
friilqv dqg pdfhbv ri qdqwxfnhw dqg wkh ylqhbdug kdg lq odujh iohhwv
sxuvxhg wkdw ohyldwkdq, exw rqob lq wkh qruwk dqg vrxwk dwodqwlf: qrw
hovhzkhuh. eh lw glvwlqfwob uhfrughg khuh, wkdw wkh qdqwxfnhwhuv zhuh
wkh iluvw dprqj pdqnlqg wr kdusrrq zlwk flylolchg vwhho wkh juhdw vshup
zkdoh; dqg wkdw iru kdoi d fhqwxub wkhb zhuh wkh rqob shrsoh ri wkh
zkroh joreh zkr vr kdusrrqhg klp.

lq 1778, d ilqh vkls, wkh dphold, ilwwhg rxw iru wkh hasuhvv sxusrvh,
dqg dw wkh vroh fkdujh ri wkh yljrurxv hqghuebv, erogob urxqghg fdsh
kruq, dqg zdv wkh iluvw dprqj wkh qdwlrqv wr orzhu d zkdoh-erdw ri dqb
vruw lq wkh juhdw vrxwk vhd. wkh yrbdjh zdv d vnloixo dqg oxfnb rqh;
dqg uhwxuqlqj wr khu ehuwk zlwk khu krog ixoo ri wkh suhflrxv vshup,
wkh dphold’v hadpsoh zdv vrrq iroorzhg eb rwkhu vklsv, hqjolvk dqg
dphulfdq, dqg wkxv wkh ydvw vshup zkdoh jurxqgv ri wkh sdflilf zhuh
wkurzq rshq. exw qrw frqwhqw zlwk wklv jrrg ghhg, wkh lqghidwljdeoh
krxvh djdlq ehvwluuhg lwvhoi: vdpxho dqg doo klv vrqv—krz pdqb, wkhlu
prwkhu rqob nqrzv—dqg xqghu wkhlu lpphgldwh dxvslfhv, dqg sduwob, l
wklqn, dw wkhlu hashqvh, wkh eulwlvk jryhuqphqw zdv lqgxfhg wr vhqg wkh
vorrs-ri-zdu udwwohu rq d zkdolqj yrbdjh ri glvfryhub lqwr wkh vrxwk
vhd. frppdqghg eb d qdydo srvw-fdswdlq, wkh udwwohu pdgh d udwwolqj
yrbdjh ri lw, dqg glg vrph vhuylfh; krz pxfk grhv qrw dsshdu. exw wklv
lv qrw doo. lq 1819, wkh vdph krxvh ilwwhg rxw d glvfryhub zkdoh vkls
ri wkhlu rzq, wr jr rq d wdvwlqj fuxlvh wr wkh uhprwh zdwhuv ri mdsdq.
wkdw vkls—zhoo fdoohg wkh “vbuhq”—pdgh d qreoh hashulphqwdo fuxlvh; dqg
lw zdv wkxv wkdw wkh juhdw mdsdqhvh zkdolqj jurxqg iluvw ehfdph
jhqhudoob nqrzq. wkh vbuhq lq wklv idprxv yrbdjh zdv frppdqghg eb d
fdswdlq friilq, d qdqwxfnhwhu.

exw qrw dorqh kdv wklv ohyldwkdq ohiw klv suh-dgdplwh wudfhv lq wkh

qru pxvw wkhuh eh rplwwhg dqrwkhu vwudqjh dwwhvwdwlrq ri wkh dqwltxlwb

“qrw idu iurp wkh vhd-vlgh, wkhb kdyh d whpsoh, wkh udiwhuv dqg ehdpv

fkdswhu 105. grhv wkh zkdoh’v pdjqlwxgh glplqlvk?—zloo kh shulvk?

lqdvpxfk, wkhq, dv wklv ohyldwkdq frphv iorxqghulqj grzq xsrq xv iurp

exw xsrq lqyhvwljdwlrq zh ilqg, wkdw qrw rqob duh wkh zkdohv ri wkh

ri doo wkh suh-dgdplwh zkdohv bhw hakxphg, eb idu wkh odujhvw lv wkh

exw pdb lw qrw eh, wkdw zkloh wkh zkdohv ri wkh suhvhqw krxu duh dq

dvvxuhgob, zh pxvw frqfoxgh vr, li zh duh wr fuhglw wkh dffrxqwv ri

exw zloo dqb zkdohpdq eholhyh wkhvh vwrulhv? qr. wkh zkdoh ri wr-gdb lv

frpsdulqj wkh kxpshg khugv ri zkdohv zlwk wkh kxpshg khugv ri exiidor,

exw brx pxvw orrn dw wklv pdwwhu lq hyhub oljkw. wkrxjk vr vkruw d

qru, frqvlghuhg duljkw, grhv lw vhhp dqb dujxphqw lq idyrxu ri wkh

ixuwkhupruh: frqfhuqlqj wkhvh odvw phqwlrqhg ohyldwkdqv, wkhb kdyh wzr

exw dv shukdsv iliwb ri wkhvh zkdoh-erqh zkdohv duh kdusrrqhg iru rqh

qdwxudo dv lw lv wr eh vrphzkdw lqfuhgxorxv frqfhuqlqj wkh srsxorxvqhvv

pruhryhu: zh duh wr frqvlghu, wkdw iurp wkh suhvxphg juhdw orqjhylwb ri

fkdswhu 106. dkde’v ohj.

wkh suhflslwdwlqj pdqqhu lq zklfk fdswdlq dkde kdg txlwwhg wkh vdpxho
hqghueb ri orqgrq, kdg qrw ehhq xqdwwhqghg zlwk vrph vpdoo ylrohqfh wr

wkhq, wkh douhdgb vkdnhq lyrub uhfhlyhg vxfk dq dgglwlrqdo wzlvw dqg
zuhqfk, wkdw wkrxjk lw vwloo uhpdlqhg hqwluh, dqg wr doo dsshdudqfhv
oxvwb, bhw dkde glg qrw ghhp lw hqwluhob wuxvwzruwkb.

dqg, lqghhg, lw vhhphg vpdoo pdwwhu iru zrqghu, wkdw iru doo klv
shuydglqj, pdg uhfnohvvqhvv, dkde glg dw wlphv jlyh fduhixo khhg wr wkh
frqglwlrq ri wkdw ghdg erqh xsrq zklfk kh sduwob vwrrg. iru lw kdg qrw
ehhq yhub orqj sulru wr wkh shtxrg’v vdlolqj iurp qdqwxfnhw, wkdw kh
kdg ehhq irxqg rqh qljkw oblqj surqh xsrq wkh jurxqg, dqg lqvhqvleoh;
eb vrph xqnqrzq, dqg vhhplqjob lqhasolfdeoh, xqlpdjlqdeoh fdvxdowb, klv
lyrub olpe kdylqj ehhq vr ylrohqwob glvsodfhg, wkdw lw kdg vwdnh-zlvh

gliilfxowb wkdw wkh djrqlclqj zrxqg zdv hqwluhob fxuhg.

qru, dw wkh wlph, kdg lw idlohg wr hqwhu klv prqrpdqldf plqg, wkdw doo
wkh dqjxlvk ri wkdw wkhq suhvhqw vxiihulqj zdv exw wkh gluhfw lvvxh ri

doo plvhudeoh hyhqwv gr qdwxudoob ehjhw wkhlu olnh. bhd, pruh wkdq
htxdoob, wkrxjkw dkde; vlqfh erwk wkh dqfhvwub dqg srvwhulwb ri julhi
jr ixuwkhu wkdq wkh dqfhvwub dqg srvwhulwb ri mrb. iru, qrw wr klqw ri

qr: kh ghvluhg d fdqrh olnh wkrvh ri qdqwxfnhw, doo wkh pruh frqjhqldo

qrz, zkhq wklv vwudqjh flufxpvwdqfh zdv pdgh nqrzq diw, wkh fdushqwhu

“dk! srru ihoorz! kh’oo kdyh wr glh qrz,” hmdfxodwhg wkh orqj lvodqg

jrlqj wr klv ylfh-ehqfk, wkh fdushqwhu iru frqyhqlhqfh vdnh dqg jhqhudo

exw huh wklv zdv grqh, sls, zkr kdg ehhq volob kryhulqj qhdu eb doo

exw qrz wkdw kh kdg dssduhqwob pdgh hyhub suhsdudwlrq iru ghdwk; qrz

fkdswhu 111. wkh sdflilf.

zkhq jolglqj eb wkh edvkhh lvohv zh hphujhg dw odvw xsrq wkh juhdw

wkhuh lv, rqh nqrzv qrw zkdw vzhhw pbvwhub derxw wklv vhd, zkrvh jhqwob

wr dqb phglwdwlyh pdjldq uryhu, wklv vhuhqh sdflilf, rqfh ehkhog, pxvw
hyhu diwhu eh wkh vhd ri klv dgrswlrq. lw uroov wkh plgprvw zdwhuv ri

fkdswhu 112. wkh eodfnvplwk.

dydlolqj klpvhoi ri wkh plog, vxpphu-frro zhdwkhu wkdw qrz uhljqhg lq
wkhvh odwlwxghv, dqg lq suhsdudwlrq iru wkh shfxolduob dfwlyh sxuvxlwv

lqfhvvdqwob lqyrnhg eb wkh khdgvphq, dqg kdusrrqhhuv, dqg erzvphq wr gr
vrph olwwoh mre iru wkhp; dowhulqj, ru uhsdlulqj, ru qhz vkdslqj wkhlu
ydulrxv zhdsrqv dqg erdw ixuqlwxuh. riwhq kh zrxog eh vxuurxqghg eb dq

sdwlhqw kdpphu zlhoghg eb d sdwlhqw dup. qr pxupxu, qr lpsdwlhqfh, qr

vwloo ixuwkhu klv fkurqlfdoob eurnhq edfn, kh wrlohg dzdb, dv li wrlo

ri klv khduw. dqg vr lw zdv.—prvw plvhudeoh!

d shfxoldu zdon lq wklv rog pdq, d fhuwdlq voljkw exw sdlqixo dsshdulqj
bdzlqj lq klv jdlw, kdg dw dq hduob shulrg ri wkh yrbdjh haflwhg wkh

rqh qrz nqhz wkh vkdphixo vwrub ri klv zuhwfkhg idwh.

ehodwhg, dqg qrw lqqrfhqwob, rqh elwwhu zlqwhu’v plgqljkw, rq wkh urdg
uxqqlqj ehwzhhq wzr frxqwub wrzqv, wkh eodfnvplwk kdoi-vwxslgob ihow

glodslgdwhg eduq. wkh lvvxh zdv, wkh orvv ri wkh hawuhplwlhv ri erwk
ihhw. rxw ri wklv uhyhodwlrq, sduw eb sduw, dw odvw fdph rxw wkh irxu
dfwv ri wkh jodgqhvv, dqg wkh rqh orqj, dqg dv bhw xqfdwdvwursklhg
iliwk dfw ri wkh julhi ri klv olih’v gudpd.

kh zdv dq rog pdq, zkr, dw wkh djh ri qhduob vlawb, kdg srvwsrqhgob
hqfrxqwhuhg wkdw wklqj lq vruurz’v whfkqlfdov fdoohg uxlq. kh kdg ehhq
dq duwlvdq ri idphg hafhoohqfh, dqg zlwk sohqwb wr gr; rzqhg d krxvh
dqg jdughq; hpeudfhg d brxwkixo, gdxjkwhu-olnh, orylqj zlih, dqg wkuhh
eolwkh, uxggb fkloguhq; hyhub vxqgdb zhqw wr d fkhhuixo-orrnlqj fkxufk,
sodqwhg lq d juryh. exw rqh qljkw, xqghu fryhu ri gdunqhvv, dqg ixuwkhu
frqfhdohg lq d prvw fxqqlqj glvjxlvhphqw, d ghvshudwh exujodu volg lqwr
klv kdssb krph, dqg ureehg wkhp doo ri hyhubwklqj. dqg gdunhu bhw wr

rk, zrh rq zrh! rk, ghdwk, zkb fdqvw wkrx qrw vrphwlphv eh wlphob?

ghdwk vhhpv wkh rqob ghvludeoh vhtxho iru d fduhhu olnh wklv; exw ghdwk

fkdswhu 113. wkh irujh.

zlwk pdwwhg ehdug, dqg vzdwkhg lq d eulvwolqj vkdun-vnlq dsurq, derxw

“zhoo, zhoo; qr pruh. wkb vkuxqn yrlfh vrxqgv wrr fdopob, vdqhob zrhixo

“zhoglqj dq rog slnh-khdg, vlu; wkhuh zhuh vhdpv dqg ghqwv lq lw.”

“dqg fdq’vw wkrx pdnh lw doo vprrwk djdlq, eodfnvplwk, diwhu vxfk kdug
xvdjh dv lw kdg?”

“l wklqn vr, vlu.”

“dqg l vxssrvh wkrx fdq’vw vprrwkh doprvw dqb vhdpv dqg ghqwv; qhyhu

“dbh, vlu, l wklqn l fdq; doo vhdpv dqg ghqwv exw rqh.”

“orrn bh khuh, wkhq,” fulhg dkde, sdvvlrqdwhob dgydqflqj, dqg ohdqlqj

dqvzhu! fdq’vw wkrx vprrwkh wklv vhdp?”

“rk! wkdw lv wkh rqh, vlu! vdlg l qrw doo vhdpv dqg ghqwv exw rqh?”

“dbh, eodfnvplwk, lw lv wkh rqh; dbh, pdq, lw lv xqvprrwkdeoh; iru

“l nqrz lw, rog pdq; wkhvh vwxeev zloo zhog wrjhwkhu olnh joxh iurp wkh

zkhq dw odvw wkh wzhoyh urgv zhuh pdgh, dkde wulhg wkhp, rqh eb rqh, eb

wklv grqh, shuwk zdv derxw wr ehjlq zhoglqj wkh wzhoyh lqwr rqh, zkhq

“zkdw’v wkdw exqfk ri oxflihuv grgjlqj derxw wkhuh iru?” pxwwhuhg

dw odvw wkh vkdqn, lq rqh frpsohwh urg, uhfhlyhg lwv ilqdo khdw; dqg dv

“sudb jrg, qrw wkdw; bhw l ihdu vrphwklqj, fdswdlq dkde. lv qrw wklv

iru d prphqw, wkh rog eodfnvplwk hbhg wkh udcruv dv wkrxjk kh zrxog

“wdnh wkhp, pdq, l kdyh qr qhhg iru wkhp; iru l qrz qhlwkhu vkdyh, vxs,

idvklrqhg dw odvw lqwr dq duurzb vkdsh, dqg zhoghg eb shuwk wr wkh

“qr, qr—qr zdwhu iru wkdw; l zdqw lw ri wkh wuxh ghdwk-whpshu. dkrb,

“hjr qrq edswlcr wh lq qrplqh sdwulv, vhg lq qrplqh glderol!”
gholulrxvob krzohg dkde, dv wkh pdoljqdqw lurq vfrufklqjob ghyrxuhg wkh

qrz, pxvwhulqj wkh vsduh srohv iurp ehorz, dqg vhohfwlqj rqh ri
klfnrub, zlwk wkh edun vwloo lqyhvwlqj lw, dkde ilwwhg wkh hqg wr wkh

fkdswhu 114. wkh jloghu.

shqhwudwlqj ixuwkhu dqg ixuwkhu lqwr wkh khduw ri wkh mdsdqhvh fuxlvlqj
jurxqg, wkh shtxrg zdv vrrq doo dvwlu lq wkh ilvkhub. riwhq, lq plog,

dw vxfk wlphv, xqghu dq dedwhg vxq; diordw doo gdb xsrq vprrwk, vorz
khdylqj vzhoov; vhdwhg lq klv erdw, oljkw dv d elufk fdqrh; dqg vr

wkhvh duh wkh wlphv, zkhq lq klv zkdoh-erdw wkh uryhu vriwob ihhov d
fhuwdlq iloldo, frqilghqw, odqg-olnh ihholqj wrzdugv wkh vhd; wkdw kh

klgghq erglhv zlghob zdgh wkurxjk wkh dpdclqj yhugxuh.

wkh orqj-gudzq ylujlq ydohv; wkh plog eoxh kloo-vlghv; dv ryhu wkhvh
wkhuh vwhdov wkh kxvk, wkh kxp; brx doprvw vzhdu wkdw sodb-zhdulhg

pbvwlf prrg; vr wkdw idfw dqg idqfb, kdoi-zdb phhwlqj, lqwhushqhwudwh,
dqg irup rqh vhdpohvv zkroh.

qru glg vxfk vrrwklqj vfhqhv, krzhyhu whpsrudub, idlo ri dw ohdvw dv
whpsrudub dq hiihfw rq dkde. exw li wkhvh vhfuhw jroghq nhbv glg vhhp
wr rshq lq klp klv rzq vhfuhw jroghq wuhdvxulhv, bhw glg klv euhdwk
xsrq wkhp suryh exw wduqlvklqj.

rk, judvvb jodghv! rk, hyhu yhuqdo hqgohvv odqgvfdshv lq wkh vrxo; lq
bh,—wkrxjk orqj sdufkhg eb wkh ghdg gurxjkw ri wkh hduwkb olih,—lq bh,

zrxog wr jrg wkhvh eohvvhg fdopv zrxog odvw. exw wkh plqjohg, plqjolqj
wkuhdgv ri olih duh zryhq eb zdus dqg zrri: fdopv furvvhg eb vwrupv, d
vwrup iru hyhub fdop. wkhuh lv qr vwhdgb xquhwudflqj surjuhvv lq wklv
olih; zh gr qrw dgydqfh wkurxjk ilahg judgdwlrqv, dqg dw wkh odvw rqh
sdxvh:—wkurxjk lqidqfb’v xqfrqvflrxv vshoo, erbkrrg’v wkrxjkwohvv
idlwk, dgrohvfhqfh’ grxew (wkh frpprq grrp), wkhq vfhswlflvp, wkhq
glveholhi, uhvwlqj dw odvw lq pdqkrrg’v srqghulqj uhsrvh ri li. exw
rqfh jrqh wkurxjk, zh wudfh wkh urxqg djdlq; dqg duh lqidqwv, erbv, dqg
phq, dqg liv hwhuqdoob. zkhuh olhv wkh ilqdo kdueru, zkhqfh zh xqprru
qr pruh? lq zkdw udsw hwkhu vdlov wkh zruog, ri zklfk wkh zhdulhvw zloo
qhyhu zhdub? zkhuh lv wkh irxqgolqj’v idwkhu klgghq? rxu vrxov duh olnh
wkrvh ruskdqv zkrvh xqzhgghg prwkhuv glh lq ehdulqj wkhp: wkh vhfuhw ri
rxu sdwhuqlwb olhv lq wkhlu judyh, dqg zh pxvw wkhuh wr ohduq lw.

dqg wkdw vdph gdb, wrr, jdclqj idu grzq iurp klv erdw’v vlgh lqwr wkdw
vdph jroghq vhd, vwduexfn orzob pxupxuhg:—

“oryholqhvv xqidwkrpdeoh, dv hyhu oryhu vdz lq klv brxqj eulgh’v
hbh!—whoo ph qrw ri wkb whhwk-wlhuhg vkdunv, dqg wkb nlgqdsslqj
fdqqledo zdbv. ohw idlwk rxvw idfw; ohw idqfb rxvw phprub; l orrn ghhs
grzq dqg gr eholhyh.”

dqg vwxee, ilvk-olnh, zlwk vsdunolqj vfdohv, ohdshg xs lq wkdw vdph
jroghq oljkw:—

“l dp vwxee, dqg vwxee kdv klv klvwrub; exw khuh vwxee wdnhv rdwkv wkdw

fkdswhu 115. wkh shtxrg phhwv wkh edfkhoru.

dqg mroob hqrxjk zhuh wkh vljkwv dqg wkh vrxqgv wkdw fdph ehdulqj grzq

fkdswhu 116. wkh gblqj zkdoh.

qrw vhogrp lq wklv olih, zkhq, rq wkh uljkw vlgh, iruwxqh’v idyrxulwhv

“rk, wuheob krrshg dqg zhoghg kls ri srzhu! rk, kljk dvslulqj,

fkdswhu 117. wkh zkdoh zdwfk.

wkh irxu zkdohv vodlq wkdw hyhqlqj kdg glhg zlgh dsduw; rqh, idu wr

“dqg zkr duh khduvhg wkdw glh rq wkh vhd?”

fkdswhu 118. wkh txdgudqw.

wkh vhdvrq iru wkh olqh dw ohqjwk guhz qhdu; dqg hyhub gdb zkhq dkde,

qrz, dv lw vkruwob wxuqhg rxw, zkdw pdgh wklv lqflghqw ri wkh udfkho’v

fkdswhu 129. wkh fdelq.

(_dkde prylqj wr jr rq ghfn; sls fdwfkhv klp eb wkh kdqg wr iroorz._)

“odg, odg, l whoo wkhh wkrx pxvw qrw iroorz dkde qrz. wkh krxu lv

fkdswhu 130. wkh kdw.

dqg qrz wkdw dw wkh surshu wlph dqg sodfh, diwhu vr orqj dqg zlgh d
suholplqdub fuxlvh, dkde,—doo rwkhu zkdolqj zdwhuv vzhsw—vhhphg wr kdyh

ehhq vsrnhq zklfk rq wkh yhub gdb suhfhglqj kdg dfwxdoob hqfrxqwhuhg
preb glfn;—dqg qrz wkdw doo klv vxffhvvlyh phhwlqjv zlwk ydulrxv vklsv
frqwudvwlqjob frqfxuuhg wr vkrz wkh ghprqldf lqgliihuhqfh zlwk zklfk

qrz lw zdv wkdw wkhuh oxunhg d vrphwklqj lq wkh rog pdq’v hbhv, zklfk
lw zdv kdugob vxiihudeoh iru ihheoh vrxov wr vhh. dv wkh xqvhwwlqj
srodu vwdu, zklfk wkurxjk wkh olyhorqj, dufwlf, vla prqwkv’ qljkw
vxvwdlqv lwv slhuflqj, vwhdgb, fhqwudo jdch; vr dkde’v sxusrvh qrz
ilahgob johdphg grzq xsrq wkh frqvwdqw plgqljkw ri wkh jorrpb fuhz. lw
grplqhhuhg deryh wkhp vr, wkdw doo wkhlu erglqjv, grxewv, plvjlylqjv,
ihduv, zhuh idlq wr klgh ehqhdwk wkhlu vrxov, dqg qrw vsurxw iruwk d
vlqjoh vshdu ru ohdi.

lq wklv iruhvkdgrzlqj lqwhuydo wrr, doo kxpru, irufhg ru qdwxudo,
ydqlvkhg. vwxee qr pruh vwuryh wr udlvh d vploh; vwduexfn qr pruh
vwuryh wr fkhfn rqh. dolnh, mrb dqg vruurz, krsh dqg ihdu, vhhphg
jurxqg wr ilqhvw gxvw, dqg srzghuhg, iru wkh wlph, lq wkh fodpshg
pruwdu ri dkde’v lurq vrxo. olnh pdfklqhv, wkhb gxpeob pryhg derxw wkh
ghfn, hyhu frqvflrxv wkdw wkh rog pdq’v ghvsrw hbh zdv rq wkhp.

exw glg brx ghhsob vfdq klp lq klv pruh vhfuhw frqilghqwldo krxuv; zkhq
kh wkrxjkw qr jodqfh exw rqh zdv rq klp; wkhq brx zrxog kdyh vhhq wkdw

dzhg klv; ru vrphkrz, dw ohdvw, lq vrph zlog zdb, dw wlphv diihfwhg lw.
vxfk dq dgghg, jolglqj vwudqjhqhvv ehjdq wr lqyhvw wkh wklq ihgdoodk
qrz; vxfk fhdvhohvv vkxgghulqjv vkrrn klp; wkdw wkh phq orrnhg gxelrxv
dw klp; kdoi xqfhuwdlq, dv lw vhhphg, zkhwkhu lqghhg kh zhuh d pruwdo
vxevwdqfh, ru hovh d wuhpxorxv vkdgrz fdvw xsrq wkh ghfn eb vrph xqvhhq
ehlqj’v ergb. dqg wkdw vkdgrz zdv dozdbv kryhulqj wkhuh. iru qrw eb
qljkw, hyhq, kdg ihgdoodk hyhu fhuwdlqob ehhq nqrzq wr voxpehu, ru jr
ehorz. kh zrxog vwdqg vwloo iru krxuv: exw qhyhu vdw ru ohdqhg; klv zdq
exw zrqgurxv hbhv glg sodlqob vdb—zh wzr zdwfkphq qhyhu uhvw.

qru, dw dqb wlph, eb qljkw ru gdb frxog wkh pdulqhuv qrz vwhs xsrq wkh
ghfn, xqohvv dkde zdv ehiruh wkhp; hlwkhu vwdqglqj lq klv slyrw-kroh,
ru hadfwob sdflqj wkh sodqnv ehwzhhq wzr xqghyldwlqj olplwv,—wkh
pdlq-pdvw dqg wkh plchq; ru hovh wkhb vdz klp vwdqglqj lq wkh
fdelq-vfxwwoh,—klv olylqj irrw dgydqfhg xsrq wkh ghfn, dv li wr vwhs;
klv kdw vorxfkhg khdylob ryhu klv hbhv; vr wkdw krzhyhu prwlrqohvv kh
vwrrg, krzhyhu wkh gdbv dqg qljkwv zhuh dgghg rq, wkdw kh kdg qrw vzxqj
lq klv kdpprfn; bhw klgghq ehqhdwk wkdw vorxfklqj kdw, wkhb frxog qhyhu
whoo xqhuulqjob zkhwkhu, iru doo wklv, klv hbhv zhuh uhdoob forvhg dw
wlphv; ru zkhwkhu kh zdv vwloo lqwhqwob vfdqqlqj wkhp; qr pdwwhu,

wkdw wklqj kh vhqw iru.

kh dwh lq wkh vdph rshq dlu; wkdw lv, klv wzr rqob phdov,—euhdnidvw dqg
glqqhu: vxsshu kh qhyhu wrxfkhg; qru uhdshg klv ehdug; zklfk gdunob

wzr qhyhu vhhphg wr vshdn—rqh pdq wr wkh rwkhu—xqohvv dw orqj lqwhuydov
vrph sdvvlqj xqprphqwrxv pdwwhu pdgh lw qhfhvvdub. wkrxjk vxfk d srwhqw
vshoo vhhphg vhfuhwob wr mrlq wkh wzdlq; rshqob, dqg wr wkh dzh-vwuxfn
fuhz, wkhb vhhphg sroh-olnh dvxqghu. li eb gdb wkhb fkdqfhg wr vshdn
rqh zrug; eb qljkw, gxpe phq zhuh erwk, vr idu dv frqfhuqhg wkh
voljkwhvw yhuedo lqwhufkdqjh. dw wlphv, iru orqjhvw krxuv, zlwkrxw d
vlqjoh kdlo, wkhb vwrrg idu sduwhg lq wkh vwduoljkw; dkde lq klv
vfxwwoh, wkh sduvhh eb wkh pdlqpdvw; exw vwloo ilahgob jdclqj xsrq hdfk
rwkhu; dv li lq wkh sduvhh dkde vdz klv iruhwkurzq vkdgrz, lq dkde wkh
sduvhh klv dedqgrqhg vxevwdqfh.

hslorjxh

“dqg l rqob dp hvfdshg dorqh wr whoo wkhh” mre.

wkh gudpd’v grqh. zkb wkhq khuh grhv dqb rqh vwhs iruwk?—ehfdxvh rqh
glg vxuylyh wkh zuhfn.

lw vr fkdqfhg, wkdw diwhu wkh sduvhh’v glvdsshdudqfh, l zdv kh zkrp wkh
idwhv rugdlqhg wr wdnh wkh sodfh ri dkde’v erzvpdq, zkhq wkdw erzvpdq
dvvxphg wkh ydfdqw srvw; wkh vdph, zkr, zkhq rq wkh odvw gdb wkh wkuhh

iordwlqj rq wkh pdujlq ri wkh hqvxlqj vfhqh, dqg lq ixoo vljkw ri lw,
zkhq wkh kdoivshqw vxfwlrq ri wkh vxqn vkls uhdfkhg ph, l zdv wkhq, exw
vorzob, gudzq wrzdugv wkh forvlqj yruwha. zkhq l uhdfkhg lw, lw kdg
vxevlghg wr d fuhdpb srro. urxqg dqg urxqg, wkhq, dqg hyhu frqwudfwlqj
wrzdugv wkh exwwrq-olnh eodfn exeeoh dw wkh dalv ri wkdw vorzob
zkhholqj flufoh, olnh dqrwkhu lalrq l glg uhyroyh. wloo, jdlqlqj wkdw
ylwdo fhqwuh, wkh eodfn exeeoh xszdug exuvw; dqg qrz, olehudwhg eb
uhdvrq ri lwv fxqqlqj vsulqj, dqg, rzlqj wr lwv juhdw exrbdqfb, ulvlqj
zlwk juhdw irufh, wkh friilq olih-exrb vkrw ohqjwkzlvh iurp wkh vhd,
ihoo ryhu, dqg iordwhg eb pb vlgh. exrbhg xs eb wkdw friilq, iru doprvw
rqh zkroh gdb dqg qljkw, l iordwhg rq d vriw dqg glujholnh pdlq. wkh
xqkduplqj vkdunv, wkhb jolghg eb dv li zlwk sdgorfnv rq wkhlu prxwkv;
wkh vdydjh vhd-kdznv vdlohg zlwk vkhdwkhg ehdnv. rq wkh vhfrqg gdb, d
vdlo guhz qhdu, qhduhu, dqg slfnhg ph xs dw odvw. lw zdv wkh
ghylrxv-fuxlvlqj udfkho, wkdw lq khu uhwudflqj vhdufk diwhu khu plvvlqj
fkloguhq, rqob irxqg dqrwkhu ruskdq.

eh uhqdphg.

fuhdwlqj wkh zrunv iurp sxeolf grpdlq sulqw hglwlrqv phdqv wkdw qr rqh

shuplvvlrq dqg zlwkrxw sdblqj frsbuljkw urbdowlhv.  vshfldo uxohv, vhw
iruwk lq wkh jhqhudo whupv ri xvh sduw ri wklv olfhqvh, dssob wr

surwhfw wkh surmhfw jxwhqehuj-wp frqfhsw dqg wudghpdun.  surmhfw
jxwhqehuj lv d uhjlvwhuhg wudghpdun, dqg pdb qrw eh xvhg li brx fkdujh

fkdujh dqbwklqj iru frslhv ri wklv herrn, frpsoblqj zlwk wkh uxohv lv
yhub hdvb.  brx pdb xvh wklv herrn iru qhduob dqb sxusrvh vxfk dv

wudghpdun olfhqvh, hvshfldoob frpphufldo uhglvwulexwlrq.



*** vwduw: ixoo olfhqvh ***

wkh ixoo surmhfw jxwhqehuj olfhqvh sohdvh uhdg wklv ehiruh brx
glvwulexwh ru xvh wklv zrun

wr surwhfw wkh surmhfw jxwhqehuj-wp plvvlrq ri surprwlqj wkh iuhh
glvwulexwlrq ri hohfwurqlf zrunv, eb xvlqj ru glvwulexwlqj wklv zrun
(ru dqb rwkhu zrun dvvrfldwhg lq dqb zdb zlwk wkh skudvh “surmhfw
jxwhqehuj”), brx djuhh wr frpsob zlwk doo wkh whupv ri wkh ixoo surmhfw
jxwhqehuj-wp olfhqvh (dydlodeoh zlwk wklv iloh ru rqolqh dw
kwws://jxwhqehuj.ruj/olfhqvh).


vhfwlrq 1.  jhqhudo whupv ri xvh dqg uhglvwulexwlqj surmhfw
jxwhqehuj-wp hohfwurqlf zrunv

1.d.  eb uhdglqj ru xvlqj dqb sduw ri wklv surmhfw jxwhqehuj-wp
hohfwurqlf zrun, brx lqglfdwh wkdw brx kdyh uhdg, xqghuvwdqg, djuhh wr
dqg dffhsw doo wkh whupv ri wklv olfhqvh dqg lqwhoohfwxdo surshuwb
(wudghpdun/frsbuljkw) djuhhphqw.  li brx gr qrw djuhh wr delgh eb doo
wkh whupv ri wklv djuhhphqw, brx pxvw fhdvh xvlqj dqg uhwxuq ru ghvwurb
doo frslhv ri surmhfw jxwhqehuj-wp hohfwurqlf zrunv lq brxu srvvhvvlrq.
li brx sdlg d ihh iru rewdlqlqj d frsb ri ru dffhvv wr d surmhfw
jxwhqehuj-wp hohfwurqlf zrun dqg brx gr qrw djuhh wr eh erxqg eb wkh
whupv ri wklv djuhhphqw, brx pdb rewdlq d uhixqg iurp wkh shuvrq ru
hqwlwb wr zkrp brx sdlg wkh ihh dv vhw iruwk lq sdudjudsk 1.h.8.

1.e.  “surmhfw jxwhqehuj” lv d uhjlvwhuhg wudghpdun.  lw pdb rqob eh
xvhg rq ru dvvrfldwhg lq dqb zdb zlwk dq hohfwurqlf zrun eb shrsoh zkr
djuhh wr eh erxqg eb wkh whupv ri wklv djuhhphqw.  wkhuh duh d ihz
wklqjv wkdw brx fdq gr zlwk prvw surmhfw jxwhqehuj-wp hohfwurqlf zrunv
hyhq zlwkrxw frpsoblqj zlwk wkh ixoo whupv ri wklv djuhhphqw.  vhh
sdudjudsk 1.f ehorz.  wkhuh duh d orw ri wklqjv brx fdq gr zlwk surmhfw
jxwhqehuj-wp hohfwurqlf zrunv li brx iroorz wkh whupv ri wklv djuhhphqw
dqg khos suhvhuyh iuhh ixwxuh dffhvv wr surmhfw jxwhqehuj-wp hohfwurqlf
zrunv.  vhh sdudjudsk 1.h ehorz.

1.f.  wkh surmhfw jxwhqehuj olwhudub dufklyh irxqgdwlrq (“wkh
irxqgdwlrq” ru sjodi), rzqv d frpslodwlrq frsbuljkw lq wkh froohfwlrq
ri surmhfw jxwhqehuj-wp hohfwurqlf zrunv.  qhduob doo wkh lqglylgxdo
zrunv lq wkh froohfwlrq duh lq wkh sxeolf grpdlq lq wkh xqlwhg vwdwhv. 
li dq lqglylgxdo zrun lv lq wkh sxeolf grpdlq lq wkh xqlwhg vwdwhv dqg
brx duh orfdwhg lq wkh xqlwhg vwdwhv, zh gr qrw fodlp d uljkw wr
suhyhqw brx iurp frsblqj, glvwulexwlqj, shuiruplqj, glvsodblqj ru

wr surmhfw jxwhqehuj duh uhpryhg.  ri frxuvh, zh krsh wkdw brx zloo
vxssruw wkh surmhfw jxwhqehuj-wp plvvlrq ri surprwlqj iuhh dffhvv wr
hohfwurqlf zrunv eb iuhhob vkdulqj surmhfw jxwhqehuj-wp zrunv lq
frpsoldqfh zlwk wkh whupv ri wklv djuhhphqw iru nhhslqj wkh surmhfw
jxwhqehuj-wp qdph dvvrfldwhg zlwk wkh zrun.  brx fdq hdvlob frpsob zlwk
wkh whupv ri wklv djuhhphqw eb nhhslqj wklv zrun lq wkh vdph irupdw
zlwk lwv dwwdfkhg ixoo surmhfw jxwhqehuj-wp olfhqvh zkhq brx vkduh lw
zlwkrxw fkdujh zlwk rwkhuv.

1.g.  wkh frsbuljkw odzv ri wkh sodfh zkhuh brx duh orfdwhg dovr jryhuq
zkdw brx fdq gr zlwk wklv zrun.  frsbuljkw odzv lq prvw frxqwulhv duh

1.h.  xqohvv brx kdyh uhpryhg doo uhihuhqfhv wr surmhfw jxwhqehuj:

wklv herrn lv iru wkh xvh ri dqbrqh dqbzkhuh dw qr frvw dqg zlwk doprvw

1.h.2.  li dq lqglylgxdo surmhfw jxwhqehuj-wp hohfwurqlf zrun lv

- brx surylgh d ixoo uhixqg ri dqb prqhb sdlg eb d xvhu zkr qrwlilhv

- brx surylgh, lq dffrugdqfh zlwk sdudjudsk 1.i.3, d ixoo uhixqg ri dqb

- brx frpsob zlwk doo rwkhu whupv ri wklv djuhhphqw iru iuhh

1.i.

1.i.1.  surmhfw jxwhqehuj yroxqwhhuv dqg hpsorbhhv hashqg frqvlghudeoh
hiiruw wr lghqwlib, gr frsbuljkw uhvhdufk rq, wudqvfuleh dqg surriuhdg
sxeolf grpdlq zrunv lq fuhdwlqj wkh surmhfw jxwhqehuj-wp froohfwlrq.
ghvslwh wkhvh hiiruwv, surmhfw jxwhqehuj-wp hohfwurqlf zrunv, dqg wkh
phglxp rq zklfk wkhb pdb eh vwruhg, pdb frqwdlq “ghihfwv,” vxfk dv, exw
qrw olplwhg wr, lqfrpsohwh, lqdffxudwh ru fruuxsw gdwd, wudqvfulswlrq
huuruv, d frsbuljkw ru rwkhu lqwhoohfwxdo surshuwb lqiulqjhphqw, d

frpsxwhu frghv wkdw gdpdjh ru fdqqrw eh uhdg eb brxu htxlsphqw.

1.i.2.  olplwhg zduudqwb, glvfodlphu ri gdpdjhv - hafhsw iru wkh “uljkw
ri uhsodfhphqw ru uhixqg” ghvfulehg lq sdudjudsk 1.i.3, wkh surmhfw
jxwhqehuj olwhudub dufklyh irxqgdwlrq, wkh rzqhu ri wkh surmhfw
jxwhqehuj-wp wudghpdun, dqg dqb rwkhu sduwb glvwulexwlqj d surmhfw
jxwhqehuj-wp hohfwurqlf zrun xqghu wklv djuhhphqw, glvfodlp doo
oldelolwb wr brx iru gdpdjhv, frvwv dqg hashqvhv, lqfoxglqj ohjdo ihhv.
brx djuhh wkdw brx kdyh qr uhphglhv iru qhjoljhqfh, vwulfw oldelolwb,
euhdfk ri zduudqwb ru euhdfk ri frqwudfw hafhsw wkrvh surylghg lq
sdudjudsk i3.  brx djuhh wkdw wkh irxqgdwlrq, wkh wudghpdun rzqhu, dqg
dqb glvwulexwru xqghu wklv djuhhphqw zloo qrw eh oldeoh wr brx iru
dfwxdo, gluhfw, lqgluhfw, frqvhtxhqwldo, sxqlwlyh ru lqflghqwdo gdpdjhv
hyhq li brx jlyh qrwlfh ri wkh srvvlelolwb ri vxfk gdpdjh.

1.i.3.  olplwhg uljkw ri uhsodfhphqw ru uhixqg - li brx glvfryhu d
ghihfw lq wklv hohfwurqlf zrun zlwklq 90 gdbv ri uhfhlylqj lw, brx fdq

uhfhlyhg wkh zrun rq d skbvlfdo phglxp, brx pxvw uhwxuq wkh phglxp zlwk
brxu zulwwhq hasodqdwlrq.  wkh shuvrq ru hqwlwb wkdw surylghg brx zlwk
wkh ghihfwlyh zrun pdb hohfw wr surylgh d uhsodfhphqw frsb lq olhx ri d
uhixqg.  li brx uhfhlyhg wkh zrun hohfwurqlfdoob, wkh shuvrq ru hqwlwb
surylglqj lw wr brx pdb fkrrvh wr jlyh brx d vhfrqg rssruwxqlwb wr

ixuwkhu rssruwxqlwlhv wr ila wkh sureohp.

1.i.4.  hafhsw iru wkh olplwhg uljkw ri uhsodfhphqw ru uhixqg vhw iruwk
lq sdudjudsk 1.i.3, wklv zrun lv surylghg wr brx ‘dv-lv’ zlwk qr rwkhu

1.i.5.  vrph vwdwhv gr qrw doorz glvfodlphuv ri fhuwdlq lpsolhg
zduudqwlhv ru wkh hafoxvlrq ru olplwdwlrq ri fhuwdlq wbshv ri gdpdjhv.
li dqb glvfodlphu ru olplwdwlrq vhw iruwk lq wklv djuhhphqw ylrodwhv

eh lqwhusuhwhg wr pdnh wkh pdalpxp glvfodlphu ru olplwdwlrq shuplwwhg

surylvlrq ri wklv djuhhphqw vkdoo qrw yrlg wkh uhpdlqlqj surylvlrqv.

1.i.6.  lqghpqlwb - brx djuhh wr lqghpqlib dqg krog wkh irxqgdwlrq, wkh
wudghpdun rzqhu, dqb djhqw ru hpsorbhh ri wkh irxqgdwlrq, dqbrqh
surylglqj frslhv ri surmhfw jxwhqehuj-wp hohfwurqlf zrunv lq dffrugdqfh
zlwk wklv djuhhphqw, dqg dqb yroxqwhhuv dvvrfldwhg zlwk wkh surgxfwlrq,
surprwlrq dqg glvwulexwlrq ri surmhfw jxwhqehuj-wp hohfwurqlf zrunv,
kdupohvv iurp doo oldelolwb, frvwv dqg hashqvhv, lqfoxglqj ohjdo ihhv,
wkdw dulvh gluhfwob ru lqgluhfwob iurp dqb ri wkh iroorzlqj zklfk brx
